analyzed: atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām jijñāsā adhikaraṇam
maṅgala ācaraṇam
śriyaḥ patye nitya agaṇita guṇa māṇikya viśada prabhā jāla ullāsa upahata sakala avadya tamase
jagat janma sthema pralaya racanā śīla vapuṣe śeṣa āmnāya smṛti hṛdaya dīptāya haraye  /

original: yena prādurabhāvi bhūmivalaye vyastāri gosantatiḥ prābodhi śrutipaṅkajaṃ karuṇayā prākāśi tattvaṃ param /
analyzed: yena prādurabhāvi bhūmi valaye vyastāri go santatiḥ prābodhi śruti paṅkajam karuṇayā prākāśi tattvam param

original: dhvāntaṃ dhvaṃsamanāyi sādhunikaraścākāri sanmārgagastena vyāsadivākareṇa satataṃ mā tyāji me mānasam // 2 // *1,17*
analyzed: dhvāntam dhvaṃsam anāyi sādhu nikaraḥ ca akāri sat mārga gaḥ tena vyāsa divākareṇa satatam mā tyāji me mānasam  /

original: vyāptiryasya nije nijena mahasā pakṣe sapakṣe sthitirvyāvṛttiśca vipakṣato 'tha viṣaye saktinar vai bādhite /
analyzed: vyāptiḥ yasya nije nijena mahasā pakṣe sapakṣe sthitiḥ vyāvṛttiḥ ca viṣaye vai bādhite

original: naivāsti pratipakṣayuktiratulaṃ śuddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ sa me bhūyāttattvavinirṇayāya bhagavānānandatīrtho muniḥ // 3 // *1,20*
analyzed: na eva asti pratipakṣa yuktiḥ atulam śuddham pramāṇam sa me bhūyāt tattva vinirṇayāya bhagavān ānandatīrthaḥ muniḥ

original: bhavati yadanubhavādeḍamūko 'pi vāgmī jaḍamatirapi janturjāyate prājñamauliḥ /
analyzed: bhavati vāgmī jaḍa matiḥ api jantuḥ jāyate prājña mauliḥ

original: sakalavacanaceto devatā bhāratī sā mama vacasi nidhattāṃ sannidhiṃ mānase ca // 4 // *1,21*
analyzed: sakala vacana cetaḥ devatā bhāratī sā mama vacasi nidhattām sannidhim mānase ca
vairāgya bhāgyaḥ mama padmanābha tīrtha amṛta abdhiḥ bhavatāt vibhūtyai
pada vākya pramāṇa jñān prativādi mada chidaḥ
śrīmat akṣobhyatīrtha ākhyān upatiṣṭhe gurūn mama
anuvyākhyāna naline cañcarīkati me manaḥ

original: na śabdābdhau gāḍhā naca nigamacarcāsu caturā naca nyāye prauḍhā naca viditavedyā api vayam /
analyzed: na śabda abdhau gāḍhāḥ na ca nigama carcāsu caturāḥ na ca nyāye prauḍhāḥ na ca vidita vedyāḥ api vayam

original: paraṃ śrīmatpūrṇapramatigurukāruṇyasaraṇiṃ prapannā mānyāḥ smaḥ kimapi ca vadanto 'pi mahatām // 8 // *1,30*
analyzed: param śrīmat pūrṇapramati guru kāruṇya saraṇim prapannāḥ mānyāḥ smaḥ kim api ca mahatām
bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena prāṇinām niḥśreyasāya praṇītam api brahmamīmāṃsā śāstram asādhu nibandha andhatamasa avakuṇṭhita tvena apraṇītam iva
manyamānaḥ bhagavān ānandatīrtha muniḥ yathā ācārya abhiprāyam asya bhāṣyam vidhāya anubhāṣyam api
kariṣyan vilīna prakṛti tayā svayam antarāya vidhuraḥ pi anavaratam īśvara pravaṇa kāya karaṇa vṛttiḥ api
nārāyaṇa praṇāma ādikam prāripsitasya anantarāya parisamāpteḥ pracayasya ca hetu tayā avigīta śiṣya ācāra paramparā ādinā avagatam avaśyam

original: karaṇīyaṃ śiṣyān grāhayituṃ granthādau nibadhnāti- nārāyaṇamiti // *1,37*
analyzed: karaṇīyam śiṣyān grāhayitum grantha ādau nibadhnāti nārāyaṇam iti
nārāyaṇam nikhila pūrṇa guṇa eka deham nirdoṣam āpyatamam api akhilaiḥ su vākyaiḥ

original: asyodbhavādidamaśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi vandyaṃ sadā priyatamaṃ mama sannamāmi // MAnuv_1,1.1 //
analyzed: asya udbhavāt idam aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ vandyam sadā priyatamam mama sat namāmi
atra nārāyaṇam san namāmi iti anvayaḥ
uttama puruṣa prayogāt eva aham iti labhyate
sam iti bhakta yā ādi atiśaya sāhitya lakṣaṇām pramāṇasya samyaktām āha
tathāvidhaḥ eva hi nārāyaṇa praṇāmaḥ bhavati abhimata siddheḥ aṅgam

original: nikhiletyādīnāṃ tu pramāṇakarmaṇā nārāyaṇena viśeṣaṇatayā sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: nikhila ityādīnām tu pramāṇa karmaṇā nārāyaṇena viśeṣaṇatayā sambandhaḥ
prayojanam ca stuti padānām viśeṣya praśaṃsā eva
tatra ārthika punarukteḥ stuti tvam eva samādhānam avadhātavyam
athavā
kutas nārāyaṇasya namya tvam

original: tathātve 'pi kṛto 'nyāsu devatāsu satīṣu tasyaiva namanamityatroktamaśeṣaviśeṣato 'pi vandyamiti /
analyzed: tathātve pi kṛtaḥ nyāsu devatāsu satīṣu tasya eva namanam iti atra uktam aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ vandyam iti

original: viśiṣṭate vastvebhiriti viśeṣā asādhāraṇadharmā aśeṣāśca te viśeṣāśca /
analyzed: viśiṣṭate vastu ebhiḥ iti viśeṣāḥ asādhāraṇa dharmāḥ aśeṣāḥ ca te viśeṣāḥ ca
apiḥ abhivyāptau

original: yāvanto vandyatvanimittabhūtā dharmāḥ tebhyo viśeṣebhyo 'pi hetubhyo vandyam /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ vandya tva nimitta bhūtāḥ dharmāḥ tebhyaḥ viśeṣebhyaḥ pi hetubhyaḥ vandyam
tathā aśeṣāt vandya tvena samāśaṅkitāt padma bhava ādeḥ jagataḥ
tatas hetoḥ satīṣu anyāsu devatāsu vandyam iti
etat ubhayam katham nārāyaṇasya iti atas bhihitam nikhila ityādi
trividhā hi devatā vandyā bhavati
viśiṣṭa adhikṛta iṣyā ca iti
nahi devatā vandanam vyasani tayā kriyate
kintu vighna vighāta ādi prayojana apekṣayā
viśiṣṭā eva devatā tasya iṣye
adhikṛtā ca sva viṣaya grantha prabodha ādikam sampādayati
vandanam khalu bhakta yādi upetam eva saphalam
tat ca iṣyāyām eva devatāyām upapadyate iti
tatra vaiśiṣyayā upapādanāya nikhila pūrṇa guṇa eka deham nirdoṣam asya udbhavāt idam iti viśeṣaṇa trayam

original: nikhilā niḥśeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ pratyekamapyanavadhikā guṇā ānandādayaḥ /
analyzed: nikhilāḥ niḥśeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ pratyekam api anavadhikāḥ guṇāḥ ānanda ādayaḥ
eka śabdaḥ kevala arthaḥ

original: ta eva deho yasya na punaḥ prākṛtādiriti tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: te eva dehaḥ yasya na punar prākṛta ādiḥ iti tathā uktaḥ
niṣkrāntaḥ doṣebhyaḥ pāratantrya ādibhyaḥ iti nirdoṣaḥ

original: asya pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhatayā buddhisannihitasya svavyatiriktaprapañcasyodbhava utpattirādirasyetyudbhavādi janmādyaṣṭakaṃ tadyathāsambhavaṃ  #
analyzed: asya pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddha tayā buddhi sannihitasya sva vyatirikta prapañcasya udbhavaḥ utpattiḥ ādiḥ asya iti udbhava ādi janma ādi aṣṭakam tat yathāsambhavam
dadāti iti udbhavāt idastam
asya iti sambandha mātre ṣaṣṭhī
pi iti etat asya udbhavāt idam iti anena api sambaddhayate
viyat adhikaraṇa ādi vyutpādya samasta avāntarabheda sahita udbhavāt idam iti
adhikṛta tva pradarśanāya apyatamam api akhilaiḥ su vākyaiḥ iti
api śabdaḥ vandya tve hetu samuccaya arthaḥ
abhivyāptau vā

original: apauruṣeyatvena tanmūlatvena vānāśaṅkitadoṣatvādinā śobhanāni vākyāni vedādīni brahmasūtrādīni ca suvākyāni tairakhilairāpyatamam /
analyzed: apauruṣeya tvena tad mūla tvena vā an āśaṅkita doṣa tva ādinā śobhanāni vākyāni veda ādīni brahmasūtra ādīni ca su vākyāni taiḥ akhilaiḥ āpyatamam
atiśayena pratipādyam

original: yadi vyācikhyāsitena brahmamīmāṃsāśāstreṇa tannirṇetavyārthena vedādinā ca pratipādya iti nārāyaṇo vandanīyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi vyācikhyāsitena brahma mīmāṃsā śāstreṇa tad nirṇetavya arthena veda ādinā ca pratipādyaḥ iti nārāyaṇaḥ vandanīyaḥ

original: hanta tarhi tata eva dharmādikaṃ prāṇādikaṃ vā vandanīyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: hanta tarhi tatas eva dharma ādikam prāṇa ādikam vā vandanīyam syāt
na syāt
tasya nārāyaṇa pratipatti aṅga tayā veda ādi eka deśa pratipādya tvāt
asya punar an anya artha tayā akhila veda ādi vedya tvāt
tathāvidham eva ca adhikṛtam ucyate iti āśayavatā apyatamam iti akhilaiḥ iti ca uktam
sadā priyatamam mama iti
atra api pūrvavat sadā āpadasya tamapaḥ ca prayojanam avadheyam
lakṣaṇa para tayā vyākhyānam
yat vā
na anirdhārita svarūpasya praṇāmaḥ yuktaḥ

original: na cāntareṇa lakṣaṇaṃ vastunirdhāraṇamityato vibhavādanekāni nārāyaṇasya lakṣaṇānyanenocyante /
analyzed: na ca antareṇa lakṣaṇam vastu nirdhāraṇam iti atas vibhavāt anekāni nārāyaṇasya lakṣaṇāni anena ucyante

original: tatra nikhiletyanena nikhilaguṇatvaṃ pūrṇaguṇatvaṃ svato guṇaikadehatvaṃ ceti vipakṣābhedena trīṇi lakṣaṇānyuditāni /
analyzed: tatra nikhila iti anena nikhila guṇa tvam pūrṇa guṇa tvam svatas guṇa eka deha tvam ca iti vipakṣa abhedena trīṇi lakṣaṇāni uditāni
nirdoṣam iti anena ekam
āpyatamam iti anena veda ādi mukhya artha tvam akhila veda ādi artha tvam ca iti dvayam
asya iti anena āṣyau
aśeṣa iti anena mukhya vandya tvam uktam aśeṣāt viśeṣeṇa vandyam iti
sadā iti anena parama prema yogya tvam
tasya an ānubhāvika tvāt asambhavam āśaṅkaya sadā mama iti uktam
anyeṣām api jñāna uttara kālam idam ānubhāvikam mama tu sadā iti
api śabdaḥ lakṣaṇa samuccaye
athavā

original: nikhiletyādyuktalakṣaṇopapannatayā nārāyaṇaḥ kena pramāṇena pratipattavya ityataḥ
analyzed: nikhila ityādi ukta lakṣaṇa upapannatayā nārāyaṇaḥ kena pramāṇena pratipattavyaḥ iti atas
su vākyaiḥ āpyam iti uktam
nanu veda ādi eka deśe nyathā api ucyate na
tad pratīteḥ aparāmarśa pūrvaka tvāt iti āśayena akhilaiḥ iti uditam
tarhi dharma ādi asiddhiḥ syāt
tasya pramāṇa antara agocara tvāt
mā evam
amukhyayā vṛttyā dharma ādeḥ api veda ādi vedya tvāt iti āśayavatā apyatamam iti abhihitam
api śabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa pramāṇa samuccaya arthaḥ
sakala jagat nimitta kāraṇa tva ādi hetubhiḥ api ukta lakṣaṇaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ pratyetavyaḥ iti abhipretya uktam asya iti
bādhaka nirāsa para tayā vyākhyānam
yat vā nārāyaṇasya deha sadbhāve duḥkha ādi doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ
tad abhāve jñāna ādi guṇa abhāvaḥ
ubhayathā api jagat janma ādi kāraṇatva asambhavaḥ iti āśaṅkayā uktam
nikhila pūrṇa guṇa eka deham nirdoṣam iti
dehavat tvāt jñāna ādi guṇa pūrṇaḥ
tasya api nikhila pūrṇa guṇa mātra tvena duḥkha ādi doṣa rahitaḥ ca iti

original: athavā nāyaṃ nārāyaṇaśabdo ḍitthādiśabda iva bhagavati sāṅgetiko ghaṭādiśabda iva vā rūḍhimātrapravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: athavā na ayam nārāyaṇa śabdaḥ ḍittha ādi śabdaḥ iva bhagavati sāṅgetikaḥ ghaṭa ādi śabdaḥ iva vā rūḍhi mātra pravṛttaḥ
kintu viśiṣṭa guṇān api ācaṣṭe iti
sakala śāstra artha para tayā vyākhyānam
athavā śrotṛ buddhaya anukūlanāya sakala śāstra artham saṅkṣepataḥ nena ācaṣṭe
vidita saṅkṣepāḥ hi prapañcam jijñāsavaḥ bhavanti
tatra sadā vandyam iti prathama sūtra artha uktiḥ
manaḥ vṛtteḥ tad pravaṇa tā hi vandanam
jijñāsā api tad viśeṣaḥ eva
tasya jīva ādi vyāvṛttaye yat brahma iti uktam tasya arthaḥ nikhila iti
tad upapādanāya dvitīya sūtre lakṣaṇam abhihitam
tat āha asya iti

original: tṛtīyasūtreṇa tatra śāstraṃ pramāṇamabhidhāya tasyādhyāyaśeṣeṇa tadviṣayatopapāditā /
analyzed: tṛtīya sūtreṇa tatra śāstram pramāṇam abhidhāya tasya adhyāya śeṣeṇa tad viṣaya tā upapāditā
tat kathanamāpyatamam iti
prathama adhyāya arthe śaṅkita doṣa nirāsaḥ dvitīye bhihitaḥ tam āha nirdoṣam iti
evam brahma svarūpe siddhe adhikāriṇaḥ tad prasāda sādhana upāya bhūta tad sākṣātkāra jananāya vairāgya bhaktibhyām akhila veda artha śravaṇa ādi
guru tvena vyāsasya praṇāmaḥ
tam eva śāstra prabhavam praṇamya jagadgurūṇām gurum añjasā eva

original: viśeṣato me paramākhyavidyāvyākhyāṃ karomyanvapi cāhameva // MAnuv_1,1.2 //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ me parama ākhya vidyā vyākhyām karomi anu api ca aham eva
nārāyaṇa praṇāmasya iva guru praṇāmasya api abhimata siddhayaṅgatayā kārya ārambhe vaśyam anuṣṭheya tvāt tad ācaraṇa puraḥsaram
brahma mīmāṃsā śāstra vyākhyānam samarthayamānaḥ pratijānīte tam eva iti
tam pūrva praṇatam nārāyaṇam eva

original: anvapi punarapi praṇamya bhaktayādyupetatālakṣaṇena prakarṣeṇa natvāhaṃ paramākhyavidyāyā brahmamīmāṃsāśāstrarūpāyā vyākhyāṃ karomīti sambandhaḥ
analyzed: anu api punar api praṇamya bhakta yā ādi upeta tā lakṣaṇena prakarṣeṇa natvā aham parama ākhya vidyāyāḥ brahma mīmāṃsā śāstra rūpāyāḥ vyākhyām karomi iti sambandhaḥ
vartamāna sāmīpya ārdra vartamāna vyapadeśaḥ
saṅkṣepataḥ vyākhyānasya prakrānta tvāt vā
nanu praṇatasya punar praṇāmaḥ kimarthaḥ
nahi praṇāma āvṛttiḥ vighna vighāta ādi hetuḥ iti atra niyāmakam asti

original: bhāve vā pūrvaśloka eva bahuśaḥ sannamāmīti vaktavyam /
analyzed: bhāve vā pūrva śloke eva bahuśas san namāmi iti vaktavyam
mā evam
guru tvena atra praṇāma ācaraṇāt
katham nārāyaṇasya guru tvam iti atas āha śāstra prabhavam iti
śāstra śabdena prakṛta tvāt brahma mīmāṃsā śāstram veda ādikam ca ucyate
prabhavati utpadyate prathamam upalabhyate vā yasmāt saḥ prabhavaḥ
yathāsambhavam śāstrasya prabhavaḥ śāstra prabhavaḥ tam

original: yo hi yacchāstre pravartate tasya tatprabhāvo gururiti prasiddhameva /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yat śāstre pravartate tasya tad prabhāvaḥ guruḥ iti prasiddham eva
prakṛta śāstra sampradāya pravartaka tvāt ca nārāyaṇasya guru tvam iti āha jagat gurūṇām iti

original: jagata etacchāstrapravaktṛṇāṃ brahmādīnāmañjasā mukhyatayā na tu vayo 'dhikatvādimātreṇa gurum /
analyzed: jagataḥ etad śāstra pravaktṛṇām brahma ādīnām añjasā mukhya tayā na tu vayaḥ dhika tva ādi mātreṇa gurum
asya śāstrasya pravaktāram iti yāvat

original: prakārāntareṇa gurutvaṃ nārāyaṇasya samarthayate- viśeṣata iti //
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa guru tvam nārāyaṇasya samarthayate viśeṣataḥ iti
gurum iti vartate

original: viśeṣata iti sākṣādupadeṣyṛtvena na tu jagata iva paramparayā /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ iti sākṣāt upadeṣyṛ tvena na tu jagataḥ iva paramparayā

original: atra yadi śāstraprabhavamityādyevocyeta tadā pṛthakpraṇāmena devatāyā gurośca pārthakyaśaṅkā syāt /
analyzed: atra yadi śāstra prabhavam ityādi eva ucyeta tadā pṛthak praṇāmena devatāyāḥ guroḥ ca pārthakya śaṅkā syāt
tad artham tam eva iti uktam
na ca evam pṛthak praṇāma anupapattiḥ
nimitta dvaya samāveśe naimittika vilopa niyama abhāvāt
śiṣya śikṣāyai ca etad granthe niveśanam
śiṣyāṇām ca asti guru devatā bhedaḥ
tad apekṣayā eva jagadgurūṇām iti uktam
anyathā viśeṣataḥ me iti uktam ayuktam syāt
vyākhyeya tva samarthanam
syāt etat
atha atas brahma jijñāsā ityādikam grantham vyākhyātum ayam devatā ādi praṇāmaḥ
na ca ayam vyākhyātavyaḥ
artha vivakṣā pūrvakasya eva pauruṣeya vākyasya vyākhyātavya tvāt
na hi mātṛkā mātra vyākhyāne prekṣāvān pravartate
na ca asya artha vivakṣā pūrvaka tve mānam asti
praṇayana mātrasya vyabhicāri tvāt
prekṣāvat praṇayanasya ca aniścayāt
niścaye vā viṣa hara mantrasya iva japa ādinā abhyudaya siddhaye nirmāṇa upapatteḥ
gṛhīta saṅgateḥ artha pratibhāsaḥ hi viṣa hara mantre samānaḥ
na ca artha vivakṣā pūrvakatva mātreṇa upādeya tā vyākhyānam yuktam
vipralambhaka ādi vākya vyākhyāna prasaṅgāt
kim nāma yāthārthye ca sati
na ca asya yāthārthye mānam asti

original: tadbhāve 'pi tathāvidhavākyāntaraparityāgenāsyaiva vyākhyāne kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkānirāsāya paramākhyavidyetyuktam / *1,88*
analyzed: tad bhāve pi tathāvidha vākya antara parityāgena asya eva vyākhyāne kāraṇam vaktavyam iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya parama ākhya vidyā iti uktam
ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: asti tāvadasmingranthe“dve vidye veditavye parā caivāparā ca';
analyzed: asti tāvat asmin granthe dve vidye veditavye parā ca eva aparā ca
ityādau para vidyā ākhyā
atra vidyā śabdena artha vivakṣā yāthārthyam ca asya avagamyate
yāthārthya jñāna tad sādhanayoḥ vidyā śabdasya yoga rūḍhibhyām pravṛtta tvāt
saṃjñāyām sama jani sada
iti atra saṃjñāyām iti anuvṛtteḥ
para śabdena ca yāthārthyāt vākya antarāt utkarṣaḥ
tat evam āgamena asya sarva uttama praṇāma āpya pratīteḥ gahana artha tvat ca upapannam anya parityāgena asya eva vyākhyānam iti
tathā api anyaiḥ eva vyākhyāta tvāt na punar idam vyākhyātavyam iti atas vyākhyām iti uktam
viśiṣṭa ākhyā vyākhyā
anena para kṛtānām apavyākhyāna tām abhipraiti
tathā ca tatra tatra pradarśayiṣyati

original: tathāpi svapraṇītabhāṣyeṇaiva kṛtavyutpādanamidaṃ śāstramiti kimanena vyutpādanenetyato 'nvapi cetyāha /
analyzed: tathā api sva praṇīta bhāṣyeṇa eva kṛta vyutpādanam idam śāstram iti kim anena vyutpādanena iti atas nu api ca iti āha
caśabdena anuvyākhyāne prayojana sadbhāvam samuccinoti
tat ca vakṣyate
prayojana sadbhāve bhāṣya diśā śiṣyāḥ eva anuvyākariṣyanti iti atas
evaśabdena anyeṣām asāmarthyam sūcayati
āgamena śāstra prāmāṇyam
prādurbhūtaḥ hariḥ vyāsaḥ viriñca bhava pūrvakaiḥ
arthitaḥ paravidyā ākhyam cakre śāstram anuttamam

original: yaduktaṃ nārāyaṇo 'sya śāstrasya prabhava iti tadayuktam /
analyzed: yat uktam nārāyaṇaḥ sya śāstrasya prabhavaḥ iti tat ayuktam
vyāsa upajña tā prasiddhi virodhāt
na ca nārāyaṇaḥ eva vyāsaḥ
janana virodhāt
kṛtakṛtyasya prayojana abhāvena śāstra praṇayana asambhavāt ca
yat ca asya śrautyā para vidyā ākhyayā sarva uttama prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti tat api ayuktam

original: paraśabdasyānekārthatvena vidyāśabdasya cārthavivakṣāvirahiṇyapi mantre prayogadarśanena paravidyākhyāyāḥ sarvottamaprāmāṇyāniścāyakatvāt /
analyzed: para śabdasya aneka artha tvena vidyā śabdasya ca artha vivakṣā virahiṇi api mantre prayoga darśanena para vidyā ākhyāyāḥ sarva uttama prāmāṇya a niścāyaka tvāt

original: kiñceyaṃ paravidyākhyaitadviṣayetyatrāpi na niyāmakamastītyata āha- prādurbhūta iti //
analyzed: kiñca iyam paravidyā ākhyā etad viṣayā iti atra api na niyāmakam asti iti atas āha prādurbhūtaḥ iti
atra kṛtakṛtyaḥ pi hariḥ ātma kṛpā āspadaiḥ viriñca bhava pūrvakaiḥ amaraiḥ arthitaḥ vyāsaḥ

original: prādurbhūto na tu jāto granthamimaṃ cakra ityanena nārāyaṇasya śāstraprabhavatve
analyzed: prādurbhūtaḥ na tu jātaḥ grantham imam cakre iti anena nārāyaṇasya śāstra prabhava tve
nupapattiḥ parihṛtā

original: dṛśyante hi kevalaṃ kṛpāpāravaśyena paropakārāya pravartamānāḥ sutarāṃ tairarthitāḥ /
analyzed: dṛśyante hi kevalam kṛpā pāravaśyena para upakārāya pravartamānāḥ sutarām taiḥ arthitāḥ

original: ata eva paraprayojanamapyātmagāmīva manyamānasya bhagavataḥ śāstrapraṇayanamiti jñāpayitumātmanepadaprayogaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva para prayojanam api ātma gāmi iva manyamānasya bhagavataḥ śāstra praṇayanam iti jñāpayitum ātmanepada prayogaḥ
atra ca nārāyaṇāt viniṣpannam ityādi āgamaḥ pramāṇam

original: paravidyākhyayā asya sarvottamaprāmāṇyasiddhiṃ vyutpādayituṃ paravidyākhyamityanūdyānuttamaṃ śāstramiti vyākhyātam /
analyzed: paravidyā ākhyayā asya sarva uttama prāmāṇya siddhim vyutpādayitum paravidyā ākhyam iti anūdya anuttamam śāstram iti vyākhyātam
na asti uttamam śāstram asmāt iti anuttamam
śiṣyate yathāsthitam pratipādyate tattvam anena iti śāstram
idam uktam bhavati
dve vidye veditavye parā ca eva aparā ca

original: iti vidyādvayamuddiśya tatrāparetyādinā sāṅgānvedānaparavidyātvenoktavā“atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate';
analyzed: iti vidyā dvayam uddiśya tatra aparā ityādinā sa aṅgān vedān apara vidyā tvena uktavā atha parā yayā tat akṣaram adhigamyate
iti para vidyā pradarśitā
sā tāvat veda ādi śāstra prakaraṇāt parama akṣara adhigati karaṇa tva liṅgāt ca śāstram eva bhavitum arhati anyathā sakṛt ukta vidyā śabdasya aneka artha tva kalpanā prasaṅgāt ca

original: tadyathā paramadhārmika ityabhihite paramatvaṃ dharmeṇeti jñāyate /

anyasya aprasaṅgāt paratva asambhavāt ca
sambhavati tu asya para tvam anugrāhaka tvāt
etena upaniṣadaḥ para vidyā iti vyākhyānam iti parāstam
ṛk ādi grahaṇena tāsām api gṛhīta tvāt
brāhmaṇa parivrājaka nyāyaḥ ca agatikā gatiḥ

adhigati karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ
aneka artha tā kalpanā āpatteḥ ca
atas nayā paravidyā ākhyayā asya śāstrasya sarva uttama prāmāṇya sādhanam upapannam iti

yadi api vidyā śāstra śabdau śiṣya ācārya vyāpāra anubandhinau tathā api ubhaya anugata tattva jñāna karaṇa tva mātram upādāya dvayoḥ aikārthyam uktam iti avagantavyam
ṛc ādyāḥ aparāḥ vidyāḥ yadā viṣṇoḥ na vācakāḥ

original: tā eva paramā vidyā yadā viṣṇostu vācakāḥ';
analyzed: tāḥ eva paramā vidyāḥ yadā viṣṇoḥ tu vācakāḥ
iti bhagavatpādīyam vyākhyānam api etam eva artham sūcayati

original: brahmamīmāṃsāśāstravyutpāditanyāyānupakṛtā hi vedādayo viṣṇoravācakāstadukṛtāśca tasya vācakā bhavantīti /
analyzed: brahma mīmāṃsā śāstra vyutpādita nyāya anupakṛtāḥ hi veda ādayaḥ viṣṇoḥ avācakāḥ tad ukṛtāḥ ca tasya vācakāḥ bhavanti iti

original: tathāpi kevalasya na paravidyātvaṃ labhyata iti cet /
analyzed: tathā api kevalasya na para vidyā tvam labhyate iti ced
mā lābhi
veda ādi itikartavya tā rūpasya asya pṛthak prāmāṇya anabhyupagamāt

guruḥ gurūṇām prabhavaḥ śāstrāṇām bādarāyaṇaḥ
yatas tat uditam mānam aja ādibhyaḥ tad arthataḥ

original: evaṃ tāvadāgamenāsya śāstrasyānuttamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasādhyādhunānumānato 'pi tat siṣādhayiṣurādau tāvatprāmāṇyamātre anumānaṃ vaktumāha- gururiti
analyzed: evam tāvat āgamena asya śāstrasya anuttamam prāmāṇyam prasādhya adhunā anumānataḥ tat siṣādhayiṣuḥ ādau tāvat prāmāṇya mātre anumānam vaktum āha guruḥ iti

original: yato yatkāraṇaṃ bādarāyaṇo gurūṇāṃ jagatastattvopadeśakānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ gururupadeṣyā /

original: yataśca śāstrāṇāṃ vedānāṃ bhāratādīnāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ prabhavo gurūṇāmaśeṣārthapratipādakānāṃ
analyzed: yatas ca śāstrāṇām vedānām bhārata ādīnām ca yathāsambhavam prabhavaḥ gurūṇām aśeṣa artha pratipādakānām

original: savistarāṇāṃ vedādiśāstrāṇāṃ gururmukhyaprabhavo na tu sampradāyamātrapravartaka iti vā /
analyzed: sa vistarāṇām veda ādi śāstrāṇām guruḥ mukhya prabhavaḥ na tu sampradāya mātra pravartakaḥ iti vā
yatas ca aja ādibhyaḥ śrotṛbhyaḥ teṣām arthaḥ mokṣaḥ tad arthaḥ tasmai tad arthataḥ

original: taduditaṃ tena bādarāyaṇenopadiṣyamidaṃ śāstramato mānaṃ bhavitumarhati / *1,114*
analyzed: tat uditam tena bādarāyaṇena upadiṣyam idam śāstram atas mānam bhavitum arhati
hetūnām sākṣāt sādhya nirdeśaḥ

original: atra gururgurūṇāmityādihetūnāṃ vaktṛśrotṛprasaṅgānāmānukūlyānyeva sākṣātsādhyāni mānasīti tu paramasādhyanirdeśa iti jñātavyam /
analyzed: atra guruḥ gurūṇām ityādi hetūnām vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaṅgānām ānukūlyāni eva sākṣāt sādhyāni mānasī iti tu parama sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti jñātavyam
tathā hi

original: vivakṣitārthatattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ vivakṣā ceti trayaṃ vakturānukūlyaṃ nāma /
analyzed: vivakṣita artha tattva jñānam karaṇa pāṭavam vivakṣā ca iti trayam vaktuḥ ānukūlyam nāma
tattva jñāna yogya tā vaktṛ prīti viṣaya tā ca iti dvayam śrotuḥ
śrotṛ prayojana uddeśaḥ prasaṅgasya

original: tatra gurūṇāṃ gururiti vakturbādarāyaṇasya vivakṣitārthatattvajñānasādhane hetuḥ /
analyzed: tatra gurūṇām guruḥ iti vaktuḥ bādarāyaṇasya vivakṣita artha tattva jñāna sādhane hetuḥ

original: yo hi yasya tattvopadeṣyā sa tato 'dhikatattvajñānavānupalabdhaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yasya tattva upadeṣyā sa tatas dhika tattva jñānavān upalabdhaḥ

original: ayaṃ ca sarvajñakalpānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ tattvopadeṣyā brahmarudrādideveṣvityādyāgamādavagataḥ /
analyzed: ayam ca sarvajña kalpānām brahma ādīnām tattva upadeṣyāḥ brahma rudra ādi deveṣu ityādi āgamāt avagataḥ
atas savarjñaḥ bhavitum arhati iti

original: gurūṇāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ guruḥ prabhava ityanenāpi tattvajñānaṃ karaṇapāṭavaṃ ca sādhyate /
analyzed: gurūṇām śāstrāṇām guruḥ prabhavaḥ iti anena api tattva jñānam karaṇa pāṭavam ca sādhyate

original: yo hi yāvadatharpratipādakasyāgamasya prabhavaḥ sa tāvantamarthaṃ tattvato jānannavagataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yāvat athar pratipādakasya āgamasya prabhavaḥ sa tāvantam artham tattvataḥ jānan avagataḥ
ayam ca aśeṣa artha pratipādakasya āgamasya prabhavaḥ nu ktam pañcabhiḥ vedaiḥ utsannān bhagavān vedān iti ādi vacanāt avagataḥ
tatas bhavitavyam anena sarvajñena

original: yaśca bahorāgamasya prabhavaḥ so 'sati nimittāntare paṭukaraṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /

original: ayaṃ cāparasya vedādeḥ prabhavaḥ kathamapaṭukaraṇo bhavediti /

original: nahi svayaṃ tattvajñānāyogyaḥ pareṣāṃ tattvopadeṣyā dṛṣṭaḥ /

kaḥ yam ananugamaḥ nāma kim sārvatrika vyavahāra anaupāyika tvam uta ekasya aneka vṛtti tva abhāvaḥ
na ādyaḥ

original: yo yasya sutaḥ sa tadīyaṃ dhanaṃ arhatītyādau sārvatrikavyavahārahetutopalambhāt /
analyzed: yaḥ yasya sutaḥ sa tadīyam dhanam arhati ityādau sārvatrika vyavahāra hetu tā upalambhāt
na dvitīyaḥ
a doṣa tvāt

original: yathā cānanugatasyāpi nāvyāptiḥ sārvatrikavyavahārahetutā ca tathā sāmānyaparīkṣāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ / *1,145*
analyzed: yathā ca ananugatasya api nā avyāptiḥ sārvatrika vyavahāra hetu tā ca tathā sāmānya parīkṣāyām vakṣyāmaḥ
āpteḥ lakṣaṇa antaram

original: etena nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vakteti lakṣaṇadvayamapi samāhitaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: etena nirdoṣaḥ pramitasya eva vaktā iti lakṣaṇa dvayam api samāhitam veditavyam
anuvādasya vāda viṣaya tvena tad prayoktuḥ api āpta tva avirodhāt
evaṃca vaktuḥ ānukūlyam āpti ekadeśe eva

original: vipralipsā ca śrotṛprasaṅgānukūlataikanibandhanā tadabhāve nivartata iti vaktrādyānukūlyavattāyā āptavākyatayā susthaḥ pratibandhaḥ /
analyzed: vipralipsā ca śrotṛ prasaṅga anukūla tā eka nibandhanā tad abhāve nivartate iti vaktra ādi ānukūlyavat tāyāḥ āpta vākya tayā susthaḥ pratibandhaḥ
nanu āpta vākya tā sva kapola kalpiteṣu mālatī mādhava ādiṣu prāmāṇyam vyabhicarati

original: nahi nāṭakādiprabandhaṃ viracayannapi kadāciduktalakṣaṇopapanno na bhavati bhavabhūtiriti cenna /
analyzed: nahi nāṭaka ādi prabandham viracayan api kadācid ukta lakṣaṇa upapannaḥ na bhavati bhavabhūtiḥ iti ced na
yaḥ yatra evambhūtaḥ iti anena eva ukta uttara tvāt
āpti mūla vākyasya āpta vākya tayā vivakṣita tvāt ca
a bodhakam viparīta bodhakam vā vākyam apramāṇam iti ucyate
tatra ābodhakam vaktuḥ apaṭu kāraṇatayā bhavati
viparīta bodhakam ca viparīta jñāna ādinā iti āpti pūrvaka vākya tvasya prāmāṇyena pratibandha siddhiḥ
anyathā kāraṇena vinā kārya utpatti prasaṅgāt iti
madhye kim āpta vākya tā sādhanam
nanu ca anukūla vaktra ādimattayā prāmāṇya sādhanam eva atra vyākhyāyatām
kim āpta vākya tā sādhanam madhye vyākhyāyate
vyāpti pakṣa dharmatayoḥ atulya tvāt
nahi yat yat vayāpakasya vyāpakam tat tasya avyāpakam iti sambhavati

original: anukūlavaktrādimattayā āptavākyatāsādhane vaktrānukūlyasyāptyekadeśatvena sādhyāviśiṣṭatā ca syāt /
analyzed: anukūla vaktra ādimattayā āpta vākyatā sādhane vaktra ānukūlyasya āpti eka deśa tvena sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā ca syāt

original: vaktṛśrotṛprasaktīnāmiti vākyaṃ tu śaṅkitasya upādheḥ sādhanavyāpakatāpradarśanārthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaktīnām iti vākyam tu śaṅkitasya upādheḥ sādhana vyāpaka tā pradarśana artham bhaviṣyati

āpta vākya tayā tena iti uttara vākya vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt
upādheḥ sādhana vyāpaka tāyāḥ vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaktīnām iti anena eva upapādita tvāt

original: nahi upādhiṃ dūṣayatā sādhanavyāpakatāṃ vyutpādya sādhanenopādheḥ pakṣe sādhanaṃ vidhāya tena sādhyaṃ sādhanīyamiti kuladharmaḥ / *1,152*
analyzed: nahi upādhim dūṣayatā sādhana vyāpaka tām vyutpādya sādhanena upādheḥ pakṣe sādhanam vidhāya tena sādhyam sādhanīyam iti kula dharmaḥ

original: upādheḥ sādhanābhedaṃ pradarśya tena sādhyaṃ sādhyata iti cenna /
analyzed: upādheḥ sādhana abhedam pradarśya tena sādhyam sādhyate iti ced na
āpteḥ vaktṛ mātra dharmasya sādhana abheda anupapatteḥ
sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā tu na asti eva
vaktra ādīnām ānukūlyena vaktuḥ āpti sādhane khalu aṃśataḥ sā syāt
anukūla vaktra ādimat tayā āpta vākya tā sādhyate iti ca uktam
tathā api sādhya sādhanayoḥ āpti eka deśa anupraveśaḥ sti iti ced
satyam
tathā api viśiṣṭa bhedena adoṣa tvāt

original: anyathā yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo 'pi na syāt /
analyzed: anyathā yaḥ dhūmavān asau agnimān iti vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ na syāt
viśeṣya aṃśasya ubhayatra anupraveśāt
kṛtaka tva anitya tvayoḥ sattā anupraveśe pi paraiḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt ca

original: yadā tu nirdoṣaḥ pramitasyaiva vaktā āpta ityāśritaṃ tadā sādhyaviśiṣṭatāyāḥ śaṅkaiva nāsti / *1,156*
analyzed: yadā tu nirdoṣaḥ pramitasya eva vaktā āptaḥ iti āśritam tadā sādhya viśiṣṭa tāyāḥ śaṅkā eva nā asti

original: anyathāstu vaktrādyānukūlyaṃ vakturvipralipsāmūlatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ ca bhavatvityāśaṅkāyāḥ ko nivārayitā /

original: yadyapi prāmāṇyaṃ svata eveti bādarāyaṇīyaṃ matam /

yat vakṣyati na vilakṣaṇa tvāt iti

tathā api aprāmāṇya śaṅkā nirāsa arthaḥ yam prayatnaḥ iti avirodhaḥ
yat śruti saṃvādi yat ca yukti saṃvādi tat pramāṇam

original: evaṃ vijātīyasaṃvādenāsya śāstrasya prāmāṇyamupapādya tadanuttamatāsiddhaye sajātīyadvayasaṃvādamapyāha- śrutīti //

tathā caśabdau samuccaya arthau
mānam ityasya anukarṣaṇa arthau vā

original: yathā āptavākyatayā tathā śrutimūlatayāpītyupamārtho vā tathāśabdaḥ /

original: tathāpyatra sāmānārthatāsāmyena gaupyā vṛttyā śrutiyuktisaṃvāditārthau vyākhyeyau /

sā mā vijñāyi iti gauṇa prayogaḥ
evam hi prayoge ṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ pi adhikaḥ vijñāyate

original: brahma vedastadarthaḥ parabrahma vā tasya sūtrāṇi brahmasūtrāṇi /

original: etenaitacchāstravācinaḥ śārīrakaśabdasya śarīrameva śarīrakaṃ tatra bhavaḥ śārīrako jīvaḥ /

original: tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyabrahmarūpatā mīmāṃseti vyākhyānādavirodha iti cenna /

original: yata evaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ trividhaṃ dṛśyate /

original: āptavākyatrayādiliṅgatrayāvasitaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ anyatrāpi cetsyāttadā kathameṣāṃ tadanuttamamityato brahmasūtrāṇāmevetyuktam /

kvacid ekadhā

satyam

original: tacca yāvadyāvadadhikaṃ pramīyate tattadanusāriṇīmaviśaṅkāṃ kṣiprapravṛttiṃ prasūta ityanubhavasiddham /
analyzed: tat ca yāvat yāvat adhikam pramīyate tat tad anusāriṇīm aviśaṅkām kṣipra pravṛttim prasūtaḥ iti anubhava siddham
tatas prāmāṇyam eva sva kārya atiśaya vaśena atiśaya vat ucyate
evam viṣaya prayojana atiśaya vaśena api atiśayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
atas nā etādṛśam kiñcid pramāṇatamam iṣyate

original: svayaṃ kṛtāpi tadvayākhyā kriyate spaṣṭatārthataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.7 //
analyzed: svayam kṛtā api tad vayākhyā kriyate spaṣṭa tā arthataḥ

original: tadevaṃ śrutyanumānābhyāmidameva śāstraṃ pramāṇatamaṃ nānyadetādṛśamastītyupasaṃharati- ata iti //

iṣyate prāmāṇikaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ
tathā ca anya parihāreṇa asya eva vyākhyānam yuktam iti hṛdayam
nanu bhāratam sarva śāstreṣu uttamam ucyate

vicāryeṣu śāstreṣu tat iti avirodhaḥ

original: nanu cāsya śāstrasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ sūtrakāra eva prathamasūtre samarthayate /

viṣaya ādi sampādanena eva tat

original: tathāpi nedaṃ vyākhyātavyaṃ vyākhyātatvādityatrānvapi ceti yat prayojanāntaraṃ astīti sūcitaṃ tadvivaraṇārthamāha- svayamiti //

original: yadyapi teṣāṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ vyākhyā svayaṃ mayaiva bhāṣye kṛtā tathāpi punaratra spaṣṭataivārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya spaṣṭatārthaḥ /

original: yataḥ saṅkṣepavistarābhyāmuktaṃ śrotṛṇāṃ sugrahaṃ saprayojanaṃ ca bhavati /

yathā uktam

tatra bhāṣya ādya padya arthaḥ atra śloka trayeṇa vivṛtaḥ

api śabdaḥ viśeṣaṇa antara samuccaya arthaḥ

original: śāstraprabhavaṃ ityādibhirbahubhiḥ prakārairyadgurutvopapādanaṃ tena gurūṃśceti bahuvacanāntaṃ padaṃ vivṛtam /
analyzed: śāstra prabhavam ityādibhiḥ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ yat guru tva upapādanam tena gurūn ca iti bahuvacana antam padam vivṛtam

original: nirupapadasūtragrahaṇena yadbrahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaprāmāṇyaṃ sūcitaṃ tadupapādanaṃ paramākhyeti /

yat dvāpare iti adi bhāṣyam tat asaṅgatam

original: yasmādāptimūlatvādiyuktayāpi brahmasūtrāṇāṃ sarvottamaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samarthayituṃ etaditi darśayati gururgurūṇāmityādineti / *1,179*

maṅgala vādaḥ

original: maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi khalu karmāṇi nirantarāyaṃ parisamāpyante pracīyante ca /
analyzed: maṅgala ācaraṇa puraḥsarāṇi khalu karmāṇi nirantarāyam parisamāpyante pracīyante ca

tathā sati kārīrī ādeḥ api vṛṣṭayā ādi hetutva abhāva āpatteḥ
syāt etat evam
yadi niṣpramāṇakam syāt na ca evam

original: śrutiniścite tu sādhyasādhanabhāve tadabhāve 'pi bhāvo 'nekakāraṇakatvasya kalpako bhavati /
analyzed: śruti niścite tu sādhya sādhana bhāve tad abhāve pi bhāvaḥ neka kāraṇaka tvasya kalpakaḥ bhavati
darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iva traivarṇika paricaryā ādināpiḥ svarga prāpteḥ
bhāve pi abhāvaḥ tu kartṛ karaṇa ādi vaiguṇya nimittaḥ bhavati

original: nahi sāmagrīvaikalyena sādhyaṃ vyabhicaran heturahetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: nahi sāmagrī vaikalyena sādhyam vyabhicaran hetuḥ ahetuḥ syāt
kartṛ ādi sādguṇye vā prabala pratibandhaka sadbhāvaḥ kalpyate

original: nahi pratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ ajanayat kāraṇamakāraṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nahi pratibaddham kāryam ajanayat kāraṇam akāraṇam bhavati
vahneḥ api sphoṭam prati akāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt
na ca evam sāmagrī vaiguṇya śaṅkayāḥ sarvatra saulabhyena sakala pravṛtti vilaya āpātāt iti
samam etat sakalam prakṛte
maṅgala ācaraṇasya avighna parisamāpti ādi hetu tvasya api avigīta śiṣya ācāra anumita śruti siddha tvāt
na tāvat prekṣāvat pravṛttiḥ viphalā sambhāvinī
na api prayojana antara arthā
dṛṣṭa parityāga adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt
kāryam āripsuḥ khalu tad samāpti ādikam kāmayate iti anubhava siddham
na ca phala antara anusandhāne pramāṇam asti
na ca eteṣām imam sādhya sādhana bhāva pratīti bhrāntiḥ
tathā satya vigāna anupapatteḥ

original: naca pratyakṣāderatrāvakāśa iti śrutireva śiṣyācāramūlaṃ kalpyate /
analyzed: na ca pratyakṣa ādeḥ atra avakāśaḥ iti śrutiḥ eva śiṣya ācāra mūlam kalpyate
na ca vighna hetu sadbhāva aniścayāt idam ananuṣṭheyam
tad sandehe doṣaḥ parihata rvyaḥ
iti nyāya prāpta tvāt

original: naca bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya vighnā eva na santīti tatparihārārthānanuṣṭhānaṃ na doṣāyeti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya vighnāḥ eva na santi iti tad parihāra artha ananuṣṭhānam na doṣāya iti yuktam
śiṣya artham api kartavya tvāt

original: yato maṅgalācaraṇapuraḥsarāṇi śāstrāṇi vīryavanti bhavantyāyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca /
analyzed: yatas maṅgala ācaraṇa puraḥsarāṇi śāstrāṇi vīryavanti bhavanti āyuṣmat puruṣakāṇi ca
anyathā bhārata ādau api na kuryāt
etena sūtrakṛtā kṛtam eva maṅgala ācaraṇam

original: kiṃ nāma granthādau na niveśitamityapi nirastam /
analyzed: kim nāma grantha ādau na niveśitam iti api nirastam
granthe niveśanasya api śiṣya ācāra prāpta tvāt
śiṣya artha tvāt ca
atas eva anyat kim api vighna vighāta ādi artham anuṣṭhitam sūtrakāreṇa iti nirastam
atra ucyate
kartavyam eva kārya ārambhe maṅgala ācaraṇam
kṛtam ca bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa
niveśitam ca grantha ādau
yat ayam oṅkāra athaśabdau āditaḥ kṛtavān
tayoḥ māṅgalika tvāt
yathā uktam
oṃkāraḥ ca atha śabdaḥ ca dvau etau brahmaṇaḥ purā
kaṇṭham bhitvā viniryātau tasmāt māṅgalikau ubhau iti
athaśabdaḥ maṅgala arthaḥ
tatra tārātha mūla tvam sarvaśas śastrasya ca iṣyate
sarvatra anugata tvena pṛthak oṅkriyate khilaiḥ
nanu etat anupapannam
tathā sati etayoḥ vighna vighāta ādi hetu tvena samasta śāstra aṅgatayā prathama sūtra avayava tva abhāva prasaṅgāt
tathātve ca prathama sūtram nyūnam āpadyeta
adhikāri ādi pratipādakasya anyasya abhāvāt
tad pratipādanasya ca āvaśyaka tvāt

original: anyathādhikāriviṣayavaidhuryeṇa śāstrasya anārambhaṇīyatvaśaṅkā na nirākṛtā syādityanarthakaṃ sūtramāpadyetetyata āha- tatreti //
analyzed: anyathā adhikāri viṣaya vaidhuryeṇa śāstrasya anārambhaṇīya tva śaṅkā na nirākṛtā syāt iti anarthakam sūtram āpadyeta iti atas āha tatra iti
taranti anena aniṣya nicayam iti oṅkāraḥ tāraḥ
tāraḥ ca athaḥ ca tayoḥ mūla tvam krameṇa ādi tvam
ādau prayuktau anena aniṣya nicayam iti oṅkāraḥ tāraḥ
tāraḥ ca athaḥ ca tayoḥ mūla tvam krameṇa udi tvam
ādau prayuktau oṅkāra atha śabdau iti yāvat

original: tatra prathamasūtre 'vayavatayā sarvaśāstrasya cāṅgatayā ceṣyate 'ṅgīkriyate sūtrakṛteti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra prathama sūtre vayava tayā sarva śāstrasya ca aṅga tayā ceṣyate ṅgīkriyate sūtrakṛtā iti śeṣaḥ
etat uktam bhavati
prathama sūtre dhikāri ādi pratipādanāya upāttau oṅkāra atha śabdau śaṅkha vīṇā veṇu dhvani vat śrutitaḥ māṅgalika tvāt kṛtsna śāstrasya anantarāya parisamāpti ādikam
kurvate
anya artha ānīyamāna pūrṇa kalaśa darśana vat iti
tārā athau iti etāvatā pūrṇe yat mūla tvam iti āha tat sūtrakāra aṅgīkāra liṅga sūcanam

original: yatparyāyāntaraṃ vihāyānayoreva kramāntaraṃ vihāyādāvevopādānaṃ tena jānīmo jñāpakatayā'disūtrasya kārakatayā samastaśāstrasya copayogitvenaitau  #
analyzed: yat paryāya antaram vihāya anayoḥ eva krama antaram vihāya ādau eva upādānam tena jānīmaḥ jñāpaka tayā ādi sūtrasya kāraka tayā samasta śāstrasya ca upayogi tvena etau
sūtrakṛtā vivakṣitau iti
na ca etat yādṛcchikam
sakala sūtrakāraiḥ evam eva prayukta tvāt
na ca anekeṣām prekṣāvatām yadṛcchayā ekavidhā pravṛttiḥ upalabdhā iti
anena atha śabdaḥ maṅgala arthaḥ ityādi bhāṣyam vivṛtam bhavati

original: atra yatpareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ“maṅgalasya vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt'; iti /
analyzed: atra yat pareṣām dūṣaṇam maṅgalasya vākya arthe samanvaya abhāvāt iti
tathā hi
padārthaḥ eva hi vākya arthe samanvīyate

original: sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
analyzed: sa ca vācyaḥ vā lakṣyaḥ vā

original: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ lakṣyaṃ vā /
analyzed: na ca iha maṅgalam atha śabdasya vācyam lakṣyam vā
kintu mṛdaṅga dhvani vadatha śabdasya kāryam

original: naca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śābde vyavahāre dṛṣṭaḥ'; /
analyzed: na ca kārya jñāpyayoḥ vākya arthe samanvayaḥ śābde vyavahāre dṛṣṭaḥ
astu vā maṅgalasya padārtha tvam
tathā api na vākya arthe samanvayaḥ
tathā hi
na tāvat maṅgalam brahma jijñāsāyāḥ kartṛ karma karaṇa bhāvena vākya arthe nveti
kartṛ ādi anyatama bhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt
kāraka antarāṇām vidyamāna tvāt ca
na api sāmānādhikaraṇyena anvayaḥ
jijñāsā maṅgalam iti praśaṃsā para tayā arthavāda tva prasaṅgāt iti
tat etena apāstam bhavati
asmābhiḥ api ānantarya abhidheyaḥ tha śabdaḥ śrutyāḥ maṅgala prayojanaḥ iti aṅgīkārāt
nanu atra sūtra ādau oṅkāraḥ eva na vidyate
tat katham ucyate
yadi api śiṣyaiḥ adhyetṛbhiḥ
uccāryamāṇaḥ dhyakṣa siddhaḥ tathā api na ayam sūtra avayavaḥ
lakṣaṇa antara abhāve satya saṃhita tayā sampāṭhe akhilaiḥ paṭhyamāna tvāt
veda adhyayana upakrame adhyetṛbhiḥ uccāryamāṇa uṅkāra vat
anyathā atha śabda vat saṃhita tayā nirdiśyeta
na ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ
adhyayana upakrama virati vaicitṛyeṇa tad tad sthāna parityāgena anya anya sthāne khilaiḥ paṭhyamānasya veda vākya anavayavatāyāḥ su prasiddha tvāt
anyathā adhyayana upakrama virati vaicitṛye pi om iti brahma ityādi vat niyata sthānatayā pāṭha prasaṅgāt
pakṣa sapakṣayoḥ ādau uccāraṇam tu prāc mukha tva ādi vat adhyayana niyama antargatam adhyetṛbhiḥ anuṣṭhīyate iti astu

original: evaṃcāyamoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā maṅgalārthatayā sūtrādāvupanibaddha ityanupapannamityata āha- sarvatra iti //
analyzed: evam ca ayam oṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā maṅgala artha tayā sūtra ādau upanibaddhaḥ iti anupapannam iti atas āha sarvatra iti

original: akhilaiḥ sūtrapāṭhakaiḥ yatpṛthagasaṃhitatayoṅkriyate tatsarvatra sūtreṣvanugatatvenābhilaṣitena nimittenopapadyate / *1,208*
analyzed: akhilaiḥ sūtra pāṭhakaiḥ yat pṛthak asaṃhita tayā uṅkriyate tat sarvatra sūtreṣu anugata tvena abhilaṣitena nimittena upapadyate
oṃkāraḥ sūtra avayavaḥ
etat uktam bhavati
sarvāṇi hi sūtrāṇi pratyekam aneka veda vākya vicāra para tvāt avāntarabrahma vidyāḥ
sravati anoṅkṛtam brahma parastāt ca viśīryate

original: iti śrautārthavādasāmarthyātsarvāsvapi brahmavidyāsvādyantayoroṅkārasyohaḥ kartavya iti gamyate /
analyzed: iti śrauta arthavāda sāmarthyāt sarvāsu api brahma vidyāsu ādi antayoḥ oṅkārasya ūhaḥ kartavyaḥ iti gamyate
na ca uhyamānam vākyāt pṛthak iti śakyate vaktum
mantreṣu api ūhyamānasya a mantra avayava tva prasaṅgāt
tatas ca pati sūtram ādi antayoḥ uccāraṇe gauravam syāt iti ādau eva uṅkāraḥ dhi kṛta tvena uccāryate

original: tasya saṃhitatayā nirdeśe prathamasūtrāvayava evāyaṃ vijñāyeta /
analyzed: tasya saṃhita tayā nirdeśe prathama sūtra avayavaḥ eva ayam vijñāyeta
tat mā vijñāyi iti śiṣyaiḥ pṛthak oṅkriyate

original: naca vyākhyānato 'pyadhikāro jñāyata iti vyarthaṃ pṛthakkaraṇamiti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca vyākhyānataḥ api adhikāraḥ jñāyate iti vyartham pṛthakkaraṇam iti vācyam
antaraṅga jñāpaka abhāvaḥ eva bahiraṅgasya anveṣaṇīya tvāt iti

original: tadanenāsaṃhitatayā nirdeśe nimittāntaraṃ vadatā hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā bhavati / *1,218*
analyzed: tat anena asaṃhita tayā nirdeśe nimitta antaram vadatā hetoḥ anyathā siddhiḥ uktā bhavati

original: nanu ca śrautārthavādabalenādyantayoroṅkārasyoho vā prāṅmukhatvādivadbahirbhūtasyaiva uccāraṇaṃ vā vidheyatvena kalpyamiti sandihyate /
analyzed: nanu ca śrauta arthavāda balena ādi antayoḥ oṅkārasya ūhaḥ vā prāc mukha tva ādi vat bahis bhūtasya eva uccāraṇam vā vidheya tvena kalpyam iti sandihyate
satyam
sandehe pi tayā praṇāḍyā anumānasya sandigdha anyathāsiddhayā api ābhāsa tvam eva

original: vakṣyamāṇanyāyenoṅkārārthasya prathamasūtravākyārthe samanvayena niścayopapattau bādhitaviṣayaṃ cānumānamiti /
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena uṅkāra arthasya prathama sūtra vākya arthe samanvayena niścaya upapattau bādhita viṣayam ca anumānam iti
athavā dṛṣṭānta dūṣaṇam anena kriyate
tathā hi
akhilaiḥ veda pāṭhakaiḥ pṛthak rūpa antareṇa sthāna vyatyāsena yat oṅ kriyate tat ukta nyāyena ādau uccāraṇena eva

original: labdhena sarvatrānugatatvena kāraṇenaivopapadyata ityanena dṛṣṭānte sādhakasya hetoranyathāsiddhiruktā /
analyzed: labdhena sarvatra anugata tvena kāraṇena eva upapadyate iti anena dṛṣṭānte sādhakasya hetoḥ anyathāsiddhiḥ uktā
tathāca dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tā iti
evam anumāne niraste nirapavādena ādau uccāraṇena oṅkārasya prathama sūtra avayava tā siddhau uktam upapannam
tat evam siddhe śāstra vyākhyeya tve prekṣāvat pravṛtti viṣayasya eva ārambhaṇīya tvāt prayojana abhidheya sambandhavatī eva

original: ca prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtterārambhaṇīyatāsiddhaye prekṣāvataḥ pravartayituṃ prayojanādyabhisambandhaṃ
analyzed: ca prekṣāvatām pravṛtteḥ ārambhaṇīya tā siddhaye prekṣāvataḥ pravartayitum prayojana ādi abhisambandham
pratipādayataḥ prathama sūtrasya vyākhyām otatva vāci ityādinā ārabhate
prayojana ādi abhidhānam sārthakam

original: nanu brahmajñānasya mokṣahetutā yadi śāstrapravṛtteḥ prāgeva pramāṇāntarasiddhā vyarthaṃ tadā tadabhidhānaṃ śāstre /
analyzed: nanu brahma jñānasya mokṣa hetu tā yadi śāstra pravṛtteḥ prāk eva pramāṇa antara siddhā vyartham tadā tad abhidhānam śāstre
pramāṇa antara siddhe kvacid upadeśa anapekṣaṇāt

original: athehaiva tanniścayastadā pravṛttau prayojanādiniścayo niścite ca prayojanādau pravṛttirityanyonyāśrayatvam /
analyzed: atha iha eva tad niścayaḥ tadā pravṛttau prayojana ādi niścayaḥ niścite ca prayojana ādau pravṛttiḥ iti anyonya āśraya tvam
atha prathama sūtrāt tad niścayaḥ
tatra eva
katham pravṛttiḥ
tad artham ca prayojana antara abhidhāne navasthā

original: evameva tatra pravṛttāvuttaratrāpi tathātvaprasaṅgādanarthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānamiti /
analyzed: evam eva tatra pravṛttau uttaratra api tathātva prasaṅgāt anarthakam sūtre prayojana ādi abhidhānam iti
ucyate
trividhā hi puṃsām citta vṛttiḥ
anubhavaḥ icchā prayatnaḥ ca
