na tu anubhavaḥ nā api phala gocara icchā
yena tayoḥ api prayojana niścaya apekṣā syāt
nahi upekṣaṇīyam niṣprayojanam iti na anubhūyate
nā api sukham prayojana antara rahitam iti nā iṣyate

original: naca mumukṣuṇā anapekṣite svarge yāgādikaṃ tatsādhanatayā nānubhūyate /
analyzed: na ca mumukṣuṇā an apekṣite svarge yāga ādikam tad sādhanatayā nā anubhūyate

original: puruṣātharsādhane tu icchālakṣaṇā prayatnalakṣaṇā vā pravṛttistathā na svarasasiddhā /
analyzed: tu icchā lakṣaṇā prayatna lakṣaṇā vā pravṛttiḥ tathā na svarasa siddhā
nahi kaścid kṣudh prahāṇa ādikam an anusandhāya bhoktum icchati prayatate vā

original: tasmādyo yatra pravartanīyaḥ sa tatprayojanādikaṃ darśayitvaiva iti sārthakaṃ sūtre prayojanādyabhidhānam / *1,236*
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ yatra pravartanīyaḥ sa tad prayojana ādikam darśayitvā eva iti sārthakam sūtre prayojana ādi abhidhānam
ādima sūtrasya śāstra antarbhāvaḥ

original: uktaṃ ca prayojanādikaṃ śrotā kataṃ śraddadhītāśraddadhānaśca kathaṃ pravarteteti punaravaśiṣyate /
analyzed: uktam ca prayojana ādikam śrotā śraddadhīta a śraddadhānaḥ ca katham pravarteta iti punar avaśiṣyate
tatra eke samādhānam āhuḥ
avagata sūtrakāra āpta bhāvaḥ tāvat tad vacanāt eva śraddhāsyati

original: yadyapi āptatvāvadhāraṇe prayojanādyanabhidhāne 'pi tatsāmānyaniścayo bhavatyeva prayojanādimadidaṃ śāstraṃ āptoktatvāditi /
analyzed: yadi api āpta tva avadhāraṇe prayojana ādi anabhidhāne tad sāmānya niścayaḥ bhavati eva prayojana ādimat idam śāstram āpta ukta tvāt iti
tathā api na asau pravṛtti aṅgam
nahi prayojana ādimat iti eva pravartate
kim nāma asmad abhimata prayojana ādimat iti

original: saca prayojanādiviśeṣo vacanādevāvasīyata iti sārthakaṃ tadabhidhānam /
analyzed: sa ca prayojana ādi viśeṣaḥ vacanāt eva avasīyate iti sārthakam tat abhidhānam
āpta tva aniścaye pi artha sandehāt eva kṛṣṭa ādau iva pravṛtti upapattiḥ

original: nanu sandehaḥ prayojanādyavacane 'pi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve sati sulabha eva /
analyzed: nanu sandehaḥ prayojana ādi avacane sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāve sati sulabhaḥ eva
viśeṣa smṛtiḥ ca
tad arthi tva viśeṣāt bhaviṣyati
mā evam

original: yo hi yadvacanātpravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yad vacanāt pravartate sa tad vacanāt eva viśeṣa smṛtim apekṣate
na tu svātantryeṇa

original: nahi rogārto mamedaṃ roganivṛttisādhanaṃ na veti yatra tatrocchṛṅkhalaḥ svayaṃ utprekṣya pravartate /
analyzed: nahi roga ārtaḥ mama idam roga nivṛtti sādhanam na vā iti yatra tatra ucchṛṅkhalaḥ svayam utprekṣya pravartate
kim nāma anavadhṛta āpta bhāvasya api vaidyasya eva vacanāt
anyathā svayam prayojana abhidhānam anadhigacchan anartham api āśaṅketa
kim niṣprayojanam idam kākadanta parīkṣā grantha vat uta aśakya sādhana prayojanam mṛti hara hima mahīdhara uttara sānu siddha sañjīvanī kathana vat
uta mad anabhimata prayojanam āryāvarta vāsinam prati dākṣiṇātyasya mātula kanyā pariṇayana prakāra upadeśa vat
athavā abhimatasya api prayojanasya sati api laghīyasī upāya antare garīyān ayam upāyaḥ
pipāsum prati gīrvāṇa taraṅgiṇī samīpa kūpa khanana upadeśa vat ityādi
etāsu ca anartha sambhāvanāsu na pravarteta
na ca prayojana ādi abhidhāne pi etāsām avakāśaḥ
loka vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt
nahi kaścid vaidya vacana ādau evam āśaṅkaya nivartate
tasmāt upapannam ubhayathā api prayojana ādi abhidhānam iti
tat etat anupapannam
tathā hi

original: yadi tāvadāptavākyatayā sūtramidaṃ prayojanāderniścāyakaṃ syāttadā'gamatayā nyāyasūtratvahāniḥ /
analyzed: yadi tāvat āpta vākya tayā sūtram idam prayojana ādeḥ niścāyakam syāt tad āgama tayā nyāya sūtra tva hāniḥ

original: kiñcāptatvaṃ sūtrakṛto yena vedādinā pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ tenaiva prayojanādyabhisambandho 'pi śāstrasyāvagamyata iti vyarthaṃ tadabhidhānamāpadyeta
analyzed: kiñca āpta tvam sūtrakṛtaḥ yena veda ādinā pramāṇena avagantavyam tena eva prayojana ādi abhisambandhaḥ śāstrasya avagamyate iti vyartham tad abhidhānam āpadyeta
āpta tva aniścaye pi artha sandehāt pravṛttiḥ iti ca ati sthavīyaḥ

original: nahi kaścitprayojanādisandehe 'timahāyāsasādhye pravartate prāguktānarthaparamparāśca kathaṃ na śaṅketa /
analyzed: nahi kaścid prayojana ādi sandehe ti mahā āyāsa sādhye pravartate prāc ukta anartha paramparāḥ ca katham na śaṅketa

original: tasmānnedaṃ prayojanādyupadeśamātraṃ kintu śrautasya prayojanādeḥ nyeyenopapādanārthamityeva parihāraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt na idam prayojana ādi upadeśa mātram kintu śrautasya prayojana ādeḥ nyeyena upapādana artham iti eva parihāraḥ

original: āptatvaṃ tu nyāyasyopodbalakamātramiti bhāṣyakārīyaṃ tadvyutpādanamapi nānarthakam /
analyzed: āpta tvam tu nyāyasya upodbalaka mātram iti bhāṣyakāra iyam tad vyutpādanam api na anarthakam
atas eva asya sūtrasya na śāstra bahirbhāvaḥ
adhyayana vidhi ādi vat asya api atas eva ārambhaṇīya tva siddheḥ na anavasthā ādi doṣaḥ pi iti
kaḥ punar asya sūtrasya prasaṅgaḥ
kaḥ punar asya sūtrasya prasaṅgaḥ
ucyate
prāripsita tayā hi buddhi sannihitam śāstram sūtrakārasya
tatra saṃśayaḥ kim idam ārambhaṇīyam na vā iti
upalabhyante khalu ubhayavidhāni api vākyāni
vākyam ca idam
na ca viśeṣaḥ dṛśyate
yena anyatara pakṣa niścayaḥ syāt
nanu kasya ayam saṃśayaḥ
na tāvat sūtrakārasya
avagata viśeṣa tvāt
anyathā nirṇāyaka sūtra praṇayana anupapatteḥ
na api parasya
pareṇa adya api śāstrasya anupalabdha tvāt
anupalabdhe ca samāna dharma darśana ādi ayogena saṃśaya utpāda anupapatteḥ
mā evam

original: yadīdaṃ śāstraṃ pareṇopalabhyeta tadoktasandehakāraṇopapattau prayojanārthitvena viśeṣasmṛtimataivaṃ sandihyeteti sūtrakṛta eva parakīyasambhāvitasaṃśayāharaṇopapatteḥ
analyzed: yadi idam śāstram pareṇa upalabhyeta tadā ukta sandeha kāraṇa upapattau prayojana arthi tvena viśeṣa smṛtimatā evam sandihyeta iti sūtrakṛtaḥ eva parakīya sambhāvita saṃśaya āharaṇa upapatteḥ
jijñāsāyāḥ kartavya tva cintanam
nanu idam yuktaya nusandhāna ātmaka vicāra mīmāṃsā manana apara nāmaka jijñāsā aṅga bhūta nyāya nibandhanam jijñāsāyāḥ bhaviṣyati

original: nahi vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ taddvārabhūtanyāyanibandhanaṃ ca nārambhaṇīyamiti sambhavati /
analyzed: nahi vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ tad dvāra bhūta nyāya nibandhanam ca na ārambhaṇīyam iti sambhavati
niḥsādhanasya vicārasya eva anutthānāt
anyathā tu na iti jijñāsā eva vicāraṇīyā
satyam

original: etacchāstravyutpādanīyanyāyakaraṇikāyāṃ jijñāsāyāṃ ubhayavidhavyāpāradarśanādviśeṣādarśanācca saṃśayaḥ kiṃ kartavyā na veti /
analyzed: etad śāstra vyutpādanīya nyāya karaṇikāyām jijñāsāyām ubhayavidha vyāpāra darśanāt viśeṣa adarśanāt ca saṃśayaḥ kim kartavyā na vā iti

original: nanu ca tadvijijñāsasva iti jijñāsāyāḥ śrutivihitatvāt kathaṃ viśeṣādarśanam /
analyzed: nanu ca tat vijijñāsasva iti jijñāsāyāḥ śruti vihita tvāt katham viśeṣa adarśanam
mā evam
vinā vicāreṇa śruti arthasya ādya apya nirṇīta tvena saṃśaya āspada tvāt
tatra tāvat jijñāsā na kartavyā iti prāptam
kutas
viṣaya prayojana sambandha adhikāri lakṣaṇa anubandha vidhura tvāt
kartavya tā khalu viṣaya ādimat tayā vyāptā

original: kṛṣṭādikaṃ hi sati viṣayabhūte bhūmyādau prayojane ca sasyādhigamādāvadhikāriṇi ca kṛṣīvalādau kartavyamupalabdham /
analyzed: kṛṣṭa ādikam hi sati viṣaya bhūte bhūmi ādau prayojane ca sasya adhigama ādau adhikāriṇi ca kṛṣīvala ādau kartavyam upalabdham

original: sā ca vyāpikā vyāvartamāneto vyāpyāmapi kartavyatāṃ vyāvartayatīti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: sā ca vyāpikā vyāvartamānā itas vyāpyām api kartavya tām vyāvartayati iti pratibandha siddhiḥ

original: viṣayaśūnyatvāddhi samanaskendriyasannikṛṣṭasya sphītālokamadhyavartino ghaṭasya na jijñāsā kriyate /
analyzed: viṣaya śūnya tvāt hi sa manaska indriya sannikṛṣṭasya sphīta āloka madhya vartinaḥ ghaṭasya na jijñāsā kriyate
prayojana vikala tvāt khalu sandigdham api vāyasa daśana ādikam na jijñāsyate

original: sambandhavaidhuryāddhi saprayojanaṃ saviṣayamapi śabdajñānamarthayamāno na vaidyake pravartate /
analyzed: sambandha vaidhuryāt hi sa prayojanam sa viṣayam api śabda jñānam arthayamānaḥ na vaidyake pravartate
adhikāra virahāt ca na mumukṣoḥ vātsyāyane pravṛttiḥ
na anātma viṣayā iyam jijñāsā
viṣaya ādi vaidhuryam eva atra katham iti ced ittham
na tāvat anātma viṣayā iyam jijñāsā
tasya tṛṇa ādi lakṣaṇasya pratyakṣa ādinā eva niścita tvāt
sandigdhaḥ ca arthaḥ nyāya viṣayaḥ bhavati
yathā uktam
avijñāta tattve rthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti
niṣpādita kriye ca karmaṇi aviśeṣa ādhāyinaḥ sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātaḥ
na api asau jijñāsitaḥ kasmaicana prayojanāya kalpate
evaṃvidhe ca adhikārī dūra utsāritaḥ
yatas rthī samarthaḥ vidvān adhikriyate
na ca etādṛśe rthe rthitā sambhavati
dharma ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tu anātmā śāstra antara ādinā eva nirṇītaḥ
ātmā ca
śarīra indriya ādi saṅghāta vyatiriktaḥ na asti eva
śarīra ādikam ca yathāyatham pratyakṣa ādinā eva niścitam
nanu ātmā śarīra ādi vyatiriktaḥ ham iti asandigdha aviparyasta sākṣāt pratītyā eva niścīyate iti ced

original: evaṃ tarhi tata eva na jijñāsyaḥ /
analyzed: evam tarhi tatas eva na jijñāsyaḥ

original: ata evānāditastadīyatattvajñāne vidyamāne 'pi iṣyāniṣyaprāptiparihārayoradarśanānnāsau jijñāsitaḥ kasyacitprayojanasyeṣye / *1,272*
analyzed: atas eva anāditas tadīya tattva jñāne vidyamāne pi iṣya aniṣya prāpti parihārayoḥ adarśanāt na asau jijñāsitaḥ kasyacid prayojanasya iṣye
na sva ātma para ātma paramātma viṣayā iyam jijñāsā

original: nanvayaṃ kartā bhoktā doṣasaṃsargī cāhaṃpratyaye prakāśate /
analyzed: nanu ayam kartā bhoktā doṣa saṃsargī ca ahaṃpratyaye prakāśate
tad viparītaḥ tu śruti pratipāditaḥ pratipattavyā u tas jijñāsā iti ced
evam tarhi jaradgava ādi vākya vat pāvaka śaitya anumāna vat ca pratīti virodhena śruti jijñāsayoḥ ābhāsa tā āpātaḥ
atas eva na para ātmā jijñāsyaḥ
tasya prāṇa ādi liṅgaiḥ avagata tvāt
sā eva jijñāsā iti ced na
tasyāḥ laukika pravedanīya tvena śāstra a vyutpādanīya tvāt
na khalu bālakaḥ stana pāna iṣya sādhana tva anumāne śāstra vyutpādanam apekṣate

original: yatkvacicchāstre 'pi laukikapravedanīyārthavyutpādanamanuvādo 'sau na punaḥ sa eva pradhānavyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: yat kvacid śāstre laukika pravedanīya artha vyutpādanam anuvādaḥ sau na punar saḥ eva pradhāna vyāpāraḥ
īśvara viṣayā jijñāsā bhaviṣyati iti ced na
tasya eva abhāvāt
na ca evam īśvara ādi padānām ānarthakyena apadatva prasaṅgaḥ iti vācyam
teṣām kathañcid jīva viṣaya tā upapatteḥ
saḥ pi hi sva śarīra indriya ādīnām īṣye
pratīta artha tva upapattau apratīta artha tva kalpanāyām gaurava prasaṅgāt

original: jīvasya cāhamiti svaprakāśatayā svaprakāśajñānāśrayatayā mānasapratyakṣavedyatayā vā siddhatvena na jijñāsāviṣayatvamityuktam / *1,276*
analyzed: jīvasya ca aham iti sva prakāśa tayā sva prakāśa jñāna āśraya tayā mānasa pratyakṣa vedya tayā vā siddha tvena na jijñāsā viṣaya tvam iti uktam
na ca īśvara viṣayā jijñāsā
kiñca īśvaraḥ pramitaḥ na vā
na ubhayathā api jijñāsā sambhavati
na iti pakṣe anugrāhya pramāṇa abhāvena jijñāsāyāḥ tarka tva vyāghātāt
kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti hi uktam
pramā karaṇasya pramāṇasya upapattiḥ anugrahaḥ tad karaṇena iti arthaḥ
na ca buddhau anārūḍham śakyam jijñāsitum
pramita tve tu niścita tvāt eva
na ca evam sakala tarka anupapatti prasaṅgena vyāghātaḥ
sāmānyatas pratītau viśeṣe tad avakāśāt
na ca atra tathātvam paśyāmaḥ
kiñca īśvare pramāṇam bhavat na tāvat pratyakṣam
tasya āpātataḥ tad abhāva āvedaka tvāt
na api anumānam
tad pratibaddha liṅga abhāvāt
āgamaḥ tu kārya niṣṭhaḥ na niṣpanna svarūpam īśvaram śaknoti avagamayitum
na ca anyat pramāṇam asti yat mīmāṃsayā anugṛhyeta
kiñca āgamaḥ pi bhavan vedaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ
anyasya an āśaṅkanīya tvāt pāratantryāt ca
vedasya pauruṣeya tva apauruṣeya tvayoḥ kāraṇa abhāvena prāmāṇyam eva durlabham

original: svataḥ prāmāṇyāṅgīkāre tu vedaviruddhānāmapi śākyādivacasāṃ tathātvāpātena punarvedāpramāṇyatādavasthyam /
analyzed: svatas prāmāṇya aṅgīkāre tu veda viruddhānām api śākya ādi vacasām tathātva āpātena punar veda apramāṇya tādavasthyam
kiñca śabdasya eva prāmāṇyam durghaṭam artha saṃsparśa śūnya tvāt
vākya artha pratyāyana prakāra a nirūpaṇāt ca
kutas tad viśeṣasya vedasya
prayojana abhāvāt na jijñāsā kartavyā

original: prayojanaṃ ceśvarajijñāsayā abhyudayo vā syāt mokṣo vā /
analyzed: prayojanam ca īśvara jijñāsayā abhyudayaḥ vā syāt mokṣaḥ vā
na ādyaḥ
tasya dharma ādi laghu upāya sādhyasya śāstra antara prayojana tvāt
na dvitīyaḥ
tasya api apāma somam ityādi āgamena laghu upāya antara sādhya tā avagamāt
na ca ekasya eva karmaṇaḥ bhyudaya niḥśreyasa hetu tvam viruddham
phala abhisandhyā ādi bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣa upapatteḥ

original: jijñāsā ca mokṣasādhanaṃ bhavantī kiṃ sākṣāduta jñānadvāreṇa /
analyzed: jijñāsā ca mokṣa sādhanam bhavantī kim sākṣāt uta jñāna dvāreṇa
na ādyaḥ
dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa tyāga kalpanā prasaṅgāt
na dvitīyaḥ
karmaṇā jñānam ātanoti iti āgamena jñānasya laghu upāya antara sādhya tā adhyavasāyāt
jñānasya api sākṣāt mokṣa hetu tva abhyupagame dṛṣṭa kalpanā eva
na ca īśvara prasāda dvārā
jñānasya prasāda hetu tāyāḥ kvāpi adṛṣṭa tvāt
tat karma hari toṣam yat
ityādinā tad prasādasya karma ādi alpa upāya sādhya tā pratīteḥ ca
kiñca ayam ātmā avidyā kalpitaḥ bandhaḥ tad vidyayā eva nivṛttim arhati
śuktikā vidyā kalpitam rajatam iva śukti vidyayā
tat kutas bandha nivṛtti lakṣaṇe mokṣe parameśvara prasādasya upayogaḥ
kutastarām tad jñānasya kutastamām ca tad jijñāsāyāḥ

original: atha parāmārtha evāyaṃ bandhastarhi na jñānena nivarteta /
analyzed: atha parāma arthaḥ eva ayam bandhaḥ tarhi na jñānena nivarteta
na ca satyasya anādeḥ ātma svarūpa mātra anubandhinaḥ bandhasya ātma svarūpasya iva kena api nivṛttiḥ yuktā
api ca muktasya śarīra indriya viṣaya ādi saṃsarge mukta tva vyāghātaḥ
duḥkha ādi prasaṅgaḥ ca
kāraṇa sāmagrī sadbhāvāt
tathā ca abhyudaya tulya tayā ukta doṣaḥ

original: śarīrādyabhāve ca tatsādhyasukhābhāvena kasyāpi tatrārthitānupapatteranadhikārikaṃ śāstramāpadyeta /
analyzed: śarīra ādi abhāve ca tad sādhya sukha abhāvena kasya api tatra arthita anupapatteḥ anadhikārikam śāstram āpadyeta

original: ko hi svasthātmā sahasā sukhatatsādhane hātumutsahate /
analyzed: kaḥ hi svastha ātmā sahasā sukha tad sādhane hātum utsahate
tat evam viṣaya ādi anubandha vidhura tvāt na jijñāsā kartavyā
tad vidhayaḥ pi na pramāṇam

original: śāstraṃ cedamanārambhaṇīyamiti prāpte sūtrayāmāsa bhagavānācāryaḥ- oṃ athāto brahmajijñāseti // *1,288*
analyzed: śāstram ca idam anārambhaṇīyam iti prāpte sūtrayāmāsa bhagavān ācāryaḥ om atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti
om om atha atas brahma jijñāsā om
atha atas brahma jijñāsā
ota tva vācī hi oṅkāraḥ vaktī asau tad guṇa uta tām
īśvaraḥ eva śāstrasya viṣayaḥ
yat tāvat uktam viṣaya abhāvāt na jijñāsā kartavyā iti tat anupapannam
anātma jīvātmanoḥ viṣaya tva anupapattau api īśvarasya tad upapatteḥ

original: atra yaduktaṃ jīvavyatirikta īśvara eva nāstīti tatparihārāya sūtrakṛtoṅkārabrahmaśabdau prayuktau /
analyzed: atra yat uktam jīva vyatiriktaḥ īśvaraḥ eva na asti iti tad parihārāya sūtrakṛtā uṅkāra brahma śabdau prayuktau
tena ayam arthaḥ sūcitaḥ
om iti etat akṣaram udgītham upāsīta
tat vijijñāsasva tat brahma
ityādi śrutau oṅkāra brahma śabdau jijñāsye vastuni śrūyete
tābhyām ca tat sakala jīva jaḍa ātmakāt prapañcāt vilakṣaṇam avagamyate iti
tat ayuktam iva ābhāti
om ādi padasya alaukika arthe

original: nahi padaṃ cakṣurādivadapratīta evārthe pratītiṃ janayati yenāpūrvamarthaṃ padaprayogādeva pratīmaḥ /
analyzed: nahi padam cakṣuḥ ādi vat apratīte eva arthe pratītim janayati yena apūrvam artham pada prayogāt eva pratīmaḥ
svarga apūrva devatā ādi arthaḥ pi na pada prayogāt eva siddhaḥ

original: kintu sannihitānekavākyārthasāmarthyāllabhyata ityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ- otatvavācīti // *1,291*
analyzed: kintu sannihita aneka vākya artha sāmarthyāt labhyate iti atas āha bhāṣyakāraḥ otatva vāci iti
guṇa pūrṇa tā eva oṃkārasya arthaḥ
hi śabdaḥ hetvarthe
oṃkāraḥ tāvat ota tvasya gata tvasya praviṣṭa tvasya vā vācakaḥ
gati ādi arthasya avateḥ khalu rūpam etat
avateṣyi lopaḥ ca iti sūtrāt
om iti punar kasya vaktā
iti praśna pūrvakam avatiḥ nāma ayam dhātuḥ gati karmā praveśana karmā ca
iti anyatra api evam eva nirukta tvāt

original: tathāca yadyasau karmāṇi tadā karturyadi vā kartari tadā karmaṇo 'pekṣāyāmupapadādyabhāve
analyzed: tathā ca yadi asau karmāṇi tadā kartuḥ yadi vā kartari tadā karmaṇā upekṣāyām upapada ādi abhāve
yogyatayā śruti antara ādi balāt vā asau oṅkāraḥ tasya jijñāsasya guṇaiḥ ānanda ādi ananta kalyāṇa guṇaiḥ guṇa anvotatām vakti
pakṣa dvaye pi ananta anavadya kalyāṇa guṇa pūrṇa tā eva uṅkārasya arthaḥ
brahma śabdasya api saḥ eva arthaḥ
bṛhateḥ vṛddhaya arthasya khalu edat rūpam

original: tathā ca pūrvavadyogyatayā “atha kasmāducyate brahmeti bṛhanto hyasmin guṇāḥ';
analyzed: tathā ca pūrvavat yogyatayā atha kasmāt ucyate brahma iti bṛhantaḥ hi asmin guṇāḥ
ityādi śruti antara balāt vā guṇānām sambandhaḥ
yaugika śabdānām avayava saṃgati grahaṇa apekṣā āvaśyakī
etat uktam bhavati
yaugikāḥ hi śabdāḥ na avaśyam artha pratyāyane saṅgati grahaṇam apekṣante
kim nāma nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa balena avayava artha avagame sati tad saṃsarga sambhāvanāyām prasiddham anyathāpūrvam eva artham avagamayanti
vākya rūpa tvāt teṣām
yathā āha śrotriyan chandaḥ dhītevākya arthe pada prayogaḥ iti
na ca vākyam saṅgati grahaṇa apekṣam artham a bodhayati
adhigata artha tva prasaṅgāt aśakya tvāt ca
oṃkāra brahma śabdayoḥ na abhedaḥ rthaḥ
tat etau oṅkāra brahma śabdau api yaugikaḥ jijñāsyam ananta guṇa paripūrṇam pratipādayantau
jīva jaḍayoḥ tad ayogāt tat vayatiriktam eva tat ca avidita tvāt sambhavati jijñāsā viṣayaḥ
na ca tatra api guṇa pūrṇa tā viruddhā
prāk pratīteḥ nirāśrayasya virodhi pratyayasya anutthānāt
pratītyā
ca evam eva siddha tvāt iti

original: yatpunarakāravācyena tatpadārthenokāravācyasya tvaṃpadārthasyābhedo makāreṇocyate brahmaśabdena ca sakalastvātmakatvalakṣaṇapūrṇatābhidhīyata  #
analyzed: yat punar akāra vācyena tad padārthena ukāra vācyasya tvam padārthasya abhedaḥ makāreṇa ucyate brahma śabdena ca sakalaḥ tu ātmaka tva lakṣaṇa pūrṇa tā abhidhīyata
iti vyākhyānam
tat aprāmāṇikam pramāṇa viruddham ca
yat tu āpteḥ ādimat tvāt vā ityādi oṅkārasya nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvam sarvajñam sarva śakti samanvitam ityādi
brahma śabdasya vyākhyānam tat jīva ādi vyatirikta vastu sādhana avirodhi iti sphuṭam eva iti āśayavatā
na vyākhyāna antaram dūṣitam anumatam ca
guṇa uta tā iti rūpaḥ sādhuḥ
nanu guṇa ūtatām iti katham
vṛddhi reci iti bhavitavyam
mā evam
om āṅgoḥ ca iti caśabdena anyatra api para rūpa tva anuśāsanāt
athavā ūyate rūpam etat
nanu asau tantu santāne paṭhyate
aneka artha tvāt dhātūnām iti adoṣaḥ
katham tarhi etatva vāci iti guṇaḥ
vaicitṛyam tu dhātu dvaya ja tva sūcana artham
athavā ākāra upasarga pūrvakaḥ sau iti adoṣaḥ
saḥ eva brahma śabda arthaḥ nārāyaṇa pada uditaḥ
nārāyaṇa padasya api guṇa pūrṇa tā eva arthaḥ
astu vā oṅkāra brahma śabdābhyām jīva jaḍa atiriktasya jijñāsyasya siddhiḥ
tathā api īśvarasya kim āyātam iti atas āha nārāyaṇa iti
saḥ eva iti anuvartate
nahi nāmni vipratipattiḥ iti āśayaḥ
athavā sūtrakāra uktau oṅkāra brahma śabdau upalakṣaṇa mātram
nārāyaṇam mahā jñeyam
ityādi śrutau jijñāsye nārāyaṇa śabdaḥ u pi śrūyate
nārāyaṇa pada uditaḥ ca arthaḥ saḥ eva yaḥ guṇa pūrṇa tva ākhyaḥ
atas nārāyaṇa śabdena api jijñāsyam jīva ādi vyatiriktam siddhayati iti anena ucyate
etat api upalakṣaṇam
ātma ananta īśvara ādi śabdāḥ api jñātavyāḥ
teṣām api ātmānam eva lokam upāsīta
ityādau jijñāsye śravaṇāt
guṇa pūrṇa tva abhidhāyi tvāt ca

original: na cālaukikārthakalpane gauravaprasaṅgādvaraṃ kathañcideṣāṃ śabdānāṃ jīvādiviṣayāṅgīkaraṇamiti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca alaukika artha kalpane gaurava prasaṅgāt varam kathañcid eṣām śabdānām jīva ādi viṣaya aṅgīkaraṇam iti vācyam
yaugika śabda prayoga anyathā anupapatteḥ ukta tvena kalpanā abhāvāt
anyathā vākyāt api alaukika athar pratyayaḥ na syāt
laukika athaḥ eva kathañcid artha anugamasya vaktum śakya tvāt
kiñca kvacid mukhya arthe eva śabdaḥ nupapattyā
kvacid amukhya arthaḥ
na punar amukhya arthe eva

original: tathāca śrautaṃ brahmādiśabdaṃ jīvādiviṣayamaṅgīkurvāṇenāpi niravagrahapūrṇatāyuktaṃ kiñcidabhidheyaṃ mukhyamaṅgīkaraṇīyameva /
analyzed: tathā ca śrautam brahma ādi śabdam jīva ādi viṣayam aṅgīkurvāṇena api niravagraha pūrṇa tā yuktam kiñcid abhidheyam mukhyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam eva
tatas ca anena kim kṛtam syāt
jīvaḥ eva ete mukhya arthāḥ tad anupalabdhiḥ tu avidyā āvaraṇa nimittā iti ced na
svayam eva prativakṣyati iti

original: sa eva bhargaśabdārtho vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūmataḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva bharga śabda arthaḥ vyāhṛtīnām ca bhūmataḥ

original: bhāvanāccaiva sutvācca so 'yaṃ puruṣa ityapi // MAnuv_1,1.10 //
analyzed: bhāvanāt ca eva su tvāt ca saḥ yam puruṣaḥ iti api
īśvaraḥ vedena pramitaḥ
yat atra uktam īśvaraḥ pramitaḥ na vā iti
tatra pramitaḥ iti uttaram
tad pakṣa doṣaḥ ca parihariṣyate
tathā ca śāstrasya viṣaya sambandhaḥ samāhitā bhavati
yat punar atra uktam kena pramāṇena iti
tatra vedena iti vadāmaḥ

original: vedasyeśvaraviṣayatā kuta ityato 'pyoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā brahmaṇi prayuktaḥ /
analyzed: vedasya īśvara viṣaya tā kutas iti atas pyoṅkāraḥ sūtrakṛtā brahmaṇi prayuktaḥ
tat katham asya arthasya upapādakam iti āśaṅkayā idam atra ākūtam sūtrakārasya iti āha vyāhṛtīnām ca iti
saḥ eva arthaḥ iti sambandhaḥ
oṃkāraḥ tāvat bhagavataḥ īśvarasya vācakaḥ
om iti brahma
ityādi śruteḥ

original: ataḥ sa eva vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca bhūrādīnāmartha iti gamyate“praṇavārthā vyāhṛtayaḥ';
analyzed: atas saḥ eva vyāhṛtīnām ca bhūḥ ādīnām arthaḥ iti gamyate praṇava arthāḥ vyāhṛtayaḥ
ityādi āgamena tisṛṇām vyāhṛtīnām varṇa traya ātmaka uṅkāra vyākhyāna tayā avagata tvāt
vyākhyāna vyākhyeyayoḥ ca eka viṣaya tā su prasiddhā iti
eva kāraḥ vyāhṛtīnām agni vāyu sūrya devatāka tva prasiddhayā tad pratipādaka tva bhramam nivārayati
agni ādīnām adhidevatā tvena api prasiddhayupapatteḥ
anyathā ukta vyākhyāna vyākhyeya bhāva anupapatti prasaṅgaḥ

original: kena nimittena vyāhṛtīnāṃ ca sa evārtha ityata āha- bhūmata iti //
analyzed: kena nimittena vyāhṛtīnām ca saḥ eva arthaḥ iti atas āha bhūmataḥ iti
bhūmā pūrṇa tvam tatas bhūḥ
bhavateḥ bahu tva arthasya kvipi rūpam etat
bhāvanāt jagataḥ utpādanāt bhuvaḥ
bhavateḥ eva antar ṇītapi arthasya ka pratyaye rūpam
su tvāt sukha tvāt svar
sva śabdaḥ hi sukha vācī prasiddhaḥ
cakārau nimitta antara samuccaye
yathā uktam
pūrṇaḥ bhūtivaraḥ nantasukhaḥ yad vaya āhṛti īritaḥ iti
etaiḥ eva nimittaiḥ vyāhṛtīnām arthaḥ na punar loka traya ātmaka tvena
tasya pramāṇa viruddha tvāt
bhūḥ iti vai ayam lokaḥ
ityādi śrutiḥ api loka traya antargata bhagavat viṣayā eva iti eva śabda arthaḥ
gāyatrī arthaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ eva

original: kimato na hi vyāhṛtaya eva veda iti cet /
analyzed: kim atas na hi vyāhṛtayaḥ eva veda iti ced
vyāhṛti artha tayā tāvat parameśvarasya gāyatrī pratipādya tā avagamyate
tri padāyāḥ gāyatṛyāḥ vyāhṛti traya vyākhyāna tvasya āgama siddha tvāt

original: nanu gāyatṛyāṃ yo bhargo no 'smākaṃ dhiyaḥ pracodayātprerayettasya saviturdevasya tadvareṇyaṃ rūpaṃ dhīmahi cintayāma iti bharganāmakaḥ savitā  #
analyzed: nanu gāyatṛyām yaḥ bhargaḥ naḥ smākam dhiyaḥ pracodayāt prerayet tasya savituḥ devasya tat vareṇyam rūpam dhīmahi cintayāmaḥ iti bharga nāmakaḥ savitā  /
pratipādyaḥ dṛśyate

original: tatkathaṃ bhagavatparatvamityata āha- sa eva bhargaśabdārtha iti //
analyzed: tat katham bhagavat paratvam iti atas āha saḥ eva bharga śabda arthaḥ iti
bharaṇa gamana yogāt iti śeṣaḥ
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
jagat prasava hetu tvāt savitā iti api draṣṭavyam
na tu sūryaḥ
tathātve gāyatṛyāḥ vyāhṛti artha tva anupapatteḥ
dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛ maṇḍala madhya vartī nārāyaṇaḥ
ityādi āgama virodhāt ca iti eva arthaḥ
astu gāyatṛyarthaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ kim etāvatā api
gāyatṛya rtha tvāt puruṣasūkta arthaḥ u pi saḥ eva iti
varga traya ātmakasya tasya tri pāda gāyatrī vyākhyāna tvena tad bhedaḥ pauruṣam sūktam
ityādi āgama siddha tvāt

original: nanu puruṣasūkte puruṣasya paśorhiraṇyagarbhasya vā pratipādanātkathaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyata ityata āha- so 'yamiti //
analyzed: nanu puruṣasūkte puruṣasya paśoḥ hiraṇyagarbhasya vā pratipādanāt katham nārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyate iti atas āha saḥ yam iti
pūrṇa tva ādinā iti śeṣaḥ
tathā ca śrutiḥ

original: “sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣṛpuriṣayo nainena kiñcanānāvṛtaṃ nainena kiñcanāsaṃvṛtam'; iti /
analyzed: sa vai ayam puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣṛ puriṣayaḥ na enena kiñcana anāvṛtam na enena kiñcana asaṃvṛtam iti
vakṣyate ca etat

original: siddhe ca puruṣasūktārthatve viṣṇoḥ kiṃ syāt /
analyzed: siddhe ca puruṣasūkta artha tve viṣṇoḥ kim syāt
sarva veda artha tvam eva siddham

original: sa eva sarvavedārtho jijñāsyo 'yaṃ vidhīyate // MAnuv_1,1.11ab //
analyzed: saḥ eva sarva veda arthaḥ jijñāsyaḥ yam vidhīyate
sa sarvā vāc sākṣāt oṃkāra vyākhyānam
vedāḥ puruṣasūkta gāḥ
iti āgamena sarva vedānām puruṣasūkta artha tayā avagata tvāt iti āha saḥ eva iti
eva śabdaḥ kārya ādi vyāvṛtti arthaḥ
sarve vedāḥ yat padam āmananti

original: ityādiśrutisiddhamapi bhagavataḥ sarvavedārthatvaṃ nyāyenopapādayitumayaṃ prayatnaḥ sūtrakārasya /
analyzed: ityādi śruti siddham api bhagavataḥ sarva veda artha tvam nyāyena upapādayitum ayam prayatnaḥ sūtrakārasya
syāt etat
īśvaraḥ savar veda arthaḥ tad vayākhyeya uṅkāra artha tvāt

original: yo yadvayākhyeyārthaḥ sa tadartho yathā sampratipanna iti vā sarvo veda īśvaraparastatparoṅkāravyākhyānatvāditi vā sākṣādevānumānaṃ kiṃ na
analyzed: yaḥ yad vayākhyeya arthaḥ sa tad arthaḥ yathā sampratipannaḥ iti vā sarvaḥ vedaḥ īśvara paraḥ tatpara uṅkāra vyākhyāna tvāt iti vā sākṣāt eva anumānam kim na

original: “tadyathā sarvāṇi parṇāni śaṅkunā santṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇaiva sarvā vāk santṛṇṇā';
analyzed: tat yathā sarvāṇi parṇāni śaṅkunā santṛṇṇāni evam oṅkāreṇa eva sarvā vāc santṛṇṇā
ityādi śrutyā hetu artha samarthanam bhaviṣyati kim anena paramparā vyākhyānena
satyam

original: tathāpi vākyāntarabalena na sarvā vāgoṅkāravyākhyānaṃ sākṣātkiṃ nāmoktaprakāreṇa paramparayaiveti jñāpayitumitthaṃ vyākhyānamityadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api vākya antara balena na sarvā vāc oṅkāra vyākhyānam sākṣāt kim nāma ukta prakāreṇa paramparayā eva iti jñāpayitum ittham vyākhyānam iti adoṣaḥ

original: nanu ceśvare pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭavata oṃkārabrahmaśabdāveva kasmānnoktau kiṃ vedānumānena /
analyzed: nanu ca īśvare pramāṇam pṛṣṭavataḥ oṃkāra brahma śabdau eva kasmāt na uktau kim veda anumānena
na ca padasya apramāṇa tā iti vācyam
mā evam
mīmāṃsā anugrāhya pramāṇasya pṛṣṭa tvāt
na ca oṅkāra ādi mātram tathā vivakṣitam
kim nāma samastaḥ vedaḥ eva iti
kim atas yadi evam īśvaraḥ sarva veda arthaḥ iti ced
viṣaya sambandha sambhavāt jijñāsāyāḥ kartavya tā śāstrasya ca ārambhaṇīya tvam siddham iti āśayavān
sākāṅkṣasya vākya ābhāsasya apratipādaka tvāt ākāṅkṣita adhyāhāram sūcayan sūtra vākya artham āha jijñāsyaḥ iti

original: ayamiti uktavidhayā jīvajaḍātmakātprapañcādatyantaviviktatvena niścitatayā viṣayabhūtaḥ sarvavedārthatayā śakyapratipādanaścetyarthaḥ / *1,333*
analyzed: ayam iti ukta vidhayā jīva jaḍa ātmakāt prapañcāt atyanta vivikta tvena niścita tayā viṣaya bhūtaḥ sarva veda artha tayā śakya pratipādanaḥ ca iti arthaḥ
nanu vedānām īśvara pratipatti janaka tvāt bhavatu tad viṣaya tvam
śāstram tu teṣām īśvara pratipādana anusaraṇa upāya nyāya viṣayam katham īśvara param ucyate
mā evam
vedānām īśvaram avabodhayatām itikartavya tā hi mīmāṃsā
tena upakāraka tvāt bhavati tad viṣayā tad uddhārā śāstram api

original: na hi bījasyāṅkuraṃ janayataḥ sahakāriṇo jalāderaṅkuro na kāryam /
analyzed: na hi bījasya aṅkuram janayataḥ sahakāriṇaḥ jala ādeḥ aṅkuraḥ na kāryam
nanu mīmāṃsā api sambhāvanā ādi viṣayā katham īśvara viṣayā bhavati
mā evam
dvividham khalu karma kārakam bhavati
kiñcid avyavadhānena vyāpāra janya atiśaya yogi
yathā udyamana nipatana vyāpāra janya ūrdhvā deśa saṃyoga vibhāga atiśaya viśiṣṭaḥ kuṭhāraḥ kartṛ vyāpārasya avyavadhānena karma bhavati
kiñcid uddeśya phala sambandhi tayā karaṇa vyāpāra vyavadhānena
yathā dvaidhībhāvavān vṛkṣaḥ

original: tatra kartṛvyāpārasya karaṇavyāpāravyavadhānena vṛkṣakarmateva mīmāṃsāvyāpārasyāpi pramāṇādisambhāvanāddhāreṇeśvarāvabodha evoddeśya iti bhavati  #
analyzed: tatra kartṛ vyāpārasya karaṇa vyāpāra vyavadhānena vṛkṣa karma tā iva mīmāṃsā vyāpārasya api pramāṇa ādi sambhāvanāt dhāreṇa īśvara avabodhaḥ eva uddeśyaḥ iti bhavati
tad karma tā
syāt etat evam
yadi veda itikartavya tā vicāraḥ syāt
na ca evam
vinā api vicāreṇa śabda upalabdhi samaya grahaṇa tad smaraṇa sahakṛtāt śabdāt eva artha avagama darśanāt
na ca mantavyam śakti tātparya ajñāna viparyaya doṣāt śabdaḥ saṃśaya vipayaryayau utpādayati
tatra doṣa apanayanena saṃśaya ādi vyudāsāya śakti tātparya vicāraḥ ṅgam bhavati iti
yatas tatra api śabdaḥ vinā vicāreṇa tattva jñānasya iṣye
kim nāma pratibandha mātram vicāreṇa apanīyate
na hi itikartavyatā evam
tat katham veda iti kartavya tā jijñāsā
kathantarām ca īśvara viṣayā
kathantamām ca śāstrasya tad viṣaya tā iti
nirṇaya prayojaka tvāt mīmāṃsāyāḥ īśvara viṣaya tvam
atra ucyate
satyam evam

original: tathāpi pratibandhanivṛttau satyāmeva nirṇaya iti pratibandhakanirāsahetorapi vicārasyopacāreṇa nirṇayahetutvādupapannamīśvaraviṣayatvam /
analyzed: tathā api pratibandha nivṛttau satyām eva nirṇayaḥ iti pratibandhaka nirāsa hetoḥ api vicārasya upacāreṇa nirṇaya hetu tvāt upapannam īśvara viṣaya tvam
etena etat api nirastam

original: īśvarasya vedapramāṇakatve tata eva niścitatvātkiṃ mīmāṃsayeti /
analyzed: īśvarasya veda pramāṇaka tve tatas eva niścita tvāt kim mīmāṃsayā iti
yukti vākya ābhāsa janita vipratipatti pratibandhasya ukta tvāt
tathā hi
veda prāmāṇyam eva an aṅgīkurvāṇāḥ kecid īśvaraḥ eva na asti iti pratipannāḥ

original: apare tu tadaṅgīkṛtyāpi tadvācināṃ padānāṃ jīvādiviṣayatāṃ vyākurvantastadabhāvamasthitāḥ /
analyzed: apare tu tat aṅgīkṛtya api tad vācinām padānām jīva ādi viṣaya tām vyākurvantaḥ tad abhāvam asthitāḥ

original: anye tu punarastīśvaraḥ kintu paramārthato nirguṇa eveti saṅgirante /
analyzed: anye tu punar asti īśvaraḥ kintu paramārthataḥ nirguṇaḥ eva iti saṅgirante

original: eke tu saguṇo 'pi na jagataḥ kāraṇamapi tūdāsīna evetyātiṣṭhante /
analyzed: eke tu na jagataḥ kāraṇam api tu udāsīnaḥ eva iti ātiṣṭhante
kecid kāraṇa tve pi upādānam iti abhyupayanti
nimitta mātra tve pi katipaya guṇam guṇebhyaḥ bhinnam anye manyante
itare tu bhinna abhinnam upagatavantaḥ

original: kecidvigrahavantamityevamādyāsvanekāsu vipratipattiṣu satīṣu tattvajñānakaraṇādapi vedāttadanutpattau tadapanodanadvāreṇa vedetikartavyatārūpā  #
analyzed: kecid vigrahavantam iti evamādyāsu anekāsu vipratipattiṣu satīṣu tattva jñāna karaṇāt api vedāt tad anutpattau tad apanodana dvāreṇa veda itikartavya tā rūpā
jijñāsā kartavyā iti
karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī parigrahaḥ ṣaṣṭi samāsa vicāraḥ

original: tatra tāvadbrahmaṇo jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso na punardharmāya jijñāsetivaccaturthīsamāsaḥ /
analyzed: tatra tāvat brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsā brahma jijñāsā iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ na punar dharmāya jijñāsā iti vat caturthī samāsaḥ

original: tādarthyasamāse prakṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti vārtikakṛtā prakṛtivikārabhāva eva caturthīsamāsasya niyamitatvāt /
analyzed: tādarthya samāse prakṛti grahaṇam kartavyam iti vārtika kṛtā prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ eva caturthī samāsasya niyamita tvāt
tathā eva udāharaṇam yūpāya dāru yūpa dāru iti
prakṛti vikāra bhāva rahiteṣu ca aśva ghāsa ādiṣu aśva ghāsa ādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhī samāsāḥ bhavanti iti prativihitam
na ca atra prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ sti
ṣaṣṭhī samāse pi kecid śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī iti pratipannāḥ
kecid karmaṇi iti
tatra karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī parigrahāya jijñāsyaḥ iti aktam
kṛtyānām karmaṇi smaraṇāt
anyathā jijñāsā asya iti avakṣyat

original: jijñāsā khalu karmāpekṣā vinā karmaṇā na jñātuṃ śakyā na tu sambandhinaṃ vineti karmaṇaḥ prādhānyāttadeva vaktavyam /
analyzed: jijñāsā khalu karma apekṣā vinā karmaṇā na jñātum śakyā na tu sambandhinam vinā iti karmaṇaḥ prādhānyāt tat eva vaktavyam
sambandhi sāmānya ukta varthāt karma api labhyate iti ced na
sākṣāt pratīta parityāgena artha labhya svīkārasya vaiyarthyāt

original: evaṃ sati lakṣaṇādijijñāsāpi pratijñātā syāditi cenna /
analyzed: evam sati lakṣaṇa ādi jijñāsā api pratijñātā syāt iti ced na
tasyāḥ vinā api abhidhānena lābhāt
nahi lakṣaṇa ādi jijñāsām antareṇa brahma jijñāsā asti
anyathā aneka viṣaya tvena śāstra bheda prasaṅgaḥ
nirviṣaya tā śaṅkā apanoda artham prayuktam padam idam karma abhidhānī eva yuktam
tat vijijñāsasva ityādi śruti artha anugatam ca evam sati sūtram syāt
nanu ca pratipada vidhānā ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate

original: iti karmāṇi ṣaṣṭhayāḥ samāsaḥ pratiṣidhyata iti cenna /
analyzed: iti karmāṇi ṣaṣṭhayāḥ samāsaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti ced na
kṛt yoga lakṣaṇā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyate
iti pratiprasavāt
karma prādhānya artham jijñāsyaḥ iti prayogaḥ

original: athavā brahmaṇaḥ karmatvenāprādhānyaśaṅkāṃ nivartayituṃ jijñāsya iti karmaprādhānyaṃ sūcitam /
analyzed: athavā brahmaṇaḥ karmatvena aprādhānya śaṅkām nivartayitum jijñāsyaḥ iti karma prādhānyam sūcitam
jñāna vidhau hi brahmaṇaḥ prādhānyam syāt
tad jñāna uddeśena jijñāsā vidhāne kutas aprādhānyam
kartavyā iti pada adhyāhāra vicāraḥ
vidhīyate iti anena kartavyā iti pada adhyāhāram sūcayati
nanu bhavati iti svatas siddham
mā evam
tathā sati anuvāda tva prasaṅgāt
atra eke codayanti
siddhā eva nanu brahma jijñāsā
atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti sakala veda artha vicārasya udita tvāt
brahma jñānasya codanā lakṣaṇa tvena dharma svarūpa tvāt abhyadhika āśaṅkā bhāvāt iti
tatra kecid abhyadhika āśaṅkām darśayantaḥ brahma jijñāsām pṛthak ārabhante

original: apare tu kāryaniṣṭha eva vedabhāgo vicāryatvena tatra prakrānto vicāritaśca na vastutattvaniṣṭha ityato vastutattvaniṣṭhaṃ vedabhāgaṃ vicārayitumidamārabhyata  #
analyzed: apare tu kārya niṣṭhaḥ eva veda bhāgaḥ vicārya tvena tatra prakrāntaḥ vicāritaḥ ca na vastu tattva niṣṭhaḥ iti atas vastu tattva niṣṭham veda bhāgam vicārayitum idam ārabhyata
iti āhuḥ
sā iyam gatārtha tā āśaṅkā tad samādhānam ca nā upapadyate
sarva vedānām īśvara eka niṣṭhatvena sarva veda arthasya atra eva jijñāsya tvāt

original: dharmajijñāsāśāstraṃ tu vedaikadeśāmukhyārthadharmavicārāya pravṛttamityāśayena vā“sa eva bhargaśabdārthaḥ';
analyzed: dharma jijñāsā śāstram tu veda eka deśa amukhya artha dharma vicārāya pravṛttam iti āśayena vāsaḥ eva bharga śabda arthaḥ
ityādi uktam

original: tatra sarvavedārtha ityanena gatārthatāśaṅkānirāsaḥ sa eva na tu kāryaśeṣatayetyādyaṃ samādhānaṃ sarveti dvitīyaṃ ca nirastam /
analyzed: tatra sarva veda arthaḥ iti anena gatārtha tā āśaṅkā nirāsaḥ saḥ eva na tu kārya śeṣa tayā iti ādyam samādhānam sarvā iti dvitīyam ca nirastam
tad upapādanāya pūrva vākyam
jijñāsyaḥ iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ
vakṣyati ca etad vistareṇa kārya tā ca ityādinā

original: jñānī priyatamo 'to me taṃ vidvāneva cāmṛtaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.11cd //
analyzed: jñānī me tam vidvān eva ca amṛtaḥ

original: vṛṇute yaṃ tena labhya ityādyuktibalena hi /
analyzed: vṛṇute yam tena labhyaḥ ityādi ukti balena hi
jijñāsā uttha jñāna jāt tad prasādāt eva mucyate

original: brahmajijñāsāyā niṣprayojanatvaṃ śaṅkitamapākartuṃ ataḥśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe- jñānīti //
analyzed: brahma jijñāsāyāḥ niṣprayojana tvam śaṅkitam apākartum atas śabdam vyācaṣṭe jñānī iti
tam vidvān iti anenatam evam vidvān amṛtaḥ iha bhavati
iti vākyam eva śabdena na anyaḥ panthāḥ ayanāya
iti uttara vākyam avadhāraṇa artham ca saṅgṛhītam
caśabdaḥ vākya samuccaye
vṛṇute yam iti anena ayam eva eṣa vṛṇute
iti vākyam saṅgṛhītam
ādi padena ātmā vai are draṣṭavyaḥ
ityādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ
hi śabdau hetau
eva śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate

original: yasmāttasya brahmaṇo nārāyaṇasya prasādātparamānugrahādeva mucyate saṃsārāt na tu karmādineti“tamevam'“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute';
analyzed: yasmāt tasya brahmaṇaḥ nārāyaṇasya prasādāt parama anugrahāt eva mucyate saṃsārāt na tu karma ādinā iti tam evam yam eva eṣa vṛṇute
iti śruti balena gamyate
yadi api tam evam iti paramapuruṣa prasādaḥ na śrūyate

original: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti śrutibalena gamyate /
analyzed: tathā api yam eva eṣa vṛṇute iti śruti balena gamyate
yadi api tam evam iti paramapuruṣa prasādaḥ na śrūyate

original: tathāpi yamevaiṣa vṛṇuta iti vākyānurodhena tatrāpyanusandheyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api yam eva eṣa vṛṇute iti vākya anurodhena tatra api anusandheyaḥ
nimittena naimittika upalakṣaṇāt mumukṣu sambandhi sādhana avadhāraṇāya tu na sākṣāt uktaḥ
varaṇam tu prasādaḥ ucyate
apāma somam
ityādyāḥ tu śrutayaḥ sāvakāśa tvāt anyathā yojyāḥ
īśvara parama prasādaḥ ca tad jñānāt eva bhavati

original: na punaḥ karmādineti jñānī priyatamastamevaṃ vidvānityuktibalenāvagamyate /
analyzed: na punar karma ādinā iti jñānī priyatamaḥ tam evam vidvān iti ukti balena avagamyate
vidvān ityasya api prasāda atiśaya dvāreṇa iti artha paryavasānasya uktatvāt
karma ādeḥ anugraha mātra hetu tvena api tat vacanam sārthakam

original: īśvarajñānaṃ ca tajjijñāsayaiva nānyeneti“ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ';
analyzed: īśvara jñānam ca tat jijñāsayā eva na anyena iti ātmā vai are draṣṭavyaḥ

original: iti paramātmadaśarnānuvādena tatsādhanatayā śrotavya ityādinā śravaṇādividhāyakoktibalena pratīyate /
analyzed: iti tad sādhanatayā śrotavyaḥ ityādinā śravaṇa ādi vidhāyaka ukti balena pratīyate
karmaṇām tu antaḥkaraṇa śuddhi dvāreṇa jñāna aṅga tva upapatteḥ tat vākyam sārthakam bhaviṣyati
atas brahma jijñāsā kartavyā iti sambandhaḥ
idam uktam bhavati

original: yadyapi na jijñāsāyāḥ svargādirūpo 'bhyudayaḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /
analyzed: yadi api na jijñāsāyāḥ svarga ādi rūpaḥ bhyudayaḥ prayojanam sambhavati
tathā api mokṣaḥ bhaviṣyati
tasya an anya sādhya tvāt
mokṣa sādhanam hi sākṣāt bhagavān eva
bandhakaḥ bhava pāśena bhava pāśāt ca mocakaḥ
iti ādi vacanāt
sādhanam ca dvividham
siddham asiddham ca
tatra asiddham utpādyam phala kāmena
yathā yāga ādi
siddham tu sa vyāpārīkaraṇīyam
yathā kuṭhāra ādi

original: siddhaṃ ca sādhanaṃ bhagavāniti mumukṣuṇā savyāpārīkaraṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: siddham ca sādhanam bhagavān iti mumukṣuṇā savyāpārīkaraṇīyaḥ
vyāpāraḥ ca prasanna tā eva
nigaḍa ādi mocakeṣu rāja ādiṣu tathā darśanāt
yasya prasādāt parama ārti rūpāt asmāt saṃsārāt mucyate na apareṇa
ityādi śruteḥ ca
vyāpāra prādhānya uktiḥ ca indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ pratyakṣam ityādau iva aupacārikī
mocakaḥ ca īśvara prasādaḥ tad bhaktayā eka sādhyaḥ
bhaktayā eva tuṣyim abhyeti viṣṇunā anyena kenacid
iti ādi vacanāt
svarga ādi hetu prasāda mātram karma ādi sādhyam
karmaṇā tu adhamaḥ proktaḥ prasādaḥ
ityādi smṛteḥ

original: prasādo nāmecchāviśeṣo guṇāntaraṃ vā na naḥ kacit kṣatiḥ /
analyzed: prasādaḥ nāma icchā viśeṣaḥ guṇa antaram vā na naḥ kacid kṣatiḥ
parameśvara bhaktiḥ nāma niravadhika ananta anavadya kalyāṇa guṇa tva jñāna pūrvakaḥ svātma ātmīya samasta vastubhyaḥ neka guṇa adhikaḥ ntarāya sahasreṇa api apratibaddhaḥ
yam adhikṛtya yatra na anyat paśyati sā niśā paśyataḥ muneḥ
ityādi śruti smṛtayaḥ
na ca asau tad sākṣātkāram antareṇa utpadyate
loke tathā darśanāt

original: nacāvyaktasvabhāvo bhagavāṃsahasreṇāpi prayatnānāṃ śakyaḥ sākṣātkartuṃ vinā tadanugrahāt /
analyzed: na ca avyakta svabhāvaḥ bhagavān sahasreṇa api prayatnānām śakyaḥ sākṣātkartum vinā tad anugrahāt
prasannaḥ tu ananta acintya śakti yogāt ātmānam darśayati iti yujyate
darśana asādhanam ca anugrahaḥ sva yogya guṇa upetasya nirdoṣasya bhagavat vigraha viśeṣasya ādara nairantaryābhyām
viṣaya vairāgya tad bhakti sahitāt bahu kāla upacitāt nididhyāsana apara nāmakāt vicintanāt ṛte na labhyate

original: naca nididhyāsanaṃ vākyārthagrahaṇalakṣaṇe śravaṇe kṛte 'pi vinā mananāparanāmnā vicāreṇopapadyate /
analyzed: na ca nididhyāsanam vākya artha grahaṇa lakṣaṇe śravaṇe kṛte vinā manana apara nāmnā vicāreṇa upapadyate
saṃśaya viparyayoḥ tādavasthyāt
nahi tayoḥ satoḥ ādara nairantarya ādi upapadyate
atas jijñāsā nididhyāsana parameśvara anugraha tad darśana parama bhakti parama anugraha dvārā mokṣa asādhana tvāt kartavyā iti

original: ye tu dhyānameva paramapāṭavāpannamaparokṣākāramiti manyante teṣāṃ darśanaśrutaya upacaritārthāḥ prasajyeran / *1,403*
analyzed: ye tu dhyānam eva parama pāṭava āpannam aparokṣa ākāram iti manyante teṣām darśana śrutayaḥ upacarita arthāḥ prasajyeran
syāt etat
atas śabdaḥ tāvat prakṛtasya hetu bhāve
tatra brahma jijñāsāyāḥ prayojana ākāṅkṣāyām adhikāri viśeṣaṇatayā atha śabdena prakṛtaḥ mokṣaḥ sambaddhayate
jñātum icchā jijñāsā
na ca atra avayava arthena jijñāsā śabdaḥ rthavān
icchāyāḥ svātantrya aviṣaya tvena vidhātum aśakya tvāt
atas eva iṣyamāṇa jñāna upalakṣaṇā api ayuktā
tasmāt jñāna icchā antarṇītaḥ vicāraḥ jijñāsā padena lakṣyate
mukhya prayoga atikrameṇa lākṣaṇika āśrayaṇe ca idam prayojanam
yat vicārasya jñāna dvārā eva mokṣa sādhanatva jñāpanam
anyathā yogyatā viraheṇa anvaya abhāvava prasaṅgāt
yadi ca jijñāsā śabdaḥ mīmāṃsā śabda vat vicāre eva upasaṅkhayāyate
tadā api anvaya vyatirekābhyām vicārasya jñāna sādhana tā jñāsyate

original: evaṃca vicāro yato jñānasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ ca mokṣasādhanamato asau kartavya iti labhyate / *1,409*
analyzed: evaṃca vicāraḥ yatas jñāna sādhanam jñānam ca mokṣa sādhanam atas asau kartavyaḥ iti labhyate
mokṣa ādeḥ anya labhya tvasya śaṅkita tvāt sāvadhāraṇa tā api

original: īśvaraprasādasya tu jñāpakaṃ na kiñcidatra paśyāmaḥ / *1,418*
analyzed: īśvara prasādasya tu jñāpakam na kiñcid atra paśyāmaḥ
na ca jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tā na yuktā
yena īśvara prasādaḥ madhye dhyā āhriyate

original: ātmayāthātmyājñānādanātmani śarīrādāvātmatvārope sati hi tadanukūlapratikūlayo rāgadveṣau bhavataḥ /
analyzed: ātma yāthātmya ajñānāt anātmani śarīra ādau ātma tva ārope sati hi tad anukūla pratikūlayoḥ rāga dveṣau bhavataḥ
tābhyām prayuktaḥ puṇya pāpa lakṣaṇām pravṛttim ācinute
tatas ca sura nara tiryak ādi nānā yoniṣu navīna śarīra indriya ādi saṃyoga lakṣaṇam janma asya bhavati

original: tasmācca duḥkhānubhava ityanādirayaṃ kāryakāraṇapravāhaḥ saṃsāra ityucyate /
analyzed: tasmāt ca duḥkha anubhavaḥ iti anādiḥ ayam kārya kāraṇa pravāhaḥ saṃsāraḥ iti ucyate
ātma tattva jñānāt ca ajñāna viparyayau nivartete
tattva jñānasya samāna āśraya viṣaya ajñāna mithyājñāna nivartana svābhāvyāt
mithyājñāna nivṛttau ca rāga dveṣa anudayaḥ
kāraṇa abhāvāt

original: tayorabhāve ca na pravṛtterutpattiḥ prāgupacitāyāścopabhogena prrakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ abhāve ca na pravṛtteḥ utpattiḥ prāk upacitāyāḥ ca upabhogena prrakṣayaḥ
pravṛtti abhāve ca janmāntara abhāvaḥ hetu abhāvāt eva
vatarmāna śarīra ādeḥ ca ārambhaka kṣaye sati nivṛttiḥ

original: janmābhāve ca na nirbījasya duḥkhasyotpāda ityevamātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttirmuktiḥ /
analyzed: janma abhāve ca na nirbījasya duḥkhasya utpādaḥ iti evam ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ muktiḥ
tathā ca jñāna svabhāva labhyāyām muktau kim īśvara prasādena
na hi andhakāra nibandhana duḥkha nivṛttaye pradīpam upādadānāḥ kasyacid prabhoḥ prasādam apekṣante
svabhāvaḥ hi pradīpasya ayam yat samāna adhikaraṇa andhakāra nivartaka tvam
tathā ca nyāyasūtram
duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyājñānānām uttarottara apāye tad anantara apāyāt apavargaḥ iti

original: dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvo jīva eva ca /
analyzed: dravyam karma ca kālaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ eva ca

original: yadanugrahataḥ santi na santi yadupekṣayā // MAnuv_1,1.13 //
analyzed: yad anugrahataḥ santi na santi yad upekṣayā

original: narte tvat kriyate kiñcidityāderna hariṃ vinā /
analyzed: na ṛte tvat kriyate kiñcid ityādeḥ na harim vinā

original: jñānasvabhāvato 'pi syānmuktiḥ kasyāpi hi kvacit // MAnuv_1,1.14 //
analyzed: syāt muktiḥ kasya api hi kvacid
mokṣasya hari adhīna tvam
yat tu mokṣasya īśvara adhīna tva vacanam tat jñāna ādi janmani īśvarasya nimittatā param iti aviruddham
tad artham ca tad upāsti ādeḥ upayogaḥ
tat evam jñāna svabhāvena ajñāna ādi nivṛttau kāraṇa abhāve kārya anudayasya īśvara prasāda anapekṣa tvāt ayuktam idam atas śabda vyākhyānam iti atas āha dravyam iti
dravya śabdena prakṛti ādi tattvam ucyate
karma iti dharma adharmau
svabhāvaḥ prakṛti ādīnām pariṇāma ādiḥ
jīvaḥ iti abhimānī
eva iti yat anugrahataḥ iti atas param draṣṭavyam
anena sarva utpattimat upādāna nimittānām sattā api parameśvara adhīnā iti ucyate
na ṛte tvat kriyate kiñcana
iti śrutyā sarva arthakriyāyāḥ tad adhīna tvam
ityādeḥ āgamāt avagamyate iti śeṣaḥ
pi iti apiśabdena aṅgīkāra vādaḥ yam iti sūcayati
hi śabdaḥ hetau
yasmāt evam tasmāt upapannam pūrva vyākhyānam iti
bandhasya īśvara adhīna tva upapādanam
tatas ca ayam arthaḥ
syāt etat evam
yadi ajñāna mātra nibandhanaḥ yam bandhaḥ jīvasya syāt
na ca evam
śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu parameśvara icchā nimitta tva avagamāt
advaitinām avidyā adhīna jīva brahma vibhāgavat tārkika ādīnām ca guṇavat tva adhīna dravyavat anādeḥ api īśvara adhīna tva upapatteḥ

original: upapādayiṣyate hi jñānānandādisvarūpo 'yaṃ jīva iti puṃstvādivadityādinā /
analyzed: upapādayiṣyate hi jñāna ānanda ādi svarūpaḥ yam jīvaḥ iti puṃstva ādi vat ityādinā
tad bhāva anupalabdhiḥ ca anubhava siddhā
tena avagamyate sti kim api āvarakam
yena āvṛtaḥ sva prakāśa caitanya rūpaḥ na ātmanaḥ tattvam veda
na ca kāma karma ādikam eva tathā bhavitum arhati
tasya api sādinaḥ kāraṇa apekṣa tvāt
na ca pūrva pūrvasmāt uttara uttaram iti yuktam
supti pralayayoḥ tad vṛtti abhāvena niṣkalaṅka caitanya balāt sva rūpa avabhāsa prasakteḥ

original: ataḥ kāmakarmādyatiriktaṃ māyāvidyā prakṛtirityādiśabdābhidheyamanādyeva kimapi dravyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
analyzed: atas kāma karma ādi atiriktam māyā avidyā prakṛtiḥ iti ādi śabda abhidheyam anādi eva kim api dravyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam
anādi māyayā suptaḥ
ityādi śruti smṛtayaḥ ca bhavanti
na ca māyā api katham sva prakāśam āvṛṇoti iti yuktam
āvaraka tayā eva tasyāḥ pramita tvāt
vakṣyate ca atra upapattiḥ
na ca jaḍasya svatas kiñcitkaratvam yuktam
dravyam karma ca ityādi vākya viruddham ca
īśvara prasādasya apekṣita tva samarthanam

original: ataḥ parameśvara eva sattvādiguṇamayyā vidyāvirodhitvenāvidyayā svādhīnayā prakṛtyācintyādbhutayā svaśaktayā ca jīvasya svaprakāśamapi svarūpacaitanyamācchādayatīti  #
analyzed: atas parameśvaraḥ eva sattva ādi guṇa mayyā vidyā virodhi tvena avidyayā svādhīnayā prakṛtyā acintya adbhutayā sva śaktayā ca jīvasya sva prakāśam api svarūpa caitanyam ācchādayati iti
yuktam
saḥ eva ca sva adhiṣṭhāna labdha pariṇāma mahat ahaṅkāra ādi prakṛti aṃśaiḥ saṃyojya kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva svātantṛyam
kāraka phala svāmyam ca asya a vidyamānam eva upadarśya rāga ādi utpādana dvarā duḥkham anubhāvayati
tat evam bandhasya īśvara adhīna tvāt saḥ eva mocakaḥ ṅgīkārya aparasya svātantrya abhāvāt

original: prasanna evāsau svakīyāṃ māyāṃ vyāvartayatīti tatprasādārthaṃ sarvo 'pyayaṃ sādhanasandarbha ityuktam /
analyzed: prasannaḥ eva asau svakīyām māyām vyāvartayati iti tad prasāda artham sarvaḥ pi ayam sādhana sandarbhaḥ iti uktam

original: tato yadyapi na sūtrākṣarebhyo bhagavatprasādo labhyate /
analyzed: tatas yadi api na sūtra akṣarebhyaḥ bhagavat prasādaḥ labhyate
tathā api anupapattyā aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti yuktam vyākhyānam
vakṣyati ca etat sūtrakāraḥ tatas hi asya bandha viparyayau iti

original: evamuktena nyāyena na jñānasyaivāyaṃ svabhāvo yatsākṣānmokṣasādhanatvam /
analyzed: evam uktena nyāyena na jñānasya eva ayam svabhāvaḥ yat sākṣāt mokṣa sādhana tvam
astu vā tathā api īśvara prasādaḥ upekṣitaḥ

original: sakalakārakāṇāṃ tadadhīnasattāpravṛttitvena tadicchāṃ vinā kasyāpi kāryasyānudayāditi /
analyzed: sakala kārakāṇām tad adhīna sattā pravṛtti tvena tad icchām vinā kasya api kāryasya anudayāt iti
aṅgīkāra vādasya ca idam prayojanam yat pūrvasya eva arthasya samarthanam
tathā hi

original: yena jñānasya mokṣahetutvamaṅgīkṛtaṃ na tenāpi īśvarecchāṃ tyaktuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: yena jñānasya mokṣa hetu tvam aṅgīkṛtam na tena api īśvara icchām tyaktum śakyate
kāraka preraka tva ādinā avaśya abhyupagamanīya tvāt
tathā ca kim anena jñānena apramitena
pramitaḥ īśvaraḥ eva aṅgīkāryaḥ iti
ajñānām jñāna daḥ viṣṇuḥ jñāninām mokṣa daḥ ca saḥ

original: ānandadaśca muktānāṃ sa evaiko janārdanaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.15 //

mithyātvam api bandhasya na pratyakṣa virodhataḥ
mithyātvasya pratyakṣa virodhaḥ
dūṣaṇa antaram ca arthāpatteḥ āha mithyātvam api iti

original: na kevalaṃ bandhamithyātvaṃ naiva muktirapekṣate kiṃ nāma bandhasya mithyātvaṃ nāstītyapisambandhaḥ /
analyzed: na kevalam bandha mithyātvam nā eva muktiḥ apekṣate kim nāma bandhasya mithyātvam nā asti iti apisambandhaḥ
nanu etat anupapannam
pramāṇam hi sva mahimnā eva artham vyavasthāpayati
na punar prāk artha siddhim apekṣate

original: tathātve vā pramāṇavaiyarthyaṃ pūrvapramāṇasyāpi tathātvenānavasthā ca syāt /
analyzed: tathātve vā pramāṇa vaiyarthyam pūrva pramāṇasya api tathātvena anavasthā ca syāt
atas prāk ākṣepya asiddhiḥ arthāpatteḥ bhūṣaṇam eva
pravṛttāyām tu arthāpattau na apekṣya asiddhiḥ pramita tvāt eva

original: evaṃ tarhi paricitacarapuruṣasya divābhuñjānasya pīnatvamanupapadyamānaṃ rasāyanasiddhiṃ yogarddhiṃ vā kasmānnākṣipet /
analyzed: evam tarhi paricita cara puruṣasya divā abhuñjānasya pīna tvam anupapadyamānam rasāyana siddhim yoga ṛddhim vā kasmāt na ākṣipet
tad asiddhiḥ api prāk arthāpatti pravṛtteḥ alaṅkāraḥ eva
uttarakālam tu na asti eva iti ced na
vaiṣamyāt
nahi rasāyana siddhayā ādi asiddha tayā nā arthāpatti prameyam
api tarhi paricita care puruṣe pramāṇa bādhita tayā

original: asiddhaṃ sādhayati pramāṇaṃ na tu pramāṇaviruddhamiti hi prasiddham /
analyzed: asiddham sādhayati pramāṇam na tu pramāṇa viruddham iti hi prasiddham
eṣā khalu arthāpatti sāmagrī
yat ākṣepakasya pramita tvam anupapadyamāna tvam ca
ākṣepyasya api upapādaka tvam pramāṇa aviruddha tvam ca
atas eva apramita tvam anupapatti abhāvaḥ nyathā api upapattiḥ anyathā eva upapattiḥ pramāṇa viruddha artha tvam ca iti arthāpatti dūṣaṇāni iti
satyam

original: vayamapi hi bandhamithyātvamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣaviruddhatvādeva nārthāpattiprameyamiti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: vayam api hi bandha mithyātvam aham kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhī ityādi pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt eva na arthāpatti prameyam iti brūmaḥ
tat idam uktam pratyakṣa virodhataḥ iti
pratyakṣa virodhataḥ pi iti vā yojanā
tena pramāṇa antara virodham samuccinoti

original: ceṣyādiliṅgairahamityeva yo vedya ityādyāgamaiścātmanaḥ kartṛtvādyupetasyaiva pramitatvāt /
analyzed: ceṣya ādi liṅgaiḥ aham iti eva yaḥ vedyaḥ ityādi āgamaiḥ ca ātmanaḥ kartṛ tva ādi upetasya eva pramita tvāt
athavā rthāpatteḥ ābhāsa tvena anākṣipta bandha mithyātvam varṇayat pareṣām bhāṣyam anupayuktam iti uktam
ayuktam api pratyakṣa ādi viruddha artha pratipādaka tvāt iti anena ucyate

original: nanu pratyakṣaṃ bandhasvarūpamātraṃ gocarayati na tu tasmin mithyātvābhāvam /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣam bandha svarūpa mātram gocarayati na tu tasmin mithyātva abhāvam
atas ṛthāpatteḥ bhāṣya kārīyasya vā tad mithyātva vyutpādanasya katham pratyakṣa virodhaḥ
mā evam

original: pratyakṣaṃ khalu bandhaṃ gocarayadastīti nāstīti vā gocarayet /
analyzed: pratyakṣam khalu bandham gocarayat asti iti na asti iti vā gocarayet
ubhaya udāsīnasya jñānasya ā daśarnāt
ādye stitvam mithyātva abhāvaḥ ca iti anartha antaram iti katham na pratyakṣa virodhaḥ
dvitīye nubhava virodhaḥ tad vyutpādana vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt ca
mithyātvam yadi duḥkha ādeḥ tad vākya agratas bhavet
na iha nānā asti iti śruti artha vicāraḥ
syāt etat evam
yadi idam pratyakṣam tattva āvedakam bhavet
na ca etat asti
samasta upādhi anavacchinna ananta ānanda caitanya ekarasam udāsīnam ekam eva advitīyam khalu ātma tattvam na iha nānā asti kiñcana ityādi śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu
gīyate

original: na caitānyupakramādivaśādīdṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni kenāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
analyzed: na ca etāni upakrama ādi vaśāt īdṛś ātma tattvam abhidadhati tad parāṇi santi śakyāni kena api upacarita arthāni kartum
tad viruddham ca prādeśikam anekavidha duḥkha ādi prapañca upaplutam ātmānam ādarśayat pratyakṣam katham upaplavaḥ na bhavet

original: yeyaṃ caitanyasya svata eva sthitalakṣaṇabrahmarūpatāvabhāsaṃ pratibadhya jīvatpāpādikavidyākamarpūrvaprajñāsaṃskāracitrabhittiranādiranirvācyavidyā
analyzed: yā iyam caitanyasya svatas eva sthita lakṣaṇa brahma rūpa tā avabhāsam pratibadhya jīvat pāpa ādika vidyā kamarpūrva prajñā saṃskāra citra bhittiḥ anādiḥ anirvācya vidyā
tasyāḥ parameśvara adhiṣṭhita tva labdha pariṇāma viśeṣaḥ vijñāna kriyā śakti dvaya āśrayaḥ kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva eka ādhāraḥ kūṭastha caitanya saṃvalana sañjāta jyotiḥ aparokṣaḥ
haṅkāraḥ

original: saca cidātmano buddhayā niṣkṛṣṭa vedāntavādibhirantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirahaṃpratyayīti ca vijñānaśaktiviśeṣamāśritya gīyate /
analyzed: saca cit ātmanaḥ buddhayā vedānta vādibhiḥ antaḥkaraṇam manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṃpratyayī iti ca vijñāna śakti viśeṣam āśritya gīyate
parispanda śaktayā ca prāṇaḥ iti
tad uparāga nimittam mithyā eva ātmanaḥ kartṛ tva ādikam pratibhāti
sphaṭika maṇeḥ iva upadhāna nimittaḥ lohitimā

original: tadevamahaṃ kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhītyādipratyakṣe śrutyādivirodhena pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bandhamithyātvavyutpādanamupapannataramityata āha- mithyātvaṃ  #
analyzed: tat evam aham kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhī ityādi pratyakṣe śruti ādi virodhena pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bandha mithyātva vyutpādanam upapannataram iti atas āha mithyātvam
yadi iti
bheva id etat na iha nānā ityādi vākya virodhena pratyakṣam ābhāsīkṛtya bandha mithyātva varṇanam
bāla jana manoharā ca eṣā prakriyā
yadi tat vākyam uktavidha ātma tattva param syāt
na ca evam
tathā hi
kim āpātataḥ pratipannaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ
athavā upakrama upasaṃhārau abhyāsaḥ pūrva tā phalam
atharva āda upapattī ca liṅgam tātparya nirṇayaḥ ityādi ukta liṅga anuguṇaḥ tad aviruddhaḥ ca
na ādyaḥ
mīmāṃsā vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
dvitīye tu katham idam vākī ukta lakṣaṇa ātma tattva param syāt
upakrama ādi liṅgeṣu balavatyā upapattyā viruddha tvāt

original: ata eva hyasataḥ sadajāyatetyādivākyapratipanno 'rthaḥ kutastu khalu somyaiyaṃ syātkathamasataḥ sañjāyetetyupapattiviruddhastyajyate /
analyzed: atas eva hi asataḥ sat ajāyata ityādi vākya pratipannaḥ rthaḥ kutas tu khalu somya eyam syāt katham asataḥ sañjāyeta iti upapatti viruddhaḥ tyajyate
vakṣyati ca bhagavan sūtrakāraḥ bhimāni adhikaraṇe mṛd abravīt ityādi vākyāt pratītam api artham upapatti viruddham parityajya arthāntaram
katham atra upapatti virodhaḥ iti ced

original: evaṃ yadi duḥkhāderātmātiriktasya samastasya mithyātvaṃ śrutyādibalena syāttarhi tasya śrutyādivākyasya tāvanmithyātvaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: evam yadi duḥkha ādeḥ ātma atiriktasya samastasya mithyātvam śruti ādi balena syāt tarhi tasya śruti ādi vākyasya tāvat mithyātvam bhavet
ātma atirikta tvāt

original: anyathā svasminnevāsya prāmāṇyaṃ pratihatamiti na kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayet /
analyzed: anyathā svasmin eva asya prāmāṇyam pratihatam iti na kañcid artham pratipādayet

original: yadi cedaṃ vākyaṃ mithyā syāttathāpi na duḥkhādermithyātvaṃ pratipādayet /
analyzed: yadi ca idam vākyam mithyā syāt tathā api na duḥkha ādeḥ mithyātvam pratipādayet
mithyā bhūtasya vandhyā suta vacasaḥ sādhaka tva adarśanāt
tat evam asya vākyasya mithyātva amithyātvayoḥ bandha mithyātva pratipādana asāmathryāt pratyakṣa bādhaka tva anupapatteḥ na duḥkha ādi bandha mithyātva siddhiḥ iti
tattva vidaḥ vadanti
sarvaḥ hi bandhaḥ buddhīndriya śarīra viṣaya tad dharma lakṣaṇaḥ smābhiḥ api ātmani āropitaḥ eva iti aṅgīkriyate
yathā uktam bhāṣyakṛtā
pramāda ātmaka tvāt bandhasya iti
atas kinnibandhanaḥ bandha mithyātva nirāse
satyam
tathā api asti atra darśana bhedaḥ
evam khalu adhyātma vidām darśanam

original: kriyājñāne prati kārakāntarāprayojyatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca parameśvarāyattamātmani svato vidyata eva /
analyzed: kriyā jñāne prati kāraka antara aprayojya tva ādi lakṣaṇam kartṛ tvam bhoktṛ tvam ca parameśvara āyattam ātmani svatas vidyate eva
kriyā āveśa ādi rūpayā vikriyayā vināśa ādi ahetu tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt
avidyā ādikam ca svarūpeṇa ātma sambandhi tvena ca sat eva
evam buddhīndriya śarīra viṣayāḥ sva rūpa santaḥ evā īśvara vaśāḥ api avidyā ādi vaśāt ātmīya tayā adhyasyante
parāyatta ātmīya tā api asti eva

original: tāṃścātmano viviktānapi vispaṣṭatayānupalabhamānastaddharmānduḥkhādīṃtsatyānevātmīyatvena paśyaṃstatkṛte nīcoccatvalakṣaṇe vikṛtī satye eva  #
analyzed: tān ca ātmanaḥ viviktān api vispaṣṭa tayā an upalabhamānaḥ tad dharmān duḥkha ādīn satyān eva ātmīya tvena paśyan tad kṛte nīca ucca tva lakṣaṇe vikṛtī satye eva
pratipadyate

original: tato rāgadveṣābhyāṃ prayuktastadvinivṛttaye yatkaroti tadapyetādṛgevātanotītyanekayoniṣu bambhramīti /
analyzed: tatas rāga dveṣābhyām prayuktaḥ tad vinivṛttaye yat karoti tat api etādṛś eva ātanoti iti aneka yoniṣu bambhramīti

original: na kvāpyātyantikaṃ tadupaśamaṃ labhate vinā paramapuruṣārādhanāditi /
analyzed: na kvāpi ātyantikam tad upaśamam labhate vinā paramapuruṣa ārādhanāt iti
māyā vādinaḥ tu duḥkha ādikam svarūpeṇa api mithyā iti manyante
yat avocat
satya anṛte mithunīkṛtya iti

original: atastannirākaraṇanirbandho yukta evetyetatparibhāvayituṃ bandhamithyātvamiti saṃmugdhe prastute 'pi duḥkhāderiti niṣkṛṣṭoktam /
analyzed: atas tad nirākaraṇa nirbandhaḥ yuktaḥ evā iti etat paribhāvayitum bandha mithyātvam iti saṃmugdhe prastute duḥkha ādeḥ iti niṣkṛṣṭa uktam
svātantrya ādeḥ na anyaḥ stikartā ityādi śruti bādhita tvāt
nahi sarva mithyātva śruteḥ iva asyāḥ kaścid virodhaḥ sti
vakṣyati ca etat tatra tatra sūtrakāraḥ
yat api pareṇa ātma anātmanoḥ itaretara adhyāsa samarthanāya tam etam avidyā ākhyam ātma anātmanoḥ itaretara adhyāsam

original: puraskṛtya sarve pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā laukikāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi ityādinā
analyzed: puraskṛtya sarve pramāṇa prameya vyavahārāḥ laukikāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi ityādinā
pramāṇa antaram ādarśitam
tat anena eva nirastam
atra hi pramātṛ pramāṇa prameya kartṛ karma kārya bhoktṛ bhogya bhoga lakṣaṇa vyavahāra trayasya
śarīra indriya ādeṣu aham mama adhyāsa puraḥsara tva pradarśanena vyavahāra kārya liṅgakam anumānam
vyavahāra anyathā anupapattiḥ vā adhyāse pramāṇam uktam

original: nacānenāntaḥkaraṇaśarīrendriyaviṣayāṇāṃ taddharmāṇāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ ca mithyātvaṃ siddhayati /
analyzed: na ca anena antaḥkaraṇa śarīra indriya viṣayāṇām tad dharmāṇām duḥkha ādīnām ca mithyātvam
svarūpa satām api tādātmya tad sambandhi tvābhyām āropeṇa eva vyavahāra upapatteḥ
na ca āropita tva mātreṇa mithyātvam
ātmanaḥ api antaḥkaraṇa ādiṣu āropita tvena mithyātva prasaṅgāt
aṅgīkṛtaḥ ca antaḥkaraṇa ādiṣu pareṇa ātma adhyāsaḥ
yathā uktam
tam pratyagātmānam sarva sākṣiṇam tad viparyayeṇa antaḥkaraṇa ādiṣu adhyasyati iti
cetanasya acetane svarūpa adhyāsa abhāvāt saṃsṛṣṭatayā eva adhyāsāt tad mātreṇa eva sakala laukika vaidika vyavahāra upapatteḥ na mithyātvam iti ced samam acetanasya api
yat atra kenacid pralapitam
itaretara adhyāse pi deha indriya ādi prapañcasya bādhanam śruti yuktibhiḥ upapādayiṣyate
cit ātmā tu śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa tad aviruddha nyāya nirṇītaḥ bādhitaḥ iti
tat asat
yuktīnām ca nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt
śruti ādi siddha tve ca mithyātvasya tam etam avidyā ākhyam ityādi vyatharma āpadyeta
na khalu kaḥ pi vādī vadati
kena api rūpeṇa śarīra ādikam ātmani na adhyastam iti
yena adhyāsa mātram upapādyeta
tādātmya adhyāsam ca nirākariṣyati ācāryaḥ
vinā ca tena vyavahāram upapādayiṣyati
yat api ahaṅkāra stham kartṛ tva ādikam tad uparāgāt ātmani cakāsti iti
tat ayuktam
ahaṃpratyayasya ātma viṣaya tvāt
nanu tathā sati suptau api aham ullekhaḥ syāt
tadā ātmanaḥ sva prakāśa tayā prakāśamāna tvāt
na ca avidyā kāryasya api tadānīm pratīti prasaṅgaḥ
suptau avidyāyāḥ samutkhātita nikhila pariṇāma tvena tad abhāvāt iti
mā evam
suptau api aham avabhāsasya iṣṭa tvāt
tathā sati smaryeta hyastanaḥ iva ahaṅkāraḥ
anubhūte smṛti niyama abhāve pi smaryamāṇa ātma mātra tvāt iti ced na
sukham aham asvāpsam iti supta utthitasya svāpa sukha anubhava parāmarśa darśanāt
tadā viśeṣataḥ smaryā iti ced
kim spaṣṭam smaraṇam āpādyate
uta viṣaya viśeṣa uparaktam
ādye tviṣi āpādanam
na dvitīyaḥ
aviṣaya janya tvāt sauṣuptika sukhasya

original: na cāyamasti niyamo yatsmaryamāṇamaśeṣasambandhiviśeṣasahitaṃ smaryata iti /
analyzed: na ca ayam asti niyamaḥ yat smaryamāṇam aśeṣa sambandhi viśeṣa sahitam smaryate iti
atas eva mukhya sukha tad anubhave bādhaka abhāvāt aduḥkha abhāva viṣayaka tva kalpanam parāmarśasya apāstam
yat tu atha atas haṅkāra ādeśaḥ tha atas ātama ādeśaḥ iti ātma ahaṅkārayoḥ bheda vacanam tat bhāṣyakṛtā eva anyathā vyākhyātam

original: vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ saiva hi satyādaya iti /
analyzed: vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ sā eva hi satya ādayaḥ iti
katham anyathā ahaṅkārasya sarvagata tvam upapadyeta
mahābhūtāni ahaṅkāraḥ ityādi smṛti siddhaḥ tu ahaṅkāraḥ yadi api ātmanaḥ bhinnaḥ
tathā api na asau aham kartā iti ullekha viṣayaḥ
tathā sati aham brahma asmi ityādau api tathātva prasaṅgāt

original: atrāpi yaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣa itivadvayakhyānamiti cenna /
analyzed: atra api yaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣaḥ iti vat vaya khyānam iti ced na
tadā ātmānam eva avet aham brahma asmi iti niravadyasya brahmaṇaḥ pi aham ullekha darśanāt
mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te
iti sva prapanna māyā nirasana samarthasya īśvarasya api aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ ityādi ullekha upalambhāt ca
spaṣṭaḥ eva śabdataḥ pi anayoḥ bhedaḥ

original: yatprakṛtipariṇāmavāci makārāntamavyayamahaṃpadaṃ na jātu tadātmani prayujyate /
analyzed: yat prakṛti pariṇāma vāci makāra antam avyayam ahaṃpadam na jātu tat ātmani prayujyate

original: yaccātmavāci dakārāntāsmacchabdajaṃ tanna kadācidapi māyāpariṇāme prayujyata iti /
analyzed: yat ca ātma vāci dakāra anta asmad śabda jam tat na kadācid api māyā pariṇāme prayujyate iti

original: tadevaṃ sarvamithyātvaparatve śrutereva mithyātvaprasaṅgenāsādhakatvāpattau duḥkhādibandhamithyātvāsiddhayā na pratyakṣamatattvāvedakamiti
analyzed: tat evam sarva mithyātva paratve śruteḥ eva mithyātva prasaṅgena asādhakatva āpattau duḥkha ādi bandha mithyātva asiddhayā na pratyakṣam atattva āvedakam iti
nanu agratas iti katham
na iha nānā iti vākyena ātma atiriktam sakalam api mithyā iti ekā eva buddhiḥ utpadyate
na ca buddheḥ viramya vyāpāraḥ sti
yāvat sva viṣaya gocarāyāḥ eva tasyāḥ samutpādāt tad atirikta vyāpāra abhāvāt iti
satyam

original: vākyena sakṛdeva jātāyāḥ sakalamithyātvaviṣayāyā buddheḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāya parīkṣakabuddhaya eva tadviṣayaṃ buddhayā vibhajya krameṇāvagāhanta  #
analyzed: vākyena sakṛt eva jātāyāḥ sakala mithyātva viṣayāyāḥ buddheḥ prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya parīkṣaka buddhayaḥ eva tad viṣayam buddhayā vibhajya krameṇa avagāhanta
iti adoṣaḥ
samānam etat yāvajjīvam aham maunī ityādi vākya prāmāṇya cintāyām iti

original: mithyāyāḥ sādhakatvaṃ ca na siddhaṃ prativādinaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.17cd //
analyzed: mithyāyāḥ sādhaka tvam ca na siddham prativādinaḥ
nanu śruti ādeḥ mithyātve pi sādhaka tvam sambhavati

original: mayā mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvābhyupagamādityata āha- mithyāyā iti //
analyzed: mayā mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tva abhyupagamāt iti atas āha mithyāyāḥ iti
yāḥ śruti ādi vācaḥ mithyā tāsām iti yojanā
vibhakti pratirūpakam vā mithyāyāḥ iti avyayam
ayam abhisandhiḥ
na iha nānā ityādi vākyaiḥ kim pumān niścita advaitaḥ bodhyate
uta tad viparītaḥ
na ādyaḥ
vaiyarthyāt

original: dvitīyastu satyasyaiva sādhakatvamiti manyamāno yadīdaṃ vākyaṃ sakalamithyātvaṃ pratipādayettadā sakalāntargatatvātsvayamapi mithyā syāt /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ tu satyasya eva sādhaka tvam iti manyamānaḥ yadi idam vākyam sakala mithyātvam pratipādayet tadā sakala antargata tvāt svayam api mithyā syāt
yathāśabdaḥ nityaḥ
iti śabdaḥ nityaḥ

original: yadi caitadvākyaṃ mithyā syānna kasyāpyarthasya sādhakaṃ syādityaniṣyaprasaṅgaṃ paśyankathaṃ tvadabhyupagamamātreṇa svatarkasya viruddhatāṃ  #
analyzed: yadi ca etat vākyam mithyā syāt na kasya api arthasya sādhakam syāt iti aniṣya prasaṅgam paśyan katham tvad abhyupagama mātreṇa sva tarkasya viruddha tām
pratipadyeta iti
tat kvacid pada doṣeṇa vihanyate
kvacid saṅgati agrahaṇāt kvāpi tad vismaraṇāt kadācikāṅkṣā ādi virahāt kutracid viparīta pratipādanena
tat atra api na iha nānā ityādi vākye sādhaka tva abhāvam āpādayatā pada doṣa ādi anyatamam eva āpādakam upādeyam
kim mithyātvena

original: tatkimavidyamānasyāpi vākyasya nirdoṣapadāvayavatvādikaṃ vidyata iti vaktumudyato bhavān /
analyzed: tat kim avidyamānasya api vākyasya nirdoṣa pada avayava tva ādikam vidyate iti vaktum udyataḥ bhavān

original: evaṃca vadatā bhavatā kasmiṃścana vipratipanne 'rthe vandhyāsutavacanaṃ pramāṇayantaṃ prativādinaṃ prati nūnaṃ padadoṣādikamevopapādya sādhakatvaṃ  #
analyzed: evaṃca vadatā bhavatā kasmiṃścana vipratipanne rthe vandhyāsuta vacanam pramāṇayantam prativādinam prati nūnam pada doṣa ādikam evā upapādya sādhaka tvam
dūṣayiṣyate

original: svarūpasyaivābhāvenāsādhakatve siddhe kiṃ tatra caramabhāvinyā padadoṣādicintayā /
analyzed: sva rūpasya eva abhāvena asādhaka tve siddhe kim tatra carama bhāvinyā pada doṣa ādi cintayā

original: nahi śabde 'vidyamānatvenaiva cākṣuṣatvasyānityatvasādhakatvābhāve siddhe kiṃ tatra caramabhāvinyā padadoṣādicintayā /
analyzed: nahi śabde vidyamāna tvena eva cākṣuṣa tvasya anitya tva sādhaka tva abhāve siddhe kim tatra carama bhāvinyā pada doṣa ādi cintayā

original: nahi śabde 'vidyamānatvenaiva cākṣuṣatvasyānityatvasādhakatvābhāve siddhe vyāpticintā kriyata iti cet /
analyzed: nahi śabde vidyamāna tvena eva cākṣuṣa tvasya anitya tva sādhaka tva abhāve siddhe vyāpti cintā kriyate iti ced
samam prakṛte pi
nanu mā bhūt prativādi apekṣayā tarkasya viruddha tā
vādi apekṣayā tu bhaviṣyati
mā evam

original: vādināpi hi śrutivākyenātmātiriktasyākhilasya mithyātvaṃ pratipadya mithyābhūtasyāpi sādhakatvamiti pratipattavyam /
analyzed: vādinā api hi śruti vākyena ātma atiriktasya akhilasya mithyātvam pratipadya mithyā bhūtasya api sādhaka tvam iti pratipattavyam
saḥ pi hi prāk sakala mithyātva bodhāt prativādi tulyaḥ eva

original: tathāca śruteḥ sarvamithyātvapratipādakatve mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvaṃ pratītya tadvirodhena tarko nirasanīyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca śruteḥ sarva mithyātva pratipādaka tve mithyābhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam pratītya tad virodhena tarkaḥ nirasanīyaḥ

original: tannirāse ca śruteḥ sarvamithyātvapratipādakatvamityanyonyāśrayamanuttīrṇaḥ kathamasāvapi tarkasya viruddhatāṃ pratipadyeta / *1,592*
analyzed: tad nirāse ca śruteḥ sarva mithyātva pratipādaka tvam iti anyonya āśrayam anuttīrṇaḥ katham asau api tarkasya viruddha tām pratipadyeta  /

original: tacca mithyāpramāṇena satā vā sādhyate tvayā /
analyzed: tat ca mithyā pramāṇena satā vā sādhyate tvayā

original: satā ced dvaitasiddhiḥ syānna siddhaṃ cānyasādhanam // MAnuv_1,1.18 //
analyzed: satā ced dvaita siddhiḥ syāt na siddham ca anya sādhanam
atha matam
pratyakṣa ādikasya sādhaka tvam tāvat anubhava siddham
tat mithyātvam ca śrutibhiḥ yuktibhiḥ ca avagamyate

original: mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvamityeṣo 'rthaḥ kutaḥ siddha iti mā vocaḥ /
analyzed: mithyā bhūtasya sādhaka tvam iti eṣaḥ rthaḥ kutas siddhaḥ iti mā vocaḥ
eka jñāna janita saṃskāra sahakṛtasya itara pramāṇasya eva surabhi candanam iti vat viśiṣṭa pratyaya janaka tva upapatteḥ
athavā ubhaya pratisandhātuḥ ātmanaḥ vidyamāna tvāt daśa ṛna sparśa nābhyam eka artha grahaṇa vat viśiṣṭa pratipattiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: evaṃca pramāṇenaiva mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatve siddhe viruddhastarko na madabhyupagamamātreṇetyetaddūṣayituṃ vikalpena pṛcchati- tacceti
analyzed: evam ca pramāṇena eva mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tve siddhe viruddhaḥ tarkaḥ na mad abhyupagama mātreṇa iti etat dūṣayitum vikalpena pṛcchati tat ca iti
tat iti mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam
ātma atiriktasya mithyātvam iva iti caśabdaḥ
satā vā pramāṇena iti sambandhaḥ

original: yadidaṃ mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvaṃ sādhayituṃ tvayā pramāṇadvayasamāhārātmakaṃ pramāṇamupanyasyate /
analyzed: yat idam mithyābhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam sādhayitum tvayā pramāṇa dvaya samāhāra ātmakam pramāṇam upanyasyate
tat mithyā sat vā iti praśna arthaḥ
sattva pakṣam dūṣayati satā ced iti

original: yadyapi pareṇāṅgīcikīrṣitatvena prādhānyānmithyātvavikalpaḥ prathamaṃ praśnāvasare nirdiṣyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api pareṇa aṅgīcikīrṣita tvena prādhānyāt mithyātva vikalpaḥ prathamam praśna avasare nirdiṣyaḥ

original: tathāpi mithyāsatyayoḥ satyamarthataḥ pradhānamiti tatkrameṇa dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: tathā api mithyā satyayoḥ satyam arthataḥ pradhānam iti tat krameṇa dūṣaṇam

original: satā cedityataḥ paramātmarūpeṇa tadanyena veti vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: satā ced iti atas paramātma rūpeṇa tad anyena vā iti vikalpaḥ
prathama pakṣe vakṣyāmaḥ iti ādya pakṣa dūṣaṇa pratijñānam ca adhyāhāryam
ātmā itareṇa satā iti dvitīya pakṣa dūṣaṇam dvaita siddhiḥ syāt iti
tathāca advaita pratipādaka śruteḥ upapatti virodhaḥ iti hṛdayam
na punar apasiddhānta mātre tātparyam
prakrama an anurūpa tvāt
śruteḥ upapatti virodhena advaita pratipādaka tva abhāvasya prakrānta tvāt
mithyātva pakṣe doṣam āha na siddham ca iti
caśabdaḥ va dhāraṇe tuśabda arthaḥ vā
sataḥ tu sādhanam na siddham eva
mithyā bhūtasya pramā sādhana tvam na siddham evā iti yāvat
idam uktam bhavati

original: yo hi yanmithyā na tatsādhakamiti vyāptimaṅgīkṛtya śrutermithyātve asādhakatvaṃ prasañjayati
analyzed: yaḥ hi yat mithyā na tat sādhakam iti vyāptim aṅgīkṛtya śruteḥ mithyātve asādhaka tvam prasañjayati
sa mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam iti artha sādhanayā upanyasta pramāṇasya api mithyātve sādhaka tvam āpādayiṣyati eva

original: tathāca asya pramāṇasya sādhakatve siddhe mithyābhūtasyaiva sādhakatvamityarthasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca asya pramāṇasya sādhaka tve siddhe mithyābhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam iti artha siddhiḥ
tatas ca tarkasya viruddha tā siddhiḥ

original: tataścāsya pramāṇasya sādhakatvasiddhiriti cakrakramaprasaṅgena naikasyāpi siddhiriti / *1,605*
analyzed: tatas ca asya pramāṇasya sādhaka tva siddhiḥ iti cakra krama prasaṅgena nā ekasya api siddhiḥ iti

original: nanu ca śrutiḥ svavyatiriktasya duḥkhādermithyātvaṃ pratipādayantī kathamupapattiviruddheti cet /
analyzed: nanu ca śrutiḥ sva vyatiriktasya duḥkha ādeḥ mithyātvam pratipādayantī katham upapatti viruddhā iti ced
kṛtaḥ yam śruti artha saṅkocaḥ
sādhaka tva anupapatti pramāṇa balāt iti ced

original: tarhi pramitaṃ vihāya mithyātvavādinī kathaṃ duḥkhādimithyātvamapi pratipādayet tasyāpi pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: tarhi pramitam vihāya mithyātva vādinī katham duḥkha ādi mithyātvam api pratipādayet tasya api pratyakṣa siddha tvāt
nanu ca śruti virodhena pratyakṣam ābhāsīkartum mayā upakrāntam
tena eva śruti virodha abhidhāne katham itaretarāśraya tvam na syāt
śruteḥ aprāmāṇye bādhaka abhāvāt pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam
tatas ca tad viruddha tvena śruteḥ aprāmāṇyam iti
hanta tava api katham itaretara āśraya tvam na syāt
śruti prāmāṇye tad virodhena pratyakṣa aprāmāṇyam
tatas ca bādhaka abhāvena śruti prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti
śruteḥ prabala tvāt na evam iti ced na
tasya dūṣṭa tvāt
sādhayiṣyate ca pratyakṣa prābalyam

original: nanu cātra śruteḥ pratyakṣavirodhamevopanyasya tatprābalyavyutpādanaṃ kuto na kṛtam /
analyzed: nanu ca atra śruteḥ pratyakṣa virodham eva upanyasya tad prābalya vyutpādanam kutas na kṛtam
kim upapatti virodha vyutpādanena
ucyate
pareṇa hi atra advaita paratve tātparya liṅga anuguṇa tvam mahatā prabandhena upapāditam
atas tad virodhaḥ eva parasya vicāra akauśala prakaṭanāya vyutpāditaḥ
upakrama ādi virodhasya ca etat upalakṣaṇam
tam ca vyutpādayiṣyāmaḥ
nanu mā bhūt tarkasya viruddha tā

original: tathāpi mithyābhūto 'pi svāpno 'rthaḥ śubhāśubhayo rekhāropito varṇo 'rthasya pratibimbaṃ
analyzed: tathā api svāpnaḥ rthaḥ śubha aśubhayoḥ rekhā āropitaḥ varṇaḥ rthasya pratibimbam

original: ca bimbasya sphaṭikalauhityaṃ copādhānasannidhānasya varṇadairghyādikaṃ cārthabhedasya
analyzed: ca bimbasya sphaṭika lauhityam ca upādhāna sannidhānasya varṇa dairghya ādikam ca artha bhedasya
savitṛsuṣira prabhṛti cāriṣyasya sādhakam upalabdham iti praśithila mūla tvena ābhāsa tvam
mā evam
yatas yat sādhakam na tat mithyā
yat ca mithyā na tad sādhakam
tathā hi
svapnasya tāvat jñāna artha rūpasya satya tām vakṣyati

original: rekhāpi varṇe padamivārthe saṅketitā taṃ smārayatīti na kiñcidatra mithyāsti /
analyzed: rekhā api varṇe padam iva arthe saṅketitā tam smārayati iti na kiñcid atra mithyā asti
atas eva rekhām upalabhya varṇam uccārayanti
pratibimbasya tu satya tā pareṇa api aṅgīkṛtā
vicchedasya api satya tām upapādayiṣyāmaḥ
sphaṭika lauhityam api etena eva vyākhyātam
dairghya ādayaḥ pi dhvaniṣu iva varṇeṣu api svābhāvikāḥ eva
anyathā svareṣu iva vyañjaneṣu api dhvāna upadhāna vaśena dīrgha ādi pratibhāsa prasaṅgāt
na tathāvidha dhvani vyaṅgam vyañjanam iti ced na
tathātve varṇeṣu eva viśeṣaḥ ṅgīkāryaḥ syāt
saḥ eva dairghya ādi pada abhidheyaḥ bhaviṣyati
savitṛ suṣira prabhṛti jñānam eva ariṣya sūcakam
vakṣyate ca etat
evam anyat api ūhanīyam iti

original: tasmātpadavākyapramāṇavidāmagresareṇa paramāstikena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇokto bhagavati svarūpabhedābhāva eva śrutyartho 'vadheyaḥ / *1,613*
analyzed: tasmāt pada vākya pramāṇa vidām agresareṇa parama āstikena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa uktaḥ bhagavati svarūpa bheda abhāvaḥ eva śruti arthaḥ vadheyaḥ  /
siddhānte na iha nānā iti śruti artha samarthanam
nanu atra api anupapattiḥ eva
yatas nānā iti nānā bhūtaḥ prapañcaḥ abhidhīyate
na tu bhedaḥ
tathātve nānātvam iti syāt
mā evam
mukta upasṛpya vyapadeśāt ityādau iva bhāva pradhāna nirdeśa upapatteḥ

original: bhavitṛprādhānye 'pi brahmaṇi nānābhūtāvayavaguṇakarmādiniṣedhe nānātvameva niṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: bhavitṛ prādhānye pi brahmaṇi nānā bhūta avayava guṇa karma ādi niṣedhe nānātvam eva niṣiddham bhavati
sa viśeṣaṇe hi vidhi niṣedhau viśeṣaṇam upasaṅkrāmate iti nyāyāt
ubhaya niṣedhe gauravāt
viśeṣaṇasya prathama prāpta tvāt
na jīrṇa malavat vāsāḥ snātakaḥ syāt
ityādau darśanāt ca
atas eva uktam
viśeṣyam na abhidhā gacchet kṣīṇa śaktiḥ viśeṣaṇe iti
yat kvacid viśiṣṭa vidhi niṣedha aṅgīkaraṇam tat agatikayā eva
sa viśeṣa tvam ca brahmaṇaḥ vakṣyāmaḥ
nanu evam satya prāpta pratiṣedhaḥ iti ced na
ābhāsa prāpta tvāt
tathā cana sthānatas pi
ityādi adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣe darśayiṣyāmaḥ
parasya eva prāpta tvāt anupapannaḥ
ekam eva advitīyam
ityādau sajātīya vijātīya svagata nānātva niṣedham vyākurvatā bhavatā api samādhātavyam etat
sādhaka tvam sataḥ tena sākṣiṇā siddhim icchatā

original: svīkṛtaṃ hyaviśeṣasya sādhyā sādhakatā punaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.19 //
analyzed: svīkṛtam hi aviśeṣasya sādhyā sādhaka tā punar
tat ca aviśeṣa mānena sādhyam iti anavasthitiḥ

original: nanu yathā bhavato mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvaṃ na saṃmatam /
analyzed: nanu yathā bhavataḥ mithyā bhūtasya sādhaka tvam na saṃmatam

original: tathā mama satyasya sādhakatvaṃ na saṃmatam /
analyzed: tathā mama satyasya sādhaka tvam na saṃmatam
caitanya atiriktasya satyatā anabhyupagamāt
caitanyasya ca kriyā āveśa śūnyasya sādhaka tva ayogāt

original: tatra yathā mithyābhūtasya sādhakatvānabhyupagamena śrutermithyātve 'sādhakatvaprasaṅgānna bandhamithyātvasādhakatetyuktaṃ bhavatā /
analyzed: tatra yathā mithyābhūtasya sādhaka tva anabhyupagamena śruteḥ mithyātve sādhaka tva prasaṅgāt na bandha mithyātva sādhaka tā iti uktam bhavatā

original: evaṃ mayāpi satyasya sādhakatvamanabhyupagacchatā vaktuṃ śakyata eva /
analyzed: evam mayā api satyasya sādhaka tvam anabhyupagacchatā vaktum śakyate eva
pratyakṣasya satya tve sādhaka tvam na syāt
mithyātvam tu tvayā eva nā upeyate
tatas ca pratyakṣasya api bandha satya tva sādhaka tva abhāvāt mithyātvam api bandhasya na pratyakṣa virodhataḥ
iti anupapannam iti
evaṃca prathamam eva mati kardame kathā ārambhaṇam aśakyam āpadyeta
tena a vicārya eya tāvat pramāṇa sadasakṣat tvam vicāraḥ ārabdhavyaḥ iti
mā evam
duḥkha ādi satya tā grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya satya tve pi avirodhāt

original: sataḥ sādhakatvaṃ mayā na svīkṛtamityuktamiti cettatrāha- sādhakatvamiti //
analyzed: sataḥ sādhaka tvam mayā na svīkṛtam iti uktam iti ced tatra āha sādhaka tvam iti
tena māyā vādinā
bhāva rūpa ajñānasya iti śeṣaḥ
hi śabdaḥ hetau
prasiddhi dyotakaḥ vā

original: māyāvādinā khalu bhāvarūpājñānaṃ siṣādhayiṣatā“pratyakṣaṃ tāvadahamajño māmanyaṃ ca na jānāmītyaparokṣāvabhāsadarśanāt';
analyzed: māyā vādinā khalu bhāva rūpa ajñānam siṣādhayiṣatā apratyakṣam tāvat aham ajñaḥ mām anyam ca na jānāmi iti aparokṣa avabhāsa darśanāt
ityādinā tad sādhanāya sākṣi pratyakṣam pramāṇam aṅgīkṛtam
āśraya pratiyogi jñāna bhūtam api sākṣi caitanyam ityādi uttara vākyena pratyakṣasya sākṣi tva avagamāt

original: evaṃca sākṣiṇājñānasiddhimicchatā pareṇa sataḥ sādhakatvaṃ svīkṛtameva /
analyzed: evam ca sākṣiṇā ajñāna siddhim icchatā pareṇa sataḥ sādhaka tvam svīkṛtam eva
sākṣi caitanyasya sattvāt

original: ato mayā sataḥ sādhakatvaṃ nāṅgīkṛtamiti na śakyate vaktum /
analyzed: atas mayā sataḥ sādhaka tvam na aṅgīkṛtam iti na śakyate vaktum
asmābhiḥ api duḥkha ādi bandha satyatāyām sākṣi pratyakṣam eva upanyastam iti hṛdayam
ajñāna vaśāt eva sākṣiṇaḥ sādhaka tvam mayā aṅgīkriyate
na svatas iti ced na
itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt
na khalu sākṣi avabhāsāt anya ajñāna sattā tava asti

original: tato 'jñāne sati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvasiddhistasyāṃ cājñānasiddhiriti kathaṃ netaretarāśrayatvam /
analyzed: tatas jñāne sati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhaka tva siddhiḥ tasyām ca ajñāna siddhiḥ iti katham na itaretarāśraya tvam
dvayoḥ anādi tvāt na evam iti ced
tarhi ajñāna vaśāt iti riktam vacaḥ
nahi sarvathā yat yat na apekṣate tat tad adhīnam iti yujyate
apekṣāyām tu paraspara āśraya anuttāraḥ

original: evamubhayavādisampratipannaṃ pramāṇaṃ svamate 'stīti darśayituṃ satyasya sākṣiṇo 'jñānasādhakatvaṃ parābhyupagatamupanyastam /
analyzed: evam ubhaya vādi sampratipannam pramāṇam sva mate sti iti darśayitum satyasya sākṣiṇaḥ jñāna sādhaka tvam para abhyupagatam upanyastam
sāmpratam prasaṅgāt tat api nā upapadyate iti āha aviśeṣasya iti

original: bhāvarūpamajñānamanicchantaṃ prati hi tatra sākṣipratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamupanyastam /
analyzed: bhāva rūpam ajñānam an icchantam prati hi tatra sākṣi pratyakṣam pramāṇam upanyastam
na ca tat ucitam
sākṣiṇaḥ śeṣa viśeṣa vidhura tva aṅgīkārāt

original: aviśeṣasya sādhakatā tu paraṃ prati tvayā sādhyaiva /
analyzed: aviśeṣasya sādhaka tā tu param prati tvayā sādhyā eva

original: yatsādhakaṃ karaṇaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nityaṃ vā jñānaṃ tatsarvaṃ jātyādiviśeṣavat /

original: yacca nirviśeṣaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādi na tatsādhakamiti pareṇa niyamasyāṅgīkṛtatvāt /

original: nirviśeṣasya prāmāṇyameva nopapadyata iti tadarthameva viśeṣānusaraṇam /

original: tasmād vyavahṛtiḥ sarvā satyetyeva vyavasthitā // MAnuv_1,1.21ab //

mithyātvam yadi ityādinā uktam prasaṅgam upasaṃharati an aṅgīkurvatām iti

sarvasya api mithyātvam pratipādayatām na iha nānā ityādi vākyānām api mithyātva prasaktayā
na vādi tā na sādhaka tā syāt

athavā atiprasaṅga antara abhidhānam etat

vyavahṛtiḥ iti yaugika pada upādānam

original: astu kathāṅgabhūtapramāṇādivyavahārasya satyatā duḥkhādibandhasya tu kimāyātamityata āha- vyāvahārikamiti //
