bādhaḥ tu prasaṅgasya alaṅkāraḥ eva iti uktam
sādhana bādhana kṣama vyavahārasya pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupama vyāpta tva pakṣe pi ukta dūṣaṇam anena eva nirastam

original: māyāvādinaṃ tadvayavahāraṃ vā pakṣīkṛtya viśiṣṭavyavahārakartṛtvena viśiṣṭavyavahāratvena vā hetunā pramāṇādisattābhyupagantṛtve tatpūrvakatve  #
analyzed: māyāvādinam tad vayavahāram vā pakṣīkṛtya viśiṣṭa vyavahāra kartṛ tvena viśiṣṭa vyavahāra tvena vā hetunā pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagantṛ tve tad pūrvakatve
vā sādhyamāne tat syāt
vimataḥ vyavahāraḥ na sādhana ādi kṣamaḥ
pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagama pūrvaka tā rahita tvāt iti vā sādhane kathañcid anvaye pūrva ukta upādhiḥ syāt
na ca evam iti uktam
kiñca ayam upādhiḥ na sādhanāt bhidyate

original: yadā hi pramāṇādisattā nābhyupagatā tadā tadasattvamevāṅgīkṛtamiti svarūpasiddhatvam /
analyzed: yadā hi pramāṇa ādi sattā na abhyupagatā tadā tad asattvam eva aṅgīkṛtam iti svarūpa siddha tvam
tat ca sat vacana ābhāsa lakṣaṇa viśeṣaḥ eva

original: nanvetadāśaṅkayoktaṃ na brūmo vayamityādi duruktaṃ tat /
analyzed: nanu etat āśaṅkayā uktam na brūmaḥ vayam ityādi duruktam tat
sattva asattve vihāya pramāṇa svarūpasya buddhau āropayitum aśakya tvena udāsīnasya tad svīkāra anupapatteḥ
evam ca vadatā yat anirvacanīyam abhipretam tat agre nirākariṣyate
yat api atra uktam kīdṛśīm maryādām ityādi
tatra yaḥ pramāṇa ādi asattvam abhyupaiti

original: yaśca tatsattāṃ pratītyāpi sattā'dyudāsīno 'hamiti manyate taṃ pratīdaṃ dūṣaṇamiti vadāmaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca tad sattām pratītya api sattā ādi udāsīnaḥ ham iti manyate tam prati idam dūṣaṇam iti vadāmaḥ
na ca ukta doṣaḥ

original: nahi vayaṃ pramāṇādisattābhyupagamaṃ kathāpravṛttikāraṇatayāvaśyaṃ tataḥ pūrvabhāvinaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: nahi vayam pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagamam kathā pravṛtti kāraṇatayā avaśyam tatas pūrva bhāvinam brūmaḥ

original: kiṃ nāma yo yathākathañcitkathāyāṃ pravṛttastaṃ vipakṣe kathānutpattiprasaṅgaṃ daṇḍaṃ pradarśya tatkāraṇānāṃ pramāṇādīnāṃ sattāmaṅgīkārayāmaḥ
analyzed: kim nāma yaḥ yathā kathañcid kathāyām pravṛttaḥ tam vipakṣe kathā anutpatti prasaṅgam daṇḍam pradarśya tad kāraṇānām pramāṇa ādīnām sattām aṅgīkārayāmaḥ
na ca evam kathā antara prasaktayā ādi doṣaḥ
pramāṇa ādi sattā anabhyupagame kathāyāḥ eva aniṣpatteḥ
etena śiṣya jñāpanam api samāhitam

original: prativādinaḥ kathāpraveśamabhyupagamya tatra pravṛttaṃ prati pramitakathākāryabalena kāraṇapramāṇādisattāyā abhyupagantavyatvasyoktatvāt /
analyzed: prativādinaḥ kathā praveśam abhyupagamya tatra pravṛttam prati pramita kathā kārya balena kāraṇa pramāṇa ādi sattāyāḥ abhyupagantavya tvasya ukta tvāt
nahi vayam pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagamam api kathaka pravartanīya vāc vyavahāra kāraṇa koṭau niveśayāmaḥ

original: yena tatsattānabhyupagantṛṇāṃ vāgvyavahārasvarūpaṃ na niṣpadyeteti prasaṅgaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yena tad sattā anabhyupagantṛṇām vāc vyavahāra svarūpam na niṣpadyeta iti prasaṅgaḥ syāt
api tarhi pramāṇa ādīnām eva kathā kāraṇa tā

original: sā ca sattvābhāve nopapadyata iti tatsattvamaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti vadāmaḥ /
analyzed: sā ca sattva abhāve na upapadyate iti tat sattvam aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti vadāmaḥ
yat punar kathaka vāc vyavahāram prati ityādi āśaṅkayā uktam
evam vadatā kathā pravṛtti uttara kālam pramāṇa ādi sattā aṅgīkārayitavyā
tathā ca kathā phalasya pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagamasya na kathā kāraṇa tvam
kintu pramāṇaiḥ vyavahartavyam ityādi vyavahāra niyamasya eva iti
tat asmābhiḥ abhyupagatam eva
yaḥ tu sattā abhyupagamam api kathā kāraṇam brūte

yat punar na ca pramāṇa ādīnām ityādinā kalpanā gauravam avādi

original: tatra kiṃ pramāṇādisattābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuta tatsattābhyupagamasya kāraṇakoṭipraveśane /

original: kiṃ vicārasādhyaḥ pramāṇādisattābhyupagamo na vicārapravṛtteḥ kāraṇamiti /

mā evam

original: sattvābhāve sādhakatvaṃ na syāditi vā prasaṅgaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: sattva abhāve sādhaka tvam na syāt iti vā prasaṅgam vakṣyāmaḥ
tatra asattvam upādhiḥ iti ced na
tasya sattva abhāva anatirekāt
tad bhaṅgasya ca prāk anirvacanīya siddheḥ aśakya tvāt
etena sat vilakṣaṇa tvāt mithyātva upapādana sat vilakṣaṇa tvāt sādhaka tvam ca upapannam iti parāstam
sat vailakṣaṇye sattva āpattyā sādhaka tva abhāva asya asat vailakṣaṇye ca sattva āpātena mithyātva upapādanasya asambhavasya āpatteḥ
prāk anirvācya siddheḥ vyāpti dvaya nirāsa ayogāt
asat vailakṣaṇya mātreṇa hāna ādi vyavahāra upapattau śukti rajata ādau api tad prasaṅgaḥ
māyā avidyā vailakṣaṇyāt na evam iti ced na
tasya nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt
vailakṣaṇya mātrasya prrakṛta anupayogāt iti
āstām vā sattva ādi vikalpa nirāsena dūṣaṇa abhidhānam
pramāṇam eva prapañca anirvacanīya tāyām nā upapadyate
nahi na iha nānā ityādi śrutiḥ sat asat vailakṣaṇya lakṣaṇa anirvacanīya tām viśvasya vakti
vailakṣaṇyam sataḥ ca api svayam sat bheda vādinaḥ

analyzed: asmāt eva hetoḥ tad siddhiḥ iti ced tarhi mātā vandhyā iti pratijñā kutas vipratiṣiddhā
vakṣyamāṇa hetunā eva pratijñāta artha siddheḥ tatra api suvaca tvāt
sambhāvitaḥ pratijñāyāḥ arthaḥ sādhyeta hetunā
iti nyāyāt tatra hetvākāṅkṣā eva na asti iti ced satyam

original: kiñca sata eva viśvasyāsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ svayaṃ sadeva /
analyzed: kiñca sataḥ eva viśvasya asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam svayam sat eva
sākṣi pramitam asti

original: atastena bādhitena sarvathā sattvānadhikaraṇatvena pratijñātena bhedavādinaḥ kathamaniṣyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: atas tena bādhitena sarvathā sattva anadhikaraṇa tvena pratijñātena bheda vādinaḥ katham aniṣyam bhavet
amukhya sattva āvedakam pramāṇam tat iti ced
mama tāvat mukhyam eva tat satvam iti uktam
parakīya pramāṇa tarkāṇām adya api gahane niviṣṭa tvāt iti

original: kecitte tavāniṣyaṃ kataṃ na bhavediti vyācakṣate /
analyzed: kecid te tava aniṣyam katam na bhavet iti vyācakṣate

original: tatra na pādādāviti pratiṣedhasya nañā nirdiṣyamanityamiti samādhānamavaseyam / *2,99*
analyzed: tatra na pāda ādau iti pratiṣedhasya nañā nirdiṣyam anityam iti samādhānam avaseyam
sarvasmāt iti sat bheda saṃsthitiḥ

original: sanmātratvaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi tasmāt tadapi no bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.25 //
analyzed: sat mātra tvam tasmāt tat api no bhavet
dvitīye dūṣaṇa antaram āha yadī ucyate iti
api śabdaḥ dūṣaṇa samuccaye
sarvasmāt api iti abhividhau vā
yadi iti śravaṇāt tarhi iti grāhyam
sarva śabdaḥ na eka arthaḥ
yadi anekasmāt sataḥ vailakṣaṇyāt

original: anekasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyamityucyate tarhi satāṃ bhedasaṃsthitistataścāpasiddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: aneka sattva anadhikaraṇa tvam viśvasya sādhyam iti ucyate tarhi satām bheda saṃsthitiḥ tatas ca apasiddhāntaḥ
idam uktam bhavati
viśvam aneka sattā anadhikaraṇam iti pratijānatā aneka sattvāni aṅgīkriyante na vā
dvitīye na eka viśeṣaṇam
ādye pi ekasmin eva arthe na ekāni sattvāni uta ādhāra bhedena
na ādyaḥ
vaiyarthyāt
dvitīye tu idam upatiṣṭhate
sat bheda saṃsthitiḥ iti
aneka sattva adhikaraṇatā pratiṣedha sāmarthyāt ekaika sattva svīkāra āpatteḥ iti vā
tṛtīyasya vā idam dūṣaṇa antaram

original: yadi sarvasmātsato vailakṣaṇyaṃ sarvasattvānadhikaraṇatvaṃ viśvasya sādhyatayocyate tarhi sadbhedasaṃsthitiḥ /
analyzed: yadi sarvasmāt sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam sarva sattva anadhikaraṇa tvam viśvasya sādhya tayā ucyate tarhi sat bheda saṃsthitiḥ
na hi aneka sat anaṅgīkāre sarva śabdasya
santi eva anekāni santi pāramāthirkam tu ekam eva iti ced na
tad siddhaya rtham evā adya api bhavatā prayatanāt
tad anadhikaraṇa tva sādhana iṃśe
caturthe dūṣaṇa antaram āha sat mātra tvam iti
avivakṣita viśeṣam sattvam yasmāt brahmaṇaḥ api asti
tasmāt kāraṇāt tasmāt sataḥ brahmaṇaḥ tad vailakṣaṇyam
tad sattva anadhikaraṇa tvam api viśvasya no smākam matam bhavet
tathā ca siddha tvāt tat api sādhyam no bhavet
avivakṣita viśeṣa sattva anadhikaraṇa tve sādhye brahma gata sattva anadhikaraṇa tayā api pratijñāta artha upapatteḥ artha antara tā iti
athavā kim idam sattvam nāma
yat anadhikaraṇa tvam viśvasya sādhyate
kim sāmānya sattvam uta svarūpa sattvam
ādyam dūṣayati yadi ucyate iti
sarvasmāt sarva artha anugatāt sāmānyāt vailakṣaṇyam tad anādhāra tvam iti yāvat
sādhya tayā yadi ucyate tadā sat bheda saṃsthitiḥ

original: yadi sattaiva nāsti tadā tadanadhikaraṇatvapratijñā vyārthā syāt /
analyzed: yadi sattā eva na asti tadā tad anadhikaraṇa tva pratijñā vyārthā syāt
na idam śaśaviṣāṇa adhikaraṇam iti vat vipratipatteḥ eva anudayāt
sattā sāmānya aṅgīkāre ca sat bhedaḥ durvāraḥ eva
na hi eka āśrayam sāmānyam asti

original: santi sattādhikaraṇāni santīti cettarhi kānīti vaktavyāni /
analyzed: santi sattā adhikaraṇāni santi iti ced tarhi kāni iti vaktavyāni
dravya ādīni iti ced katham tarhi teṣām eva tad anadhikaraṇa tva sādhanam
vyavahārataḥ sarvam asti
paramārthataḥ tu na iti ced na
ukta uttara tvāt
etat ca para matena uttaram uktam veditavyam
sva matena tu siddhasādhana tvam draṣṭavyam
dravya ādi atirikta anugata sattva sāmānyasya eva anaṅgīkārāt
dvitīyam dūṣayati sat mātra tvam iti
sattā anapekṣam sattvam sanmātra tvam svarūpa sattvam iti yāvat
tat brahmaṇaḥ pi asti yatas tasmāt kāraṇāt tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ tat vailakṣaṇyam abrahmatvam api viśvasya naḥ bhavet iti
athavā sāmānya sattā pakṣe doṣa antaram anena ucyate

original: tathāhi sattāsāmānyavidhurasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ sanmātratvaṃ svarūpasattvaṃ tāvadasti /
analyzed: tathā hi sattā sāmānya vidhurasya api brahmaṇaḥ sanmātra tvam svarūpa sattvam tāvat asti
na punar sattva vaidhuryāt asat anirvācyam vā brahma
tasmāt sattā vaidhuryasya asattva ādi ahetu tvāt tad sattā anadhikaraṇa tvam api viśvasya no bhavet iti
etena brahma svarūpam sattvam iti pakṣaḥ api nirastaḥ

original: arthakriyākāritvaṃ jñānābādhyatvaṃ vā sattvamiti pakṣadvayaṃ sphuṭadoṣatvānna dūṣitam /
analyzed: arthakriyā kāri tvam jñāna abādhya tvam vā sattvam iti pakṣa dvayam sphuṭa doṣa tvāt na dūṣitam
arthakriyā iti vadatā mithyābhūtasya eva arthakriyā aṅgīkṛtā iti siddhānta virodhaḥ ca
arthakriyā vidhurasya api brahmaṇaḥ sattvāt tad vaidhuryam na asāttva ādi hetuḥ
arthakriyā anadhikaraṇa tā mātra sādhanam prakṛta anupayuktam tad viruddham ca
jñāna abādhya tva vaidhuryam ca tad bādhya tvam eva
tat ca hetvarthāt na bhidyate iti sphuṭam eva
hetu antara abhidhāne vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena bādha siddhārtha tā ādi āpattiḥ sphuṭā eva
yat atra uktam

original: tvayāpi dve tattve sadasidati tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā yadeva sattvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyaiva mayāpyaṅgīkārānna sacchabdārthāniruktiriti /
analyzed: tvayā api dve tattve sat asit ati tattvam vyavasthāpayatā yat eva sattvena vyavasthāpitam tasya eva mayā api aṅgīkārāt na sat śabda artha aniruktiḥ iti
tat atīva mandam
mayā hi
kvacid sat iti bhāvaḥ vyavahriyate
kvacid ca pratipanna upādhau niṣedha apratiyogi
kvāpi mūrtam ityādi tat sarvam ca nirastam iti
jñāna bādhya tvam api tu na siddham prativādinaḥ

original: vijñātasyānyathā samyag vijñānaṃ hyeva tanmatam // MAnuv_1,1.26 //
analyzed: vijñātasya anyathā samyak vijñānam hi eva tat matam
evam pratijñām nirākṛtya hetum api apākaroti jñāna bādhya tvam iti
na kevalam pratijñā duṣyā
kim nāma hetu bhūtam jñāna bādhya tvam api iti arthaḥ
tuśabdaḥ siddhānti abhimatāt jñāna bādhya tvāt vayavacchinatti

original: jñānabādhyatvaṃ hi jñānanivartyatvaṃ vā pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ vā hetutvena parasyābhimatam /

atas nyatara asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti
nanu īśvara jñānena prapañca nivṛttiḥ tvayā api iṣyate eva
anyathā tasya saṃhāra kartṛ tva anupapatteḥ
jñāna ādimataḥ eva katṛ tvāt
satyam
na evam jñāna nivartya tvam parasya abhipretam

original: api tarhyajñānopādānakasya samāne viṣaye virodhitā jñānenopādāne nivṛtte svayameva vilapanam /

original: “ajñānasya svakāryeṇa vartamānena pravilīnena vā saha jñānena nivṛttibādhaḥ'; iti /

original: tathāvidhamapi jñānabādhyatvaṃ pakṣaikadeśe prakṛtyādau na siddhaṃ prativādina iti bhāgāsiddhatvāt /

original: naca vipakṣe kiñcidbādhakamastītyato 'prayojakatvājjñānabādhyatvaṃ na siddhamapi vyāpyatvāsiddhamapīti yāvat /
analyzed: naca vipakṣe kiñcid bādhakam asti iti atas prayojaka tvāt jñāna bādhya tvam na siddham api vyāpya tva asiddham api iti yāvat
prativādinaḥ matena iti guḍajihvikā mātram
bādhaka anupanyāse vādinaḥ u pi vyāpya tva asiddheḥ āvaśyaka tvāt

original: sato vināśe caitanyasyāpi vināśaprasaṅga iti cet /

original: nanu ca nehanānāstītipratipannopādhau śrautaniṣedhātmā bādhaḥ prapañce 'stīti cenna /

original: ato 'sambhavinā tena lakṣaṇenoktena kathaṃ te 'niṣyaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ na bhavedityādiyojanā draṣṭavyā /

original: bhedavādina ityanena māyāvādino viyadādau sadvailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāraḥ śuktirajatādau cāsadvilakṣaṇatvābhyupagatirāgrahamātramalaivetyabhipraiti
analyzed: bheda vādinaḥ iti anena māyā vādinaḥ viyat ādau sat vailakṣaṇya aṅgīkāraḥ śukti rajata ādau ca asat vilakṣaṇa tva abhyupagatiḥ āgraha mātra malā eva iti abhipraiti
yadi ucyate iti atra api ukta rītyā asambhavi tva ādikam jñātavyam
sat mātra tvam iti anena ativyāptiḥ ucyate
tathā hi
brahmaṇaḥ pi sat mātra tvam sattva anadhikaraṇa tvam iti yāvat
māyā vādinā abhyupagatam iti śeṣaḥ
nirdharmaka tva aṅgīkārāt
asattva anadhikaraṇa tvam tu niścitam eva
tasmāt tat api brahma api sannaḥ bhavet kintu anirvācyam prasajyeta iti

original: sattvenāsattvena ca vicārāsahatvamanirvacanīyatvaṃ na punaḥ sattvāsattvadharmānadhikaraṇatvam /
analyzed: sattvena asattvena ca vicāra asaha tvam anirvacanīya tvam na punar sattva asattva dharma anadhikaraṇa tvam

original: brahma tu sattvena vicārasahaṃ kathamanirvacanīyaṃ syāditi cenna /
analyzed: brahma tu sattvena vicāra saham katham anirvacanīyam syāt iti ced na
sattvena iti tu apratyaya arthasya anabhyupagamāt

original: kiñca yo viyadādau vicāraḥ sa brahmaṇyapi samāna iti kathaṃ na tasyānirvacanīyatvam /
analyzed: kiñca yaḥ viyat ādau vicāraḥ sa brahmaṇi api samānaḥ iti katham na tasya anirvacanīya tvam
yathā uktam
nirākariṣyate ca asau durvicāraḥ tatra tatra iti
dvitīyam api lakṣaṇam nirākaroti jñāna bādhya tvam iti
yadi jñāna bādhya tvam nāma ukta vidhayā śukti rajata ādeḥ ca asatvena avidyā upādānaka tva abhāvāt
tatas ca asambhavi tvam lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ
yadi punar jñāna vināśya tva mātram

original: tathāpi viyadādau nitye nityatvādeva śuktirajatādau cāsatvānna siddhamityavyāptiḥ /
analyzed: tathā api viyat ādau nitye nitya tvāt eva śukti rajata ādau ca asatvāt na siddham iti avyāptiḥ

original: yadi ca pratipannopādhau niṣedhapratiyogitvaṃ tadapi viyadādau na siddhamityavyāptireva /
analyzed: yadi ca pratipanna upādhau niṣedha pratiyogi tvam tat api viyat ādau na siddham iti avyāptiḥ eva
upapattayaḥ tu uktāḥ vakṣyamāṇāḥ ca anusandheyāḥ
nanu bhavatā api bādhya tvam kim api aṅgīkaraṇīyam eva
padasya nirarthaka tva ayogāt
tat eva asmākam anirvacanīya lakṣaṇam bhavatu iti atas āha prativādinaḥ vijñātasya iti
prativādinaḥ mama matam iti sambandhaḥ
tat ca ātmani anirvacanīye pi asti iti ativyāptam iti śeṣaḥ
atra anyathā vijñānam eva bhrāntiḥ

original: tatprasañjitānyathā'kāraloḍanaṃ samyagvijñānameva bādha ityavadhāraṇatayā matāntarāṇi nirastāni veditavyāni /
analyzed: tad prasañjita anyathā ākāra loḍanam samyak vijñānam eva bādhaḥ iti avadhāraṇa tayā mata antarāṇi nirastāni veditavyāni
hi śabdena tatra pramāṇa prasiddhim sūcayati
atha pañcākhyātivādaḥ

original: iha khalu kecidyathārthameva sarvavijñānamiti manyamānā nānyathākhyātiṃ sahante /

nahi nimitta kāraṇa nāśāt kārya nāśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: saṃyogapradhvaṃsastu na kadāpi nivartate punaḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇo mukulībhāvastu śītādinodanajanya eva /

original: yadi saṃvidi bahumānavānneti brūyāttadā kathaṃ tacchuktikālambanaṃ syāt /

original: nanu rajatāvabhāsasya rajataviṣayakatve tena rajatena bhavitavyam /

katham na bhavitavyam

satyam

original: na khalu jarāmaraṇavidhvaṃsaheturjātu sudhā taddheturapi bhavati /

na ca adṛṣṭa bhedāt kārya bhedaḥ

doṣa sahakṛtāt indriyāt eva anyathā jñāna jananam iti api asat
doṣāḥ hi kāraṇānām autsargika kārya janana sāmarthyam nighnanti

original: na khalu duṣyaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ vaṭaṃ janayati /

original: kiñca pradarśitākāravyabhicāre pratyayasya sarvatra vyabhicāraśaṅkā durvārā syāt /

original: tathāhi jñānameva khalu sarvatra vastuvyavasthāpakaṃ nānyat /

tat ced kvacid vayabhicarati
tadā tat sarvatra śaṅkita vyabhicāram eva

tat ca sakalam api śaṅkā kalaṅka saṅkocita prabhāvam na prabhavati iti uktam
tatas ca kutas bāhya artha pratyāśā

original: naca vācyaṃ yathā ghaṭādeḥ pārthivasya vahnivyabhicāre 'pi na dhūmasyāpi tadvayabhicāraḥ śaṅkayate /

evam eka jñānasya artha vyabhicāre pi na sarvatra vyabhicāra śaṅkā iti

original: asti hi tatra pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pyavyabhicāraniścayopāyo dhūmatvādirevāvāntaro viśeṣaḥ /

nahi tatra bādhakam kiñcid
tena upapadyate tatra āśvāsaḥ

original: api ca pratīyamāno 'yaṃ rajatākāraḥ kutastya iti vaktavyam /

doṣa vaśāt tad gatasya śukti tva sāmānya viśeṣasya agrahaṇāt

original: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajatasmṛtiṃ janayati /
analyzed: tanmātram ca gṛhītam sadṛśa tayā saṃskāra udbodha krameṇa rajata smṛtim janayati
sā ca gṛhīta grahaṇa svabhāvā api doṣa vaśāt gṛhīta tatta aṃśa pramoṣeṇa gṛhīti sarūpā avatiṣṭhate

original: tathāca rajatasmṛteḥ purovṛttigrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇātsannihitarajatajñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ
analyzed: tathā ca rajata smṛteḥ purovṛtti grahaṇasya ca mithas svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca bheda agrahaṇāt sannihita rajata jñāna sārūpyeṇa idam

original: rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravataryataḥ /
analyzed: rajatam iti bhinne api grahaṇa smaraṇe abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśam ca
kutas etat iti ced na
anyathā anupapatteḥ ukta tvāt
kiñca idam iti purovarti nayana samprayoga jam jñānam anubhavaḥ iti avivādam
rajata jñānam ca na tāvat indriya jam
indriyasya sannikṛṣṭa athar eva jñāna janana sāmarthyāt
anyathā sarva sārvajña prasaṅgāt
na ca viprakṛṣṭena rajatena sannikarṣaḥ sti
tad kāryasya sākṣātkārasya kadāpi adarśanāt
na ca śukti śakala sannikarṣāt eva indriyam rajata jñānam utpādayati iti sāmpratam
atiprasaṅgāt
na ca doṣa sat asat bhāvābhyām vyavasthā
doṣāṇām viparīta kārya kāri tayā nirasta tvāt
bhasmaka doṣa dūṣitasya jāṭhara jātavedasaḥ bahutara āhāra pariṇati hetu tā upalabhyate iti ced na
vipratipatteḥ
doṣasya eva āhāra vikāra hetu tā upapatteḥ

original: naca dahanakāryaṃ kathaṃ doṣaḥ karotīti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca dahana kāryam katham doṣaḥ karoti iti vācyam
kārye pi vaijātya upalambhāt

original: jāṭharāgnipariṇatā hi rasāḥ śarīropacayahetavo na bhasmakapariṇatāstathā /
analyzed: jāṭhara agni pariṇatāḥ hi rasāḥ śarīra upacaya hetavaḥ na bhasmaka pariṇatāḥ tathā
tasmāt na idam indriya jam
liṅga ādi anusandhāna vidhurāṇām api jāyamānam anumāna ādi prabhavam iti vaktum śakyate
atas pratyutpanna karaṇa abhāve pi utpadyamānena anena pariśeṣāt smaraṇena eva bhavitavyam
kiñca idam smaraṇam an ākalita rajatasya anutpadyamāna tvāt sampratipanna smaraṇa vat
na ca idam asmaraṇam
tatta aṃśa vikala tvāt sampratipanna vat iti yuktam

original: padātpadārthasmṛtau hariharādismṛtau ca vyabhicārāt kiñcānubhūtaṃ tāvanna samastaṃ smaryate /
analyzed: padāt padārtha smṛtau hari hara ādi smṛtau ca vyabhicārāt kiñca anubhūtam tāvat na samastam smaryate
tattā aṃśaḥ ca atīta deśa kāla sambandhaḥ smaryamāṇa dharmaḥ
tathā ca smaraṇam ca bhavatu
bhavatu doṣa vaśāt pramuṣita tad tad aṃśam
na ca vipakṣe bādhakam kiñcid iti aprayojakaḥ hetuḥ
na ca nā iyam smṛtiḥ indriya janya tvāt
tat ca indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt iti vācyam
smṛti bīja saṃskāra udbodha hetu purovarti sādhāraṇa ākāra grahaṇe eva indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatirekayoḥ upakṣīṇa tvāt

original: nanvevaṃ satyanāsvāditatiktasya śiśostiktasmaraṇānupapatteḥ kathaṃ tikto guḍa iti pratyaya iti cenna /
analyzed: nanu evam sati anāsvādita tiktasya śiśoḥ tikta smaraṇa anupapatteḥ katham tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti pratyayaḥ iti ced na
janma antara anubhūta tvāt
adṛṣṭa vaśāt ca kasyacid eva smaraṇam upapadyate

original: athavā nāyaṃ niyamo grahaṇasmaraṇe evāgṛhītaviveke vyavahārādipravartake iti kintu kvacidgrahaṇe eva mitho 'gṛhītabhede /
analyzed: athavā na ayam niyamaḥ grahaṇa smaraṇe eva agṛhīta viveke vyavahāra ādi pravartake iti kintu kvacid grahaṇe eva mithas gṛhīta bhede
yathā pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ iti

original: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya pītatvaṃ doṣavaśāddravyarahitaṃ gṛhyate /
analyzed: atra hi viniryat nayana raśmi vartinaḥ pitta dravyasya pīta tvam doṣa vaśāt dravya rahitam gṛhyate
śaṅkhaḥ pi guṇa hīnaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhyate
tat anayoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ itaretara apekṣiṇoḥ a saṃsarga agrahāt sārūpyāt pīta cira bilva ādi phala pratyaya aviśeṣeṇa abheda vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca
bhavataḥ
yat tu kajjala kālima grahaṇam tat tiryak avasthānāt
asvaccha tayā nayana raśmi pratibandhaka tvāt ca

original: pittaṃ tu ājarvāvasthitaṃ kācamiva svacchaṃ na pratibandhakamiti viśeṣaḥ /

evam tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti

original: tathāstyeva ca tatsamutthaṃ savikalpakamidamiti vedanātsavivādabhedābhedaṃ rajatavedanam /

original: tatra vipratipannau bhedābhedau vihāyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātramidaṃ rajatamityādisāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahārakāraṇaṃ pakṣatvena vivakṣitaṃ cetko  #

original: bhede hi vedanayoridaṃ vedanam purovatirmātragocaram na rajatavātā vetti /

original: rajatavedanamapi rajatamātragrāhi nedamiti purovartinamanūdya tasyaiva rajatatāmidaṃ rajatamiti /

original: tato vipratipannākāraṃ parityajyedaṃ rajatamityavagamamātrapakṣīkāre na kaściddoṣaḥ /

original: atha rajatāthirnaḥ śuktikāyāṃ pravṛttau hetubhūtaṃ jñānaṃ mayā pakṣīkriyata iti cenmoccairvāccaḥ paro 'pi śroṣyati /

original: tathāca guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ ca bhedaḥ āśrayāṇāṃ cābhedaḥ sphuṭa eva /
analyzed: tathā ca guṇa ādīnām āśrayeṇa parasparam ca bhedaḥ āśrayāṇām ca abhedaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva
nahi svayam eva svasya adhikaraṇam
na api samānam adhikaraṇam yeṣām iti paraspara abhede yujyate
na ca āśraya bhede tasya samāna tā asti
na ca guṇa ādi āśrayasya bhede pramāṇam asti
viśiṣṭayoḥ bhede pi na tat guṇa ādi āśrayaḥ
kintu guṇa ādi āśraya āśritam vastu antaram tat

original: evañca yatra bhedo na tadabhedena pratibhāsate yaccābhedena pracibhāsate na tatra bheda iti kvātivyāptiḥ /
analyzed: evam ca yatra bhedaḥ na tat abhedena pratibhāsate yat ca abhedena pracibhāsate na tatra bhedaḥ iti kva ativyāptiḥ

original: nanu guṇādīnāmāśrayeṇa parasparaṃ cābhedo bhagavato muneḥ siddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: nanu guṇa ādīnām āśrayeṇa parasparam ca abhedaḥ bhagavataḥ muneḥ siddhāntaḥ
kvacid bheda abhedau ca
sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ tu bheda niṣṭhā eva vyākhyātā

original: tathāca punaḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityādipratyayā vibhramāḥ prasaktāḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca punar śuklaḥ paṭaḥ ityādi pratyayāḥ vibhramāḥ prasaktāḥ
mā evam
sa viśeṣa tva aṅgīvakārāt
viśadam ca etat viśeṣa nirūpaṇe vyutpādayiṣyāmaḥ
yat punar anya ākāra ullekhi ityādinā asmad abhimata anyathā khyāteḥ anubhava virodham pratijñāya tad upapādanāya yat sannikṛṣṭa karaṇena ityantena ālambana lakṣaṇa nirākaraṇam
kṛtam tat anumatam eva asmākam

original: yadvijñānaṃ yatsannikṛṣṭakaraṇena janyate sa tasya viṣaya ityaṅgīkārāt /
analyzed: yat vijñānam yat sannikṛṣṭa karaṇena janyate sa tasya viṣayaḥ iti aṅgīkārāt
nanu atra api doṣaḥ bhihitaḥ iti ced na
sannikarṣasya api kāraṇa tayā vivakṣita tvena tasya asambaddha tvāt
nahi cakṣuḥ ādeḥ ākāśa ādi sannikarṣaḥ rūpa ādi jñāna kāraṇam
nā api vākyasya ākāśa ādi sannikarṣaḥ vākya artha jñāne hetuḥ
na ca liṅga jñānasya ātmanā sannikarṣaḥ liṅgi jñāna nimittam
kim nāma avarjanīya sannidhayaḥ te sannikarṣāḥ

original: liṅgasya sādhyadharmisannikarṣo liṅgijñānakāraṇamiti cenna liṅgajñānasya karaṇatayābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: liṅgasya sādhya dharmi sannikarṣaḥ liṅgi jñāna kāraṇam iti ced na liṅga jñānasya karaṇa tayā abhyupagamāt
anena eva vākyasya śrotṛ śrotra sannikarṣa āśrayaṇena dūṣaṇam parāstam
vākya jñānasya eva karaṇa tva aṅgīkārāt

original: tathāpi pratyabhijñāyāṃ tattāṃśena cakṣurāderliṅginā ca liṅgajñānasya vākyārthena vākyajñānasya sannikarṣābhāvādaviṣayatāpattiriti cenna asannikṛṣṭajñāpane  #
analyzed: tathā api pratyabhijñāyām tatta aṃśena cakṣuḥ ādeḥ liṅginā ca liṅga jñānasya vākya arthena vākya jñānasya sannikarṣa abhāvāt aviṣaya tā āpattiḥ iti ced na asannikṛṣṭa jñāpane
ti prasaṅgāt
tad anubhava janita saṃskāra sahakṛta indriyeṇa pratyabhijñā jāyate
tad vayāpta liṅga viṣayeṇa ca liṅga jñānena liṅgi jñānam utpadyate
saṃsarga dharmaka padārtha vāci pada samudāya rūpa vākya viṣaya jñānena vākya artha jñānam janyate
atas na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced tarhi abhyupagataḥ sannikarṣaḥ

original: nahi saṃyogādireva sannikarṣaḥ kiṃ nāma pratyāsattimātram / *2,202*
analyzed: nahi saṃyoga ādiḥ eva sannikarṣaḥ kim nāma pratyāsatti mātram
tathā api rūpa pratīteḥ ātmā viṣayaḥ prasajyeta
tatra manasaḥ karaṇa tvāt
ātma manaḥ sannikarṣasya api rūpa jñānam prati kāraṇa tvāt iti ced na
manasaḥ ca sādhāraṇa tvāt

original: tarhi manaḥsannikṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā jāyamānaṃ rūpajñānaṃ manoviṣayamāpannamiti cenna /
analyzed: tarhi manaḥ sannikṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā jāyamānam rūpa jñānam manaḥ viṣayam āpannam iti ced na
sannikarṣasya api asādhāraṇa kāraṇatayā vivakṣita tvāt
cakṣumarnaḥ sannikarṣaḥ hi dravya ādi jñāna sādhāraṇaḥ
evam anye trapa kṣudra upadravāḥ pariharaṇīyāḥ
tat evam janya jñāne viṣaya tvasya anyathā vyavasthita tvāt yat jñānam yat pratibhāsam iti anyathā paribhāṣaṇam anupapannam
na ca evam sati anubhava virodhaḥ
rajata avabhāsasya śuktikā sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tvena tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ
na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ
doṣa janya tva tad abhāva ādinā vyavasthā upapatteḥ
anyathā rajata jñānāt arajate pravṛttau api katham na atiprasaṅgaḥ
yat punar rajata avabhāsasya ityādi āśaṅkaya samādhānam abhihitam tad jñāna ekatva samarthanena nirākariṣyāmaḥ

original: astu vā yadvijñānaṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ tattadviṣayamityeva vyavasthā /
analyzed: astu vā yat vijñānam yat pratibhāsam tat tat viṣayam iti eva vyavasthā
tathā api na anubhava virodhaḥ
tat kim rajata avabhāsasya śukti tva viṣaya tāyām anubhava virodham brūṣe uta idantva ākārasya
ādye sampratipattiḥ

original: nahi vayamasminpratyaye śuktitvamāvabhāsata iti brūmo yena virodhaḥ syāt,
analyzed: nahi vayam asmin pratyaye śukti tvam āvabhāsate iti brūmaḥ yena virodhaḥ syāt
śukti tva pratibhāsasya rajata avabhāsa virodhi tva abhyupagamāt
dvitīye tu na kaścid virodhaḥ

original: virodhe vā samīcīnarajata idaṃ rajatamiti pratītirna syāt /
analyzed: virodhe vā samīcīna rajate idam rajatam iti pratītiḥ na syāt
idam ākārasya rajata pratibhāsa viṣaya tām anabhyupagacchataḥ eva pratīti virodham vakṣyāmaḥ

original: evaṃ sati rajatasyāpi jñānaviṣayatā prasajyata iti cet satyam,
analyzed: evam sati rajatasya api jñāna viṣaya tā prasajyate iti ced satyam
iṣyam eva etat
na ca evam akhyāti pakṣapātaḥ
jñāna aikya abhyupagamāt
na api śuktikā rajate
iti jñānam vibhramaḥ prasajyate rajatasya asattva abhyupagamāt
tādātmya avabhāsa abhyupagamāt ca
atas eva uktam asataḥ sattva pratītiḥ sataḥ sattva pratītiḥ iti

original: vakṣyati ca viṣayasya kuto bādha ityasato rajatatādātmyorjñānaviṣayatāmācāryaḥ /
analyzed: vakṣyati ca viṣayasya kutas bādhaḥ iti asatoḥ rajata tādātmyoḥ jñāna viṣaya tām ācāryaḥ
na ca anyathā khyāti janane kāraṇa abhāvaḥ
indriya ādeḥ eva tad kāraṇa tvāt

na ca doṣāṇām svārasika śakti virodhi tā mātram iti vācyam

original: ādye paśuhiṃsā kiṃ dharmajanane svārasikaśaktimatī utādharmajanana iti vācyam /
analyzed: ādye paśu hiṃsā kim dharma janane svārasika śaktimatī uta adharma janane iti vācyam

original: sahakārivaśāditi cet aṅgīkṛtaṃ tarhi sahakāriṇāṃ svārasikaśaktipratibandhena viparītaśaktayādhāyakatvam /

original: yāvatkhalu vigīte pratyaye bhāsate tasya sarvasyāsattve 'satkhyātiḥ syāt /

original: yaccoktaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre jñānasya savartrānāśvāsa iti tat autsargikaṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyamapavādādviparyaya iti vadatā'cāryeṇaiva parihariṣyate
analyzed: yat ca uktam viṣaya vyabhicāre jñānasya savartrā anāśvāsaḥ iti tat autsargikam jñānānām prāmāṇyam apavādāt viparyayaḥ iti vadatā ācāryeṇa eva parihariṣyate

original: sākṣī khalu caitanyarūpo niyatayāthārthyaḥ kadācidapi saṃśayānāskandito 'ntaḥkaraṇavṛttīnāṃ yāthārthyaṃ svayameva gṛhṇāti,

original: ata evānāśvāsanirasanopāyo na jñāneṣu kaścidviśeṣo 'stīti nirastam /

original: anyathā parasyāpi kathaṃ viṣayavyabhicāre vyavahṛtervyavahārāntare samāśvāsaḥ syāt /

original: kvacidvivekāgrahe ca kathamanyatra viśiṣṭapratyaye viśvāso bhavet /

original: rajatajñānavata evotpadyamānatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti cenna tathāpi rajatasaṃskāravyavahārādau vyabhicārāt /

rajata savikalpaka jñānavataḥ eva utpadyamāna tvam vivakṣitam iti ced na hāna ādi buddhiṣu anaikāntika tā nistārāt

original: kiñcedaṃ smaraṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ na tāvatsāmānyaṃ guṇeṣu prābhākarairabhyupagatam /

original: anyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkita iti cenna tathāpi sandigdhakālātītatānistārāt /

original: asati bādhake na vṛthānyatropakṣayaḥ śaṅkayata iti cet samaṃ prakṛte 'pīti /

anena eva pratipakṣa anumāna dvayam api samāhitam veditavyam

original: nedaṃ smṛtiriti vyavahartavyaṃ tattollekhādismṛticinhavikalatvāditi prathamaprayoge vivakṣitatvāt /
analyzed: na idam smṛtiḥ iti vyavahartavyam tatta ullekha ādi smṛti cinha vikala tvāt iti prathama prayoge vivakṣita tvāt
atas eva tikta guḍa ādi pratyaya prakriyā api parāstā

original: yadapi viparyayābhyupagame kalpanāgauravamuktaṃ tat vivekāgrahamātreṇa pravṛttyāderupapattau tathāstu /
analyzed: yat api viparyaya abhyupagame kalpanā gauravam uktam tat viveka agraha mātreṇa pravṛtti ādeḥ upapattau tathā astu
na ca evam iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: kiñcaivamantyatantusaṃyogaparyantaṃ kāraṇakalāpamupādāya paṭo 'pi nāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tanmātreṇa sarvasyopapatteḥ /
analyzed: kiñca evam antya tantu saṃyoga paryantam kāraṇa kalāpam upādāya paṭaḥ pi nā aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tanmātreṇa sarvasya upapatteḥ
paṭaḥ pi pramitaḥ na hātum śakyate

original: naca tena vinaikatvādipratyayopapattiriti cet viparyaye 'pyevamiti kuto gauravam /
analyzed: na ca tena vinā eka tva ādi pratyaya upapattiḥ iti ced viparyaye pi evam iti kutas gauravam
anyathā khyātau kim pramāṇam iti ced
anubhavaḥ eva iti brūmaḥ

original: (ta) yathā hi purovartini rajate rajatamidamiti viśiṣṭaviṣayamekameva vijñānaṃ svaprakāśatayā
analyzed: yathā hi purovartini rajate rajatam idam iti viśiṣṭa viṣayam ekam eva vijñānam sva prakāśa tayā

original: vā mānasapratyakṣatayā vā sākṣiṇā vāvabhāsate tathedamapīti kuto 'sya na viśiṣṭaviṣayaikajñānatvam /
analyzed: vā mānasa pratyakṣa tayā vā sākṣiṇā vā avabhāsate tathā idam api iti kutas na viśiṣṭa viṣaya eka jñāna tvam

original: na hi tato 'sya mātrayāpi viśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: na hi mātrayā api viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ
darśane vā asmad pravṛttiḥ na syāt

original: kevalamekaṃ tādṛgviṣayasadbhāvādyathārthaṃ tadabhāvāparamayathārthamaviśiṣṭaviṣayamanekamapi tadviśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvena pratibhāsata iti cenna
analyzed: kevalam ekam tādṛś viṣaya sadbhāvāt yathārtham tad abhāva aparam ayathārtham aviśiṣṭa viṣayam anekam api tad viśiṣṭa viṣaya eka tvena pratibhāsate iti ced na
anyasya api viśiṣṭa viṣaya ekatve samāśvāsa asambhava prasaṅgāt viparyaya aṅgīkāra prasakteḥ ca

original: nāstyeva viśiṣṭaviṣayaikatvagrāhipratyaya iti cenna anubhavasiddhajñānāpalāpe smṛtyanubhavasvarūpāpalāpaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na asti eva viśiṣṭa viṣaya eka tva grāhi pratyayaḥ iti ced na anubhava siddha jñāna apalāpe smṛti anubhava svarūpa apalāpa prasaṅgāt
kiñca rajata arthinaḥ śuktikāyām pravṛttiḥ anyathā anupapanna anyathā jñānam ākṣipati
nanu iyam pravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca agṛhīta bhedāt vedana dvayāt upapadyate iti ced
kaḥ yam bhedaḥ nāma

original: kiṃ svarūpam uta pṛthaktavam utānyonyābhāvaḥ athavāvaidharmyam /
analyzed: kim svarūpam uta pṛthaktavam uta anyonya abhāvaḥ athavā avaidharmyam
na prathamaḥ
sva prakāśa jñāna jñeya pratibhāse tad anavabhāsa anupapatteḥ
na dvitīyaḥ
guṇe guṇa an abhyupagamāt
sarvatra bheda agraha sambhavena anya arthinaḥ nyatra pravṛtti prasaṅgāt
tṛtīye vaktavyam
kim idam rajata tvayoḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ na avabhāsate uta idam rajatayoḥ iti
na ādyaḥ
aparyāya śabda smārakayoḥ jāti vyaktayoḥ tad anavabhāsa asambhavāt
kiñca anyonya abhāvaḥ nāma anyonya svarūpam eva parasya
tat ca upalabdham iti katham tad anupalambhaḥ
atas eva na dvitīyaḥ
na api caturthaḥ

original: rajatāsambhavinaḥ purovartinīdantvasya purovartyasambhavinaśca rajate rajatatvasya gṛhītatvāt /
analyzed: rajata asambhavinaḥ purovartinī dantvasya purovarti asambhavinaḥ ca rajate rajata tvasya gṛhīta tvāt
idam rajata tvayoḥ asaṃsarga agrahaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti ced na
a saṃsargaḥ hi saṃsargasya abhāvaḥ

original: sa cedaṃrajatatvayoḥ svarūpameva pareṣām iti kathaṃ tadavabhāse nāvabhāseta /
analyzed: sa ca idam rajata tvayoḥ svarūpam eva pareṣām iti katham tad avabhāse na avabhāseta
viparyaya abhyupagama vādibhiḥ api bheda agrahaḥ bhyupagamanīyaḥ eva
tatra api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na
bhedasya svarūpa tāvat mātra tva anabhyupagamāt

original: atha manyase purovatirno yaḥ śuktitvādidharmo rajatavyāvartako yaśca rajate vyavahitadeśatvādidharmaḥ purovartivyāvartakastayoragrahaṇaṃ pravartakamiti
analyzed: atha manyase purovatiḥ no yaḥ śukti tva ādi dharmaḥ rajata vyāvartakaḥ yaḥ ca rajate vyavahita deśa tva ādi dharmaḥ purovarti vyāvartakaḥ tayoḥ agrahaṇam pravartakam iti
tat asat

original: purovartino hi śuktitvāgrahe na śuktikārthī tatra pravarteta /
analyzed: purovartinaḥ hi śukti tva agrahe na śuktikā arthī tatra pravarteta

original: rajatasya cāsannihitatvādidharmāgrahe rajatārthī na tatra pravartatām /
analyzed: rajatasya ca asannihita tva ādi dharma agrahe rajata arthī na tatra pravartatām
rajata arthinaḥ pravṛttiḥ tu kutas
kiñca bheda agrahāt anya arthinaḥ nyatra pravṛttim ācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ
kim ayam eva vyavahāraḥ bheda agrahāt anyaḥ tu abheda grahāt
uta sarvaḥ pi bheda agrahāt iti
na ādyaḥ
aniyata kāraṇa tā āpātāt
nanu ca sarvatra abheda grahaḥ eva pravartakaḥ
tad sārūpyāt bheda agrahaḥ tathā iṣyate
yathā hi

original: asti tāvatpravartakatvābhimatapratyaye 'pyapekṣitopāyapurovṛttyavagamāṃśayoḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedavirahādeva bhedāgrahaḥ /
analyzed: asti tāvat pravartaka tva abhimata pratyaye pi apekṣita upāya purovṛtti avagama aṃśayoḥ svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca bheda virahāt eva bheda agrahaḥ
tathā atra api avivecakam sādhāraṇam rūpam avagamyate
na avagamyate ca sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ vedyayoḥ vedanayoḥ ca
tatas ca eka pravartaka pratyaya sadṛśa vapuḥ upajanayati idam vedana dvayam pravṛttim iti
mā evam
aniyata hetuka tva anistārāt

original: kiñca pravartakasādṛśyātpravṛttirityatraiva kalpyate uta yadyatsadṛśaṃ tattatkāryakārīti sarvatra niyamaḥ /
analyzed: kiñca pravartaka sādṛśyāt pravṛttiḥ iti atra eva kalpyate uta yat yat sadṛśam tat tat kārya kāri iti sarvatra niyamaḥ
na ādyaḥ
adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt

original: pravṛttilobhāditthamāsthīyata iti cenna tasyā viparyayāṅgīkārādeva suvyavasthiteḥ /
analyzed: pravṛtti lobhāt ittham āsthīyate iti ced na tasyāḥ viparyaya aṅgīkārāt eva su vyavasthiteḥ
na dvitīyaḥ
kṛśānu sadṛśāt guñjā puñjat śīta nivṛtteḥ adarśanāt

original: nanvidaṃ rajatamiti yathā rajatasādhyā buddhī rajatasadṛśācchuktiśakalādbhavati bhavatām /
analyzed: nanu idam rajatam iti yathā rajata sādhyā buddhī rajata sadṛśāt śuktiśakalāt bhavati bhavatām
tathā pravartaka eka jñāna sadṛśāt jñāna dvayāt pravṛttiḥ api kutas na syāt
mā evam
arthasya sākṣāt jñāna kāraṇatva anabhyupagamāt
sādṛśyam tu kāca ādi vat doṣatayā upayujyate

original: api cedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ pravartakasādṛśyamātrādyadi pravṛttimupajanayennivṛttimapi kutā ena janayet /
analyzed: api ca idam jñāna dvayam pravartaka sādṛśya mātrāt yadi pravṛttim upajanayet nivṛttim api kutas ena janayet
asti hi tatra nivartaka bheda graha sārūpyam abheda agrahaṇam

original: nanu ca yathā bhedāgraho bhavatāmabhedagrahaṃ janayati tathā pravṛttimapi kiṃ na janayediti /
analyzed: nanu ca yathā bheda agrahaḥ bhavatām abheda graham janayati tathā pravṛttim api kim na janayet iti
mā evam
vaiṣamyāt

original: jñānajanane hi kāraṇānāṃ svātantṛyaṃ na puruṣasya /
analyzed: jñāna janane hi kāraṇānām svātantṛyam na puruṣasya
tāni ca yādṛśa sāmagrī madhya patitāni tādṛśam jñānam upajanayanti
na tu puruṣa ākāṅkṣām apekṣante heya upekṣaṇīya jñāna jananāt

original: pravṛttau tu puruṣa eva svatantro na jñānam /
analyzed: pravṛttau tu puruṣaḥ eva svatantraḥ na jñānam

original: sa hi satyapi jñāne 'pekṣita eva pravartate /
analyzed: sa hi sati api jñāne pekṣitaḥ eva pravartate
na tu jñānam jātam iti eva udāsīna viparītayoḥ api
tathā ca bheda agraha doṣa kaluṣitāni nayana ādīni viparyayam janayanti
na tu puruṣaḥ pravartaka sādṛśya mātreṇa pravartitum arhati
tathātve vā nivartaka sādṛśyāt prekṣāvān nivarteta api iti uktam

original: kiñca jñānamarthe pravṛttiṃ kiṃ sākṣādupajanayati utecchāprayatnadvāreṇa /
analyzed: kiñca jñānam arthe pravṛttim kim sākṣāt upajanayati uta icchā prayatna dvāreṇa
na ādyaḥ
heya upekṣaṇīyayoḥ api pravṛtti prasaṅgāt
dvitīye katham agṛhīta bhedāt jñāna dvayāt pravṛttiḥ
purovarti pravṛtteḥ hi sākṣāt kāraṇam prayatnaḥ
tasya ca icchā
tasyāḥ ca samīhita sādhana tā anumānam
na ca tat sambhavati
rajata tvasya pakṣa dharma taā
yā a pratipanna tvāt

original: atha rajate pratipannena rajatatvena tatsamīhitasādhanatājñānamupajātaṃ bhedāgraha(bhedagrahe 'bhedagraha)
analyzed: atha rajate pratipannena rajata tvena tad samīhita sādhana tā jñānam upajātam bheda agraha bheda grahe bheda graha
sārūpyāt purovartinī icchām upajanayati iti ced na
tathā sati bheda graha sārūpyāt abheda agrahāt upekṣayā api āpātāt iti
nanu astu tarhi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ
tathā hi
sati arajate tāvat asti rajata vyakti jñānam rajata tva jāti bodhaḥ ca
na ca asti a saṃsarga jñānam
etāvatā eva tatra tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ
nahi tayoḥ tādātmyam paśyanti
jāti vyaktayoḥ da tādātmya abhāvāt

original: naca tatra saṃsargagrahaḥ pravartakaḥ samavāyo hi tayoḥ saṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tatra saṃsarga grahaḥ pravartakaḥ samavāyaḥ hi tayoḥ saṃsargaḥ
na ca asau pratyakṣaḥ
indriya sannikarṣa abhāvāt
na api anumānaḥ tadā śakyate jñātum
liṅga abhāvāt

original: avisaṃvādivyavahārajanakatvaviśiṣṭasākāṃkṣarūparūpisahopalambho hi talliṅgam na cāvisaṃvāditvaṃ prāk pravṛtteḥ śakyādhigamam /
analyzed: avisaṃvādi vyavahāra janaka tva viśiṣṭa sākāṃkṣa rūpa rūpi saha upalambhaḥ hi tat liṅgam na ca avisaṃvādi tvam prāk pravṛtteḥ śakya adhigamam

original: asti cedaṃ sakalamapi pravartakaṃ vibhrame 'pīti kuto viparyayābhāve pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
analyzed: asti ca idam sakalam api pravartakam vibhrame pi iti kutas viparyaya abhāve pravṛtti anupapattiḥ
idam rajata tva ādhārayoḥ bheda grahaḥ vā sati arajate pravṛtti hetuḥ
asti ca asau prakṛte pi
na ca purovartini rajata tva apratītau icchā anupapattiḥ iti vācyam

original: rajatatvena sahāgṛhītāsaṃsargatayā vā rajatādagṛhītabhedatayā vā samīhitasādhanatānumānopapatteriti etadapyayuktam /
analyzed: rajata tvena saha agṛhīta asaṃsarga tayā vā rajatāt agṛhīta bheda tayā vā samīhita sādhana tā anumāna upapatteḥ iti etat api ayuktam
a saṃsarga agraha bheda agrahayoḥ nirasta tvāt
kiñca evam sati sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa uccheda prasaṅgaḥ
rūpa rūpi bhāvaḥ savikalpake cakāsti

original: nirvikalpake tu vastusvarūpamātramiti bheda iti cet /
analyzed: nirvikalpake tu vastu svarūpa mātram iti bhedaḥ iti ced
kaḥ yam rūpa rūpi bhāvaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ paraspara ākāṅkṣā viṣaya tvam iti ced
tat kim tayoḥ svarūpam uta anyat
ādye tat api nirvikalpake prakāśate eva
dvitīye kim tat aindriyakam uta atīndriyam
prathame katham avikalpake na prakāśeta
dvitīye katham sa vikalpake prakāśeta

original: ata tadvastudarśanasāpekṣadaśarnaṃ nirvikalpake 'cakāsadapi savikalpake bhātīti cet /
analyzed: nirvikalpake cakāsat api savikalpake bhāti iti ced
tarhi na tat sa ṛṃga atiriktam asti iti saṃsarga grahāt eva savikalpaka upapattiḥ
na ca nirvikalpakasya pravartaka tvam asti
kiñca a saṃsarga agrahāt eva sarvatra pravṛtti aṅgīkāre madhyama vṛddha pravṛtteḥ api tathātvena
bālasya tadīya saṃsarga jñāna anumāna upāya abhāvāt padānām anvita artheṣu vyutpatti anupapattau
śābda pramāṇa uccheda prasaṅgaḥ
atha evam manyeta
asti eva vyavahartuḥ anvaya jñānam
kim nāma sat api na pravṛttau upayujyate
atas na kaścid doṣaḥ iti

original: tatra kiṃ tadanvayajñānaṃ pravṛttau niyatamutāniyatamiti vācyam /
analyzed: tatra kim tad anvaya jñānam pravṛttau niyatam uta aniyatam iti vācyam
ādye stu tad pravṛttau upayogi mā vā bhūt

original: anyathākhyātiṃ vinā na rajatārthinaḥ purovartini pravṛttiriti tāvatsiddham /
analyzed: anyathā khyātim vinā na rajata arthinaḥ purovartini pravṛttiḥ iti tāvat siddham
dvitīye tu śabda ucchedaḥ tad avasthaḥ
kiñca niyata pūrva bhāvi ca akāraṇam ca iti anupapannam

original: pratibhāsamānayorasaṃsargāgrahe sati saṃsargagraho 'varjanīyasannidhiriti cenna viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
analyzed: pratibhāsamānayoḥ a saṃsarga agrahe sati saṃsarga grahaḥ varjanīya sannidhiḥ iti ced na viparyayasya api vaktum śakya tvāt
avaśyam ca etat evam
vyavahāraḥ hi vyavahartavya upalambha nibandhanaḥ yuktaḥ
na tu vyavaharaṇīya viparyaya anupalabdhi nibandhanaḥ
nahi ghaṭa vyavahāraḥ vyavahartavya jñāna puraḥsaraḥ vyavahāra tvāt ghaṭa vyavahāra vat
vivāda padam jñānam purovarti viṣayam tad viṣaya vyavahāra janaka tvāt saṃmata vat

original: purovarti vā rajatajñānagocaro rajatajñānagocaro rajatānupāyatve sati tadarthipravṛttiviṣayatvātsamyagrajatavat /
analyzed: purovarti vā rajata jñāna gocaraḥ rajata jñāna gocaraḥ rajata anupāya tve sati tad arthi pravṛtti viṣaya tvāt samyak rajata vat

original: vivādapadaṃ rajatajñānamidaṃ jñānānna bhidyate prakāśamānāttato 'prakāśamānabhedatve sati prakāśamānatvātsampratipannarajatajñānavadityādayaḥ
analyzed: vivāda padam rajata jñānam idam jñānāt na bhidyate prakāśamānāt prakāśamāna bheda tve sati prakāśamāna tvāt sampratipanna rajata jñāna vat ityādayaḥ

original: kiñca viparyayābhāve nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānasya bādhakatvamanupapadyamānaṃ taṃ gamayati /
analyzed: kiñca viparyaya abhāve na idam rajatam iti jñānasya bādhaka tvam anupapadyamānam tam gamayati
nahi tathātve bādhaka tvam asti
na tāvat agrahaṇa nivartaka tayā bādhaka tvam
sarva pratyayānām tathā tva āpātāt
nā api vyavahāra vicchedaka tvena
atadarthinām vyavahāra anutpattau na idam rajatam iti jñānasya ābādhaka tva prasaṅgāt
vyāghra cora ādi jñānasya api pravṛtti vicchedaka tvena bādhaka tva prasakteḥ ca
na ca arthasya vyavahāra yogya tā vicchedaka tvena
samaya antare pi tatra vibhramāt pravṛtti abhāva āpatteḥ
na ca vyavahāra pratibandhaka tvena
aviveka nivṛttau kāraṇa abhāvāt eva vyavahāra anupapatteḥ pratibandhaka kalpanā yogāt
vyāghra cora ādi jñānasya bādhaka tā āpatteḥ ca
vimatam ayathārtham bādhya tvāt vayavahāra vat iti
atas eva bhrānti tva prasiddhayā api viparyāsa siddhiḥ
evam ca sati pratyaya tva anumānam kāla atyaya apadiṣyam veditavyam
aduṣya karaṇa janya tva upādhi grastam ca
etena rajata jñāna tva anumānam api nirastam
anyathā vimataḥ vyavahāraḥ yathārthaḥ vyavahāra tvāt
rajata viṣayaḥ vā rajata vyavahāra tvāt iti api syāt
yat api jñāna tvam ca yathārtha mātra vṛtti ityādi

original: tatra kimidaṃ jñānatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā pratiniyataṃ vā /
analyzed: tatra kim idam jñāna tvam sāmānyam vā pratiniyatam vā
na ādyaḥ
vādi prativādinoḥ āśraya asiddheḥ
vimata jñāna vṛtti jñāna tva pakṣīkāre pi mātrā iti vyartham syāt
tad tyāgena ca pratijñāne prathama anumāna doṣaḥ eva
kiñca yathāthar mātra vṛtti iti ayathārtha avṛtti tva mātram vivakṣitam uta ayathāthar jñāna avṛtti tvam
ādye siddhasādhanam ayathārtha vyavahāra avṛtti tvasya siddha tvāt
dvitīye parasya aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā
aduṣṭa sāmagrī janya mātra vṛtti tvam apādhiḥ ca
yat ca śuktikā rajata tvena ābhāsate ityādi
tat api asat

original: meruḥ sarṣapa ityādivāyānmerorapi sarṣapatvena pratibhāsāddṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavaikalyāt /
analyzed: meruḥ sarṣapaḥ ityādi vāyāt meroḥ api sarṣapa tvena pratibhāsāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalyāt

original: anyathā tathāvidhavākyābhāsaṃ śrutavatā tatpratiṣedho na kriyetāprasaktatvāt /
analyzed: anyathā tathāvidha vākya ābhāsam śrutavatā tad pratiṣedhaḥ na kriyeta aprasakta tvāt
nahi padārtha pratiṣedhaḥ yuktaḥ

original: api caivaṃ satyagniranuguṇa iti bādhitaviṣayasya vākyasya ghaṭaḥ pacatītyapārthakādbhedo na syāt /
analyzed: api ca evam sati agniḥ anuguṇaḥ iti bādhita viṣayasya vākyasya ghaṭaḥ pacati iti apārthakāt bhedaḥ na syāt
yat api idam rajata tādātmyam ityādi
tat ca ayuktam
tad apratītau āśraya asiddheḥ

original: anyathā śvetaketūddālakākhyāyikayā pratipāditatvādadvaitamapi na śrutyabhiprāyaḥ syāt /

tat ha etat paśyan ṛṣiḥ vāmadevaḥ pratipeda iham brahma asmi

original: ityapi paropāsanānuvādo na svārthe tātparyavān syāt“atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste';
analyzed: iti api para upāsana anuvādaḥ na svārthe tātparyavān yaḥ nyām devatām upāste

tathā ca vispaṣṭa tadīya vākya antara balāt asya api sūtrasya svarūpa lakṣaṇa paratvam eva iti

iti āha atas iti

original: jaḍamātravyāvṛttyarthaṃ tu lakṣaṇe vyākhyāyamāne kathaṃ jīvaikyavādināṃ lakṣaṇasūtrārambho 'nupapanna ityata āha- nahīti //

original: tathā sati lakṣaṇasya jīve 'tivyāptimāśaṅkayetaravyapadeśāddhitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiriti sūtrakārīyaṃ tannirākaraṇamasaṅgataṃ syāt /

original: kathañcicchaṅkāyāṃ vā tasyāpi lakṣyatvāṅgīkāraṃ parityajya tatra na lakṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ kriyata ityāśavānāha- hitākriyeti //

original: ito 'pi māyāvādināṃ na brahmalakṣaṇasūtrārambhaḥ sambhavatītyāha- nirguṇatvaṃ ceti //

original: tato 'nenāpi lakṣaṇāvākyena brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena tadavinābhūtaiḥ sarvajñatvādibhiśca saṃsargaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ /

kim nāma advaidinā nirguṇam brahma nirūpayitum aśakyam iti
guṇa śabdena a cā
tra dharma mātram prakṛtam
tad guṇa ādiṣu api sarva saṃmatam
guṇa ādīnām ca sa guṇa tvam paramāṇu ārambha nirāse vakṣyate
nanu ca sākṣī cetā kevalaḥ nirguṇaḥ ca
iti nirguṇam brahma śrūyate
mā evam
anyathā sākṣi tva ādīnām api dharma tvāt vayāghātaḥ ca
sākṣāt draṣṭā hi sākṣī
yathā āha pāṇiniḥ
sākṣāt draṣṭari saṃjñāyām iti

original: evaṃ dharmarāhityalakṣaṇaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ nirākṛtamapyāgrahamātreṇa yo 'ṅgīkaroti taṃ prati solluṇṭhamāha- nirguṇatvamiti //
analyzed: evam dharma rāhitya lakṣaṇam nirguṇa tvam nirākṛtam api āgraha mātreṇa yaḥ ṅgīkaroti tam prati sa ulluṇṭham āha nirguṇa tvam iti

original: nirguṇatvaṃ tadā ca syādāsuratvaṃ nacānyathā // MAnuv_1,1.103ab //
analyzed: nirguṇa tvam tadā ca syāt āsura tvam na ca anyathā

original: ṇatve nirākṛte 'pi yadi nirguṇatvaṃ parasmai ruciṃ syāt tarhi guṇaśabdoditasakalaśubharāhityalakṣaṇamāsuratvameva syāt /
analyzed: nirākṛte yadi nirguṇa tvam parasmai rucim syāt tarhi guṇa śabda udita sakala śubha rāhitya lakṣaṇam āsuratvam eva syāt
anyathā nirūpayitum aśakya tvasya ukta tvāt
tena aikyam ca māyā vādinām anumanyāmahe iti

original: nahi nānāvidhakāryakriyāveśātmatvaṃ tatprasavaśaktayatmakaṃ vā jijñāsyaviśuddhabrahmāntargataṃ bhavitumarhati /

syā eva nirākṛta tvāt

atha tad uktasya guṇa guṇinoḥ anya tva ananya tvābhyām anirūpaṇam duṣṭa tā

original: yadapi guṇaguṇinoranyatvānanyatvābhyāmanirūpaṇāditi lakṣaṇasya taṭasthatvādi siddhaye pareṇoktaṃ taddūṣayitumanuvadati- lakṣyalakṣaṇayoriti

original: tatra jagajjanmādikāraṇatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣasya sadbhāvāttadbalena
analyzed: tatra jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tva ādīnām dharmāṇām bheda abhāve pi viśeṣasya sadbhāvāt tad balena

original: sarvamutpadyata iti vaktuṃ nirbhedavastuni pareṇa viśeṣasyānaṅgīkṛtatvāt ghaṭādīnāṃ
analyzed: sarvam utpadyate iti vaktum nirbheda vastuni pareṇa viśeṣasya an aṅgīkṛta tvāt ghaṭa ādīnām

original: ca mithyātvenāṅgīkṛtānāmanudāharaṇatvātsatya eva vastunyasāvudapapādanīya iti manvāna āha- tadeti //

tad aikyasya gatiḥ eva na vidyate

original: yadyevaṃ pṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayasi tadaikyasya gatirnirūpaṇaprakāro na vidyate /

ayam abhiprāyaḥ

aparam tad svarūpa param avāntaravākyam

katham iti ced ucyate

original: tattvamasītyādivākyapratipādyamaikyaṃ kiṃ tatpadalakṣitāccaitanyādabhinnamuta bhinnamatha bhinnābhinnamiti vācyam /

original: pareṇāṅgīkṛtatvena prādhānyādabhedapakṣaṃ tāvadādau nirākaroti- aikyābheda iti //

original: aikyābhede na śāstreṇa jñeyaṃ tat svaprakāśataḥ // MAnuv_1,1.104cd //

original: aikyasya caitanyasvarūpābhede 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe tadaikyaṃ tattvamasītyādinā śāstreṇa pratipādyaṃ na syāt /

kutas sva rūpasya sva prakāśa tvena nitya siddha tvāt

nahi prakāśamānam eva śāstra pratipādyam

śāstra pratipādyam ca iti vyāhatam

original: atha śāstraṃ naikyaṃ pratipādayati kintu bhedabhramaṃ nirākaroti,

aikyam na prakāśate iti ced na
sva prakāśa caitanya mātra tva virodhāt
avidyā vaśāt sva prakāśasya api anavabhāsaḥ iti ced na sarvathā api anavabhāsa prasaṅgāt

iti ayuktam

original: nanu kathaṃ tarhi so 'yaṃ devadatta iti vākyam /

atra api viśeṣa anaṅgīkāre nupapattiḥ eva iti

original: tadā vaktavyaṃ tau kiṃ caitanyādabhinnāvuta bhinnau atha bhinnābhinnāviti /

original: sa bhedaḥ kiṃ bhedibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno bhinnābhinno vā /

original: yadyapi bhedābhedāṅgīkāre virodho vaktuṃ śakyate tathāpi sphuṭatvānnoktaḥ /

original: tadā pṛcchāmaḥ svasya nirvāhakaṃ hi svanirvāhakaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ svanirvāhakatā /

original: nahi tīre nadītvamanabhidadhato nadīpadasyānadītvavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ sambhavati /

tat api anena eva nirastam

original: nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśamāne virodhyākārāropa evānupapanna iti coktam /
analyzed: nirviśeṣe svayam prakāśamāne virodhya ākāra āropaḥ eva anupapannaḥ iti ca uktam
evam viśeṣa anaṅgīkāre vākya dvayasya anupapattim abhidhāya upasaṃharati tat iti
tat akhaṇḍam ca khaṇḍitam

original: tattasmādakhaṇḍaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ vākyadvayapratipādyamityetanmataṃ khaṇḍitaṃ dūṣitaṃ veditavyamityarthaḥ / *3,81*
analyzed: tat tasmāt akhaṇḍam nirviśeṣam vākya dvaya pratipādyam iti etat matam khaṇḍitam dūṣitam veditavyam iti arthaḥ
sva kriyā viruddham ca nirviśeṣa tva vacanam iti āha nirviśeṣa tvam iti
nirviśeṣa tvam etena mūkaḥ ham iti vat bhavet
yathā mūkaḥ ham iti etat sva kriyā viruddham

katham
etena nirviśeṣa tvena viśeṣeṇa āpatitena hetunā

original: viśeṣābhāvo hi nirviśeṣaṃ brahmeti vākyena pratipādayitumiṣyaḥ /

original: ayamapi viśeṣo nirviśeṣamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /

original: tarhyetadvacanakartṛtvamapi mūko 'hamityanena nirākriyata iti kutastatrāpi svakriyāvirodhaḥ /

samaḥ samādhiḥ

atas katham virodhaḥ iti ced

atas ukta prakāreṇa mahāvākya avāntaravākyayoḥ anyathā anupapatti balāt bheda rahite pi brahmaṇi ayam anupapatti śānti hetuḥ viśeṣaḥ nāma śakti viśeṣaḥ ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ

original: yato bhedahīne 'pi vastunyasti kaścicchaktiviśeṣo yena prakāśamānamapi na prakāśata ityādi yujyate /
analyzed: yatas bheda hīne vastuni asti kaścid śakti viśeṣaḥ yena prakāśamānam api na prakāśate ityādi yujyate

original: sa ca viśeṣo 'nayaivārthāpattyāvagamyata ityeva tvayā vaktavyamiti / *3,85*
analyzed: sa ca viśeṣaḥ nayā eva arthāpattyā avagamyate iti eva tvayā vaktavyam iti
nanu aṅgīkṛte viśeṣe na anupapatti śāntiḥ

original: so 'pi hi viśeṣo yadi vastuno bhinnastarhi bhedānavasthādi doṣaḥ syādabhinnatve ca viśeṣatadvadbhāvānupapattestādavasthyādityata āha- viśeṣeti
analyzed: saḥ pi hi viśeṣaḥ yadi vastunaḥ bhinnaḥ tarhi bheda anavasthā ādi doṣaḥ syāt abhinna tve ca viśeṣa tadvat bhāva anupapatteḥ tādavasthyāt iti atas āha viśeṣa iti
viśeṣa tadvatoḥ ca eva sva nirvāhaka tā bhavet
viśeṣa viśeṣiṇoḥ ca abhedaḥ eva aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ
viśeṣa balāt ca viśeṣa tadvat bhāvaḥ pi upapādanīyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
tathā api viśeṣa parasparayā anavasthā syāt iti atas āha sva nirvāhaka tā iti

original: sa eva viśeṣo viśeṣāntaramantareṇa viśeṣatadvadbhāvaṃ ca ghaṭayati /
analyzed: saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ viśeṣa antaram antareṇa viśeṣa tadvat bhāvam ca ghaṭayati

original: ekasyaiva nirvāhyatvaṃ nirvāhakatvaṃ ca tadbalādeva siddhayatītyaṅgīkaraṇīyamiti / *3,86*
analyzed: ekasya eva nirvāhya tvam nirvāhaka tvam ca tad balāt eva siddhayati iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti

original: nanvabhinne vastuni bhedakāryanirvāhakatvaṃ viśeṣasya kutaḥ pramāṇāt(taḥ)

siddham iti atas āha bheda hīne tu iti
tuśabdaḥ va dhāraṇe

aparyāya śabda antara niyāmakaḥ iti aśeṣa bheda kāyaḥ nirvāhaka tva upalakṣaṇam
etat uktam bhavati
jīva brahma aikya ādīnām ekadhā eva ityādi śrutyā caitanya svarūpa mātra tvam pratīyate
caitanye sva prakāśa tayā siddhe pi asiddhiḥ aparyāya śabda vedya tvam
caitanya prakāśasya na avidyā nivartaka tvam advaita jñānasya tad nivartaka tvam iti arthakriya viśeṣaḥ
caitanyam ekam satya tva ādīni anekāni iti saṅkhaya availakṣaṇyam ityādi bheda kāryāṇi ca avagamyate

original: etadubhayānyathānupapattyā bhedarahite 'pi caitanye bhedrapratinidhistatkāyarkārī kaścidatiśayo 'stīti kalpyate /

gati antara abhāvāt
tathā ca arthāpattyā svarūpa grāhiṇyā bheda kārya nirvāhakaḥ eva ca

original: asau siddha iti kiṃ tatra pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇeneti /

anena eva viśeṣasya lakṣaṇam ca uktam bhavati

anya vādibhiḥ api viśeṣaḥ ṅgīkāryaḥ
evam advaita vādinā viśeṣam aṅgīkārayitvā anyān api aṅgīkārayati saḥ u sti iti
saḥ sti vastuṣu aśeṣatas
na kevalam brahmaṇi māyā vādinā viśeṣaḥ ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ
kim nāma prapañca satyatā vādibhiḥ api aśeṣa dravyeṣu sa viśeṣaḥ ṅgīkāryaḥ

original: tathā hi paṭastacchauklayaṃ ca tāvanna bhidyete /

original: nāpi kuṇḍamiva paṭo 'dhikaraṇatvena badarāṇīva śauklayamādheyatvena parisphurati /

original: 'pi paṭe 'sti kaścidatiśayo bhedapratinidhiryadvaśādidaṃ sarvaṃ samañjasaṃ syādityeva kalpanīyam /
analyzed: pi paṭe sti kaścid atiśayaḥ bheda pratinidhiḥ yad vaśāt idam sarvam samañjasam syāt iti eva kalpanīyam
na ca atiśayaḥ bhinne viśeṣaka tvāt viśeṣaḥ iti gīyate

original: nanu bhedābhedāṅgīkāreṇānupapatteḥ śamanāt kiṃ viśeṣeṇeti cenna /
analyzed: nanu bheda abheda aṅgīkāreṇa anupapatteḥ śamanāt kim viśeṣeṇa iti ced na

viśeṣasya api aṅgīkaraṇīya tvāt
pratīta tvāt kaḥ virodhaḥ iti ced
satyam
pratītiḥ api katham upapannā iti cintāyām vastu svabhāva atiśayasya anusaraṇīya tvāt

nanu sarva vastuṣu yadi asti viśeṣaḥ

original: prāptaṃ tarhi sakalavastūnāmaikyamityata āha- viśeṣā iti // *3,92*
analyzed: prāptam tarhi sakala vastūnām aikyam iti atas āha viśeṣāḥ iti
viśeṣāḥ te pi anantāḥ ca paraspara viśeṣiṇaḥ
sva nirvāhaka tā yuktāḥ santi vastuṣu aśeṣatas

original: te prakṛtasvarūpā viśeṣā aśeṣato vastuṣvananteṣu dravyeṣvanantā eva santi /
analyzed: te prakṛta svarūpāḥ viśeṣāḥ aśeṣatas vastuṣu ananteṣu dravyeṣu anantāḥ eva santi
na punar ekaḥ eva sarvatra atas na ukta doṣaḥ
saḥ asti iti ekavacanam tu samudāya apekṣayā prayuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanvekaikasmiṃśca dravye viśeṣo 'pyekaiko 'sti tadā paṭo mahāṃśchuklaścalatīti vicitrānekavyavahārānupapattiḥ /

na hi ekasmāt avicitra svabhāvāt vicitra aneka kārya utpattiḥ dṛṣṭā
tathā sati ākasmika tva prasaṅgāt

original: tataśca viśeṣāṅgīkāro vyarthaḥ syādityata āha- viśeṣā iti //
analyzed: tatas ca viśeṣa aṅgīkāraḥ vyarthaḥ syāt iti atas āha viśeṣāḥ iti

original: te 'pyuktalakṣaṇā viśeṣā aśeṣato 'pi vastuṣu pratyekamanantāḥ santyato noktadoṣāvakāśaḥ anantā ityupalakṣaṇam /

original: yatra yāvanto vyavahārāstatra tāvanto viśeṣā iti jñātavyam /
analyzed: yatra yāvantaḥ vyavahārāḥ tatra tāvantaḥ viśeṣāḥ iti jñātavyam
pratidravyam aneka tve viśeṣāṇām parasparam bhedena bhāvyam
bheda avinābhūta tvāt anekatvasya

original: tathāca bhinnanāṃ dravyābhede dravyasyāpi bhedaprasaṅga ityata āha- parampareti //
analyzed: tathā ca bhinnanām dravya abhede dravyasya api bheda prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha paramparā iti
paraspara viśeṣavat tvena eva aneka tvam sambhavati
viśeṣasya bheda kārya kāri tāyāḥ ukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
viśeṣāṇām api viśeṣa antara aṅgīkāre na avasthā iti atas āha sva nirvāhaka tā iti
pūrvam dravyeṇa viśeṣasya abheda cintā
idānīm tu parasparam iti sphuṭaḥ rtha bhedaḥ

original: sarvaṃ caitadviśeṣasvarūpasādhakārthāpattyaiva siddhamiti na pṛthak pramāṇamuktam /
analyzed: sarvam ca etat viśeṣa svarūpa sādhaka arthāpattyā eva siddham iti na pṛthak pramāṇam uktam
nahi svayam anupapannam anupapatti antara śāntyai prabhavati
kintu yathā yathā upapadyate tathā tathā eva svarūpa grāhiṇyā arthāpatyā eva kalpyate
yadi api viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pi bhavati
yena pratyakṣa siddhena
iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: tathāpi vipratipanno na tanmātreṇa bodhayituṃ śakyata ityarthāpattirupanyasteti / *3,94*
analyzed: tathā api vipratipannaḥ na tad mātreṇa bodhayitum śakyate iti arthāpattiḥ upanyastā iti
yad artham tad aikyasya ityādinā sarva vādibhiḥ viśeṣaḥ ṅgīkāritaḥ tat idānīm āha atas iti
atas nanta guṇam brahma nirbhedam api bhaṇyate
nirbhedam api brahma atas viśeṣa sāmarthyāt ananta guṇam bhaṇyate iti

original: yatpareṇa pṛṣṭaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇayorbheda ityādi tasyedamuttaram- brahma nirbhedamiti //
analyzed: yat pareṇa pṛṣṭam lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ bhedaḥ ityādi tasya idam uttaram brahma nirbhedam iti
yat atra uktam aneka lakṣara abhinnasya aneka tva prasaṅgaḥ
lakṣaṇānām vā aneka tva anupapattiḥ
śabda paryaya tvam
guṇa guṇi tva ādi anupapattiḥ iti
tasya uttaram nirbhedam api atas viśeṣa śat guṇānām ananta tvam
brahmaṇaḥ ca eka tvam
anantāḥ guṇāḥ asya iti guṇa guṇi ādi bhāvaḥ

original: brahma ca guṇāścetyapunaruktabhaṇanaṃ ca yujyata iti /
analyzed: brahma ca guṇāḥ ca iti apunarukta bhaṇanam ca yujyate iti
atra jagat janma ādi kāraṇatvam iti vaktavye nanta guṇam iti vacanam idam sūtram ananta guṇavat

original: tvameva brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamabhipretya tatsādhanāya jagajjanmādikāraṇatvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayituṃ pravṛttamiti sūcayitum /
analyzed: tvam eva brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam abhipretya tad sādhanāya jagat janma ādi kāraṇatva lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum pravṛttam iti sūcayitum

original: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvasya svalakṣaṇatve bādhakābhāvānna taṭasthatvakalpanaṃ yuktamiti siddham /
analyzed: tat evam jagat janma ādi kāraṇatvasya sva lakṣaṇa tve bādhaka abhāvāt na taṭastha tva kalpanam yuktam iti siddham
atra āha
kimartham lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ abhedam aṅgīkṛtya viśeṣa balena sarva vyavahāra samādhānam kriyate
bhedaḥ eva kasmāt na aṅgīkriyate
guṇa guṇi bhāvaḥ tu samavāya sambandhāt bhaviṣyati

original: yadi ca sūtrakāreṇa samavāyo nirākariṣyata iti nāṅgīkārārhastadā guṇaguṇinoreva sa kaścittādṛśaḥ svabhāvabheda ityaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
analyzed: yadi ca sūtrakāreṇa samavāyaḥ nirākariṣyate iti na aṅgīkāra arhaḥ tadā guṇa guṇinoḥ eva sa kaścid tādṛśaḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam

original: nahi paṭādau bhedābhāve 'pi viśeṣabalādvayavahāraviśeṣadarśanamātreṇa brahmaṇyapi tathā kalpayituṃ yuktam /

kintu upakrama ādayaḥ eva
teṣām avyabhicāri tvāt
pratīti vyākhyānayoḥ tu vyabhicāri tvāt

original: yatrāpi pratīvyākhyāne na vyabhicaratastatrāpyupakramādyanusandhānapūrvakatvenaiva na tu svataḥ /
analyzed: yatra api na vyabhicarataḥ tatra api upakrama ādi anusandhāna pūrvakatvena eva na tu svatas
atas upajīvya tvāt upakrama ādīnām eva tātparya liṅga tvam iti
tat idam āha te eva iti
sūtra vākyam yojayati taiḥ iti
taiḥ samyak pravicārite

original: mukhyārtho bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvaśāstrasya nāparaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.119b-d //
analyzed: mukhya arthaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarva śāstrasya na aparaḥ
anena anvayāt iti ekavacanam samudāya artham iti uktam bhavati
tena ca teṣām avirodham sūcayati
sam śabda arthaḥ samyak iti

original: tasya ca pravicārita ityadhyāhṛtakriyayā sambandho darśitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca pravicāritaḥ iti adhyāhṛta kriyayā sambandhaḥ darśitaḥ

original: nanu ca pratītivyākhyānavadupakramādīnāmapi kvacittātparyavyabhicāradarśanātkathaṃ liṅgatvamityāśaṅkānirāsāya samyak pravicārita ityuktam /
analyzed: nanu ca pratīti vyākhyāna vat upakrama ādīnām api kvacid tātparya vyabhicāra darśanāt katham liṅga tvam iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya samyak pravicāritaḥ iti uktam

original: upakramādīnāṃ śrutyādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāṃ sāvakāśatvādinā ca balābalaviniścayapuraḥsaraṃ virodhe balavatā durbalabādhayā vākyārthavimarśaḥ  #
analyzed: upakrama ādīnām śruti ādīnām ca sannikarṣa viprakarṣābhyām sāvakāśa tva ādinā ca bala abala viniścaya puraḥsaram virodhe balavatā durbala bādhayā vākya artha vimarśaḥ
samyak pravicāraṇam
tena na upakrama ādi mātram liṅgam ucyate
yena vyabhicāra udbhāvanam saṅgaccheta
kintu samyak pravicāra lakṣaṇa avāntara vyapāra upetāḥ eva upakrama ādayaḥ
na ca te kvacid vayabhicaranti iti uktam bhavati
pravicāritaḥ iti bhāve ktaḥ
pravicāre kṛte sati iti
śāstre pravicārite sati iti vā
etat avagamyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ
mukhya arthaḥ iti āvṛttyā saṃśabdasya artha antaram
sarvā iti api sam śabda arthaḥ eva
śāstrasya arthaḥ iti śāstra yoni iti pūvarsūtrāt anuvṛttasya vyākhyānam
bhagavān viṣṇuḥ iti tad śabda arthaḥ
tuśabdaḥ va dhāraṇe
tad vayākhyānam na aparaḥ iti
tathā ca evam sūtra yojanā

original: anvayādupakramādiliṅgasamudāyāt śāstre samyak pravicārite sati sarvaśāstrasya bhagavatyeva
analyzed: anvayāt upakrama ādi liṅga samudāyāt śāstre samyak pravicārite sati sarva śāstrasya bhagavati eva
samyak vacana vṛttyā anvayāt śakti tātparya lakṣaṇa sambandha avagamāt tat viṣṇu ākhyam brahmā eva

original: jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena śāstrayoni na tu harahiraṇyagarbhādaya iti /
analyzed: jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvena śāstra yoni na tu hara hiraṇyagarbha ādayaḥ iti
ananta guṇa paripūrṇa tvam hi pradhāna lakṣaṇam

original: tatra ca śāstraṃ pramāṇīkriyamāṇaṃ vacanavṛttyā sarvameva ca yuktam /
analyzed: tatra ca śāstram pramāṇīkriyamāṇam vacana vṛttyā sarvam eva ca yuktam
lakṣaṇa ādinā vṛttau vācya artha guṇa alābhāt
vācye tad guṇa prasaṅgāt ca
evam katipaya vākyaiḥ ananta guṇa a pratipādanāt
vākya antara viṣayasya ca
t tva prasaṅgāt ca
atas saṃśabdasya āvṛttiḥ upapannā

original: nanu janmādyasya yata iti yacchabdaśravaṇāttadbrahmeti prakṛtam /
analyzed: nanu janma ādyasya yatas iti yad śabda śravaṇāt tat brahma iti prakṛtam
tat eva atra maṇḍūka plutyā anuvartiṣyate
kim punar atra tad grahaṇena
mā evam
tuśabdaḥ tāvat atra itara vyāvṛtti artham upādeyaḥ

original: naca tasya tadityanuktau anvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca tasya tat iti anuktau anvayaḥ pratyetum śakyate
yatas tatas nyatra niṣedhaḥ iti vacanāt
na ca anuvṛttena anvaya pratītiḥ bhaviṣyati iti vācyam
śrutena anvayāt iti anena eva sambandha pratīti prasaṅgāt
tatra upayoga abhāvāt na iti ced na
anvaya padāt eva tad siddhiḥ iti ced na
tasya upakrama ādīnām liṅga tva pratipādane eva caritārtha tva sambhavāt
atas sārthakam sūtre tad grahaṇam

original: saṃśabdena sakalapadānāṃ lakṣaṇayā brahmaprātipadikārthamātraparatvamucyata iti vyākhyānamakhaṇḍārthanirāsena nirastam /
analyzed: sam śabdena sakala padānām lakṣaṇayā brahma prātipadika artha mātra paratvam ucyate iti vyākhyānam akhaṇḍa artha nirāsena nirastam
nirākariṣyate ca uttaratra iti na iha nirākṛtam

original: tadevaṃ jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena mukhyayā vṛttyā varṇapadavākyātmakāśeṣaśāstrapratipādyaṃ nārāyaṇākhyaṃ brahmaiveti susthaṃ lakṣaṇamiti siddham
analyzed: tat evam jagat janma ādi kāraṇatvena mukhyayā vṛttyā varṇa pada vākya ātmaka aśeṣa śāstra pratipādyam nārāyaṇa ākhyam brahma eva iti sustham lakṣaṇam iti siddham
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām samanvaya adhikaraṇam
īkṣati adhikaraṇam
atha īkṣati adhikaraṇam
om īkṣateḥ na aśabdam om
īkṣateḥ na a śabdam
vacana vṛttyā eva sakala śāstra pratipādyam brahma iti uktam tat ākṣipya samādhātum idam adhikaraṇam ārabhyate
tathā hi
yatas vācaḥ nivartante aśabdam asparśam
ityādi śruteḥ
śabdaḥ na yatra puru kārakavān
ityādi smṛteḥ ca brahma avācyam avasīyate
vacana vṛttiḥ ca dravya guṇa kriyā jāti nimittā
na ca brahmaṇaḥ dravya ādi yogaḥ sti
kevalaḥ nirguṇaḥ ca niṣkalam niṣkriyam śāntam
ityādi āgamāt
tat katham tasya vācya tā sambhavati
aupaniṣada tvam tu
ca lakṣaṇayā vṛttyā sambhavan na vācya tām apekṣate
atas vācya tvāt brahmaṇaḥ na vacana vṛttyā śāstra gamya tvam iti

original: apara āha na sarvaśāstrapratipādyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati niścayopāyābhāvāt /
analyzed: aparaḥ āha na sarva śāstra pratipādya tvam brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati niścaya upāya abhāvāt
upakrama ādayaḥ hi tad niścaya upāyāḥ
taiḥ ca asmad ādi adhigata śāstrasya kathañcid brahma viṣaya tā avadhāraṇe pi asmad anadhigata śāstrasya tad para tā avadhāraṇa ayogāt
anantāḥ vai vedāḥ
iti śruteḥ anantam hi śāstram avagamyate
na ca ananta śāstra adhigamaḥ smākam kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api sambhavati
viphalaḥ ca śāstra eka deśasya brahma para tva adhyavasāyaḥ
eka deśa antare tad viparīta pratipādanasya api śaṅkanāt

original: naca vastuni vikalpaḥ sambhavati iti atrāpi sandehaḥ samāskandati,
analyzed: na ca vastuni vikalpaḥ sambhavati iti atra api sandehaḥ samāskandati

original: ityato na sarvaśāstraprāmāṇyājjagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ samastaguṇaparipūrṇaṃ brahma siddhayati /
analyzed: iti atas na sarva śāstra prāmāṇyāt jagat janma ādikāraṇam samasta guṇa paripūrṇam brahma siddhayati

original: ityevaṃ prāpte avācyatvaśaṅkāṃ tāvannirācaṣṭe sūtrakāraḥ- īkṣaternāśabdamiti //
analyzed: iti evam prāpte avācya tva śaṅkām tāvat nirācaṣṭe sūtrakāraḥ īkṣateḥ na aśabdam iti
īkṣateḥ na a śabdam om
tat vayācaṣṭe īkṣaṇīya tvataḥ iti
atra īkṣateḥ iti dhātu nirdeśaḥ

original: na cāvivakṣitārthaṃ śabdamātraṃ brahmaṇo vācyatve heturbhavitumarhatīti tadartho 'nenopalakṣyate /
analyzed: na ca avivakṣita artham śabdamātram brahmaṇaḥ vācya tve hetuḥ bhavitum arhati iti tad arthaḥ nena upalakṣyate
naca brahma asambandhi īkṣaṇam api atra hetuḥ bhavati atiprasaṅgāt

original: sambandhaśca na kartṛtvādirūpaḥ śrutyananugamāt vipakṣe bādhakābhā(vācca)
analyzed: sambandhaḥ ca na kartṛ tva ādi rūpaḥ śruti ananugamāt vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt ca
va prasaṅgāt ca
atas īkṣaṇam brahma karmakam eva hetu tvena vācyam
na ca etat api yuktam vyadhikaraṇa tva prasaṅgāt

original: tasmādīkṣaṇakarmatvameva hetutayā vivakṣitam ityāśayenoktam- īkṣaṇīyatvata iti //
analyzed: tasmāt īkṣaṇa karma tvam eva hetutayā vivakṣitam iti āśayena uktam īkṣaṇīya tvataḥ iti
īkṣaṇīya tvataḥ viṣṇuḥ vācyaḥ eva
tat iti anuvartate
tena viṣṇuḥ iti āha

original: na vidyate vācakaḥ śabdo yasya tadaśabdam /
analyzed: na vidyate vācakaḥ śabdaḥ yasya tat aśabdam
avācyam iti arthaḥ

original: vācyamiti vaktavye nāvācyamiti vacanaṃ“dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayataḥ';
analyzed: vācyam iti vaktavye na avācyam iti vacanam dvau nañau prakṛtam artham sa atiśayam gamayataḥ
iti vacanāt avadhāraṇa artham iti abhipretya uktam vācyaḥ eva iti
nanu avadhāraṇam api kimartham
ucyate
tattva nirṇaya artham hi nyāya sūtram
nirṇayaḥ ca sva para pakṣa sādhana upalambhābhyām eva bhavati
na anyatara mātreṇa
yathā uktam
vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti
tat atra avadhāraṇe kṛte vācya tva vidhiḥ avācya tva niṣedhaḥ ca iti ubhayam api śruti arthābhyām pratijñātam syāt
ubhaya sādhana arthaḥ ca īkṣaṇīya tva hetuḥ vijñāyate
tathā ca nirṇayaḥ bhavet

original: vācyamiti tu pratijñāte parapakṣapratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ syāt /
analyzed: vācyam iti tu pratijñāte parapakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ na kṛtaḥ syāt
na ca tad artham anyat sūtram asti
atas yuktaḥ yam nirdeśaḥ
evam anyatra api veditavyam
idam uktam bhavati
brahma vācyam bhavitum arhati
na punar avācyam īkṣaṇa karma tvāt ghaṭa vat

original: īkṣaṇīyatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ“sa etasmājjīvadhanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣate'“ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet';
analyzed: īkṣaṇīya tvam ca brahmaṇaḥ saḥ etasmāt jīva dhanāt parātparam puriśayam puruṣam īkṣate ātmani eva ātmānam paśyet
ityādi śruti siddham iti
nanu brahmaṇaḥ vācya tva abhāve kim bādhakam
īkṣaṇīya tvam na syāt
tathā ca brahma jñāna abhāvena śāstra vaiyarthyam anirmokṣaḥ ca syāt iti ced na
vācya tvasya avyāpaka tvāt īkṣaṇīya tvasya avyāpya tvāt ca
na hi avyāpaka nivṛttiḥ avyāpya nivṛttim āpādayati
yitum śaknoti
īkṣaṇīya tvam hi pratyakṣa anumāna āgama tad ābhāsa nimittam vyāpakam yuktam
vācya tvam ca śabda vṛtti viśeṣa upādhikam vyāpyam eva iti
mā evam
na tāvat idam mokṣa artham upadiṣyam brahma īkṣaṇam pramāṇa ābhāsa janyam
bhrānteḥ avidyā nivartaka tva abhāvāt
na api pratyakṣa anumāna jam
śāstra eka samadhigamya tāyāḥ sādhita tvāt

original: tathāca prakārāntarābhāve sati yadi brahma vācyamapi na bhavettadekṣaṇīyamapi na bhavediti bādhakaṃ sambhavatyeva /
analyzed: tathā ca prakāra antara abhāve sati yadi brahma vācyam api na bhavet tadā īkṣaṇīyam api na bhavet iti bādhakam sambhavati eva
na ca vyāpti abhā sambhavaḥ
vyatireka sambhavāt

original: yat yatkārakāviṣayaḥ tat tatkriyāviṣayaḥ yathā kuṭhārādyaviṣayo gaganaṃ na chidāviṣaya iti sāmānyavyāptisambhavācca / *3,165*
analyzed: yat yad kāraka aviṣayaḥ tat tad kriyā viṣayaḥ yathā kuṭhāra ādi aviṣayaḥ gaganam na chidā viṣayaḥ iti sāmānya vyāpti sambhavāt ca
nanu mā abhūt pramāṇa ābhāsaiḥ pratyakṣa anumānābhyām ca aikṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ
mā ca bhūt vācyam
tathā api śabda lakṣya tayā īkṣaṇīyam ca bhaviṣyati
tathā ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojakaḥ hetuḥ
iti atas āha na ca iti
na ca anyathā
lakṣya tvam kvāpi dṛṣṭam hi

original: hi yasmādanyathā vācyatvābhāve lakṣyatvaṃ kvāpi na dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: hi yasmāt anyathā vācya tva abhāve lakṣya tvam kvāpi na dṛṣṭam
tasmāt avācya tve brahmaṇaḥ lakṣya tva ayogā
bhāvāt lakṣaṇayā api na īkṣaṇīya tvam iti śeṣaḥ

original: kenacicchabdena vācyameva hi tīrādikaṃ kenacillakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti / *3,167*
analyzed: kenacid śabdena vācyam eva hi tīra ādikam kenacid lakṣyam dṛṣṭam iti
avācyasya api lakṣya tve anavasthitiḥ
nanu avācyam api lakṣyam kim na syāt
tatas ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojakaḥ yam prasaṅga hetuḥ
iti atas āha kim tat iti
kim tat iti anavasthitiḥ
anyathā iti anuvartate
yadi avācyam api brahma lakṣyam iti aṅgīkriyate
tadā kim tat iti jijñāsā pravṛttau anavasthitiḥ syāt
idam uktam bhavati

original: lākṣaṇiko hi śabdo na śrutamātro 'rthāntare dhiyamupajanayati tatrāgṛhītaśaktitvāt /
analyzed: lākṣaṇikaḥ hi śabdaḥ na śruta mātraḥ rtha antare dhiyam upajanayati tatra agṛhīta śakti tvāt
kintu vācya artha arthe
buddhim utpādya tad anupapatti darśane sati
na tāvatā api

original: kiṃ nāmārthāntarasya svarūpato vācyārthasambandhitayā cāvagatau satyām /
analyzed: kim nāma artha antarasya svarūpataḥ vācya artha sambandhi tayā ca avagatau satyām

original: gaṅgādiśabdena hi svarūpato gaṅgādisambandhitayā cāvagatameva tīrādikaṃ lakṣyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: gaṅgā ādi śabdena hi svarūpataḥ gaṅgā ādi sambandhi tayā ca avagatam eva tīra ādikam lakṣyam dṛṣṭam
na anavagata svarūpam kūrma roma ādi
na api anya sambandhi tayā avagatam tīra ādi
tathā ca vaidika śabda lakṣya tve brahmaṇaḥ pratītiḥ aṅgīkāryā
na ca tīra ādi vat pratyakṣa ādinā tasya pratītiḥ sambhavati

original: tato lākṣaṇikaśabde prayukte vācyārthe 'nupapattiṃ paśyato lakṣaṇīye 'rthe kiṃ tadyadanena lakṣyamiti jijñāsāyāṃ śabda eva prayoktavyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas lākṣaṇika śabde prayukte vācyārthe paśyataḥ lakṣaṇīye rthe kim tat yat anena lakṣyam iti jijñāsāyām śabdaḥ eva prayoktavyaḥ

original: tenāpi cenna vācyaṃ kintu lakṣyameva tarhi punaḥ kiṃ taditi jijñāsāyā anivṛttatvācchabdāntarameva vācyam /
analyzed: tena api ced na vācyam kintu lakṣyam eva tarhi punar kim tat iti jijñāsāyāḥ anivṛtta tvāt śabda antaram eva vācyam
tena api ced lakṣyam eva punar jijñāsā eva iti aparyavasānam syāt
pūrva pūrva lakṣaṇa asiddhau uttara uttara lakṣaṇa asiddheḥ mūla kṣatiḥ

original: yadi ca kenacicchabdena vācyaṃ syāttadā taduktāvuparatajijñāso lākṣaṇikakāryaṃ pratīyāt /
analyzed: yadi ca kenacid śabdena vācyam syāt tadā tad uktau uparata jijñāsaḥ lākṣaṇika kāryam pratīyāt

abhimāni adhikaraṇe vaktavya tvāt

original: tasmādvipakṣe 'navasthālakṣaṇabādhakasadbhāvādavācyatve lakṣyatvaṃ na syāditi yukto 'tiprasaṅga iti /

buddhim utpādya tad anupapatti darśane sati

original: tatteja aikṣata tā āpa aikṣanteti gauṇaprāyapaṭhitatvāt /
analyzed: tat tejaḥ aikṣata tāḥ āpaḥ aikṣanta iti gauṇa prāya paṭhita tvāt
yathā hi āsanna patanam kūlam ālakṣya kūlam pipatiṣati iti upacāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: tathā'sannasarge pradhāne 'pyaikṣatetyupacāro bhaviṣyatītyataḥ parihāraṃ paṭhati- gauṇaścennātmaśabdāt //
analyzed: tathā āsanna sarge pradhāne pyaikṣata iti upacāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas parihāram paṭhati gauṇaḥ ced na ātma śabdāt
ap tejasoḥ iva acetane pi pradhāne gauṇī iyam īkṣatiḥ iti asat
kutas
ātma śabdāt
anena jīvena ātmanā iti
nahi jīvaḥ cetanaḥ cetanasya pradhānasya ātmā sambhavati
saḥ ātmā tat tvam asi iti ca
nahi cetanasya śvetaketoḥ acetana aikya bodhanam upapannam
atha ucyeta
acetane pi pradhāne bhavati ātma śabdaḥ
ātmanaḥ sarva artha kāri tvāt

original: yathā rājñaḥ sarvārthakāriṇi bhṛtye mamātmā bhadrasena ityātmaśabdadarśanāditi /
analyzed: yathā rājñaḥ sarva artha kāriṇi bhṛtye mama ātmā bhadrasenaḥ iti ātma śabda darśanāt iti
tatra uttaram tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt
na evam ātma śabda ālambanam pradhānam kalpyam

original: sa ātmātattvamasīti śvetaketostanniṣṭhāmupadiśya tasya tāvadeva ciramiti mokṣopadeśāt /
analyzed: saḥ ātmā a tattvam asi iti śvetaketoḥ tad niṣṭhām upadiśya tasya tāvat eva ciram iti mokṣa upadeśāt
na hi acetana niṣṭhasya mokṣaḥ yuktaḥ
syāt etat
brahma eva jñīpsitam

original: tacca na prathamaṃ sūkṣmatayā śakyaṃ śvetaketuṃ grāhayitumiti tatsambaddhaṃ pradhānameva sthūlatayā'tmatvena grāhyate /
analyzed: tat ca na prathamam sūkṣma tayā śakyam śvetaketum grāhayitum iti tat sambaddham pradhānam eva sthūla tayā ātma tvena grāhyate
arundhatīm iva ati sūkṣmām darśayitum tad sannihitām sthūla tārakām darśayanti iyam arundhatī iti
asyām śaṅkāyām uttaram heya tva avacanāt ca
evam sati sthūla tārā vat na ayam ātmā iti heya tvam brūyāt
na ca evam abravīt
atas nā eṣā kalpanā yuktā
caśabdaḥ eka vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñā virodham samuccinoti
sva apyayāt
sat śabda vācya prastutya svam hi api itas bhavati iti ucyate

original: nahyacetane cetanasyāpyayaḥ suptau laye ca sambhavati /
analyzed: na hi acetane cetanasya apyayaḥ suptau laye ca sambhavati
atas ca na pradhānam sat śabda vācyam
gati sāmānyāt

original: yadi ca kvacidapyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamucyeta vedānteṣu /
analyzed: yadi ca kvacid api acetanam pradhānam jagataḥ kāraṇam ucyeta vedānteṣu
tathā sati kathañcid īkṣaṇa ādikam kalpyeta
na ca evam

original: ato vedāntotpādyāyā gateravagateraikarūpyācca na pradhānaṃ jagatkāraṇamiti //
analyzed: atas vedānta utpādyāyāḥ gateḥ avagateḥ aikarūpyāt ca na pradhānam jagat kāraṇam iti
śruta tvāt ca

original: sa kāraṇaṃ kāraṇādhipādhipa iti sākṣātsarvajñasyeśvarasya jagatkāraṇatvaṃ śrūyate /
analyzed: sa kāraṇam kāraṇa adhipa adhipaḥ iti sākṣāt sarvajñasya īśvarasya jagat kāraṇa tvam śrūyate
atas ca na pradhānam jagat kāraṇam vedānta vedyam
jñāna kriyā śaktī tu apariṇāminā u pi īśvarasya savituḥ iva yujyete
iti evam sāṅkhaya nirākaraṇāya etāni sūtrāṇi bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ cakāra
iti yat māyā vādinaḥ vadanti tat na iti arthaḥ
kutas na iti ced na

original: aśabdaṃ hi taditi hetūkṛtamaśabdatvaṃ nāma śabdagocaratvaṃ vā śabdāvācyatvaṃ vā avaidikatvaṃ vā kāraṇatayāvaidikatvaṃ vā /

asau sāṅkhayaḥ

kiñca ādya pakṣe pradhānasya asattvam abhipretam uta pramāṇa antara vedya tvam
ādye tad upapādanāya īkṣateḥ upanyāsaḥ nupapannaḥ
atas eva na uttaraḥ
dvitīyaḥ brahmaṇi anaikāntikaḥ
tṛtīya caturthayoḥ sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvam

original: kiṃcekṣaṇenaiva neti pratijñātārthasiddhāvaśabdaṃ hi taditi madhye hetvantarakalpanaṃ vyartham /
analyzed: kiṃca īkṣaṇena eva na iti pratijñāta artha siddhau aśabdam hi tat iti madhye hetu antara kalpanam vyartham
īkṣitṛ tvam ca īkṣaṇa guṇa yogi tvam
tat brahmaṇi api gauṇam eva nirguṇa tva vādinā aṅgīkaraṇīyam
tathāca gauṇaḥ ced iti vyartham
kiṃca īkṣateḥ gauṇa tva kalpanasya bādhaka abhāvām anukta vātma śabdāt iti asaṅgatam
pareṇa prāya pāṭha virodhāt
tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt iti atra kim pradhāna aikya upadeśa anupapattiḥ vā vivakṣitā
tad jñasya mokṣa anupapattiḥ vā
ādye brahmapakṣe samānaḥ doṣaḥ
nahi jīvasya api brahma aikya upadeśaḥ yuktaḥ iti uktam adhastāt
dvitīyaḥ tu anupapannaḥ eva
ātma anātma viveka artham anātma jñānasya āvaśyaka tvāt

original: ātmaśabdasya gauṇatve codite bādhakābhāva eva vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: ātma śabdasya gauṇa tve ca udite bādhaka abhāvaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ
heya tva avacanāt iti asya paricodanā eva anupapannā
nahi sāṅkhayaḥ dvaita jñāna artham pradhāna upadeśam manyate
heya tva avacanam ca anaikāntikam
anna maya prāṇa maya ādīnām a brahmatve pi heya tva a vacanāt ca
uttara uttara brahmatva vacanam tatra jñāpakam iti ced na
atra api tathāvidha jñāpaka saulabhyāt
pratijñā virodhaḥ tu brahma vāde eva na pradhāna vāde
pradhānasya sarva ātmaka tva abhyupagamāt
bhoktṛ vargasya na pradhāna ātmaka tvam asti iti ced
satyam
brahmaṇaḥ tu na kiñcid
etena sva apyayaḥ pi nirastaḥ
ekībhāvasya brahma pakṣe pi abhāvāt
pariṣvaṅga mātrasya pradhāne pi sambhavāt
brahma viṣayam gati sāmānyam parasya asiddham eva
īkṣaṇa ādinā tad jñāpane prathama sūtreṇa gatārtha tā
atas eva śruta tvāt iti a siddham
gata artham ca gati sāmānyena iti eṣā diś
vācyatva samarthanam eva prathama pratimā ādyam na sāṅkhya nirākaraṇam
astu vā yathā kathañcid sūtra gamanikā

original: tathāpi prakṛtasaṅgatiparyālocanayātra vācyatvasamarthanamevopapannaṃ na sāṅkhayanirākaraṇamityāha- samanvaya iti //
analyzed: tathā api prakṛta saṅgati paryālocanayā atra vācyatva samarthanam eva upapannam na sāṅkhaya nirākaraṇam iti āha samanvayaḥ iti
samanvaye pratijñāte śabda gocara tā eva hi
prathama pratipādyā syāt

original: tattu samanvayāditi samastasyāpi śāstrasya brahmaṇi samanvaye pratijñāte sati yadyapi mukhyayā vṛttyā śabdagocaratā sāṅkhayanirākaraṇaṃ cetyubhayamapi  #
analyzed: tat tu samanvayāt iti samastasya api śāstrasya brahmaṇi samanvaye pratijñāte sati yadi api mukhyayā vṛttyā śabda gocara tā sāṅkhaya nirākaraṇam ca iti ubhayam api
pratipādyam bhavati

original: ubhayābhāve 'pi samanvayānupapatteḥ tathāpi śabdagocarataiva prathamapratipādyā syāt hi yasmāttasmātsaivātra pratipādyate na sāṅkhayanirākaraṇam
analyzed: ubhaya abhāve pi samanvaya anupapatteḥ tathā api śabda gocara tā eva prathama pratipādyā syāt hi yasmāt tasmāt sā eva atra pratipādyate na sāṅkhaya nirākaraṇam
tat punar īkṣati karma vyapadeśāt saḥ ityādau kariṣyate iti
kutas śabda vācya tāyāḥ prathama pratipādya tvam iti atas āha tad abhāve iti
tad abhāve kutas nvayaḥ
avācya tve hi brahmaṇi śabda sambandhaḥ eva anupapannaḥ
jagat kāraṇa tva ādi vākya vicāraḥ tu dūre
sāṅkhaya nirākaraṇa abhāve tu sṛṣṭayādi vākyānām eva samanvaya anupapattiḥ

original: ataḥ prathamaṃ vācyatvasamarthanena samanvayasambhāvanāyāṃ satyāṃ vākyaviśeṣaniṣṭhasya vicārasya paścādavasara iti / *3,227*

samanvaya kathanāt na lakṣaṇa abhipretā sūtra kārasya

original: nanu vācyatvābhāve 'pi lakṣaṇayā vṛttyā samanvayo bhaviṣyatītyavācyatvākṣepaṃ nirdalatayopekṣya
analyzed: nanu vācya tva abhāve pi lakṣaṇayā vṛttyā samanvayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti avācya tva ākṣepam nirdala tayā upekṣya

original: sūtrakāreṇādau sāṅkhayamataṃ nirākṛtamityaṅgīkāre kathamasaṅgatirityata āha- kathaṃ ceti //
analyzed: sūtrakāreṇa ādau sāṅkhaya matam nirākṛtam iti aṅgīkāre katham asaṅgatiḥ iti atas āha katham ca iti

janma ādi kāraṇe samanvayasya ukta tvāt na nirguṇe samanvaya prasaṅgaḥ

katham

original: lakṣaṇasūtre janmādikāraṇatvena lakṣite hi brahmaṇi śāstraṃ pramāṇamabhidhāya tasya samanvayamāha sūtrakāraḥ /

na ca tat nirguṇam janma ādi kāraṇa tva guṇa yogāt

original: nanu janmādikāraṇatvaṃ taṭasthameva satbrahma lakṣayatīti brūmaḥ /

mā bhūt lakṣaṇa sūtre nirguṇasya prakṛta tvam

yatas tat eva

original: tasyānukrāntāyāṃ trisūtṛyāṃ prakṛtasya mukhyārthasya vācyasya samanvayaviṣayatayā tyāge 'sambhavaḥ katham,
analyzed: tasya anukrāntāyām trisūtṛyām prakṛtasya mukhya arthasya vācyasya samanvaya viṣaya tayā tyāge sambhavaḥ katham

ajñeya tvāt nirguṇam na prameyam

original: tadā tatra lakṣaṇāpi na sambhavatīti vyarthaṃ samanvayasūtramāpannamiti vaktuṃ nirguṇasyāprameyatvaṃ tāvatsādhayati- māneneti // *3,232*

na kena api

ajñeya tvāt
jñeyam eva hi prameyam dṛṣṭam ghaṭa ādi
vācyasya eva tad viṣaya tva darśanāt
jñeya tva aṅgīkāre ca nirguṇa tva vyāghātāt
nirguṇasya ameya tve lakṣaṇayā api vṛttiḥ na saṃbhavati

tatas kim iti atas āha ameyam ced iti

original: ameyaṃ cenna śāstrasya tatra vṛttiḥ kathañcana // MAnuv_1,1.143ab //

original: tarhyameyatvāttatra śāstrasya kathañcanalakṣaṇayāpi vṛttirna sambhavatīti samanvayasūtraṃ vyatharmeva prāptam /

original: nahi tīraṃ svarūpato gaṅgāsambandhitvena ca pramāṇato 'pratipannaṃ gaṅgāśabdena jñāpyate /

lākṣaṇikaḥ pi hi śabdaḥ lakṣya pramā utpādāya prayujyate
