tathā ca aprameye hetu phalayoḥ asambhavāt katham lakṣaṇa asambhavaḥ
nanu prasiddhiḥ eva lakṣaṇā hetuḥ na pramāṇa prasiddhiḥ viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt

original: tathāca svataḥ siddhe kathaṃ lakṣaṇā na sambhavatīti /
analyzed: tathā ca svatas siddhe katham lakṣaṇā na sambhavati iti

original: evaṃ tarhi sutarāṃ lakṣaṇā nopapadyata iti vakṣyati /
analyzed: evam tarhi sutarām lakṣaṇā na upapadyate iti vakṣyati
nanu lākṣaṇikāḥ śabdāḥ lakṣya pramām an utpādayantaḥ pi viparīta ākāra vyāvartanena eva
prayojanavantaḥ bhaviṣyanti iti na
nirākṛta tvāt iti
jñāna ānanda ādi ananta guṇa arṇava tvena saguṇam para brahma eva jijñāsyam
nirguṇe samanvayam nirākṛtya vyatireka mukhena upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
tasmāt śāstreṇa jijñāsyam asmadīyam guṇa arṇavam
vijñeya vācya lakṣya tva pūrva aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ
yatas nirguṇe samanvayaḥ na upapannaḥ

original: tasmādasmadīyaṃ saguṇameva paraṃ brahma śāstreṇa jijñāsyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
analyzed: tasmāt asmadīyam sa guṇam eva param brahma śāstreṇa jijñāsyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam
nanu pūrvam viṣṇoḥ jijñāsya tvam uktam

original: idānīṃ tu saguṇasya brahmaṇa iti virodha ityata uktam- vāsudevākhyamiti //
analyzed: idānīm tu saguṇasya brahmaṇaḥ iti virodhaḥ iti atas uktam vāsudeva ākhyam iti
tathā api prāk saguṇasya heya tva ādikam abhihitam

original: idānīṃ tu jijñāsyatvamiti kuto na virodha ityata uktam- guṇārṇavamiti //
analyzed: idānīm tu jijñāsya tvam iti kutas na virodhaḥ iti atas uktam guṇa arṇavam iti
pūrvam anirvacanīya avidyā avacchinnasya sa guṇasya aprāmāṇika tvam prākṛta sattva ādi guṇa baddhasya heya tva ādikam ca abhihitam

original: idānīṃ tu jñānānandādyanantaguṇārṇavatvena saguṇaṃ parabrahmopādeyamucyata iti ko virodhaḥ /
analyzed: idānīm tu jñāna ānanda ādi ananta guṇa arṇava tvena saguṇam para brahma upādeyam ucyate iti kaḥ virodhaḥ

original: arṇava ivācaratīti kvipi kṛte 'ṇarvateḥ pacādyaci kṛte 'rṇavaśabdaḥ triliṅgaḥ sādhuḥ /

atas katham guṇa arṇava tvam iti atas uktam advandvam akhila uttamam iti
a dvandvam asamam

analyzed: tat yāvat udāharaṇa tvena vākya viśeṣān upādāya vimarśa pūrvakam pūrva uttara pakṣa upālambha sādhanābhyām na prapañcyate tāvat anukta prāyam arka ākāri tvāt

original: anyathā paro 'pi hyanyadeva samanvayādityuktavā kṛtī syāt /
analyzed: anyathā paraḥ pi hi anyat eva samanvayāt iti uktavā kṛtī syāt

original: yadi hi pratyayamanutpādyaiko 'yaṃ bhūmadhyapradeśa iti brūyāt /
analyzed: yadi hi pratyayam an utpādya ekaḥ yam bhū madhya pradeśaḥ iti brūyāt
tadā kim na brūyāt parastāt vitasteḥ iti
tasmāt āvaśyakam samanvaya prapañcanam
tat anena samanvaya sūtreṇa adhyāya śeṣasya prapañcya prapañcaka bhāvena saṅgatiḥ darśitā
evam tarhi tat ānantaryam eva syāt kutas vyavadhānam iti atas uktam evam iti

original: evamīkṣatyadhikaraṇavyutpāditanyāyena brahmaṇaḥ śāstrāvagamyatve mukhyayā vṛttyā sakalaśāstrapratipādyatve sambhāvite satīti /

etat uktam bhavati

sati hi
sya avasaraḥ
śabda leśa sañcāra asambhave vākya tātparya vicārasya anavakāśa tvāt

original: nahi toyābhyavahārāsamarthasya mumūrṣoḥ śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ sacetanaḥ sambhāvayatīti /

original: ityevaṃ sahasraśo 'vidyāvidyāviṣayabhedena brahmaṇo dvirūpatāṃ darśayanti vedāntavākyāni /
analyzed: iti evam sahasraśas vidyā avidyā viṣaya bhedena brahmaṇaḥ dvi rūpa tām darśayanti vedānta vākyāni

tatra kānicid brahmaṇaḥ upāsanāni abhyudaya arthāni
kānicid krama muktaya rthāni kānicid karma samṛddhaya rthāni

original: evamapekṣitopādhibhedaṃ brahmopāsyatvena nirastasamastopādhi tu jñeyatvenopadiśyata ityasyārthasya pradarśanāyettaragrantha ārabhyata iti /
analyzed: evam apekṣita upādhi bhedam brahma upāsya tvena nirasta samasta upādhi tu jñeya tvena upadiśyate iti asya arthasya pradarśanāya ittara granthaḥ ārabhyate iti
tat idam anupapannam
brahmaṇaḥ dvairūpyasya a prāmāṇika tvāt

original: sarvāṇyapi hi vedavākyānyasaṅkhayeyakalyāṇaguṇākaraṃ sakaladoṣagandhavidhuramekarūpameva brahma nārāyaṇākhyaṃ pratipādayanti /

kintu kānicid sarvajña tva sarva īśvara tva sarva antaryāmi tva saundarya audārya vīrya ādi guṇa viśiṣṭa tayā
kānicid apahata pāpma tva nirduḥkha tva prākṛta bhautika vigraha rahita tva ādi doṣa abhāva viśiṣṭa tayā
kānicid adigahana tā jñāpanāya vāc manasā agocara tva ādi ākāreṇa
kānicid sarva parihāreṇa tasya eva upādānāya advitīya tvena
kānicid sarva sattā pratīti pravṛtti nimitta tā pratipatti artham sarva ātmaka tvena iti evamādi aneka prakāraiḥ paramapuruṣam bodhayanti

original: tato vyākulabuddhayo gurusampradāyavikalā aśrutavedavyākhyātāraḥ sarvatrāpyekarūpatāmananusandadhānā vedaṃ chindanti /

original: mukhyārthabādhe tadyoge prayojane ca sati lakṣaṇā dṛṣṭā /

original: nanu sūtre yathāśrutameva ced gṛhyate tadā kīdṛśo doṣo yena lakṣaṇā vyākhyātavyetyata āha- sarveti //

original: nanu yathā yathāśrutagrahaṇe bādhakamasti sūtrāṇāṃ viśvatomukhatvāsambhavaḥ tathopalakṣaṇā'śrayaṇe 'pi bādhakasadbhāvaḥ samānaḥ /

ānanda maya śabdena anna maya ādīnām iva sarva śabdānām upalakṣayitum śakya tvena uttara adhikaraṇa ārambha anupapatteḥ iti ced
kim samāna nyāya śabda antara viṣaya adhikaraṇa anārambha prasaṅgaḥ bādhakaḥ

analyzed: upalakṣaṇa pakṣe sa na syāt iti āpādyate iti atas āha punar ca iti

tatra pūrva adhikaraṇa vyutpādi nyāya viṣaye pi arthe yat adhikaraṇa antaram ārabhyate tat pūrva adhikaraṇa nyāya ācchādaka adhika āśaṅkā lakṣaṇāt punar adhikaraṇa antara ārambha prāpakāt hetoḥ vidyamānāt yujyate
idam uktam bhavati

original: samāne 'pi nyāye punaradhikaraṇāntarārambhānyathānupapattyā yathāśruta eva sūtrārtha iti yaduktaṃ tanna /
analyzed: samāne pi nyāye punar adhikaraṇa antara ārambha anyathā anupapattyā yathāśrutaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ iti yat uktam tat na

adhika āśaṅkayā tad nyāya viṣaya tva abhāve pareṇa āśaṅkite dhika āśaṅkā nirākaraṇena punar tad nyāya viṣaya tva pradarśana ārtha tvāt adhikaraṇa antara ārambhasya

original: brahmaniṣṭhastu vedāntabhāgo 'lpīyān vināpi lakṣaṇā'śrayaṇena yathāśrutārthaiḥ sūtraiḥ śakyo nirṇetumiti kiṃ lakṣaṇā'śrayaṇenetyata āha- sarve  #

original: sarve vedā āmananti yat padaṃ tviti hi śrutiḥ // MAnuv_1,1.159ab //

yat yatra upalakṣaṇam abhipretam syāt tadā prathama prāpta tvāt anna maya śabdam eva upādadyāt
ānanda maya śabdam tu upādadat sūtrakāraḥ tad mātra vivakṣām sūcayati iti atas āha ānanda maya iti
ānanda maya rūpe tu brahmaṇaḥ puccha tā uktitaḥ
samasta a brahma tā prāpteḥ ānanda maya nāma hi
anna maya ādīnām abrahma tve vikāra śabdaḥ sādhāraṇa upapattiḥ

original: ānandamayarūpe tu brahmavidāpnoti paramityuktasya“brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā';

tra avahitaiḥ bhavitavyam iti jñāpayitum ānandamaya nāma gṛhītam sūtrakṛtā iti anyathā upapattiḥ uktā bhavati iti

original: yadyānandamayo brahma syāttadā tadavayavasya samastāyā mukhyāyā ābrahmatāyāḥ samyagbrahmatāyā aprāpteriti vā /

original: ato 'nnamayādisādhāraṇaṃ brahmaśabdābhyāsaṃ hetutvena vadatā sūtrakāreṇa teṣāmapi pakṣatvamaṅgīkṛtamiti jñāyate /

na ca brahma śabdaḥ nyaparaḥ

original: naca nirapavādo brahmaśabdo hetuḥ na brahmaśabdamātramiti vācyam /

ṛtam satyam param brahma puruṣam kṛṣṇa piṅgalam
ūrdhvaretam virūpākṣam śaṅkaram nīlalohitam

original: iti tāpanīyavākye rudre 'pi paraṃbrahmaśabdaśravaṇādityataḥ pūrvottarārdhe bhinnaviṣayatayā vyākhyāti- ṛtamiti //
analyzed: iti tāpanīya vākye rudre pi paraṃbrahma śabda śravaṇāt iti atas pūrva uttara ardhe bhinna viṣaya tayā vyākhyāti ṛtam iti

original: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahma puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalam // MAnuv_1,1.162cd //
analyzed: ṛtam satyam param brahma puruṣam kṛṣṇa piṅgalam
viṣṇu ākhyam uktam anyatra hi ūrdhvaretam ca tat prati
virūpākṣa ākhyam avaram brahmā uktam tad vrate sthitam
iti pūrva ardhe viṣṇu ākhyam param brahma uktam iti yojanā
anyatra uttara ardhe virūpākṣa ākhyam uktam iti pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ bhinna viṣaya tvam uktam
bhinna viṣaya tve nvayaḥ katham iti atas uktam tat pratyūrdhvaretam iti
anena ṛtam ityādīni dvitīya antāni ūrdhvaretasam ityādīni prathama antāni iti uktam bhavati
tarhi napuṃsaka liṅga prayogaḥ katham iti atas uktam aparam brahma iti
amukhyayā vṛttyā jīve brahma śabda sadbhāvāt tad apekṣayā napuṃsaka liṅgam iti
tat pratyūrdhvaretam iti vivṛṇoti tat vrate sthitam iti

original: ekaviṣayatayā pratīyamānayoḥ pūrvottarārdhayoḥ kuto bhinnaviṣayatā kalpyata ityata āha- samāneti //
analyzed: eka viṣaya tayā pratīyamānayoḥ pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ kutas bhinna viṣaya tā kalpyate iti atas āha samāna iti
samāna adhikṛta tvam ced uttaram nīlalohitam
kṛṣṇa piṅgala rūpeṇa punar uktam bhaviṣyati

original: samānamekamadhikṛtamadhikaraṇaṃ viṣayo yayoḥ pūvottarādharyoste samānādhikṛte tayorbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: samānam ekam adhikṛtam adhikaraṇam viṣayaḥ yayoḥ pūva uttara adharyoḥ te samāna adhikṛte tayoḥ bhāvaḥ

original: yadi pūrvottarārdhayorekaviṣayatvaṃ syāttadottaram uttarārdhoktaṃ nīlalohitam kṛṣṇapiṅgalarūpeṇa pūrvārdhoktena nimittena punaruktaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: yadi pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ eka viṣaya tvam syāt tadā uttaram uttara ardha uktam nīla lohitam kṛṣṇa piṅgala rūpeṇa pūrva ardha uktena nimittena punar uktam bhaviṣyati
kṛṣṇa piṅgala nīla lohita śabdayoḥ ekārtha tvāt
atas pratītam api eka viṣaya tvam parityajya bhinna viṣaya tva grahaṇam nyāyyam iti

original: kiñca brahmādhipatirbrahmaṇe 'dhipatirityuttaravākye brahma adhipatiryasya rudrasya asau brahmādhipatiriti rudrasya brahma adhipatiḥ pratīyate
analyzed: kiñca brahmā adhipatiḥ brahmaṇe dhipatiḥ iti uttara vākye brahma adhipatiḥ yasya rudrasya asau brahmā adhipatiḥ iti rudrasya brahma adhipatiḥ pratīyate

original: yasya cādhipatirasti kathaṃ tasya parabrahmatā syādityataśca pūrvārdho na rudraviṣaya ityāśayavānāha- brahmādhipatiriti // *3,320*
analyzed: yasya ca adhipatiḥ asti katham tasya para brahma tā syāt iti atas ca pūrva ardhaḥ na rudra viṣayaḥ iti āśayavān āha brahmā adhipatiḥ iti
brahmā adhipatiḥ iti atra tāpanīya śrutau puras

original: ṛtaṃ satyamiti vākyaṃ yadgatam atra tāpanīyaśrutau ṛtamityasmātpuraḥ purataḥ upariṣyāditi yāvat /
analyzed: ṛtam satyam iti vākyam yat gatam atra tāpanīya śrutau ṛtam iti asmāt puras puratas yāvat
brahmā adhipatiḥ iti rudrasya para adhīna tā pratipādakam padam asti iti yojanā
syāt evam yadi brahma adhipati śabdasya bahuvrīhi tvam syāt
na ca evam

original: ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣe karmadhāraye vā sambhavati bahuvrīhitvaniścāyakābhāvādityata āha- svariteti //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣe karmadhāraye vā sambhavati bahuvrīhi tva niścāyaka abhāvāt iti atas āha svarita iti

na samāsa antara tvam
tathātve nta udātta tvena anudāttam padam eka varjam iti asya prasaṅgena pūrva padasya svarita anta tā

original: nanu pūrvapadāntasvarasya svaritatve 'pi kuto bahuvrīhitvamiti cet /

na saṃyoga mātram tad prāptiḥ
na api aikya āpatti ādiḥ
kintu tad vayakti sthāne tyanta bhinna tayā satyakāma tva ādi tad sārūpya abhivyaktiḥ eva iti
astu evam prathama vākya sūcita arthasya para brahma tvāt tad uttha śaṅkā parihāra arthasya mantra varṇasya api tad para tvam

original: tathāpi kiṃ prakṛta ityataḥ sūtrārthaṃ vivṛṇoti- tatreti //
analyzed: tathā api kim prakṛtaḥ iti atas sūtra artham vivṛṇoti tatra iti
tatra satya tvam sṛṣṭayā anna prāṇayoḥ api

original: uktaṃ jñānaṃ tu manasā vijñānenāpyudīritam // MAnuv_1,1.188 //
analyzed: uktam jñānam tu manasā vijñānena api udīritam
ananta tvam tathā ānanda maya vācā api udāhṛtam

original: tatra lakṣaṇeṣu satyatvaṃ sṛṣṭayā“tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ';
analyzed: tatra lakṣaṇeṣu satya tvam sṛṣṭayā a tasmāt vai etasmāt ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ
iti sṛṣṭi prakaraṇena
sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ nna rasa mayaḥ
iti tasmāt vai etasmāt anna rasa mayāt
iti ca anna prāṇayoḥ anna maya prāṇa mayayoḥ prakaraṇābhyām amum api uktam
jñānam tu brahma lakṣaṇam manasā
tasmāt vai etasmāt prāṇa mayāt
ityādinā manaḥ maya prakaraṇena
vijñānena api
tasmāt vai etasmāt manaḥ mayāt
ityādinā vijñāna maya prakaraṇena api udīritam
tathāśabdaḥ samuccaye
ananta tvam api brahma lakṣaṇam
ānanda maya vācā
tasmāt vai etasmāt vijñāna mayāt
ityādinā ānanda maya prakaraṇena
api padena uttara vākyaiḥ api udāhṛtam
atas uttareṣām ṣaṇṇām api prakaraṇānām māntravarṇika para brahma lakṣaṇa vivṛti tvāt param
brahmā eva anna maya ādayaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ
satya tvam sṛṣṭi prakaraṇena uktam iti uktam
tat katham iti atas āha sadbhāvam iti

original: sadbhāvaṃ yāpayed yasmāt satyaṃ tat tena kathyate // MAnuv_1,1.189cd //
analyzed: sadbhāvam yāpayet yasmāt satyam tat tena kathyate
iti sṛṣṭiḥ iha proktā
sat śabdaḥ sadbhāva vācī

original: sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sadityetatprayujyata iti vacanāt /
analyzed: sadbhāve sādhu bhāve ca sat iti etat prayujyate iti vacanāt
sadbhāvaḥ janma
sadbhāva śabdena prajananam sūcitam iti

original: tathāca sacchabde janmavācīti karmaṇyupapade yāterantarṇītaṇyarthādato 'nupasarge ka iti kapratyaye kṛte 'yasmayādīni chandasītyupapadasya  #
analyzed: tathā ca sat śabde janma vāci iti karmaṇi upapade yāteḥ antar ṇīta ṇyarthāt atas n upasarge kaḥ iti kapratyaye kṛte yasmaya ādīni chandasi iti upapadasya
bha saṃjñāyām satyam iti bhavati

original: tataḥ satsadbhāvaṃ janma yāpayetprāpayetsvavyatiriktaṃ sarvaṃ yasmāttasmāttadbrahma
analyzed: tatas sat sadbhāvam janma yāpayet prāpayet sva vyatiriktam sarvam yasmāt tasmāt tat brahma

original: satyaṃ kathyata iti sakalajagajjanmakāraṇatvaṃ satyaśabdārthaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā ātmana
analyzed: satyam kathyate iti sakala jagat janma kāraṇatvam satya śabda artham hṛdi kṛtvā ātmanaḥ
ākāśaḥ ityādi śrutyā iha anuvāke sṛṣṭiḥ proktā iti arthaḥ
astu jagat sraṣṭṛ tvam satya śabda arthaḥ

original: tathāpyātmana ākāśa ityādisṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ tadvayākhyānamiti na yuktam /
analyzed: tathā api ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ ityādi sṛṣṭi prakaraṇam tad vayākhyānam iti na yuktam
avayava artha kathana ādeḥ abhāvāt iti atas āha jagat iti

original: satyaśabdena yajjagatsadbhāvayāpakaṃ brahmetyuktaṃ tasyārthasya sthāpanāyaiva sṛṣṭiḥ proktā nāvayavārthakathanādyarthā /
analyzed: satya śabdena yat jagat sadbhāva yāpakam brahma iti uktam tasya arthasya sthāpanāya eva sṛṣṭiḥ proktā na avayava artha kathana ādi arthā
etat uktam bhavati
na avayava artha kathana ādikam eva vyākhyānam
kim tu ukta sthāpanam api

original: prakṛte ca satyaṃ brahmeti lakṣaṇe 'bhihite 'sambhavīdaṃ pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāmeva
analyzed: prakṛte ca satyam brahma iti lakṣaṇe bhihite sambhavi idam pañcānām mahābhūtānām eva
jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvāt iti āśaṅkaya mahābhūtānām api brahma eva kāraṇam tad antargatam

original: tatsattādipradaṃ cāto brahmaiva jagajjanakamiti tatsthāpanamātmana ākāśa ityādinā
analyzed: tad sattā ādi pradam ca atas brahmā eva jagat janakam iti tat sthāpanam ātmanaḥ ākāśe ityādinā
kriyate iti bhavati idam tat vayākhyānam iti

original: annamayaprakaraṇaṃ satyaśabdārtha ityuktaṃ tatkathamityata āha- sattvamiti //
analyzed: anna maya prakaraṇam satya śabda arthaḥ iti uktam tat katham iti atas āha sattvam iti

original: viśīrṇatā ca sattvaṃ syāt sannamityāhureva yat // MAnuv_1,1.191ab //
analyzed: viśīrṇa tā ca sattvam syāt sannam iti āhuḥ eva yat

original: na kevalaṃ janmaiva sacchabdārthaḥ kintu jīvanaṃ ca prāṇadhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sattvameva sacchabdapravṛttinimittameva /
analyzed: na kevalam janma eva sat śabda arthaḥ kintu jīvanam ca prāṇa dhāraṇa lakṣaṇam sattvam eva sat śabda pravṛtti nimittam eva
asti devadattaḥ iti ukte jīvati iti pratyayāt
viśīrṇa tā ca śaithilya lakṣaṇā

kutas
yat yasmāt viśīrṇam vastu sannam iti āhuḥ

original: evaśabdaḥ ṣadḷviśaraṇagatyavasādaneṣviti pāṭhānmukhya evāyaṃ prayoga iti sūcayati /

original: tathācāsteḥ śatrantasya sadeḥ kvibantasya vā saditi rūpam /

bhāva pradhānam ca etat

original: sat sattvaṃ jīvanaṃ viśaraṇaṃ vā bhūtānāṃ yāpayatīti satyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sat sattvam jīvanam viśaraṇam vā bhūtānām yāpayati iti satyam iti uktam bhavati
kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha atas iti
satya śabda arthaḥ eva hi

tat katham
hi yasmāt upajīvya tva lakṣaṇa ādya tā vināśaka tva lakṣaṇa āttṛ tā ca tat iti

original: prāṇaṃ devā anuprāṇanti manuṣyāḥ paśavaśca ye /

original: tacca bhāvapradhānaṃ vivakṣitvā satsattvaṃ gatiṃ jīvanaṃ vā bhūtānāṃ yāpayatīti satyaśabdo 'pi gatijīvanapradatvamāha /

prācuryasya loke pratiyogi alpatā sāpekṣa tvāt
na ca brahmaṇi duḥkham sambhavati

original: kiñca priyādīnāṃ pratiśarīraṃ bhedenānandamayasyāpi bhede brahmaṇo 'pi pratiśarīraṃ bhedaḥ prasajyeta /
analyzed: kiñca priya ādīnām pratiśarīram bhedena ānanda mayasya api bhede brahmaṇaḥ pi pratiśarīram bhedaḥ prasajyeta
na ca tat yuktam
ananta tva śruteḥ
na ca evam bhāgarvī vāruṇī vidyā viruddhayeta
tatra mayaṭaḥ śravaṇena bhinna viṣaya tvāt
etam ānanda mayam ātmānam iti ca anna maya ādīnām iva ānanda mayasya atikramaṇīya tayā uktasya a brahma tvāt

original: ante mayaṭaḥ śravaṇena pūrvamapi tadadhyāhāre pūrvamapi nānandamayo brahmāstu /
analyzed: ante mayaṭaḥ śravaṇena pūrvam api tad adhyāhāre pūrvam api na ānanda mayaḥ brahma astu
brahma jñāna arthinaḥ tu tad upadeśaḥ dvāra tayā upapannaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
nanu evam tarhi katham sūtrāṇi
ānanda mayasya brahma tā pratipādana para tayā upalambhāt
mā evam

original: vedasūtrayorvirodhe guṇe tvanyāyyakalpaneti nyāyena sūtrāṇāṃ kathañcidyojyatvāt /
analyzed: veda sūtrayoḥ virodhe guṇe tu anyāyya kalpanā iti nyāyena sūtrāṇām kathañcid yojya tvāt
tasmāt ānanda maya ādayaḥ pañca api kośāḥ na brahma iti

original: tadetatsūtravyākhyānena nirākṛtamapi śiṣyahitatayā sphuṭaṃ nirākaroti ye 'nnamiti /
analyzed: tat etat sūtra vyākhyānena nirākṛtam api śiṣya hita tayā sphuṭam nirākaroti ye iti
ye brahma ityādi upāsām sāmānādhikaraṇyataḥ
uktavā pañca svarūpāṇām punar tad prāpti vādinī
sthāna dvaya gatā veda vāṇī tad apalāpinām

original: tamaso 'nyatra saṃsthānaṃ kathameva saheta sā // MAnuv_1,1.220ab //
analyzed: tamasaḥ nyatra saṃsthānam katham eva saheta sā
ityādi iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam
viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ eva ayam na dviguḥ
taddhita artha ādi abhāvāt
tad prāpti vādinī
jñāna phala tvena iti śeṣaḥ
sthāna dvayam anuvāka dvayam
tad apalāpinām anna maya ādīnām
idam uktam bhavati

original: annamayādipañcakaṃ yadi na brahma tadānnamayādīnpratyudāhṛtaślokeṣu ye 'nnaṃ brahmopāsata iti prathamānuvāke 'nnaṃ brahmeti vyajānādityuttarānuvāke  #
analyzed: anna maya ādi pañcakam yadi na brahma tadā anna maya ādīn pratyudāhṛta ślokeṣu ye nnam brahma upāsate iti prathama anuvāke nnam brahma iti vyajānāt iti uttara anuvāke
ca brahma tayā ukti virodhaḥ syāt
nahi pucchasya api brahmatve pramāṇam asti anyat atas brahma śabdāt
nanu etat brahma jñāna dvāra tayā upadiṣyam
na tu brahma tayā upadiṣyam iti ced na
sāmānādhikaraṇyena ukta tvāt

tathā sati viduṣaḥ tad prāptiḥ uktā viruddhayā ita
na ca tatra atikramaḥ iti uktam

original: nacānandamaye brahmaśabdo nāsti ślokasya pucchaviṣayatvāditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca ānanda maye brahma śabdaḥ na asti ślokasya puccha viṣaya tvāt iti vācyam

na ādyaḥ
bādhakānām parihṛta tvāt

original: dvitīye tu nirnimittaṃ vedārthabhūtabrahmāpalāpino bauddhasyeva vedābhimānikopena narakaprāptiḥ syāditi / *3,465*
analyzed: dvitīye tu nirnimittam veda artha bhūta brahma apalāpinaḥ bauddhasya iva veda abhimāni kopena naraka prāptiḥ syāt iti

prāk ca bhṛgoḥ ca etat vadiṣyati iti

astu iti ced na

yasya anna ādeḥ vikārāḥ tad etad praśaṃsā para tayā saṅgatiḥ tu iti ced na
manaḥ maya śloke tad ayogāt

original: tarhi tata evānupapatterannādiśabdairannamayādaya evocyata iti kalpyata iti cet /
analyzed: tarhi tatas eva anupapatteḥ anna ādi śabdaiḥ anna maya ādayaḥ eva ucyate iti kalpyate iti ced
tarhi atra api prakaraṇa vaśāt anna maya ādayaḥ eva ucyante iti aṅgīkāryam
ukte rthe hi saṃvādi tvena iyam ākhyāyikā uktā
tasmāt anna maya ādayaḥ eva atra ucyante
te ca brahma praśna uttara tvena uktatva anyathā anupapattyā brahmā eva iti

original: yadyapi“saiṣā bhārgavī vāruṇakṣa vidyā parame vyomanpratiṣṭhitā';
analyzed: yadi api sā eṣā bhārgavī vidyā parame vyoman pratiṣṭhitā
iti sākṣāt brahma vidyā tvam ucyate
tathā api mīmāṃsā artham yuktayā upanyāsaḥ
athavā
asya api samāna yogakṣema tvāt iti
syāt etat
brahma praśna uttara tayā ukti mātreṇa na varuṇa uktānām anna ādīnām brahmatvam
brahma jñāna upāya tayā api tad upadeśa upapatteḥ
tathā hi
dvitīya ā candra praśne candra rūpā api śākhā candra tayā ucyate candra jñāna upāya tvāt
yathā vā arundhatī praśne tad samīpa vartinī pṛthulā tārakā arundhatī tvena upadiśyate
arundhatī jñāna dvāra tvāt

original: dvāratvaṃ cānnādiśabdoditānāṃ śarīrādīnāṃ bahirvṛttinivāraṇadvārā brahmajñānaṃ pratyupapadyata eveti /
analyzed: dvāra tvam ca anna ādi śabda uditānām śarīra ādīnām bahirvṛtti nivāraṇa dvārā brahma jñānam pratyupapadyate eva iti
mā evam
kim anena vyabhicāraḥ codyate
kiṃvā anyathā asiddhiḥ sambhāvyate
uta sā niścīyate
pakṣa trayam asambaddham iti āha dvāram iti

upasattim katham vidyuḥ
tat annādikam
upapattim brahma jñāna artha upasatti uttara kālīnam guru upadeśa prakāram iti arthaḥ
katham iti ākṣepe
na vidyuḥ iti arthaḥ
guru upadeśa prakāra ajñāna vijṛmbhitā iyam śaṅkā iti bhāvaḥ
tat katham na vidyuḥ iti atas āha aupasannāya iti
upasannāya hi triśas
brahma eva vaktavyam
na punar yat kiñcid

original: abodhe 'pi punaḥ punaḥ tadeva śabdāntareṇa vaktavyam /
analyzed: a bodhe pi punar punar tat eva śabda antareṇa vaktavyam
dvāram ca dvāra tayā eva vaktavyam
na tu tad ātmaka tvena
nahi dhūmaḥ gni ātmaka tvena pradaśyarte
candradi udāharaṇam api asiddham eva iti
āgamāḥ vedāḥ
sampradāya vidaḥ smṛti itihāsa purāṇa kartāraḥ
api ca au itaretara samuccaya arthau
tarhi upadeśa prakāra ajña tayā varuṇaḥ
mā evam
lokapālasya etāvat jñāna abhāva sambhavāt iti āśayena dvāra upadeśa śaṅkā nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati tat iti

original: tad yatkiñcit kathaṃ brūyādupasannāya dikpatiḥ // MAnuv_1,1.223ab // *3,470*
analyzed: tat yat kiñcid katham brūyāt upasannāya dikpatiḥ

original: nanvabrahmaiva brahma pṛṣṭavate varuṇenoktaṃ vyāmohanāyeti kiṃ na syādityata āha- na vadediti //
analyzed: nanu abrahma eva brahma pṛṣṭavate varuṇena uktam vyāmohanāya iti kim na syāt iti atas āha na vadet iti

original: na vaded brahma ca kathaṃ māyāvī nahi vārirāṭ // MAnuv_1,1.223cd //
analyzed: na vadet brahma ca katham māyāvī nahi
kim ākṣepe
brahmā eva vadet iti arthaḥ
tatra hetuḥ māyāvī na hi iti
āpta tvāt iti arthaḥ
vivakṣita artha tattva jñānam hi varuṇasya dikpateḥ prasiddham
a vipralambhaka tvam ca pitṛ tvāt
bhṛgoḥ brahma jñāna yogya tvāt
upasannāya iti prasaṅga doṣasya nirasta tvāt
vārirāj iti bhūta abhimāni tvena uktasya apaṭu karaṇatva asambhavāt
vivakṣāyāḥ ca upadeśāt eva siddheḥ
atas eva śrutiḥ vāruṇiḥ varuṇam
pitaram upasasāda iti āha
tat anena āptena brahma praśna uttara tvena uktatvam anna ādīnām brahmatve hetuḥ iti uktam bhavati
nanu varuṇena ukteṣu anna ādiṣu anna prāṇa manāṃsi santu brahma svarūpāṇi
anna ādi śabdānām attṛ tva ādi artha tayā anupapatti abhāvāt
cakṣuḥ śrotra vāc śabdam tu katham brahma syāt
cakṣuḥ ādi śabdānām caṣṭe nena iti cakṣuḥ
śṛṇoti anena iti śrotram
vadati anayā iti vāc iti karaṇa artha tvāt
brahmaṇaḥ ca karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ iti ced na
kartari api tad vyutpatti sambhavāt iti āha caṣṭe iti
caṣṭe iti eva tat cakṣuḥ śravaṇāt śrotram ucyate
vacanāt eva vāc brahma sṛṣṭi sthiti ādi kāraṇam
evaśabdena karaṇa sādhanatām nirākaroti
kiñcayataḥ vai imāni bhūtāni jāyante
iti sakala bhūtānām sṛṣṭi sthiti saṃhāra kāraṇa tvam ca brahma lakṣaṇam anna ādiṣu upadiṣyam
tatas ca etat brahma iti āha sṛṣṭi iti
yatas sṛṣṭayā ādikāraṇam uktam atas pi brahma iti sambandhaḥ
nanu tathā api na anuvāka dvaya uktam ekam vastu bhavitum arhati
saṅkhaya abhedāt saṃjñā bhedāt ca
pūrvam khalu anna maya ādayaḥ pañca uktāḥ na cakṣuḥ śrotra vācaḥ

original: uttaratra cānnādayaḥ ṣaṭ na vijñānānandāviti tatrāha- tacceti //
analyzed: uttaratra ca anna ādayaḥ ṣaṭ na vijñāna ānandau iti tatra āha tat ca iti
tat ca vāghūla śākhāyām aṣṭa rūpam udāhṛtam
vijñāna ānanda sahitam pṛthak sṛṣṭayā ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ
caśabdaḥ hetvarthaḥ
yasmāt vādhūlaśākhāyām vijñāna ānanda sahitam tat anna ādi ṣaṭkam iti aṣṭa rūpam brahma tayā udāhṛtam

original: tasmāttadanusāreṇa prathamānuvāke cakṣurāditrayasyottaratra vijñānānandayoradhyāhāreṇa saṅkhayāsaṃjñaikyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tad anusāreṇa prathama anuvāke cakṣuḥ ādi trayasya uttaratra vijñāna ānandayoḥ adhyāhāreṇa saṅkhayā asaṃjñā aikyam bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ
hetu anta samuccaye vā caśabdaḥ
atra api hi vijñānam brahma iti vyajānāt
ānandaḥ brahma iti vyajānāt
iti uttara vākya paryālocanayā api hi atra vijñāna ānandayoḥ adhyāhāraḥ gamyate
na hi anyat varuṇena upadiṣyam bhṛguḥ tu anyat vayajānāt iti yujyate

original: nanu vādhūlaśākhoktamapi kuto brahmetyata āha- pṛthagiti //
analyzed: nanu vādhūla śākhā uktam api kutas brahma iti atas āha pṛthak iti
aneka śākhā vidām eva atra samyak adhikāra jñāpanāya etat uktam
nanu vādhūla śākhāyām iva atra ubhayatra āṣyakam eva kasmāt na uktam iti atas āha āvāpa iti

original: āvāpodvāpataṣa śākhā yata āhuḥ paraṃ padam // MAnuv_1,1.226ab //
analyzed: āvāpa udvāpa taṣa śākhāḥ yatas āhuḥ param padam

original: kvacidanyatrānuktāvāpena kvacidanyatroktodvāpena kvacidubhayatayā kvacitsāmagṣeṇa parameśvarasvarūpaṃ pratipādayantīti śākhānāṃ svabhāvo yato  #
analyzed: kvacid anyatra anukta āvāpena kvacid anyatra ukta udvāpena kvacid ubhayatayā kvacid sāmagṣeṇa parameśvara sva rūpam pratipādayanti iti śākhānām svabhāvaḥ yatas
na kaścid virodhaḥ iti
nanu tathā api varuṇa upadiṣyānām anna ādīnām brahmatvam na upapadyate
tat vijñāya punar eva varuṇam pitaram upasasāra
iti labdha upadeśasya api bhṛgoḥ punar upasaraṇa vacanāt

original: pūrvoktasyaiva brahmatve adhīhi bhagavo brahmeti punarupasaraṇaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt /
analyzed: pūrva uktasya eva brahmatve adhīhi bhagavaḥ brahma iti punar upasaraṇam vyartham syāt

original: anena tu jñāyate na pūrvopadiṣyaṃ brahmeti /
analyzed: anena tu jñāyate na pūrva upadiṣyam brahma iti

original: yathā hi kaścitsuvarṇaṃ yācitavate rajataṃ dadāti so 'pi gṛhītvā'locya punaḥ(punaḥ)
analyzed: yathā hi kaścid suvarṇam yācitavate rajatam dadāti gṛhītvā ālocya punar punar
suvarṇam dehi iti yācate

original: tena pārśvastho jānāti prāgdattamanyadeva kiñcinna suvarṇamiti /
analyzed: tena pārśva sthaḥ jānāti prāk dattam anyat eva kiñcid na suvarṇam iti
tathā iha api iti āśaṅkām pariharati yatas iti

original: yato bhūtāni jāyanta ityādyairlakṣaṇaiḥ svayam // MAnuv_1,1.226cd //
analyzed: yatas bhūtāni jāyante ityādyaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ svayam
lakṣitam guruṇā paścāt tapasā eva aparokṣataḥ
dṛṣṭvā ekaikam sva rūpam tu samasta ukta anudarśanam
icchatā ājñām guroḥ prāpya tapasā eva ārokṣitam
abrahma iti eva vadatām śruta hāni a śruta grahau
sākṣāt lakṣaṇa tām prāptau iti lajjā tad uktiṣu
ayam arthaḥ na punar upasaraṇa anyathā anupapattyā pūrva upadiṣyasya abrahmatvam kalpyam
punar upasaraṇasya anyathā upapatteḥ
tathā hi
varuṇaḥ hi uddeśa lakṣaṇābhyām bhṛgave brahma upadiśya uvāca
na śravaṇa mātreṇa kṛtī bhavān
śravaṇa mātrasya brahma sākṣātkāra asādhana tvāt
sākṣātkārasya eva mokṣa sādhana tvāt
atas tvayā manana nididhyāsana rūpam tapaḥ karaṇīyam iti
sa ca evam upadiṣya āṣya rūpaḥ yugapad sarvasya sākṣātkartum aśakya tvāt manana nididhyāsābhyām anna ākhyam

original: bhagavadrūpaṃ sākṣātkṛtya guruprasādalabdhamapūrvatamaṃ dhanaṃ tasmai nivedayituṃ
analyzed: bhagavat rūpam sākṣātkṛtya guru prasāda labdham apūrvatamam dhanam tasmai nivedayitum
prāṇa ākhya rūpa antara sākṣātkārāya manana nididhyāsane cikīrṣuḥ guroḥ anujñām ādātum ca punar gurum upasasāra
evam rūpa antare pi

original: tatrānujānīhīti vaktavye yadadhīhi bhagavo brahmeti vadati tadahaṅkāranirāsārthamiti /
analyzed: tatra anujānīhi iti vaktavye yat adhīhi bhagavaḥ brahma iti vadati tat ahaṅkāra nirāsa artham iti
nanu evam astu arthāpattiḥ anyathā upapatti upakṣīṇā
tathā api kim pūvarsya abrahmatvāt punar upasaraṇam uta ukta rītyā anujñāna artham iti sandihyate
sandehe ca anna maya ādīnām na brahmatva avadhāraṇam sambhavati iti
mā evam
yatas vai imāni bhūtāni jāyante ityādi lakṣara yogāt tapasā eva a parokṣita tva liṅgāt ca uttarapakṣa avadhāraṇa upapatteḥ
nahi deha ādau idam lakṣaṇam sambhavati iti
na ca tasya svabhāva siddha jñānasya sākṣātkārāya tapaḥ upekṣitam

original: kiñca pūrvasyābrahmatvena punarupasaraṇe sa tapastaptvānnaṃ brahmeti vyajānāt /
analyzed: kiñca pūrvasya a brahmatvena punar upasaraṇe sa tapaḥ taptvā annam brahma iti vyajānāt
na annāt hayā iva khalu ityādi brūyāt

original: evaṃ brahmatvajñāpakeṣu śruteṣvapyaśrutamabrahmatvaṃ kalpayatāṃ śrutahāniraśrutagrahāpattiśca syādityalaṃ nirdalapakṣapratikṣepe 'smākameva  #
analyzed: evam brahmatva jñāpakeṣu śruteṣu api aśrutam abrahmatvam kalpayatām śruta hāniḥ aśruta graha āpattiḥ ca syāt iti alam nirdala pakṣa pratikṣepe smākam eva
lajjā jāyate iti
akṣara arthaḥ tu sphuṭaḥ eva
sūtra akṣarāṇām anānuguṇyam tu bhagavatā na vyutpāditam
tasya pareṇa svayam eva aṅgīkṛta tvāt
yaḥ hi svayam eva sva vyākhyānasya asvārasika tvam manyate

original: taṃ prati tadvyutpādanaṃ mṛtamāraṇamiva nirākartureva lajjākaram /
analyzed: tam prati tat vyutpādanam mṛta māraṇam iva nirākartuḥ eva lajjā karam
atas eva āha

original: iti prakāreṇa taduktiṣu viṣayabhūtāsu dūṣaṇābhidhāne 'smākameva lajjeti / *3,480*
analyzed: iti prakāreṇa tad uktiṣu viṣaya bhūtāsu dūṣaṇa abhidhāne smākam eva lajjā iti

original: yacca bhedavyapadeśācceti sūtraṃ vyākhyāyoktaṃ pareṇa mithyābhūtaṃ jīvātmaparamātmabhedamāśritya bhedavyapadeśāccetyuktamiti tadanupapannamiti  #
analyzed: yat ca bheda vyapadeśāt ca iti sūtram vyākhyāya uktam pareṇa mithyā bhūtam jīvātma paramātma bhedam āśritya bheda vyapadeśāt ca iti uktam iti tat anupapannam iti
bhāvena āha samīpe iti

original: bhedo jīveśayormithyetyeva mithyā svayaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,1.230ab //

saḥ u śnute ityādau tena saha

original: nahi sāmīpyaṃ sāhityaṃ ca bhedena vinopapadyate /

original: naca mokṣe 'pi śiṣyamāṇaṃ mithyā bhavituṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca mokṣe śiṣyamāṇam mithyā bhavitum yuktam

original: athavā bhedavyapadeśādityukte mithyābhedo 'yaṃ kiṃ na syādityākāṅkṣānirāsārthatvenāsminnasya ca tadyogaṃ śāstīti sūtraṃ prakārāntareṇa vyākhyāti
analyzed: athavā bheda vyapadeśāt iti ukte mithyā bhedaḥ yam kim na syāt iti ākāṅkṣā nirāsa artha tvena asmin asya ca tad yogam śāsti iti sūtram prakāra antareṇa vyākhyāti
etena mayaṭaḥ ca eva dvaividhyena artha kalpanāt

original: tadanyeṣāṃ matamapi satsaṃsatsu na bhāsate // MAnuv_1,1.230c-f //

original: evaṃ pañcakośavādināṃ māyāvādināṃ vyākhyāṃ nirākṛtya ye tu bhāskarādayo yathāśrutasūtrānusāriṇo 'nnamayādayaścatvāraḥ kośā ānandamayastveka  #
analyzed: evam pañcakośa vādinām māyā vādinām vyākhyām nirākṛtya ye tu bhāskara ādayaḥ yathāśruta sūtra anusāriṇaḥ nna maya ādayaḥ catvāraḥ kośāḥ ānanda mayaḥ tu eka
eva paramātmā iti vyācakṣate

original: etenaivānnamayādīnāṃ pañcānāmapi brahmatvopapādanena tadanyeṣāṃ pañcakośatvavādibhyo 'nyeṣāṃ catuṣkośavādinām /
analyzed: etena eva anna maya ādīnām pañcānām api brahmatva upapādanena tad anyeṣām pañcakośa tva vādibhyaḥ nyeṣām catuṣkośa vādinām

original: annamayādiṣu vikārārthatvamānandamaye prācuryārthatvamiti yadatra niyāmakamuktaṃ tatprāgeva nirākṛtamiti /

analyzed: dharmiṇaḥ eva nitya tve tena saha para adhīna tvam kutas iti eva arthaḥ
na dvitīyaḥ
artha pratipādāna ādi śakteḥ tad svabhāva tvāt
katham prasiddha bahula śabdānām ayathārtha tā

original: kiñcākāśādivākye santi pārameśvarāṇi liṅgānīti yuktaṃ tatra tadāśrayaṇam /
analyzed: kiñca ākāśa ādi vākye santi pārameśvarāṇi liṅgāni iti yuktam tatra tad āśrayaṇam
na ca atra tathāvidham kim api paśyāmaḥ
pratyuta gāyatrī vai idam sarvam vāc vai gāyatri

original: ityādayaḥ śabda eva prasiddhā bahavaḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante /
analyzed: ityādayaḥ śabdaḥ eva prasiddhāḥ bahavaḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante
katham ca teṣām
vinā balavat bādhaka upanipātena anyathārtha tā
anya artha tā kalpayitum yuktā
avyavasthā prasaṅgāt
na ca chandasaḥ sarva ātmaka tva anupapattiḥ
brahmaṇaḥ pi sāmyāt
nanu iyam eva gāyatrī vākya śeṣe jyotiṣṭvena paṭhyate
atha yat atas parodivaḥ jyodiḥ dīpyate ityādinā
jyotiḥ ca pūrva adhikaraṇe brahma iti nirṇītam
mā evam
pūrva adhikaraṇa udāhṛta vākya uktasya jyotiṣaḥ brahma tve pi atra tad anupapatteḥ
tatra hi karṇa ādi vidūra tvam uktam

original: atra punastadetaddṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ ceti tadviparītam /
analyzed: atra punar tat etat dṛṣṭam ca śrutam ca iti tad viparītam
yujyate ca jyotiḥ iti padam chandasi
tat paryāyasya tejaḥ vai brahmavarcasam gāyatri
iti tejaḥ śabdasya tatra darśanāt
astu vā atha yat atas parā udivaḥ jyotiḥ
iti uktam jyotiḥ brahma
tathā api gāyatrī chandaḥ eva
upadeśa bhedena bhinna prakaraṇa tvāt iti

original: athavātrāpyatha yadataḥparo diva iti vākyokte jyotiṣi sandehaḥ /
analyzed: athavā atra api atha yat atas paras divaḥ iti vākya ukte jyotiṣi sandehaḥ
kim brahma uta anyat iti
upakrame gāyatrī śabda śravaṇāt anyat iti prāptam
nanu gāyatrī śabdasya ākāśa ādi śabda vat īśvara paratva upapatteḥ kim anena iti atas nitya tvāt ityādinā abhyadhikā āśaṅkā iyam uktā iti
etad ācchādaka tvena adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha iti ced iti
iti ced tat hareḥ eva bāhulyāt śruti liṅgayoḥ
tatra brūmaḥ iti adhyāhāryam

original: tat jyotiḥprakaraṇaṃ gāyatrīprakaraṇaṃ ca harereva pratipādakam /
analyzed: tat jyotiḥ prakaraṇam gāyatrī prakaraṇam ca hareḥ eva pratipādakam
na ca gāyatrī pada virodhaḥ
yatas tat hareḥ eva vācakam
katham
yasmāt tat gāyatrī pada pravṛtti nimittam mukhyataḥ hareḥ eva
anya gatam ca hareḥ eva adhīnam
na ca jyotiṣaḥ brahma tve dṛṣṭa tva ādi anupapattiḥ
yatas tat adhiṣṭhāna ādi dvārā karṇa ādi vidūrasya eva hareḥ upapadyate
na ca upadeśa bheda anupapattiḥ

original: yatastaddivaḥ paratvaṃ divi sthitatvaṃ ca vivakṣābhedāddherereva yujyate /
analyzed: yatas tat divaḥ paratvam divi sthita tvam ca vivakṣā bhedāt hereḥ eva yujyate
kutas etat
śruti liṅgayoḥ bāhulyāt
tathā hitataḥ jyāyān ca pūruṣaḥ
yat vā etat brahmayaḥ etām eva brahma upaniṣadam veda
iti śrutayaḥ
liṅgāni ca gāna trāṇa kartṛ tvam
bhūta ādi pāda tvam
etām eva na atiśīyante
iti sarva uttama tvam ityādīni
atas eva śruti liṅga bāhulyāt tat prasiddha bahula śabda jātam api
hareḥ eva iti

original: nanūktamatra nityā gāyatrī pravṛttinimittaṃ ca tatsvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: nanu uktam atra nityā gāyatrī pravṛtti nimittam ca tad svabhāvaḥ
tat katham hareḥ adhīnam iti atas āha tādṛśa tvāt ca iti
tādṛśa tvāt ca tad śakteḥ
pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ
hetu samuccaye caśabdaḥ
tādṛśī khalu īśvara śaktiḥ
yad nitya anitya svabhāva asvabhāva sarva viṣayā
anyathā sarva īśvara tva hāneḥ

original: atha tasyāḥ śakteḥ kiṃ śakyamiti cet /
analyzed: atha tasyāḥ śakteḥ kim śakyam iti ced
tad svarūpa sattā eva
anādi siddhā sā iti ced
satyam
anādi īśvara śaktayā eva iti vadāmaḥ
uktam ca atra pramāṇam iti
apare tu jyotiḥ caraṇa abhidhānāt ityādi ekam eva adhikaraṇam vyācakṣate
tat ayuktam

original: atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotiriti vākye caraṇābhidhānābhāvāt /
analyzed: atha yat atas paras divaḥ jyotiḥ iti vākye caraṇa abhidhāna abhāvāt
caraṇa abhidhānāt ityasya pāda abhidhānāt iti arthaḥ iti ced
bhūta ādi pāda vyapadeśa upapatteḥ ca evam

original: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt / BBs_1,1.27 /
analyzed: upadeśa bhedāt na iti ced na ubhayasmin api avirodhāt
evam tarhi bhūta ādi pāda vyapadeśa upapatteḥ ca evam iti punar uktam syāt
na syāt
tātparya bhedāt
tathā hi
pūrvasmin vākye tāvān asya mahimā iti catuṣpād brahma nirdiṣyam

original: tatra yaccatuṣpado brahmaṇastripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti dyusambandhirūpaṃ nirdiṣyam tadeveha dyusambandhātpratyabhijñāyate /
analyzed: tatra yat catuṣpadaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tri pādasya amṛtam divi iti dyu sambandhi rūpam nirdiṣyam tat eva iha dyu sambandhāt pratyabhijñāyate

original: tatparityajya prākṛtaṃ jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriye prasajyetāmityatrābhipreyate /
analyzed: tat parityajya prākṛtam jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛta hāna aprakṛta prakriye prasajyetām iti atra abhipreyate
tatra tu bhūta ādi pāda vyapadeśa balena prakṛtasya brahma tva upapādanam iti
ucyate

original: evaṃ hi vyākuvartā prakṛtapratyabhijñānaṃ jyotiṣo brahmatve hetuḥ uttarā tu trisūtrī prakṛtasya brahmatvopapādiketyuktaṃ syāt /
analyzed: evam hi vyākuvartā prakṛta pratyabhijñānam jyotiṣaḥ brahma tve hetuḥ uttarā tu tri sūtrī prakṛtasya brahma tva upapādikā iti uktam syāt
tathā ca śruta hāna aśruta kalpane syātām
anyathā jyotiḥ pratyabhijñānāt iti eva brūyāt

original: laghu caivaṃ spaṣṭaṃ ca sūtraṃ syāt /
analyzed: laghu ca evam spaṣṭam ca sūtram syāt
pāda abhidhānāt iti eva vā vadet
śruti anugamaḥ hi evam sati syāt iti uktam eva upapannam iti
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām gāyatṛyadhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām pāda antya prāṇa adhikaraṇam
om prāṇaḥ tathā anugamāt om
nanu atas eva prāṇe iti anena eva etat gatārtham

original: tā etāḥ śīrṣaṃcchriyaḥ śritā ityādivākyāntaraviṣayatvānneti cenna /
analyzed: tāḥ etāḥ śīrṣaṃ śriyaḥ śritāḥ ityādi vākya antara viṣaya tvāt na iti ced na
ukta uttara tvāt

original: sadbhāve vā tadanantaramevārambhaṇīyatvādityato nirantarādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyopajīvyadhikāśaṅkayā pūrvapakṣamāha- bāhulya iti //
analyzed: sadbhāve vā tad anantaram eva ārambhaṇīya tvāt iti atas nirantara adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāya upajīvi adhika āśaṅkayā pūrvapakṣam āha bāhulye iti
bāhulye śruti liṅgayoḥ
anyasya mukhya vācya tvam iti

original: pūrvādhikaraṇe hi gāyatṛyādyanyavāciśabdabāhulyasadbhāve 'pi śrutiliṅgabāhulyāśrayaṇena gāyatrī paramātmaiveti nirṇītam /

asti ca atra api parakīya śruti liṅga bāhulyam

tatas dehapāta utthāne

original: tathā taṃ śataṃ varṣāṇyabhyārcaditi śatāyuṣṭvaṃ prāṇo vaṃśa iti cakṣurādīnprati vaṃśatvamiti jīvaliṅgāni /

na ca vākya bhedaḥ doṣaḥ ananyagatikatayā prāptatvāt iti

original: amukhyayā vṛttyātra mukhyaprāṇasya vācyatvaṃ siddhāntināpyabhyupagamyata ityato mukhyetyuktam /
analyzed: amukhyayā vṛttyā atra mukhya prāṇasya vācya tvam siddhāntinā api abhyupagamyate iti atas mukhyā iti uktam
iti śabdaḥ śaṅkā samāpti dyotakaḥ

om prāṇaḥ tathā anugamāt om

tat na atragasya hi

original: brahmaviṣayayoḥ śrutiliṅgayorbāhulye vidyamāne yadanyasyendrādeḥ prāṇaśabdamukhyavācyatvaṃ pūrvavādinoktam- tanneti //

original: naca mañceṣu puruṣasambandhanibandhanaṃ krośanamivāmukhyānīśvare liṅgānīti śaṅkanīyam /

antargatasya tasya eva tad tad kartṛ tvāt iti āśayena mukhyatas iti uktam

original: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin / BBs_1,1.29 / *3,580*
analyzed: na vaktuḥ ātma upadeśāt iti ced adhyātma saṃbandha bhūmā hi asmin

original: asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭaṃ śastraṃ śaṃsiturviśvāmitrasya nendro 'nyathopadeṣyumarhatīti yuktidyotanāya sārthakamiti / *3,582*

original: eko nārāyaṇo devo bhaṇyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_1,1.248 //

original: lakṣaṇayāyaṃ samanvayo 'bhidhīyata iti keṣāñcinmataṃ mukhyavṛttyeti siddhāntaḥ /

original: ato vipratipatteratra saṃśayo na kāryo nirṇāyakasyoktatvādityarthaḥ /

original: sarvajñakalpena tattvopadeśāya pravṛvena bhagavatā'cāryeṇaivaṃ sūtreṣu vyākhyāteṣu śiṣyāṇāmetāvanmātrārthānyetānīti pratītiḥ syāt /

tām nirākartum āha vāsudeva ādi iti

original: athavā pañcamūrtiḥ sa prokto 'dhikaraṇaṃ prati // MAnuv_1,1.249 //
analyzed: athavā pañcamūrtiḥ sa proktaḥ dhikaraṇam prati

original: athāpi veti trayo nipātā yathākramaṃ pratisūtramityādibhistribhiḥ sambaddhayate /

original: atreyaṃ mūrtiḥ pratipādyata iti kathaṃ jñāyata ityata āha- tairiti // *3,584*

original: tasyāṃ tasyāṃ mūrtau prasiddhairliṅgaiḥ śrutisamākhyādivyāvartakaivirveko jñātavya iti śeṣaḥ /

original: nanu caturmūrtiḥ pañcamūrtirveti pratyadhikaraṇaṃ pratisūtraṃ vā pratyakṣaraṃ veti ca vastuvikalpaḥ kathamityata āha- yogyateti //
analyzed: nanu catur mūrtiḥ pañca mūrtiḥ vā iti pratyadhikaraṇam pratisūtram vā pratyakṣaram vā iti ca vastu vikalpaḥ katham iti atas āha yogyatā iti

tra sambaddhayate

original: tarhi kasmāttathā na vyākhyāyata ityata āha- bahvarthamapīti //

ucyate vyākhyāyate

original: buddhiśabdasya jñānārthatve graho grāhyaṃ bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ /

original: na caivaṃ sūtrārthaleśavyākhyānaparo 'yaṃ grantha ityanādaraṇīya ityāśayenāha- grantha iti //

original: ayamityuktatvātsatyapi tasminpunarasya viracanādbhāṣyamalpārthamiti nāśaṅkanīyamityāha- bhāṣyaṃ ceti //

original: nanvevaṃ tarhi prameyatvānityatvayorapyevaṃ vaktuṃ śakyata eva /

apavādena tu ākāśa ādau nitya tvam
apavāda abhāvāt śabda ādau anitya tva sādhaka tā iti
tatas ca anaikāntika tā ucchedaḥ syāt
mā evam

original: sāmānyaviṣayeṇa hi pramāṇenārthe pratīte sati viśeṣaviṣayeṇāpavādo bhavati /
analyzed: sāmānya viṣayeṇa hi pramāṇena arthe pratīte sati viśeṣa viṣayeṇa apavādaḥ bhavati

original: tataśca sarvataḥ prasaktā buddhistadviṣayaṃ parityajyānyatra viśrāmyati /

original: naca sarvabhūtahiṃsāniṣedhasyeva prameyatvānityatvavyāpteḥ kenāpi pramāṇena prāptirasti /

utsarga apavāda nyāyasya avakāśaḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi karmarkatṛbhāvo 'pi bhedābhedābhyāṃ saha vyavasthita evopalabdha iti kathamatrāpyutsargāpavādanyāyasyāvakāśaḥ /

mā evam

original: ato bhedaḥ sāmānyataḥ prāpnoti viśeṣastvapavādeneti yuktamuktam /

a bhinnaḥ pi

original: iha tu saṃyogavibhāgalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa sthāṇāveva karmaṇyanumite kathaṃ kalpanāgauraveṇa tadapanayanam /

original: atra hi sthāṇau pratītau saṃyogavibhāgāvakāraṇakāveva syātāmiti vā śaṅkanīyam /

original: kiñca saṃyogādinā kriyānumāne yāvatsattvaṃ calati pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /

original: api cāpratyakṣe vyomni saṃyogavibhāgāvapi apratyakṣāviti patati patatrī gagana iti pratyayo na syāt /

original: kiṃ tu nirnimittatvātsā naiva kāryā syāt /

nahi pūrvapakṣī sarvathā api a prekṣāvān

original: tathā satyunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt kṛtā ca teneyaṃ sarvā kalpanā /

om antaryāmi adhidaiva ādiṣu tad dharma vyapadeśāt om
antaryāmi adhidaiva adhiloka ādiṣu tad dharma vyapadeśāt
nanu etat anantara atītena eva gatārtham
antaryāmi tvam hi antar sthitvā niyāmaka tvam
etat eva antare upapatteḥ iti uktam
na ca tatra niyāmaka tvam na vivakṣitam

original: tathā satyanavasthiterasambhavācceti dūṣaṇasyālagnakatvaprasaṅgādityataḥ prameyabhedaṃ darśayituṃ etadadhikaraṇanivartanīyāmāśaṅkāmāha- ramaṇamiti
analyzed: tathā sati anavasthiteḥ asambhavāt ca iti dūṣaṇasya alagnaka tva prasaṅgāt iti atas prameya bhedam darśayitum etad adhikaraṇa nivartanīyām āśaṅkām āha ramaṇam iti
ramaṇam na ati yatnasya vikṣepāt eva yujyate
pūrva adhikaraṇe kṣi ādiṣu sthitvā ramamāṇaḥ tad prerakaḥ hariḥ iti uktam
tat asat
vyāhata tvāt
āditya ādi niyamana artham ati yatnena hi bhāvyam
prayatnasya vyāpāra anuguṇa tva darśanāt
ati yatnavataḥ ca citta vikṣepaḥ niyataḥ
na ca citta vikṣepavataḥ ramaṇam upapadyate

ukta vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā avadhāraṇāya evaśabdaḥ
etad parihāra tvena gūḍha abhisandhiḥ adhikaraṇa artham āha iti ced iti

original: iti cet sarvaniyamo yasya kasmānna śakyate // MAnuv_1,2.14cd //

original: etāmāśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ sarvāntaryāmitvamiha hetutayocyata iti bhāvaḥ /

original: yat ādityādiniyāmakasya cittavikṣepasambhavena ramaṇaṃ na yujyata ityukte,
analyzed: yat āditya ādi niyāmakasya citta vikṣepa sambhavena ramaṇam na yujyate iti ukte

yat vastu sva ātmanā devadattena aniyatam devadatta anadhīna sattā pratīti pravṛttikam

original: tadevātmano devadattasya pratīpaṃ cittavikṣepakaṃ bhavediti hi dṛṣṭam /

original: athavā yadīdaṃ yastu viśvaṃ svātmaneśvareṇāniyataṃ syāt /

atha matam

yat pṛthaktavam avadhi nirūpyam
anyonya abhāvaḥ tu pratiyogi nirūpyaḥ
kiṃca anya ārāt itararta
iti pṛthak tava vāci pada yoge pañcamī anuśiṣyate
anye iti artha grahaṇam iti vacanāt

original: anyathā bhinno ghaṭātpaṭo 'rthāntaraṃ ghaṭātpaṭa ityādau pañcamī na syāt /
analyzed: anyathā bhinnaḥ ghaṭāt paṭaḥ ṛtha antaram ghaṭāt paṭaḥ ityādau pañcamī na syāt
anuśāsana antara abhāvāt

original: tathāca pṛthaktavameva cedanyonyābhāvaḥ tadā ghaṭo na bhavati paṭa ityatrāpi pañcamī syāt /
analyzed: tathāca pṛthaktavam eva ced anyonya abhāvaḥ tadā ghaṭaḥ na bhavati paṭaḥ iti atra api pañcamī syāt
na ca evam
tena jānīmaḥ nyatpṛthaktavam
anyaḥ ca anyonya abhāvaḥ iti
svarūpa bhedasya ca ābhyām ubhayābhyām vivekaḥ
para nirūpya tva virahāt vidhi rūpa tvāt ca
evam ca vyavahāra paryāya tā anyathā upapādanīyā iti
atra ucyate
yat tāvat uktam nirūpaka bhedāt bhedaḥ iti tat asat
avadhi pratiyoginoḥ eva bhedasya nirūpayitum aśakya tvāt
pañcamī prayoga aprayogābhyām bhedaḥ ca anupapannaḥ
anya śabda upapade pañcamī vidhānāt
katham tarhi bhinna ādi yoge pañcamī iti ced
vilakṣaṇaḥ yajñadattaḥ devadattāt iti atra katham
nahi vailakṣaṇyam pṛthaktavam
guṇa ādiṣu api sadbhāvāt

original: atha kathañcidapādānatvaṃ tatra vyutpādayiṣyata iti cet /
analyzed: atha kathañcid apādāna tvam tatra vyutpādayiṣyate iti ced
bhinnaḥ ityādau api kim na vyutpādyate

original: tathā satyanya ityatrāpi sāmyātsūtravaiyarthyamāpadyata iti cenna /
analyzed: tathā sati anyaḥ iti atra api sāmyāt sūtra vaiyarthyam āpadyate iti ced na
prapañca atha ṛtvena upapatteḥ
vilakṣaṇa yoge pañcamī vaktavyā iti ced
viśiṣṭa vyāvṛtta ādi yoge pi katham

original: na viśiṣṭādikaṃ pṛthaktavamiti ca svayameva vyutpāditam /
analyzed: na viśiṣṭa ādikam pṛthaktavam iti ca svayam eva vyutpāditam
sarvatra upasaṅkhayāne bhinna ādiṣu api tathā bhaviṣyati
kim anyā iti atra artha grahaṇa vyākhyānena
pṛthak vinā nānābhiḥ tṛtīyā anyatarasyām
iti vikalpa vidhāna sāmarthyāt idattha
mā āśrīyate iti ced na
aprāpte pi vikalpa vidhānasya bahulam upalambhāt
astu vā anyā iti artha grahaṇam
tathā api pṛthaktava vāci pada yoge pañcamī vidhānasya vyākhyānāt
ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati iti atra tu
vākya pratipādyam pṛthaktavam iti pañcamī na bhaviṣyati

original: pratiyoginirūpyatvānirūpyatvābhyāṃ tu vivekaḥ svarūpabhedavādinā vaktumaśakya iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: pratiyogi nirūpya tva anirūpya tvābhyām tu vivekaḥ svarūpa bheda vādinā vaktum aśakyaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ
vidhi rūpa tvam ca ukta nyāya parāhatam
atas eva nirastam
kim ca an aśvaḥ iti kim anyonya abhāvaḥ nañ arthaḥ
kiṃvā pṛthaktavam
ādye katham aśvāt anyaḥ iti vigraha vākye pañcamī
na ca tatra pṛthaktavam anya śabda arthaḥ iti yuktam
samāsa vigraha vākyayoḥ samāna artha tvāt
dvitīye niṣedhata iti alam pallavena
santu kalpanā gaurava dṛṣṭa hāni adṛṣṭa kalpanāḥ
tatas kim iti ced
tat kim kalpanā gaurava ādikam dūṣaṇam eva na bhavati
kiṃvā bhavati dūṣaṇam
kintu doṣa unnāyaka tvena eva iti
ādyam nirākaroti dṛṣṭā iti
dṛṣṭa hāniḥ adṛṣṭasya kalpanā iti eva dūṣaṇam

original: yadā tadadhiko doṣo vidyate ko nu vādinām // MAnuv_1,2.22 //
analyzed: yadā tad adhikaḥ doṣaḥ vidyate kaḥ nu vādinām
iti śabdaḥ ādi arthe
tena kalpanā gauravam saṅgṛhyate
dūṣaṇam eva iti yojanā
kutas iti atas āha yadā iti
yadā śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe
tad adhikaḥ tad atiriktaḥ
kim ākṣepe
nu vitarke
vādinām iti
vaiparītya lakṣaṇayā parihāsaḥ
aniṣya prasañjana artham vā
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadi dṛṣṭahānyādikaṃ na dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddhayādikamapi kuto dūṣaṇamiti vaktavyam /
analyzed: yadi dṛṣṭa hāni ādikam na dūṣaṇam tadā asiddhayā ādikam api kutas dūṣaṇam iti vaktavyam
aṅga vaikalya hetu tvāt iti ced
atha vikala aṅgam api kutas na sādhanam
tathā sati ākāśa ādīnām anitya tā ādikam āpadyeta
tat ca pramāṇa viruddham iti ced
svīkṛtam tarhi dṛṣṭa hāna ādeḥ doṣa tvam
aṅga vikalasya api anumāna tve prāmāṇikāni anekāni prasajyante iti ced
tat idam adṛṣṭa kalpanam kalpanā gauravam ca

original: vikalāṅgaṃ ca sādhanaṃ ceti vyāhatamiti cet /
analyzed: vikala aṅgam ca sādhanam ca iti vyāhatam iti ced
katham vyāhatam
sakala aṅgasya eva sādhaka tva darśanāt vikala aṅgasya adarśanāt iti ced
dṛṣṭa hāni ādikam eva etat
atha mā bhūt asiddha yādikam dūṣaṇam iti brūyāt
tadā vādi tvam eva na syāt
dūṣya pakṣa abhāvāt
tad abhāve sādhyasya api abhāvāt iti
dvitīyasya api etat eva uttaram dṛṣṭa hāniḥ iti
atra etat eva dūṣaṇam
na tu doṣa antara unnāyaka tvena iti yathāsthitaḥ eva sambandhaḥ
tatra hetum āha yadā iti

original: yadā dṛṣṭahānyādikamudbhāvyeta tadā tataḥ kimityāśaṅkāyāṃ tadadhikastadunneyo doṣaḥ ko nu vaktavyo vidyate na ko 'pi /
analyzed: yadā dṛṣṭa hāni ādikam udbhāvyeta tadā tatas kim iti āśaṅkāyām tad adhikaḥ tad unneyaḥ doṣaḥ kaḥ nu vaktavyaḥ vidyate na kaḥ pi
yaḥ u pi ucyeta tasya api dṛṣṭa hāni ādi anatirekāt iti bhāvaḥ
anyonya abhāvasya bhāva svabhāva tve
dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ tad śabdānām sahaprayogaḥ

original: kadācid dṛṣṭe 'pi vastuni tadadarśanamityādikaṃ na syāditi,
analyzed: kadācid vastuni tad adarśanam iti ādikam na syāt iti
tṛtīyasya prāc uktam eva parihāram smārayati bhāva iti
bhāva abhāva svarūpāḥ tu viśeṣāḥ eva vastunaḥ
abhinnāḥ eva saṅgrāhyāḥ vyavahāra prasiddhaye
bhāva grahaṇena attṛ tva ādiṣu api ayam parihāraḥ nusandheyaḥ iti daśaryati
bhāva bhāva svarūpāḥ attṛ tva ādayaḥ dṛśya tva ādayaḥ ca yadi api para brahmaṇā abhinnāḥ eva

original: tathāpi dharmadharmyādivyavahāraprasiddhaye vastuno dharmiṇo viśeṣā eva saṅgrāhyāḥ /
analyzed: tathā api dharma dharmya ādi vyavahāra prasiddhaye vastunaḥ dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣāḥ eva saṅgrāhyāḥ
na vastu tanmātram iti
idam uktam bhavati
attṛ tva ādīnām adṛśya tva ādīnām ca brahma svarūpa tvam tāvat śruti ādi siddham
asti ca dharma dharmya ādi vyavahāraḥ pi pramitaḥ
na ca anyatarasya api bādhā upapannā
tatas tad anyathā anupapattyā sa viśeṣa abhedaḥ ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ
viśeṣasya ca abhinne pi bheda nimitta vyavahāra nirvāhaka tvam svarūpa grāhaka pramāṇena eva siddham iti

original: atraike, guṇakriyādīnāṃ dravyeṇātyantabhedaṃ samavāyaṃ cāṅgīkṛtya vyavahārānupapādayantaḥ śrutīnāmupāsanārthatvaṃ anāgantukārthatvaṃ vā,
analyzed: atra eke guṇa kriyā ādīnām dravyeṇa atyanta bhedam samavāyam ca aṅgīkṛtya vyavahārān upapādayantaḥ śrutīnām upāsanā artha tvam anāgantuka artha tvam vā
vadantaḥ viśeṣam na abhyupagacchanti

original: apare tu, bhedābhedābhyāṃ vyavahāranirvāhaṃ paśyantaḥ kevarabhedapratiṣedhaṃ ca śrutīnāmarthaṃ bruvāṇā na viśeṣamicchanti /
analyzed: apare tu bheda abhedābhyām vyavahāra nirvāham paśyantaḥ kevara bheda pratiṣedham ca śrutīnām artham bruvāṇāḥ na viśeṣam icchanti

original: anye tu, akhaṇḍameva brahmābhyupagamya dharmadharmyādivyavahārāḥ sarve 'pyavidyā'ropanimittā iti manyamānā viśeṣamavajānate /
analyzed: anye tu akhaṇḍam eva brahma abhyupagamya dharma dharmya ādi vyavahārāḥ sarve pi avidyā āropa nimittāḥ iti manyamānāḥ viśeṣam avajānate

original: tatra bhedavādinā bhedābhedavādinā ca viśeṣamaṅgīkārayati- yatheti // *3,726*
analyzed: tatra bheda vādinā bheda abheda vādinā ca viśeṣam aṅgīkārayati yathā iti
yathā ekaḥ bheda abhedau ca vastuni
aṅgīkāryāḥ viśeṣeṇa sthāneṣu vyavahartṛbhiḥ

original: sthāneṣu svaśāstrapradeśeṣu ekaḥ samavāya iti vastuni bhedābhedāviti ca vyavahartṛbhiryathā te samavāyabhedābhedā viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantoṅgīkāryāstathā  #
analyzed: sthāneṣu sva śāstra pradeśeṣu ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti vastuni bheda abhedau iti ca vyavahartṛbhiḥ yathā te samavāya bheda abhedāḥ viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantaḥ ṅgīkāryāḥ tathā
bhāva abhāva svarūpāḥ ca iti yojanā
etat uktam bhavati
dharma dharmi bheda vādinā tāvat ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti vyavahriyate
tattvam bhāvena iti sūtrita tvāt

original: tatra samavāyasyaikatvaṃ kiṃ tato bhinnamuta tatsvarūpam /
analyzed: tatra samavāyasya eka tvam kim tatas bhinnam uta tad svarūpam
na ādyaḥ
samavāye dravya guṇa ādeḥ asambhavāt
dvitīye tu katham sahaprayogaḥ
ṣaṣṭhī vyavahāraḥ vā
aupacārikaḥ iti ced na
samavāya eka tva sādhana prayāsa vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
tatas gati antara abhāvāt sa viśeṣa abhedaḥ ṅgīkāryaḥ

original: tathāca kiṃ brahmaṇi śrutīnāmanyaparatvaṃ prakalpya bhedasamavāyakalpanayā /
analyzed: tathā ca kim brahmaṇi śrutīnām anya para tvam prakalpya bheda samavāya kalpanayā
antatas pi aṅgīkāryeṇa viśeṣeṇa eva sarvasya upapatteḥ
samavāya pratiyogika bheda abhāvaḥ samavāyasya eka tvam iti ced

original: tathāpi samavāyasyeti ṣaṣṭhayarthasya pṛthagabhāvena tatra viśeṣasyāṅgīkāryatvāt /
analyzed: tathā api samavāyasya iti ṣaṣṭhayarthasya pṛthak abhāvena tatra viśeṣasya aṅgīkārya tvāt
yaḥ tu bheda vādī samavāye pi ekatva saṅkhayām aṅgīkaroti
tena api samavāyasya sambandhaḥ ṅgīkriyate na vā
ādye kim saḥ eva
samavāya antaram vā
na prathamaḥ
sambandhi atirikta sambandha abhāvena ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti vyavahāra anupapatteḥ
atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ
sva nirvāhaka tve punar sa viśeṣa tvam eva aṅgīkaraṇīyam
na dvitīyaḥ
ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti asya anupapatteḥ

original: na hyavayavāvayavyādīnāṃ sambandho 'sti yata ekaḥ samavāyaḥ /

sva nirvāhaka tve tu uktam
api ca eka svabhāvaḥ eva samavāyaḥ

avayava ādīnām svabhāva bhedāt iti ced
alam tarhi samavāyena
atha samavāyasya eva vicitra svabhāva tvam tadā sa viśeṣa tvam eva iti

original: kiñca bhedābhedayorapi vastunā parasparaṃ ca bhedābhedāntarābhyupagame 'navasthā /
analyzed: kiñca bheda abhedayoḥ api vastunā parasparam ca bheda abheda antara abhyupagame navasthā
sva nirvāhaka tve tu viśeṣa aṅgīkāraḥ
bhede vastuni bheda abhedau iti vyavahāra anupapattiḥ

original: atyantābhede 'pi vastuni bhedābhedāvityādhārādheyabhāvo dvivacanaṃ cānupapannaṃ syāt /
analyzed: atyanta abhede pi vastuni bheda abhedau iti ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ dvivacanam ca anupapannam syāt

original: tataśca tannirvāhārthamavaśyamaṅgīkaraṇīye viśeṣe tata eva brahmaṇi sarvasyopapattau kiṃ bhedābhedābhyupagameneti /
analyzed: tatas ca tad nirvāha artham avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīye viśeṣe tatas eva brahmaṇi sarvasya upapattau kim bheda abheda abhyupagamena iti
yathā ca tantu paṭa ādau bheda abheda abhyupagamaḥ tat vakṣyāmaḥ

akhaṇḍa vādinaḥ
pi syāt viśeṣaḥ
aṅgīkāryaḥ iti vacana vipariṇāmena sambaddhayate

original: vyāvṛtte nirviśeṣe tu kiṃ vyāvartyabahutvataḥ // MAnuv_1,2.25b-d //

sva abhyupagama mātreṇa akhaṇḍa vādi tve pi nyāya prāpta tvāt viśeṣa aṅgīkaraṇam iti
asau pūrva upapāditaḥ

original: anena pūrvoktārthasmaraṇārthatvādasya na punaruktidoṣa iti sūcitam /

yat vā

tasya a paryāya śabda pravṛttau abhinne pi nimitta tvāt
asau iti aṅgīkārya tva hetu sūcanam

original: nanu brahmātirikte satyajñānānandādau vācakatvaśaktimatāṃ satyādipadānāṃ lakṣyameva brahmābhyupagamyate /

tat katham paryāya tā
vācya artha bheda sadbhāvāt
mā evam
satya jñāna ananta ānanda ādīnām brahma atiriktānām pareṇa an aṅgīkṛta tvāt
asti kathañcid satya ādikam anyat iti ced na
kathañcid satya ādikam vācyam
sākṣāt satya ādikam tu lakṣyam iti vaiparītyasya anucita tvāt
astu vā kathañcid paryāya tā parihāraḥ

original: tathāpyekena padena lakṣitasyaivānyenāpi lakṣaṇāyāṃ vyathartā na parihartuṃ śakyā /
analyzed: tathā api ekena padena lakṣitasya eva anyena api lakṣaṇāyām vyathartā na parihartum śakyā

original: nanu ca lakṣyārthabhedābhāve 'pi brahmaṇyāropitāsatyatvādidharmāṇāṃ vyāvartyānāṃ bahulatvāt tadvayāvartakatvena sārthakyaṃ padānāmityata āha-  #
analyzed: nanu ca lakṣya artha bheda abhāve pi brahmaṇi āropita asatya tva ādi dharmāṇām vyāvartyānām bahula tvāt tad vayāvartaka tvena sārthakyam padānām iti atas āha
vyāvṛttaḥ iti
vyākhyāta caram idam

original: tadevaṃ viśeṣasya sarvavādibhiraṅgīkāyartvāttadbalena dharmadharmyādivyavahāropapatteryuktam adṛśyatvādiguṇānāṃ brahmaṇaikyamiti siddham /
analyzed: tat evam viśeṣasya sarva vādibhiḥ aṅgīkāya rtvāt tad balena dharma dharmya ādi vyavahāra upapatteḥ yuktam adṛśya tva ādi guṇānām brahmaṇā aikyam iti siddham
om vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇa śabda viśeṣāt om
vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇa śabda viśeṣāt
asya adhikaraṇasya na atra antarbhāvaḥ sambhavati
nāma ātmaka śabda samanvaya artha tvāt
na api pūrvatra
liṅga samanvayasya api atra siddha tvāt
na ca ubhaya bahirbhāvaḥ
anyatra prasiddha śabda viṣaya tvāt
na ca avaktavya tā
samanvaya asiddhi prasaṅgāt
tat katham iti atas liṅga adhikā iti atra antarbhāvaḥ samarthitaḥ
yat vā pāda dvaya artha tvena ekatra praveśa anupapatteḥ pāda dvaya śeṣaḥ yam

original: ata eva padadvayānte nibandhanamiti jñāpayituṃ pādadvayārthaṃ tāvadupasaṃharati- bahuliṅgeti //
analyzed: atas eva pada dvaya ante nibandhanam iti jñāpayitum pāda dvaya artham tāvat upasaṃharati bahu liṅga iti
bahu liṅga samāyuktaiḥ bahubhiḥ rūḍha nāmabhiḥ
prasiddhaiḥ anya ga tvena vācyaḥ sākṣāt janārdanaḥ
vaiśvānara ādayaḥ śabdāḥ api tad vācinaḥ tatas
rūḍha iti asya eva vivaraṇam prasiddhaiḥ anya ga tvena iti
anyathā yaugika nāma parityāgaḥ syāt
etat ca liṅgānām api viśeṣaṇam
sākṣāt mukhyayā vṛttyā
idānīm vaiśvānara adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha vaiśvānara ādayaḥ iti
ādi śabda prayogāt vaiśvānara śabdasya upalakṣaṇa tvam iti darśayati
tatas iti sautra ātma śabda ādikam parāmṛśati
tad vācinaḥ parameśvara vācinaḥ
nanu katham vaiśvānarasya viṣṇu tva nirdhāraḥ

original: pakṣāntare 'pyagnyādiśabdānāṃ homādhikaraṇatvādiliṅgānāṃ ca śravaṇādityata āha- tānīti //
analyzed: pakṣa antare pi agni ādi śabdānām homa adhikaraṇa tva ādi liṅgānām ca śravaṇāt iti atas āha tāni iti

original: tāni liṅgāni te śabdā api tadgā hi sarvaśaḥ // MAnuv_1,2.27cd //
analyzed: tāni liṅgāni te śabdāḥ api tad gāḥ hi sarvaśas
tad gāḥ parameśvara viṣayāḥ
hi iti tathā dṛṣṭay upadeśam hetum ācaṣṭe
yasmāt evam tasmāt iti pūrveṇa vā sambandhaḥ

original: anena śabdādibhya iti sūtrasya tātparyamuktaṃ veditavyam /

original: atra parameśvarasya sasvabhāvatve na kevalamatra kiṃ nāma pūrvoktāṇutvamahāttvādau cetyarthaḥ /

original: ataḥparāṇi sūtrāṇi bhāṣya eva spaṣṭārthānīti na tatra vaktavyamasti /

original: yasmāt pravṛttinimittānāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ tadgatatvamiva paragateṣu svātantryamapi duḥkhyādiśabdapravṛtteḥ kāraṇam /
analyzed: yasmāt pravṛtti nimittānām duḥkha ādīnām tad gata tvam iva para gateṣu svātantryam api duḥkhi ādi śabda pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam

original: tasmādduḥkhyādiśabdā api uktārthāpattibalāttadadhīnatvahetuto brahmaṇi vartanta iti sambandhaḥ / *4,79*

kim tu amukhyam eva
tatra prayogasya apracura tvāt

iti anupapannam iti atas āha svātantryam iti

original: anena rūḍhimātreṇa padasamanvayāṅgīkāro niṣprayojanaḥ anantaguṇatvāsiddheriti pūrvapakṣiṇoktaṃ parihṛtamityuktaṃ bhavati /

original: anyathā śvitrī śodhanaṃ karoti ityabhiprāyeṇa prayuktasya śveto dhāvatīti vākyasya itaḥ sārameyo drutaṃ gacchatītyapi prameyaṃ prasajyetetyata  #

uktam śruti iti

original: bhavedevam yadi vasanta ityādiśrutīnāmuktavidhinirvacanena parameśvaraguṇeṣu tātparyaṃ na syāt /

tat ca asti iti upapādayiṣyāmaḥ iti ca hi śabdaḥ
yoga vṛtti aṅgīkārasya prayojana antaram āha vijñāna iti

rūḍhi aṅgīkāra prayuktam yat anitya tva ādi dūṣaṇam uktam tat na asti iti arthaḥ
tat anenajyotiḥ

original: evaṃ karmakāṇḍasya brahmaṇi pratipadasamanvayapratipādanena samanvayasūtrasyānupapattiḥ parihṛtā /

original: vākyasamanvaye 'ṅgīkṛte 'pi brahmaṇi vasanta ityādivākyānāṃ samanvayāṅgīkārādapi doṣaḥ samanvayasūtrānupapattirnaivāstītyarthaḥ /

original: nanūktamatra na vākyānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvayo ghaṭate /

original: yathā khalu yūpāhavanīyādivākyāni na niṣphale tāvanmātre paryavasyanti /

pṛthak samanvaya arthāni sthānāni etāni sarvaśas
yat vā atra ādyena ślokena adhikaraṇa arthaḥ
ṇa upādhayaḥ kathyante
virodhi iti parama aiśvarya virodhi arthāḥ
sarva iti ukta vakṣyamāṇa vyatiriktāḥ
bāhulya iti bāhulya viśiṣṭa artha vācinaḥ
kāraṇa iti avāntarakāraṇa vācinaḥ
strī iti strī liṅgāḥ
niṣedhaḥ vācyaḥ yeṣām asti te niṣedhinaḥ
athavā
dvandvāt paraḥ in pratyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
tathātve virodhi ādayaḥ rthāḥ grāhyāḥ
śabdānām iti śeṣaḥ

original: etāni etatpādagatāni sarvaśaḥ sthānāni adhikaraṇāni eṣāṃ śabdānāṃ samanvayaprayojanānītyukte pratyekaṃ sarvaśabdasamanvayasiddhirityapi pratīyeta
analyzed: etāni etad pāda gatāni sarvaśas sthānāni adhikaraṇāni eṣām śabdānām samanvaya prayojanāni iti ukte pratyekam sarva śabda samanvaya siddhiḥ iti api pratīyeta
atas pṛthak iti uktam
sarva mānaiḥ virodhaḥ ca vyutpatteḥ api aśakya tā
paraspara virodhaḥ ca virodhaḥ kārya tadvatoḥ
strī liṅga tvam niṣedhaḥ ca pūrvapakṣeṣu hetavaḥ
doṣa ati a spṛṣṭi niyamaḥ śabda artha aneka tā tathā
bahu rūpa tvam īśasya vyaktaya vyakti viśeṣi tā
utpādanam sva dehāt ca durjana avyakta tā tathā

original: itayādyā yuktayaḥ sākṣāt siddhāntasthāpakā iha // MAnuv_1,4.24 //
analyzed: itayā ādyāḥ yuktayaḥ sākṣāt siddhānta sthāpakāḥ iha
sarva iti anena eva samākarṣa adhikaraṇa arthaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ
tasya jyotiḥ adhikaraṇa artha ākṣepa parihāra ārtha tvāt
sarva mānaiḥ virodhaḥ ca

original: evamānumānikamityādīni sūtrāṇi saṅkṣepato vyākhyāya siṃhāvalokananyāyena samākarṣādhikaraṇaṃ jyotiradhikaraṇaṃ“cānvayaḥ';
analyzed: evam ānumānikam ityādīni sūtrāṇi saṅkṣepataḥ vyākhyāya siṃhāvalokana nyāyena samākarṣa adhikaraṇam jyotiḥ adhikaraṇam ca anvayaḥ
ityādinā kiñcid vivṛṇoti
tathā hi

original: samākarṣādhikaraṇe pratipādyamāno vākyānvayaḥ sūtrakārasyābhimāno na vā /
analyzed: samākarṣa adhikaraṇe pratipādyamānaḥ vākya anvayaḥ sūtrakārasya abhimānaḥ na vā
ādye vaktavyam
prāk ukta pratipadā anvayaḥ yuktaḥ na vā iti
na iti pakṣe na vaktavyaḥ
yukta tve tu mukhye tasmin vidyamāne sya vaiyarthyam

original: kiñca vākyānvayasya svamatatve 'nyārthaṃ tu jaiminirityādisūtreṣu jaiminyādigrahaṇaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt /
analyzed: kiñca vākya anvayasya sva mata tve tu jaiminiḥ ityādi sūtreṣu jaimini ādi grahaṇam vyartham syāt
api ca pratijñā siddheḥ liṅgam āśmarathyaḥ utkramiṣyate evam
bhāvāt iti auḍulomiḥ avasthiteḥ iti kāśakṛtsnaḥ iti vākya anvayaḥ tri prakāraḥ bhihitaḥ
tasya parasparam avirodhe mata bhedaḥ na syāt
virodhe tu katham sūtrakāra abhimata tvam
atha sūtrakārasya anabhimataḥ vākya anvayaḥ tadā nirākaraṇa sūtreṇa abhāvyam
na ca etat asti
tat katham etat iti atas āha anvayaḥ iti
anvayaḥ sarva śabdānām aśakyaḥ jñātum añjasā
iti yat loka vaimukhyam jaimini ādi matam vadan
vidyā adhināthaḥ bhagavān apācakre svayam prabhuḥ
pratipadā anvaye bhihite hi manda adhikāriṇām mokṣa māgaḥ vaimukhyam syāt

original: sarvaśabdānāṃ brahmaṇi añjasā mukhyayā vṛttyā anvayastāvajjñātumaśakyaḥ /
analyzed: sarva śabdānām brahmaṇi añjasā mukhyayā vṛttyā anvayaḥ tāvat jñātum aśakyaḥ
kaḥ chandasām iti śruteḥ
na ca tad jñānena vinā mokṣaḥ
na ca aśakye pravṛttiḥ yuktā
ākāśa romanthana ādau pravṛtti adarśanāt
tathā ca āhuḥ
vyasanāni durantāni sama vyaya phalāni ca

original: aśakyāni ca vastūni nārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ'; iti /
analyzed: aśakyāni ca vastūni na ārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ iti
tasmāt āstām ayam mokṣaḥ
śakya anuṣṭhāna sādhana dharma ādi artham eva pravartemahi iti

original: evaṃ mandalokasya mokṣamārgavaimukhyaṃ bhagavansūtrakāraḥ svayameva jaiminyādimatametaditi vadanvākyānvayapradarśanena nirākṛtavān /
analyzed: evam manda lokasya mokṣa mārga vaimukhyam bhagavan sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva jaimini ādi matam etat iti vadan vākya anvaya pradarśanena nirākṛtavān

original: anena svābhimata eva vākyānvayo 'to na nirākaraṇasūtrābhāvo doṣāya /
analyzed: anena sva abhimataḥ eva na nirākaraṇa sūtra abhāvaḥ doṣāya
pratipadā anvayaḥ ca yuktaḥ eva iti tad vyutpādanam upapannam eva

original: tathāpi pratipadamanvaye sāmarthyavaikalyena mokṣamārgādvimukhānāṃ mandādhikāriṇāmupāyāntarapradarśanena samāśvāsārthaṃ vākyānvayakathanaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā api pratipadam anvaye sāmarthya vaikalyena mokṣa mārgāt vimukhānām manda adhikāriṇām upāya antara pradarśanena samāśvāsa artham vākya anvaya kathanam
ca upapannam iti uktam bhavati
tarhi jaimini ādi grahaṇam vyartham iti uktam iti atas āha sva śiṣyāṇām iti
sva śiṣyāṇām prasiddhayartham matam ātmīyam aṃśataḥ

original: vijñātaṃ tairjagādātra tāratamyaṃ nṛṇāṃ vadan // MAnuv_1,4.27ab //
analyzed: vijñātam taiḥ jagāda atra tāratamyam nṛṇām vadan
jaimini ādīnām iti śeṣaḥ
na atra jaimini ādi grahaṇena tadīyam eva etat matam iti ucyate
kintu madīyam eva matam eka deśataḥ jaimini ādibhiḥ vijñātam iti
etat ca teṣām khyāti artham

original: guruṇā ślāghitā hi śiṣyā loke khyātiṃ labhante /
analyzed: guruṇā ślāghitāḥ hi śiṣyāḥ loke khyātim labhante

original: nanu vākyānvayasya prakāratrayaṃ parasparaviruddhaṃ kathaṃ sūtrakārābhimataṃ syādityata āha- tāratamyamiti //
analyzed: nanu vākya anvayasya prakāra trayam paraspara viruddham katham sūtrakāra abhimatam syāt iti atas āha tāratamyam iti

original: nṛṇāmalpādhikāriṇāmavasthātāratamyaṃ vadannityanenāvasthātāratamyavyavasthayā matabhedo na virodhenetyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nṛṇām alpa adhikāriṇām avasthā tāratamyam vadan iti anena avasthā tāratamya vyavasthayā mata bhedaḥ na virodhena iti uktam bhavati
etena aṅgīkṛte pi ityādi uktam vivṛtam veditavyam
jyotiḥ adhikaraṇe yoga vṛttyā parameśvare khila padānām
śabda samanvayaḥ bhihitaḥ
na asau yujyate
prakṛti ādeḥ anya para tva abhāve nirvacana anupapatteḥ

original: nahi jātādipadānāmanyaparatvānaṅgīkāre jātamotaṃ yasminniti vyutpattiḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: nahi jāta ādi padānām anya paratva anaṅgīkāre jātam otam yasmin iti vyutpattiḥ sambhavati

original: prakṛtyāderanyaparatve tu sarvaśabdānāṃ bhagavadvācitvamiti gataḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛti ādeḥ anya para tve tu sarva śabdānām bhagavat vāci tvam iti gataḥ pakṣaḥ

original: kiñca vasanta ityādīnāṃ bhagavatparatve karmānuṣṭhānalopo lokavyavahāravilopaśca prasajyetetyuktamityata āha- teṣviti //
analyzed: kiñca vasante ityādīnām bhagavat paratve karma anuṣṭhāna lopaḥ loka vyavahāra vilopaḥ ca prasajyeta iti uktam iti atas āha teṣu iti
kalpanā upadeśāt ca madhu ādi vat avirodhaḥ

original: teṣu teṣu padārtheṣu rūḍhiraṅgīkṛtā yataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.27cd //
analyzed: teṣu teṣu padārtheṣu rūḍhiḥ aṅgīkṛtā yatas
prayojana bahu tvena tasya tasya avirodhataḥ
upadeśa ādi sāmarthyāt viṣṇau śaktiḥ ca gṛhyate

original: vyutpattyupapattiḥ karmānuṣṭhānasambhavo lokavyavahārānucchedaścetyevaṃ prayojanānāṃ bahutvena kāraṇena teṣu teṣu tattacchabdavācyatayā prasiddheṣvartheṣu
analyzed: vyutpatti upapattiḥ karma anuṣṭhāna sambhavaḥ loka vyavahāra anucchedaḥ ca iti evam prayojanānām bahu tvena kāraṇena teṣu teṣu tad tad śabda vācya tayā prasiddheṣu artheṣu
rūḍhiḥ iti upalakṣaṇam

original: vṛttiraṅgīkṛtā yatastasmāttasya tasyāvirodhataḥ taṃ tamarthamaparityajya upadeśaliṅgaprakaraṇādibalena sarvaśabdānāṃ viṣṇau ca śaktirgṛhyate
analyzed: vṛttiḥ aṅgīkṛtā yatas tasmāt tasya tasya avirodhataḥ tam tam artham a parityajya upadeśa liṅga prakaraṇa ādi balena sarva śabdānām viṣṇau ca śaktiḥ gṛhyate
yadi api atra etāvat eva vaktavyam
na eṣa doṣaḥ
sarva śabdānām bhagavat vācinām api prasiddha artha antara vācaka tvasya api svīkārāt
jyotiḥ ādi śabdānām hi jyotiṣyomāt vayarthatvasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt na anuṣṭhāna lokavyavahāra vilopaḥ

original: jātamotamityavayavavṛttyā parameśvare vṛttau jātātipadānāmanyataratvamaṅgīkriyata iti vyutpattyupapattiḥ /
analyzed: jātam otam iti avayava vṛttyā parameśvare vṛttau jāta ati padānām anyatara tvam aṅgīkriyate iti vyutpatti upapattiḥ
punar tad avayavasya api anya para tvam upādāya parameśvare
tathā api syāt etat evam

original: yadi śabdānāmanekārthatvaṃ syāt tadeva kuta iti śaṅkānirāsārthamidamuktamiti jñātavyam /
analyzed: yadi śabdānām aneka artha tvam syāt tat eva kutas iti śaṅkā nirāsa artham idam uktam iti jñātavyam
tathā hi
padārtha antara vāci tvam tāvat ukta prayojana siddhaye ṅgīkaraṇīyam
parameśvara vāci tvam ca sarva śabdānām nāmāni sarvāṇi yam āviśanti
tāḥ vai etāḥ sarvāḥ ṛcaḥ
ityādi upadeśa balāt śati liṅga ādi sāmarthyāt ca tat tat śabdānām avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti
anena kalpanā upadeśāt ca madhu ādi vat avirodhaḥ
iti sūtrasya tātparyam uktam bhavati
yadi sarva śabdānām ubhaya artha tvam tarhi viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ asat eva idam agre āsīt
ityādau katham
ubhayoḥ sarva uttama tva ādeḥ viruddha tvena atra ubhaya arthatva anupapatteḥ
padānām ubhaya artha vācitave pi tatra virodhaḥ
tatra anyatara mātre tātparyam aṅgīkāryam iti ced

original: tatrāpi kimupādeyaṃ kiṃ parityājyamiti na jñāyata ityata āha- tathāpīti //
analyzed: tatra api kim upādeyam kim parityājyam iti na jñāyate iti atas āha tathā api iti
tathā api etad virodhe tu tad vāci tvam apodyate
yadi api ubhaya arthāḥ śabdāḥ iti sāmānyena uktam
tathā api parameśvara paratva virodhe nyaparatvam apodyate
tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa dyotana arthaḥ
ubhaya paratvam tāvat viruddham iti pareṇa eva uktam
anyatara parityāge ca parameśvara parityāgaḥ na yuktaḥ
niścita tātparya vākya antara virodhāt
atas pariśeṣāt itara parityāgaḥ eva ucitaḥ iti
tarhi kalpanā upadeśāt ityādi virodhaḥ
tatra sarva śabdānām ubhaya para tvasya ukta tvāt iti ced na
nirapavāda sthale paryavasāyi tvāt tasya iti āha avirodhaḥ iti

original: avirodhe tu bahvarthā etanmūlatayā matāḥ // MAnuv_1,4.29cd //
analyzed: avirodhe tu bahu arthāḥ etad mūla tayā matāḥ
bahu śabdaḥ na eka arthaḥ
matāḥ tatra tatra sūtre bhimatāḥ
nanu avirodhe pi ubhaya artha tva aṅgīkāraḥ na yuktaḥ
tat tu samanvayāt iti avadhāraṇa virodhā
ṇaśat iti atas uktam etad mūla tayā iti

original: eṣa parameśvaro mūlaṃ mukhyo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāsteṣāṃ bhāvastattā /
analyzed: eṣa parameśvaraḥ mūlam mukhyaḥ yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ tattā
tayā iti itthaṃmbhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā
mukhyam artha antaram vārayitum avadhāraṇam
na tu artha antara mātram
ukta prayojana vyāghātāt iti bhāvaḥ
etenanāni āyaścāyyam cā
neka artha tvam iti api samāhitam
mukhya arthasya eka tvāt
nanu purandara ādiṣu api indra ādi śabdāḥ rūḍhi yogābhyām pravṛttāḥ
rūḍhi yogau ca mukhya vṛttī kathyete
atas kṣa ādi śabdānām iva indra ādi śabdānām ubhayam mukhya abhidheyam yuktam
na īśvaraḥ eva iti atas āha itas hi iti
itas hi rūḍha tā anyeṣām upajīvya tvam atra hi

original: satyamasti purandarādīnāmapīndrādiśabdarūḍhiviṣayatā tathāpi sā itaḥ parameśvarādeva hi yasmāt,
analyzed: satyam asti purandara ādīnām api indra ādi śabda rūḍhi viṣaya tā tathā api sā itas parameśvarāt eva hi yasmāt

original: yasmācca atra yogaviṣayatve parameśvarasyaivopajīvyatvaṃ tasmātsa eva mukhyārtho na purandarādayaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt ca atra yoga viṣaya tve parameśvarasya eva upajīvya tvam tasmāt saḥ eva mukhya arthaḥ na purandara ādayaḥ
svatas eva anavadhika aiśvarya ādimatī īśvaraḥ eva indra ādi śabdānām yoga rūḍhī
tad sannidhānāt tad āyatta tad pra
pravṛtti nimitta tvāt eva ca purandara ādiṣu
prasiddham ca etat
yat yat sannidhānāt yat śabda pratipādyam tat amukhyam anyat mukhyam iti
yathā dagdhṛ śabdasya ayaḥ gniḥ ca
na ca akṣa ādi śabda arthānām itareta
ra apekṣā asti iti vaiṣamyam iti
nanu evam ced īśvarasya api amukhya tvam prasaktam
artha antara apekṣayā eva tatra śabda pravṛtteḥ

original: na khalu jātādiśabdānāmanyārthatāmanapekṣya jyotiṣetyādiśabdānāṃ bhagavati pravṛttiḥ sambhavatītyata āha- tatsiddhiriti /
analyzed: na khalu jāta ādi śabdānām anya artha tām an apekṣya jyotiṣā ityādi śabdānām bhagavati pravṛttiḥ sambhavati iti atas āha tad siddhiḥ iti
tad siddhiḥ tad apekṣā ca
caśabdaḥ va dhāraṇe
na ayam asti doṣaḥ
yatas paramapuruṣe tad tad śabda pravṛtti pratītiḥ eva artha antara apekṣā na tu pravṛttiḥ

original: nahi ghaṭasya rūpaṃ pradīpāpekṣayā pratīyata ityetāvatā tadāyattaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nahi ghaṭasya rūpam pradīpa apekṣayā pratīyate iti etāvatā tat āyattam bhavati
yathā anyatra śabda pravṛttiḥ eva parameśvara apekṣā
na evam paramātmani vṛttau itara apekṣām kām api īkṣāmahe iti

original: itaśca nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha- sāpekṣā ceti //
analyzed: itas ca na ayam doṣaḥ iti āha sa apekṣā ca iti
sa apekṣā ca hari icchayā

original: yā parameśvare śabdānāṃ vṛttāvarthāntarāpekṣā sā ca bhagavadicchānibandhanaiva na tvananyagatikatayetyato na tasyāmukhyārthatāprāptiḥ /
analyzed: yā parameśvare śabdānām vṛttau artha antara apekṣā sā ca bhagavat icchā nibandhanā eva na tu ananyagatikatayā iti atas na tasya amukhya artha tā prāptiḥ
na hi icchayā prakṛti ādikam upādadānasya sṛṣṭiḥ parāyattā
na api paṭu karaṇā līlā nimittam icchayā daṇḍam avaṣṭabhya gacchan daṇḍa āyatta gatiḥ bhavati iti

original: yadyevaṃ harisannidhānādinā śabdānāmanyatra vṛttistatkimayasīva dagdhṛśabdasya loke sarvaśabdānāṃ lakṣaṇaiva /
analyzed: yadi evam hari sannidhāna ādinā śabdānām anyatra vṛttiḥ tat kim ayasi iva dagdhṛ śabdasya loke sarva śabdānām lakṣaṇā eva
tathā sati gaṅgā tīrayoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: īkṣatyadhikaraṇoktārthasya mūle nihitaḥ kuṭhāra ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharannetanmūlatayetyādinoktamarthamupasaṃharati- tasmāditi //
analyzed: īkṣati adhikaraṇa ukta arthasya mūle nihitaḥ kuṭhāraḥ iti āśaṅkām pariharan etad mūla tayā ityādinā uktam artham upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
tasmāt parama mukhya tvam viṣṇau anyatra mukhya tā
na ayasi dagdhṛ śabdasya iva indra ādi śabdānām purandara ādiṣu lakṣaṇā eva
rūḍheḥ abhidhāna ādi siddha tvāt
yoga nimittasya ca parama aiśvarya ādeḥ sadbhāvāt
kintu parameśvara viṣayayoḥ rūḍhi yogayoḥ apara adhīna tva niraṅkuśa tvābhyām
anyatra tad adhīna tva alpa tvābhyām
mukhya atha ṛtāyām eva ayam mukhya amukhya vibhāgaḥ bhihitaḥ iti
tat idam uktam parama mukhya tvam iti mukhya tā iti ca

original: upalakṣaṇā ca gauṇī ca tisraḥ śabdasya vṛttayaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.31cd //
analyzed: upalakṣaṇā ca gauṇī ca tisraḥ śabdasya vṛttayaḥ
param iti śabdaḥ dhyā āhāryaḥ
etat eva darśayan parama mukhya ādi vṛtti lakṣaṇāni āha pravṛtti ityādinā
tatra parama mukhya vṛttiḥ dvedhā
mahā yogaḥ mahā yoga rūḍhiḥ ca iti
mahā rūḍhiḥ tu na sambhavati
sā yogāt eva labhyate
iti ukta tvāt
tatra mahāyoga svarūpam āha pravṛtti hetoḥ iti
pravṛtti hetoḥ bāhulyam jñeyam parama mukhya tā
nirvacana labhyaḥ rthaḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ tasya bāhulyam niravadhika tvam
yadi api svātantryam ca atra vaktavyam
prakṛta tvāt
tathā api anyatara mātreṇa itara vyāvṛtti siddheḥ lakṣaṇa padānām ca tad mātra prayojana tvāt na abhihitam
parama mukhya tā iti jñeyam iti yojanā
nanu bāhulyam pravṛtti hetoḥ dhamarḥ
bahula pravṛtti hetumat tvam ca abhidheyasya
tu śabda dharmaḥ
tat katham sāmānādhikaraṇyam
na eṣa doṣaḥ
upacarita tvāt

original: niravadhikaṃ svatantraṃ vā pravṛttihetumapekṣya yā śabda(sya pra)
analyzed: niravadhikam svatantram vā pravṛtti hetum apekṣya yā śabdasya pra

original: vṛttiḥ sā paramamukhyatā mahāyogalakṣaṇā jñātavyeti tātparyārthaḥ / *4,160*
analyzed: vṛttiḥ sā parama mukhya tā mahā yoga lakṣaṇā jñātavyā iti tātparyārthaḥ
mahā yoga rūḍhi svarūpam nirūpayan āha tatra iti

original: tatra prayogabāhulyaṃ yadi tatparatā kimu // MAnuv_1,4.32cd //
analyzed: tatra prayoga bāhulyam yadi tad para tā kimu

original: yatrārthe pravṛttihetoranavadhikatvaṃ tatraiva cetprayogabāhulyaṃ syāttadā tasyā vṛtteḥ paratā paramamukhyatā kimu vaktavyeti /

original: atrānavadhikapravṛttinimittavati yatrārthe yasya śabdasya prayogabāhulyamasti tasya tatra mahāyogarūḍhilakṣaṇā paramamukhyavṛttirityetāvadeva  #

original: yasya kṣīrasya vikāro yaddadhi tasmātkṣīrādanyatā tasya dadhnaḥ kenāpi kvāpi na dṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yasya kṣīrasya vikāraḥ yat dadhi tasmāt kṣīrāt anya tā tasya dadhnaḥ kena api kvāpi na dṛśyate iti arthaḥ
evam anya tā darśanasya siddhā vikāra vikāri bhāva advaya āvṛttiḥ
tatas kim iti atas āha sarvajñāt iti
sarvajñāt brahmaṇaḥ jagataḥ hi anubhūyate
hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe
tasmāt na tayoḥ vikāra vikāri bhāvaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
ayam atra prayogaḥ
jagat brahma vikāraḥ na bhavati
tatas nya tvena upalabhyamāna tvāt

original: yo yato 'nyatvenopalabhyate na sa tadvikāro yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭasya /

yaḥ ca yad vikāraḥ na asau tatas

anyonyam anya tvena upalabhyamāna tvāt
ghaṭa paṭa vat iti prayogaḥ
na ca ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ
yaḥ iti brahmaṇaḥ sarvajña tva śravaṇāt
jñāna kāryasya sarvathā api anupalambhena jagataḥ jñāna abhāva anumānāt
viruddha dharma adhikaraṇayoḥ ca anyonyam anya tva upalambha niyamāt iti bhāvena uktam sarvajñāt iti
nanu vikāra vikāriṇoḥ bheda abhyupagamāt katham ayam hetuḥ iti ced na
bhedena eva upalambhasya hetu tvāt
tat kim tvad abhyupagama mātreṇa ghaṭa paṭayoḥ abhedaḥ

original: nivṛttaṃ karma pravṛttamapi bhavatīti kathaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ syāt /

original: brahmaṇa eva sāmānyasattā viyadādāvanugateti cettarhi kathaṃ na svarṇasattā kharve 'nugatā / *4,323*

original: atha manyase kāraṇameva kāryātmanā bhavatīti pariṇāmavādināṃ matam /
analyzed: atha manyase kāraṇam eva kārya ātmanā bhavati iti pariṇāma vādinām matam
tatas ca kāraṇam yat svabhāva avyabhicāri tad anugamaḥ kārye vaśyā abhyupagantavyaḥ

original: anyathā kāraṇameva kāryātmanā bhavatīti riktaṃ vacaḥ syāt /

avyabhicarita svabhāva ananugame kāraṇasya eva ananugama prāpteḥ
na ca sat mātra svabhāvam suvarṇam
yena kharvam tad vikāraḥ syāt
kintu tad avyabhicāri suvarṇa tva ādi anugame sati iti

original: evaṃ tarhi jagadapi kathaṃ brahmapariṇāmaḥ syāt /

nahi sat mātra svabhāvam brahma
kintu vijñānam ānandam brahma ityādi śrutyā vijñāna ādīnām api tad avyabhicāri svabhāva tva avagamāt
na ca vijñāna ānanda ādi anugamaḥ prapañce sti iti samam

original: nanu ca kṣīrāvyabhicārisvabhāvamādhuryānugatividhuraṃ dadhi tadvikāro dṛṣṭamiti cenna /
analyzed: nanu ca kṣīra avyabhicāri svabhāva mādhurya anugati vidhuram dadhi tad vikāraḥ dṛṣṭam iti ced na

original: kiñca kṣīrakāryaṃ dadhīti niścaye na mādhuryaṃ kṣīrasvabhāva iti kalpyate /
analyzed: kiñca kṣīra kāryam dadhi iti niścaye na mādhuryam kṣīra svabhāvaḥ iti kalpyate

original: mādhuryasya kṣīrasvabhāvatāniścaye vā kṣīravināśe tatkāraṇasya dadhyupādānatvaṃ kalpyata sati na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: mādhuryasya kṣīra svabhāva tā niścaye vā kṣīra vināśe tad kāraṇasya dadhi upādāna tvam sati na doṣaḥ

original: api cāgamairanumānaiśca brahmaṇo nirvikāratve siddhe sati apracyutasvarūpasvabhāvasyaiva (brahmaṇo)

original: jagadupādānatvaṃ yo manyate taṃ pratyetau prasaṅgaviparyayāvuktāviti ko virodhaḥ /

original: etena pradhānasya jagadupādanatve 'pyayaṃ samāno doṣa iti nirastam / *4,328*

atas na kaścid uktaḥ doṣaḥ

original: nimittakāraṇena cicchaktikena prakṛtipradhānādyabhidhānaṃ sacchaktikaṃ brahma pariṇamatītyaṅgīkāre

original: na yuktivirodho 'pi sadātmakasya jagadupādānatvāccaitanyādyananugame 'pi na doṣaḥ /

original: bhāgena pariṇāmaśced bhāgayorbheda eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.69ab //

tayoḥ bhogayoḥ abhedaḥ bheda abhedau vā

original: śṛṅgādikaṃ hyekadeśena śarādīnpratyupādānamekadeśena cāpāyāvadhitayā kārakaṃ bhavati /

original: katipayāvayaveṣu pariṇateṣuca bahūnāmavaśiṣṭatvena śṛṅgāntarotpattyā śṛṅgabuddhimātrotpattyā vā śṛṅgaśabdopapattiriti / *4,343*

śṛṅga ādeḥ ukta rūpa apādāna tve pi na ca śara ādīnām nirupādāna tva ukti prasaṅgaḥ

bhavet abhavat iti ādyaḥ prayogaḥ ca atra yujyate
ukta guṇānām sat ādi śabda ukta ktānām
dharmāṇām vyaktiḥ pratītiḥ

original: nṛṇāmupadeṣyṛpuruṣāpekṣayā sṛṣṭau satyāveva bhavet hi yasmā(dasmā)tkāraṇāt /
analyzed: nṛṇām upadeṣyṛ puruṣa apekṣayā sṛṣṭau satyau eva bhavet hi yasmāt asmāt kāraṇāt

original: atra ca nityaguṇe 'pi brahmaṇi sadādikamabhavaditiprayogo yujyate /
analyzed: atra ca nitya guṇe brahmaṇi sat ādikam abhavat iti prayogaḥ yujyate
tatas ca ayam śruti arthaḥ sampadyate

original: tat brahma mūrtāmūrtātmakaṃ viśvaṃ sṛṣṭvā tatprerakatvena nānārūpaistadeva viśvaṃ
analyzed: tat brahma mūrta amūrta ātmakam viśvam sṛṣṭvā tad preraka tvena nānā rūpaiḥ tat eva viśvam
praviśya prāk sṛṣṭeḥ upadeṣyṝṇām upadeśyānām ca śarīra indriyavatām abhāvāt apratīta guṇakam

original: sat athedānīmupadeṣyṝṇāmupadeśyānāṃ ca śaṇīrendriyavattve sati pratītasattvādiguṇamabhavaditi /
analyzed: sat atha idānīm upadeṣyṝṇām upadeśyānām ca śaṇīra indriyavat tve sati pratīta sattva ādi guṇam abhavat iti
tat anena pārameśvarī sṛṣṭiḥ yogyānām sva guṇa jñāna arthā iti uktam bhavati
yathā uktam

original: “so 'yaṃ vihāra iha me tanubhṛtsvabhāvasambhūtaye bhavati bhūtikṛdeva bhūtyāḥ'; iti / *4,387*
analyzed: saḥ yam vihāraḥ iha me tanubhṛt svabhāva sambhūtaye bhavati bhūti kṛt eva bhūtyāḥ iti
brahma pariṇāma nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
tasmāt aśeṣa kartā ekaḥ nirvikāraḥ ramāpatiḥ
nirvikāraḥ eva aśeṣa kartā iti sambandhaḥ

original: dvibhāgaṃ brahmeti yannirākṛtaṃ tasyopasaṃhāra eka iti /

pariṇāma anupapattau ukta yukteḥ anuvādaḥ vā

original: ato na brahmopādānatvaṃ prakṛtyadhikaraṇārtha iti (sambandhaḥ) śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: atas na brahma upādāna tvam prakṛti adhikaraṇa arthaḥ iti sambandhaḥ śeṣaḥ
kaḥ tarhi tad arthaḥ iti atas āha śabdaiḥ iti
śabdaiḥ prakṛtiḥ ityādyaiḥ strī liṅgaiḥ abhidhīyate
iti arthaḥ usya iti śeṣaḥ
anena apavyākhyāna nirākaraṇasya sva vyākhyāna dārḍhya artha tvāt na asaṅgatiḥ iti api sūcitam
nanu vaktavya arthasya avaśiṣṭa tvāt katham upasaṃhāraḥ kriyate
tathā hi
pratijñā dṛṣṭānta an uparodhāt iti uktam tāvat dūṣaṇīyam
satyam
vivarta nirākaraṇena nirākariṣyate
tarhi abhidhyā upadeśāt ca iti atra uktam bahu syām prajāyeya
iti vākyam dūṣaṇīyam iti ced na
asya api sat ca tyat ca
iti vākya vyākhyāna nyāyena eva vyākhyāta tvāt iti āha bahu syām iti

original: bahu syāmiti tasyaiva hyuktamārgeṇa yujyate // MAnuv_1,4.80ab //
analyzed: bahu syām iti tasya eva hi ukta mārgeṇa yujyate
tasya eva nirvikārasya eva
ukta mārgeṇa iti asya eva
vivaraṇam tad tad gatena rūpeṇa iti
tad tad gatena rūpeṇa
tad tad ananta padārtha preraka ananta rūpaiḥ bahu syām iti sā u kāmayata iti asyāḥ śruteḥ arthaḥ iti arthaḥ
evam tarhi saḥ idam sarvam asṛjata
iti uttara vākyam asaṅgatam syāt
na hi anya artham saṅkalpam abhidhāya anya kriyā abhidhānam saṅgacchate
nahi īśvaraḥ svatantraḥ satyakāmaḥ vā iti atas āha tad artham iti
tad artham hi asṛjat jagat
niyamyam jagat tāvat asṛjat
tatas niyāmaka bahu svarūpaḥ bhūtvā
tat eva anuprāviśat iti
vākya yojana upapatteḥ kā atra asaṅgatiḥ iti arthaḥ
anena eva tat ātmānam svayam akuruta iti
śrutiḥ vyākhyātā veditavyā
na hi atra ātmānam prapañca ātmanā akuruta iti śrūyate
ubhaya āmnānam ca ūrṇanābhi dṛṣṭānta aktyā eva nirastam
na hi ūrṇanābheḥ utpadyamānasya

tantoḥ ūrṇanābhiḥ upādānam

yat ca avikṛtam eva etat brahma viśvātmanā mṛṣā

original: dṛśyate mandadṛṣṭayaiva sa sarga iti kathyate // MAnuv_1,4.81 //

original: avikṛtamevānyadanyātmanā dṛśyata ityasambhavi ityata uktam- mṛṣeti //

original: mandā bhavati dṛṣṭiryayā sā mandadṛṣṭistayā māyayetyarthaḥ /

mandā ca asau dṛṣṭiḥ ca manda dṛṣṭiḥ bhrāntiḥ tayā iti arthaḥ
bhrānteḥ api yāthārthyāt viśvasya
satya tā āpattiḥ iti atas uktam mṛṣā iti

api tarhi avidyā pariṇāma mṛṣā viśva bhrama adhiṣṭhāna tvena eva

analyzed: jīvāḥ eva sva avidyayā pratyekam prapañca ākāreṇa brahma vibhrāmyanti

original: yadi brahmavyatiriktajīvāśrayā viśvabhrāntiraṅgīkriyate tadā bhrāntyāśrayasya bhrāntikalpitatvāyogāt jīvabrahmaṇoranyatā svābhāvikītyāpannam
