original: kintu dehayogarahitasyendriyābhāvātatpadārthadarśanaṃ na sambhavatītyato hetoḥ āropakāraṇamindriyaṃ tadāśrayo dehaśca kalpanāṃ vinaivāstītyaṅgīkaraṇīyam

tathā hi

original: yadi viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
analyzed: yadi viyat ādikam sarvam bhrama siddham syāt tadā tad antaḥpāti tvāt iyam śrutiḥ ca tathā syāt

original: bhramāropitaṃ viyadādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhramasiddhaṃ syāt tadā tadantaḥpātitvādiyaṃ śrutiśca tathā syāt /
analyzed: bhrama āropitam viyat ādikam sarvam bhrama siddham syāt tadā tad antaḥpāti tvāt iyam śrutiḥ ca tathā syāt
bhrama āropitam ca asat iti śruteḥ api asattvāt na artha dhī hetutvam iti

original: bhramaśabdaḥ jñāne arthe ca pareṣāṃ prasiddha iti bhramatva ityuktam /
analyzed: bhrama śabdaḥ jñāne arthe ca pareṣām prasiddhaḥ iti bhrama tve iti uktam

original: yadyapyayamarthaḥ prathamasūtre varṇitaḥ tathāpi tatrādhyātmikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ (prapañco)
analyzed: yadi api ayam arthaḥ prathama sūtre varṇitaḥ tathā api tatra ādhyātmikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ prapañcaḥ
atra tu bāhya ṣava ṣayaḥ iti bhedaḥ
adhika vivakṣayā ca uktasya punaruktiḥ iti

original: nanu sarvo 'pyayaṃ prapañco bhrāntisiddho 'pi vyāvahāriko bhavatyeva /
analyzed: nanu sarvaḥ pi ayam prapañcaḥ bhrānti siddhaḥ pi vyāvahārikaḥ bhavati eva
atas tad antar patitā śrutiḥ api vyāvahārika tvāt artha hetuḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha vyāvahārika tā iti

original: vyāvahārikatā cāsya syādabādhyatva eva hi // MAnuv_1,4.86ab //
analyzed: vyāvahārika tā ca asya syāt abādhya tve eva hi
caḥ tu arthaḥ
syāt api evam yadi prapañcasya vyāvahārika tā tāvat tava
śakya aṅgīkārā syāt
na ca evam

original: yato 'sya prapañcasya vyāvahārikatā tu abādhyatva eva syāt /
analyzed: yatas sya prapañcasya vyāvahārika tā tu abādhya tve eva syāt
etat uktam bhavati
yadi prapañcaḥ vyāvahārikaḥ ṅgīkriyeta
tarhi abādhyaḥ pi aṅgīkartavyaḥ prasajyeta
na ca tathā aṅgīkriyate bhavatā
atas na vyāvahārikā api aṅgīkartum ucitaḥ iti
satya tva aṅgīkāra āpādane tviṣi āpādanam syāt
pareṇa api kathañcid satya tvasya api aṅgīkṛta tvāt
atas bādhya tve eva iti uktam
nanu śakti rajata ādeḥ bādhyasya api abhijñā abhivadana rūpa vyavahāra viṣaya tvāt vayāpti hīnaḥ yam tarkaḥ iti atas āha bādhyam iti
bādhyam na arthakriyā kāri
satyam bādhyam śukti rajata ādikam
abhijñā ādikam vyavahāra viṣayaḥ iti
tathā api arthakriyā kāri na bhavati
nahi tena rajata ucitā valaya nirmāṇa ādi arthakriyā jāyamānā dṛṣṭā
arthakriyā kāri tva lakṣaṇam eva vyāvahārika tvam iha prakṛtam
na abhijñā ādi viṣaya tvam
śruteḥ artha dhī janaka tva upanyasta tvāt
atas na tarkasya aṅga vaikalyam iti
nanu bādhya tvam śuktikā ādi adhiṣṭhānasya dharmaḥ
vijñātasya anyathā
iti ukta tvāt
śuktikā ādikam ca arthakriyā kāri iti katham ucyate bādhyam na arthakriyā kāri iti
mā evam
niṣedhya tva lakṣaṇa bādhya tvasya para abhyupagatasya atra āśrayaṇāt

original: nanu tathāpyasatyasya svāpnakāminīsambhogādeḥ caramadhātuvisargādyarthakriyākāritvadarśanāt vyāptivikalastarka ityata āha- na ceti //
analyzed: nanu tathā api asatyasya svāpna kāminī sambhoga ādeḥ carama dhātu visarga ādi artha kriyā kāri tva darśanāt vyāpti vikalaḥ tarkaḥ iti atas āha na ca iti
na ca svapnaḥ na u mṛṣā
svapnaḥ iti svapna avasthā upalabdhaḥ rthaḥ
na u smākam bādarāyaṇīyānām mate

original: tarhi mama matena vyāptibhaṅgo 'stu mayā mṛṣātvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt iti cenna,
analyzed: tarhi mama matena vyāpti bhaṅgo stu mayā mṛṣātvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt iti ced na
bādarāyaṇīyena tathā aṅgīkartum aśakya tvāt

original: nanu kathaṃ bādarāyaṇasya na mṛṣā svapna ityata āha- vāsaneti //
analyzed: nanu katham bādarāyaṇasya na mṛṣā svapnaḥ iti atas āha vāsanā iti
vāsanā janita tvena tasya api aṅgīkṛta tvataḥ

original: tasya svapnasyāpi māyāmātramiti vadatā sūtrakāreṇa vāsanājanitatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt idaṃ jñāyate,
analyzed: tasya svapnasya api māyā mātram iti vadatā sūtrakāreṇa vāsanā janita tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt idam jñāyate

original: yat na tasya svapno mṛṣābhimata iti /
analyzed: yat na tasya svapnaḥ mṛṣā abhimataḥ iti
nahi kaścid a vidyamānasya kāraṇam nirūpayet

original: kiñca śrutyanusārī hi sūtrakārasya siddhāntaḥ syāt /
analyzed: kiñca śruti anusārī hi sūtrakārasya siddhāntaḥ syāt

original: śrutyā ca svāpnārthasya kartāraṃ vadantyā satyatvamevābhipretamiti na mṛṣātvaṃ sūtrakṛto 'bhimatamityāha- sa hīti // *4,422*
analyzed: śrutyā ca svāpna arthasya kartāram vadantyā satya tvam eva abhipretam iti na mṛṣātvam sūtrakṛtaḥ bhimatam iti āha sa hi iti
sa hi kartā iti vākyāt ca
nanu katham svapnaḥ na mṛṣā
māyā mātram

original: iti sūtrakṛtaiva tanmithyātvasya vakṣyamāṇatvādityato vāha- vāsaneti //
analyzed: iti sūtrakṛtā eva tad mithyātvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt iti atas vā āha vāsanā iti
na māyā mātra padena svapnasya mṛṣātvam abhimatam
kintu vāsanā janita tvam
atas na mṛṣā iti arthaḥ
yathā ca etat tathā upapādayiṣyate

original: tasyāgāminaḥ sūtrasya vāsanājanitatvapratipādakatvena asmābhiraṅgīkṛtatvāditi vā yojyam /
analyzed: tasya āgāminaḥ sūtrasya vāsanā janita tva pratipādaka tvena asmābhiḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt iti vā yojyam

original: na kevalaṃ vakṣyamāṇopapattivaśāt mṛṣātvaṃ na sūtrārthaḥ /
analyzed: na kevalam vakṣyamāṇa upapatti vaśāt mṛṣātvam na sūtra arthaḥ
kintu śruti vaśāt ca iti āha sa hi iti
yat vā svāpna arthaḥ na tāvat anādi nityaḥ
paścāt adṛṣṭayā ādi virodhāt
na api sa ādi vināśī
upādāna nimittayoḥ anirūpaṇāt
na ca prakāra antaram sambhavati
tat katham na mṛṣā iti atas āha vāsanā iti
na upādāna abhāvaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
na mṛṣā iti pūrveṇa vā sambandhaḥ
evam upādānam nirūpya nimittam upapādayati sahi iti
nimittam ca īśvaraḥ jñāyate iti śeṣaḥ
na mṛṣā iti pūrveṇa eva vā anvayaḥ
nanu katham tarhisvapnamāyāsa rūpā
ityādau svapnasya bhrānti tva uktiḥ iti atas āha jāgratvam iti
jāgrat tvam iti hi bhramaḥ
iti śabdaḥ ādi arthe
ullekha arthe vā
jāgrat aham asmi iti draṣṭuḥ yat jāgrat tvam
yat ca etat padārthānām jāgrat dṛśā dṛśā adṛṣṭa padārthaiḥ aikyam
bāhya mṛd ādi janya tvam vā
evamādi pratibhāsaḥ bhramaḥ
bādhya tvāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ
tad apekṣayā śruti ādi vacanāni iti bhāvaḥ
nanu ca rajjau sarpa bhrame
asatyasya api sarpasya sarpa ucita bhaya kampa ādi arthakriyā kāri tvam dṛśyate

original: tathā sarpe samāropitāyāḥ kusumamālāyāḥ santoṣakāritā upalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā sarpe samāropitāyāḥ kusuma mālāyāḥ santoṣa kāri tā upalabhyate
atas vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ tarkasya iti atas āha sarpa iti
sarpa bhrama ādau api hi jñānam asti eva tādṛśam
na bhūt atra sarpaḥ
itivat na sarpa jñānam abhūt
iti bādhaka anudayāt
abhūt eva iti anuvṛtteḥ ca
bhrama tvasya viṣaya vaiparītya mātreṇa upapatteḥ iti hi śabda arthaḥ
kim atas untataḥ yadi jñānam asti eva iti atas āha tat eva iti
tat eva arthakriyā kāri
eva śabdena sarpa ādikam
sati api sarpa ādau asati ca jñāne
bhaya kampa ādi anutpatteḥ
sati ca tasmin
tad utpatteḥ jñāna kāryam eva bhaya kampa ādikam na sarpa kāryam
tad kāryam tu abhisarpaṇa daṃśana ādikam
maraṇam api dhātu vyākula tā nimittakam

original: sā ca viṣadravyeṇeva bhayādināpi bhavatīti na bādhyasya(syāpi)
analyzed: sā ca viṣa dravyeṇa iva bhaya ādinā api bhavati iti na
sarpa ādeḥ arthakriyā kāri tvam

original: nanu kiṃ jñānamātraṃ bhayādijanakaṃ kiṃvā viṣayāvacchinnam /
analyzed: nanu kim jñāna mātram bhaya ādi janakam kiṃvā viṣaya avacchinnam
na ādyaḥ
ghaṭa jñānasya api jñāna tvena tad āpatteḥ
dvitīye na tāvat viṣayaḥ rajju ādiḥ
rajjuḥ iyam ityādi jñānasya api bhaya ādi hetu tā āpātāt
sarpa ādiḥ ced viśeṣaṇatayā tasya api bhaya ādi hetu tvam prāptam
atra kaścid āha
na ayam doṣaḥ
jñāna vyāvartaka tayā upayuktasya sarpa ādeḥ viṣayasya jñāna janya arthakriyāyām apraveśāt
nahi kurūṇām kṣetre vasati

original: gurūṇāṃ ṭīkāṃ paṭhati ityādau viśeṣaṇasyāpi kārakatvamasti /
analyzed: gurūṇām ṭīkām paṭhati ityādau viśeṣaṇasya api kāraka tvam asti
kintu ati prasaktayoḥ kṣetraṭīkayoḥ vyāvṛtti mātreṇa caritārtha tvam iti
tat asat
evam api bādhyasya sarpa ādeḥ vyāvartaka tvasya avaśya abhyupagamanīya tvāt
tatra api jñāna abhyupagamena parihāre vyāvartaka upādānena prasaṅga tādavasthyam iti
tatra āha tādṛśam iti
yādṛśam satya sarpa ullekhi jñānam
tādṛśam iti arthaḥ
satya sarpa jñānam tāvat ghaṭa ādi jñānāt vayāvṛttam anubhūyate
vyāvṛttiḥ ca vyāvartaka dharma
yoga kṛtā sarvatra upalabdhā
na ca viṣayaḥ vyāvartakaḥ
tasya a tad dharma tvāt
sambaddham hi vyāvartakam bhavati
anyathā atiprasaṅgāt
viṣaya sambandhaḥ astu iti ced na
tasya saṃyoga ādi rūpasya abhāvāt
atas kaścid jñāna gataḥ eva dharmaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ

original: kiñca vilakṣaṇasamāgrījanmanorjñānayoryathā parokṣatvāparokṣatvarūpo viśeṣaḥ viṣayopādhinā vinābhyupagamyate,
analyzed: kiñca vilakṣaṇa sama agrī janmanoḥ jñānayoḥ yathā parokṣa tva aparokṣa tva rūpaḥ viśeṣaḥ viṣaya upādhinā vinā abhyupagamyate
evam aparokṣa jñāne pi katham svagataḥ viśeṣaḥ nā aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ

original: api ca sarpajñānasya vilakṣaṇārthakriyā na svagatenātiśayena vinopapadyate / nahi
analyzed: api ca sarpa jñānasya vilakṣaṇā arthakriyā na svagatena atiśayena vinā upapadyate nahi
devadatta sambandhi tā mātreṇa kalama bījam kalama bīja antara kārya vilakṣaṇam kāryam upajanayati

original: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ satyasarpajñāne samīcīnayā sāmagṣā jātaḥ,
analyzed: sa ca ayam viśeṣaḥ satya sarpa jñāne samīcīnayā sāmagṣā jātaḥ
mithyā sarpa jñāne tu asamīcīnayā iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: ato viṣayāntarbhāvamantareṇa svagatenaiva viśeṣeṇa sarpādijñānasya bhayādijanakatvānna sarpasya kiñcitkaratvamiti /
analyzed: atas viṣaya antarbhāvam antareṇa svagatena eva viśeṣeṇa sarpa ādi jñānasya bhaya ādi janaka tvāt na sarpasya kiñcitkaratvam iti

original: tadevaṃ yatrātharkriyā niścitā na tatra mithyātvam,
analyzed: tat evam yatra athar kriyā niścitā na tatra mithyātvam

original: yatra tu mithyātvaṃ na tatrārthakriyeti na tarkamūlavyāpteḥ kvāpi bhaṅgaḥ,
analyzed: yatra tu mithyātvam na tatra arthakriyā iti na tarka mūla vyāpteḥ kvāpi bhaṅgaḥ
iti upasaṃharati tat iti
tat sa deva artha kārakam

original: nanvarthakriyākāritvaṃ yathā vipakṣānmithyābhūtādvayāvṛttam evaṃ sapakṣādbrahmaṇo 'pi vyāvṛttatvādasādhāraṇam /
analyzed: nanu arthakriyā kāri tvam yathā vipakṣāt mithyābhūtāt vayāvṛttam evam sapakṣāt brahmaṇaḥ vyāvṛtta tvāt asādhāraṇam
na ca jñānasya satyasya arthakriyā uktā iti vācyam

original: tasyāpi prapañcāntarbhāvena vipratipannatvādityata āha- brahma tviti //
analyzed: tasya api prapañca antarbhāvena vipratipanna tvāt iti atas āha brahma tu iti

original: brahma tvarthakriyākāri parataḥ svata eva vā /
analyzed: brahma tu arthakriyā kāri paratas svatas eva vā
aṅgīkṛtam hi tena eva

original: tena māyāvādinaiva brahma prapañcādapyatiśayenārthakriyākāryamaṅgīkṛtameva hi janmādisūtre jagatkāraṇatvenoktatvāt /
analyzed: tena māyā vādinā eva brahma prapañcāt api atiśayena arthakriyā kāryam aṅgīkṛtam eva hi janma ādi sūtre jagat kāraṇa tvena ukta tvāt
atas sapakṣa praveśi tvāt na asādhāraṇyam mantavyam

original: nanu mayāṅgīkriyamāṇaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyākāritvaṃ ca na svābhāvikam /
analyzed: nanu mayā aṅgīkriyamāṇam brahmaṇaḥ rthakriyā kāri tvam ca na svābhāvikam
kintu paratas eva
māyāyām
tatas iti aṅgīkārāt

original: ataḥ kathamāpādakasya sapakṣapraveśa ityata āha- parata iti //
analyzed: atas katham āpādakasya sapakṣa praveśaḥ iti atas āha paratas iti

tat svatas paratas vā astu kim anena prakṛta anupayuktena

syāt etat

original: brahmaṇo'rthakriyākāritvaṃ parata ityasya nāyamarthaḥ dāruyantrasyeva parādhīnam iti,
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ ṛthakriyā kāri tvam paratas iti asya na ayam arthaḥ dāruyantrasya iva para adhīnam iti
na api kulālasya iva prayojana ādi apekṣam iti

original: kintu gagane malinateva niṣkriyā eva brahmaṇi māyāsambandhādarthakriyā(di)
analyzed: kintu gagane malina tā iva niṣkriyā eva brahmaṇi māyā sambandhāt arthakriyā ādi
avabhāsate iti

original: na caivaṃvidhena sapakṣapraveśo bhavatyāpādakasyetyata āha paratastva iti /

paratas tve na ca pramā

pramā pramāṇam
ayam atra āśayaḥ

na ced katham lakṣaṇa tvena ucyate
kasya ca māyā maya tvam aṅgīkriyate

original: nacaivaṃ brahmaṇo 'rthakriyāyāḥ paratastve pramāṇamasti yadbādhakaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na ca evam brahmaṇaḥ rthakriyāyāḥ paratastve pramāṇam asti yat bādhakam bhavet

prāmāṇyasya svatas tvāt iti brūmaḥ

original: paratastve ca prāmāṇyasyānavasthāpātena na pramā niścīyeta /

original: evaṃ śrutibalena parastve 'rthakriyāyāḥ svīkṛte tadabhidhātrī“sa idaṃ sarvamasṛjata';
analyzed: evam śruti balena parastve ṛthakriyāyāḥ svīkṛte tad abhidhātrī idam sarvam asṛjata
ityādi śrutiḥ na pramā syāt
pratipādita artha mithyātva atiriktasya aprāmāṇyasya abhāvāt

original: iti śrutiretacchativirodhātparatastve na prameti kiṃ na syāt /

ātyantika abādhya tva abhāve pi prāk brahma ātma aikya jñānāt abādhya tvāt
atas tad antargatā śrutiḥ api amukhya satya tvāt sādhikā bhaviṣyati iti atas āha amukhyā iti
amukhya satya mānasya sādhaka tve sadā āvayoḥ

original: na hi sampratipattiḥ syādatastiṣṭhatu sā pramā // MAnuv_1,4.90 //
analyzed: na hi sampratipattiḥ syāt atas tiṣṭhatu sā pramā
sadā iti anena
prameyasya prāk eva upapādita tvam iti ācaṣṭe
tatas ca punarukti doṣaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati
tiṣṭhatu na vaktavyā iti yāvat
sā pramā brahma jñāna bādhyam pramāṇam iti arthaḥ
yasmāt sā śrutiḥ apramā tasmāt tiṣṭhatu iti vā
prapañca mithyātvam hi tat atharḥ
na ca asau brahma svarūpam
sa upādhika tvāt
bādhya tvam āvaśyakam
bādhya artham ca apramāṇam iti prasiddham eva
bādhya artha tve pi prāk brahma jñānāt abādhya artha tvena prāmāṇyam astu iti atas uktam amukhya iti
satyam abādhya artham

original: nahi kālavilambena bādhitārthaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatīti vakṣyāmaḥ /
analyzed: nahi kāla vilambena bādhita artham pramāṇam bhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ
astu evam svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca asatya tvāt sādhaka tvena vipratipannā śrutiḥ

original: tathāpi prapañcamithyātvasādhanāya tadupanyāsaḥ kuto na kāryaḥ ityata āha- na hīti //
analyzed: tathā api prapañca mithyātva sādhanāya tad upanyāsaḥ kutas na kāryaḥ iti atas āha na hi iti

original: na hi vipratipannena śakyaṃ sādhayituṃ kvacit // MAnuv_1,4.91ab //
analyzed: na hi vipratipannena śakyam sādhayitum kvacid
tathātve svarūpa asiddha kāla atītayoḥ api upanyāsaḥ syāt
āropa mātrasya tatra api sulabha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
syāt etat
āstām iyam pramāṇa sat asat tva cintā
pramāṇena eva prameya siddheḥ

original: anyathā bhavatāmapi prapañcamithyātvanirākaraṇe tatsatyatvasādhane ca pramāṇābhāvena kathābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: anyathā bhavatām api prapañca mithyātva nirākaraṇe tad satya tva sādhane ca pramāṇa abhāvena kathā bhāva prasaṅgāt
yuṣmābhiḥ upanyasyamānam pramāṇam satyam asatyam vā syāt

original: na tāvatsatyaṃ māṃ prati vaktumucitam mayā satyasya sādhakatvānaṅgīkārāt,
analyzed: na tāvat satyam mām prati vaktum ucitam mayā satyasya sādhaka tva anaṅgīkārāt

original: yatsatyaṃ na tatra kriyā'veśaḥ yatra ca kriyā'veśo na tatsatyamiti /

original: naca vācyaṃ sākṣiṇaḥ satyasya sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamiti /

kathaccit sukha ādau tasya śakya upanyāsa tve pi bāhya prapañce tad ayogāt
bāhya pramāṇa viṣayaḥ hi asau
anyathā andha badhira ādi abhāva prasaṅgāt
saḥ eva ca atra prakṛtaḥ iti
na api asatyam bhavadbhiḥ anaṅgīkṛta tvāt iti atas āha sādhaka tvam iti

original: samyak sampratipannaṃ tanna vivatarmamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.91c-f //

original: hiśabdaḥ, sarvaṃ vastu jñātatayājñātatayā vā sākṣicaitanyasya viṣaya evetyāditatprasiddhidyotakaḥ /

tat iti avyayam
tena sākṣiṇā
viśva vivarta matam na bhavet
nirākurmaḥ iti yāvat
upalakṣaṇam ca etat

original: viśvasya satyatāmapi tenaiva sādhayāma ityapi draṣṭavyam /

original: tatkathaṃ kimapyanaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ māṃ prati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhakatvaṃ tvayāṅgīkṛtamityucyata ityata āha- yadīti //

original: pāde me sukhaṃ śirasi me duḥkhaṃ mano me duḥkhitamiti darśanātsukhādiṣu vyabhicārāt /

sandigdha asiddha tvāt

pratyakṣa tvāt iti ced na

tad virahita tayā eva tad siddhiḥ i
dheḥ na iti ced na
anyathā tad siddheḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: kiñcātra sarvatra sāhacaryadarśane saṅkoca eva dravyāntarakalpanāyā laghīyān /
analyzed: kiñca atra sarvatra sāhacarya darśane saṅkocaḥ eva dravya antara kalpanāyāḥ laghīyān
pariśeṣa anumānam tu aṣṭa dravya atirikta dravya a prasiddha viśeṣaṇam
prasiddhau ca anumāna vaiyarthyam

original: aṣṭadravyātiriktāśrita ityeva sādhane guṇādivṛttisāmānyādapi vyāvṛttatvenāsādhāraṇatā syāt /
analyzed: aṣṭa dravya atirikta āśritaḥ iti eva sādhane guṇa ādi vṛtti sāmānyāt api vyāvṛtta tvena asādhāraṇa tā syāt

original: śabdāśrayaḥ itarebhyo bhidyate śabdāśrayatvāt vyatirekeṇa pṛthivīvat iti prayoga iti cet(na) /
analyzed: śabda āśrayaḥ itarebhyaḥ bhidyate śabda āśraya tvāt vyatirekeṇa pṛthivī vat iti prayogaḥ iti ced na
pṛthivī ādi pratiyogika aneka bhedānām pratyekam sādhane ba ādīnām sapakṣa tvena tatra avṛttyāḥ asādhāraṇyāt
samudita sādhane purana prasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvāt

original: abhāvasya sādhyatvādabhāvābhāvasya ca bhāvatvena pratiyogyanapekṣatayā vyāptigrahaṇasambhavānna doṣa iti cenna /
analyzed: abhāvasya sādhya tvāt abhāva abhāvasya ca bhāva tvena pratiyogi anapekṣa tayā vyāpti grahaṇa sambhavāt na doṣaḥ iti ced na
tathā api pratiṣedha mukhena pratīteḥ anivāraṇāt
śabda āśrayaḥ na itarebhyaḥ bhidyate prameya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti sat pratipakṣa tvāt ca
sarva pratiyogika eka bheda sādhane tu pramāṇa bādhaḥ ca adhikaḥ
pratiyogi bhedena bheda bhedasya api darśanāt iti
astu vā śabda guṇaka ākāśa siddhiḥ anumānāt
tathā api avyākṛta ākāśa siddhiḥ sākṣiṇā eva
tad sādhaka liṅga abhāvāt
ākāśa dvaitam ca viyat adhikaraṇe vakṣyate
jāti badhirāṇām api ākāśa pratīteḥ na āgamaḥ tatra pramāṇam iti sākṣi siddham eva gaganam

original: tadbhāgā eva diśo na dravyāntaramiti tāsāmapi sākṣivedya(siddha)taiva /
analyzed: tad bhāgāḥ eva diśaḥ na dravya antaram iti tāsām api sākṣi vedya siddha tā eva
anyat sva avasare vakṣyāmaḥ
nanu astu gagana ādikam sākṣi siddham

original: na tāvatā tasya traikālikabādhavaidhuryalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ siddhayati,
analyzed: na tāvatā tasya traikālika bādha vaidhurya lakṣaṇam sattvam siddhayati
pratītasya api śukti rajata ādeḥ bādha darśanāt
iti atas āha sākṣi siddhasya iti

original: sākṣisiddhasya na kvāpi bādhyatvaṃ tadadoṣataḥ // MAnuv_1,4.94cd // *4,494*

kvāpi kāle tasya sākṣiṇaḥ adoṣa tvāt

original: sākṣiṇa eva hi sākṣiprāmāṇyagrāhakatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /

original: yena sarvakāleṣvabādhyatvaṃ sākṣiṇā pratīyata ityata āha- kālo hīti //

etat api asat
ghaṭa śūnyam bhū talam ityādi vat svabhāva pratyāsattyā eva viśiṣṭa pratyaya upapatteḥ

atra sambandhe bādhaka abhāvāt na evam iti ced na
anya samaveta tvasya eva bādhaka tvāt
upanāyaka dravya antara kalpanayā tad upapattiḥ iti ced

original: tadidamuktam teṣāṃ viśiṣṭapratyayānāṃ nityasiddherdravyāntarakalpānāṃ vinā svabhāvādeva siddheḥ dravyāntarānumānāvasaro na bhavediti /

tena sambandha abhāve pi bhaviṣyati viśiṣṭa vyavahāraḥ
darśanasya durapahnava tvāt
sambandha antara kalpanasya ca vyartha tvāt
na ca taraṇi parispandānām piṇḍa sānnidhyam asti
tatas bhavitavyam madhye dravya antareṇa iti
mā evam
vinā api sānnidhyena ghaṭa jñānam iti viśiṣṭa pratyaya darśanāt

original: kiñcābhāvasyāpi na bhūtalasānnidhyaṃ parapakṣe kimapi paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: kiñca abhāvasya api na bhū tala sānnidhyam para pakṣe kim api paśyāmaḥ

original: astu vā tapanaparispandānāṃ piṇḍaṃ pratyupanāyakaṃ dravyāntaram /
analyzed: astu vā tapana parispandānām piṇḍam pratyupanāyakam dravya antaram
tat ca pṛthivī ādikam kim na syāt
tapana piṇḍābhyām a saṃsargāt na iti ced na
ekaikasya avyāpaka tve pi bahūnām saṃyukta saṃyoga bhūyaḥ tvena kriyā upanāyaka tva upapatteḥ

original: naca taraṇipiṇḍāntakāle tāni na santyanupalambhāditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca taraṇi piṇḍa anta kāle tāni na santi anupalambhāt iti vācyam
sūkṣmāṇām kalpanīya tvāt
na ca vinigamanāyām kāraṇa abhāvaḥ
saṃśaye pi pariśeṣa avadhāraṇa anupapatteḥ

ākāśaḥ vā kim na syāt
na syāt
viśeṣa guṇavat tvāt pṛthivī ādi vat iti ced na
viśeṣaṇa guṇavataḥ pi nīla dravyasya paṭe nīlima upasaṅkrāmaka tva darśanāt

original: sūryagatyupanāyakatvaṃ ca dravyasvarūpaṃ vā atīndriyaśaktirvā sahakāriśaktirvā /
analyzed: sūrya gati upanāyaka tvam ca dravya svarūpam vā atīndriya śaktiḥ vā sahakāri śaktiḥ vā

dravya mātre prasaṅgāt
na dvitīyaḥ
anabhyupagamāt

vyāpaka tvam eva tat iti

kriyā upanāyaka tvam khalu āntarālikasya dravyasya na ubhaya saṃyoga atiriktam kiñcid
tat ekasya iva anekeṣām api samānam
yadi ākāśaḥ
sva sambandhena anya gatam dharmam anyatra saṅkrāmayet

original: tadā sarvaṃ sarvatra saṅkrāmayet aviśeṣāditi cenna /
analyzed: tadā sarvam sarvatra saṅkrāmayet aviśeṣāt iti ced na

bhāva anavabodhāt

original: kimayaṃ svarasambandhanibandhanaḥ kiṃ vā atiriktasambandhādhīna iti /
analyzed: kim ayam svara sambandha nibandhanaḥ kim vā atirikta sambandha adhīnaḥ iti

original: dvitīye 'pi kiṃ sākṣātsambandho 'tra nimittamuta dravyāntarakṛta iti /
analyzed: dvitīye pi kim nimittam uta dravya antara kṛtaḥ iti
uttaratra apa tat dravyam prasiddheṣu anyatamam vā bhavatu anyat vā iti

original: sarvatra bādhakāni paryālocayanprasiddhadravyeṣu yadbādhakaṃ paśyettadaprasiddhe 'pi kalpyamāne kathaṃ nānusandadhyāt /
analyzed: sarvatra bādhakāni paryālocayan prasiddha dravyeṣu yat bādhakam paśyet tat aprasiddhe kalpyamāne katham na anusandadhyāt

original: anusandadhānaśca tatsvābhāvyena parihāraṃ cintayankalpanāgauravavyasanamapahāya laghīyāṃsameva pakṣaṃ na kathaṃ(vā)
analyzed: anusandadhānaḥ ca tad svābhāvyena parihāram cintayan kalpanā gaurava vyasanam apahāya laghīyāṃsam eva pakṣam na kathaṃvā
rocayate iti asya arthasya vivakṣita tvāt
para prasiddha tvena prasaṅgasya na doṣaḥ iti asya api ayam eva abhiprāyaḥ

na ādyaḥ
kāla pratīti uttara kālam vyāpti bhaṅgāt
dvitīye katham ākāśasya kriyā upanāyaka tvam tyājayet
anyathā jāti nirākaraṇam api na syāt iti

original: astu vā'kāśasya viśeṣaguṇavataḥ kriyopanāyakatvābhāvaḥ diśastu syāt viśeṣaguṇaśūnyatvāt vyāpakatvācca /

ubhaya upanāyaka tve pi bādhaka abhāvāt

tat idam uktam

original: tasya viśiṣṭapratyayasya nityena niyatena prasiddhenaiva pṛthivyādinā siddhernāprasiddhe dravye 'numānāvasaro bhavediti / *4,538*
analyzed: tasya viśiṣṭa pratyayasya nityena niyatena prasiddhena eva pṛthivī ādinā siddheḥ na aprasiddhe dravye numāna avasaraḥ bhavet iti

original: anye tu paramparaśabdābhyāṃ paratvāparatve guṇau yuvasthavirapiṇḍa(vartinau)

original: paratve vā yadyālambanaṃ tadā astu kālānumānam /

na ca etat asti

original: paro 'yamityādi prayuktavantaḥ ko 'syārtha iti pṛṣṭāḥ laukikāḥ parīkṣikāśca bahukālīna(no 'yamityādi)

iti vyācakṣāṇāḥ dṛśyante
tatra kāla svarūpam sākṣi siddham

original: tadbahutvādi ca kvacitsākṣiṇā kvacidanumānādinā ca jñāyata iti /

etat api uktam tat etat iti ślokābhyām

tam ā id etam cirantanam panthānam arocayamānāḥ navīnāḥ tu diś kālayoḥ anyathā anumānam āhuḥ

original: vivādādhyāsitaṃ kāryaṃ viśeṣaguṇarahitadravyābhyāṃ janyate kāryatvāt antaḥkaraṇadvayasaṃyogavaditi /

original: mano manasā saṃyujyate mūrtatvāccharīravaditi ca ākālike vidyadādau sandigdhavyabhicāram / *4,547*

parama mahat parimāṇam dravya catuṣyaya vṛtti parimāṇa tvāt aṇu tva vat iti
atra yadi ākāśa ātma gata

atas eva na kāla ādi gatasya pakṣīkāraḥ

original: ātmavadupasaṅgrāhakaikyena dravyāṇāṃ navatvopapattiriti cettarhi diśā kālena vā sādhyaparyavasānā(sambhavā)

dubhaya sādhaka tvam asya na syāt
mā bhūt iti ced na
aneka pada vaiyarthyāt

hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ ca anupapattiḥ vakṣyate iti alam pallavena
gagana ādeḥ sakala prapañcasya traikālika abādhya tvam sākṣi siddham iti uktam artham upasaṃharan vivṛṇoti atas iti
atas doṣa pratītasya satya tvam sākṣiṇā matam

original: na vidyate doṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya jñānasya tena pratītasya viṣayīkṛtasyādoṣeṇa pratyakṣādinā vā pratītasya gaganādeḥ prapañcasya satyatvaṃ traikālikābādhyatvaṃ  #

indriya liṅga śabda gamyāḥ

na a sattvena
na api udāsīnena rūpeṇa

original: nacaivaṃ ghaṭo 'sti ghaṭo nāstītipratyayānupapattiḥ paunaruktyādvayāghātācceti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca evam ghaṭaḥ sti ghaṭaḥ na asti iti pratyaya anupapattiḥ paunaruktyāt vayāghātāt ca iti yuktam
ghaṭaḥ sti iti deśa kāla viśeṣa sambandhi sattā viṣaya tvāt
kvacid viparīta ākāṅkṣā vyavaccheda atha ṛtvāt
kvāpi vyākhyāna vyākhyeya bhāvāt
na asti ityasya ca deśa kāla viśeṣa sambandhi sattā pratiṣedha paratvāt
nahi satā sakala deśa kāla satā bhavitavyam iti niyāmakam asti

original: jñānagataṃ ca yāthārthyalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ jñānagrāhakeṇaiva gṛhyate /
analyzed: jñāna gatam ca yāthārthya lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam jñāna grāhakeṇa eva gṛhyate
jñāna grāhakaḥ ca sākṣī iti avivādam vādi prativādinoḥ

original: tathāca sākṣiṇā jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇatā tadviṣayasya sakalaprapañcasya traikālikābādhyatvalakṣaṇaṃ satyatvameva gṛhītaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca sākṣiṇā jñāna prāmāṇyam gṛhṇatā tad viṣayasya sakala prapañcasya traikālika abādhya tva lakṣaṇam satya tvam eva gṛhītam bhavati

original: yadi hi jñānagocarasya nityasya vā anityasya vā sarvagatasya vā asarvagatasya vā arthasya svadeśakālaprakāropādhāvasattvā'vedanalakṣaṇo bādhaḥ
analyzed: yadi hi jñāna gocarasya nityasya vā anityasya vā sarvagatasya vā asarvagatasya vā arthasya sva deśa kāla prakāra upādhāva sattva āvedana lakṣaṇaḥ bādhaḥ
kaḥ rthaḥ tadā jñāna prāmāṇyam sākṣiṇā pramitam iti asya iti

original: yadi tarhi jñānasvarūpagrāhakaḥ sākṣī tatprāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇanprapañcasatyatāṃ niścinuyāt,
analyzed: yadi tarhi jñāna svarūpa grāhakaḥ sākṣī tad prāmāṇyam api gṛhṇan prapañca satyatām niścinuyāt

original: śuktirajatādijñānasvarūpagrāhako 'pi sa eveti tatprāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇan śuktirajatādikamapi satyaṃ vyavasthāpayet /
analyzed: śukti rajata ādi jñāna sva rūpa grāhakaḥ pi saḥ eva iti tad prāmāṇyam api gṛhṇan śukti rajata ādikam api satyam vyavasthāpayet
na ca śukti rajata ādi jñānānām prāmāṇyam eva na asti
kim sākṣiṇā gṛhyatām iti yuktam

original: prapañcagocarāṇāmapi jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyābhāvātkiṃ sākṣirā gṛhyata ityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
analyzed: prapañca gocarāṇām api jñānānām prāmāṇya abhāvāt kim sākṣi rā gṛhyate iti api vaktum śakya tvāt

original: tasmātsākṣiṇā prapañcasatyatāsiddhimabhilaṣatā jñānagrāhakasya sākṣiṇaḥ prāmāṇyagrāhakatvaṃ svabhāva iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: tasmāt sākṣiṇā prapañca satyatā siddhim abhilaṣatā jñāna grāhakasya sākṣiṇaḥ prāmāṇya grāhaka tvam svabhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam
tathā ca uktaḥ tiprasaṅgaḥ iti atas uktam adoṣa iti
ayam arthaḥ
na sākṣī jñānam gṛhṇan pramāṇam eva etat iti gṛhṇāti
kintarhi atva
doṣam ced pramāṇam sa doṣam apramāṇam iti
vyavasthayā

original: yadā tvarthitvena prāmāṇyaṃ nirdidhārayiṣitaṃ tadā sajātīyavijātīyasaṃvādavisaṃvādabhāvābhāvalakṣaṇayā parīkṣayā doṣabhāvaṃ niścitya
analyzed: yadā tu arthi tvena prāmāṇyam nirdidhārayiṣitam tadā sajātīya vijātīya saṃvāda visaṃvāda bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇayā parīkṣayā doṣa bhāvam niścitya
prāmāṇyam avadhārayati tu aprāmāṇyam
prapañca pratīteḥ ca prayatnena anviṣya api doṣam a paśyan prāmāṇyam eva avadhārayati ivati tat satya tvam sākṣi siddham
na ca evam śukti rajata ādīnām
doṣa apratīti daśāyām prāmāṇya anavadhāraṇāt
tad pratītau tu aprāmāṇya niścayāt
nanu śukti rajata ādi jñānasya api prāmāṇyam nirdhāryate eva
katham anyathā niḥśaṅkā pravṛttiḥ iti ced
satyam
na asau sākṣi rūpa avadhāraṇā
api tu mānasī iti vakṣyāmaḥ
manasaḥ ca doṣa saṃsarga sambhavena na tāvatā prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti

original: nanu yadi parīkṣāsahakṛtaḥsākṣī jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tadānavasthā syāt /
analyzed: nanu yadi parīkṣā sahakṛtaḥ sākṣī jñāna prāmāṇyam gṛhṇīyāt tadā anavasthā syāt
parīkṣā api hi svayam pramāṇa tvena avadhṛtā para prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya alam
na anyathā
tathā ca tatra api parīkṣā antaram avataraṇīyam iti

original: kiñca sākṣiṇo 'pyanavadhṛtapramāṇabhāvasya svayaṃ duḥsthasya na paraprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasamārthyamiti
analyzed: kiñca sākṣiṇaḥ api anavadhṛta pramāṇa bhāvasya svayam duḥsthasya na para prāmāṇya avadhāraṇa samārthyam iti
tad prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya parīkṣā antara apekṣā grāhaka antara apekṣā ca iti anavasthā evā iti atas
āha parīkṣā ādeḥ ca iti

original: parīkṣādeśca satyatvaṃ tena hyeva mataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.99cd //
analyzed: parīkṣā ādeḥ ca satya tvam tena hi eva matam bhavet
ādi padena sākṣī gṛhyate
caḥ tu arthaḥ
satya tvam yathārtha tvam

original: tena sākṣiṇaiva kevalena na tu parīkṣāyuktena(sahakṛtena) /
analyzed: tena sākṣiṇā eva kevalena na tu parīkṣā yuktena sahakṛtena
hi śabdaḥ sya arthasya anubhava siddha tvam dyotayati
tasmāt na anavasthā iti hetau vā
etat uktam bhavati
doṣa abhāva avadhāraṇa artham nyāya anusandhānam hi khalu parīkṣā
sandigdhaḥ ca arthaḥ nyāya viṣayaḥ
sandehaḥ ca ubhaya koṭi prāpaka sadbhāve bhavati

original: evañca yatra yatra doṣasambhāvanayā tatsandehastatra tatraiva parīkṣāpekṣā nānyatra /
analyzed: evam ca yatra yatra doṣa sambhāvanayā tad sandehaḥ tatra tatra eva parīkṣā apekṣā na anyatra
na ca sarvatra doṣa sandehaḥ sti
sākṣi siddhe rthe tad prāpti abhāvāt
atas na tāvat parīkṣā anavasthā
tathā hi

original: astyatra purataḥ pānīyamiti vākyaṃ śrutavato bhavati sandehaḥ kimidaṃ viparyayādimūlamuta neti /
analyzed: asti atra puratas pānīyam iti vākyam śrutavataḥ bhavati sandehaḥ kim idam viparyaya ādi mūlam uta na iti
puruṣa vacasām ubhayathā darśanāt

original: tata evārthe sandihānaḥ pratyāsīdan rūpaviśeṣādinānuminoti pānīyametaditi /
analyzed: tatas eva arthe sandihānaḥ pratyāsīdan rūpa viśeṣa ādinā anuminoti pānīyam etat iti
tatra api bhavati saṃśayaḥ
kim idam anumānam uta ābhāsam saḥ iti
vyāpti ādi grāhiṇām yāthārthya a yāthārthya upalambhāt
pratyāsannaḥ ca udaka abhyavahāra anantaram rasa viśeṣāṇā anumāya api pūrvavat sandigdhe
pīta udakaḥ tu udanyā ādi nimitta duḥkha abhāvam sukham ca anubhavan na tatra saṃśete
sukha ādau tad abhāve ca sākṣi siddhe kadāpi anyathābhāva ādi anupalambhāt
na ca pratīta tva sāmānyena tatra api saṃśayaḥ
viśeṣa niṣṭhasya niścāyakasya sadbhāvāt
anyathā saṃśaya anucchedena vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: saṃśayābhāve ca na tatpūrvikā parīkṣeti kuto 'navasthā /
analyzed: saṃśaya abhāve ca na tad pūrvikā parīkṣā iti kutas navasthā
atas eva sākṣa prāmāṇya avadhāraṇe parīkṣā anavasthā api parihṛtā
grāhaka anavasthā tu na asti eva
sākṣiṇaḥ sva prakāśa tvena sva prāmāṇya grāhaka tvāt
etāvān atra viśeṣaḥ

original: indriyaliṅgaśabdajanyeṣu jñāneṣvanādau saṃsāre dvayīṃ gatimanusandadhatsākṣī na sahasaiva pramāṇametaditi niścetuṃ śaknoti /
analyzed: indriya liṅga śabda janyeṣu jñāneṣu anādau saṃsāre dvayīm gatim anusandadhat sākṣī na sahasā eva pramāṇam etat iti niścetum śaknoti
kintu
doṣa abhāvam ca na svayam eva
avadhārayitum īṣye
api kim tu parīkṣā sahakṛtaḥ eva

original: parīkṣāyāṃ cendriyaliṅgaśabdajāyāṃ pūrvanyāyena parīkṣāntaramanusarati yāvatsākṣātsvaviṣaye sukhādāvavatarati /
analyzed: parīkṣāyām ca indriya liṅga śabda jāyām pūrva nyāyena parīkṣā antaram anusarati yāvat sākṣāt sva viṣaye sukha ādau avatarati
na ca sva ātmani anena kadāpi anyathābhāvaḥ vagataḥ iti sandeha abhāvāt parīkṣā anusaraṇāt nivartate

original: nahi jñānasvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca viṣayīkartuṃ svamahimnaiva śaknoti /
analyzed: nahi jñāna svarūpam prāmāṇyam ca viṣayīkartum sva mahimnā eva śaknoti

original: tasya tu mānasyā doṣaśaṅkayā prāmāṇyagrahaṇaśaktiḥ pratibaddhā /
analyzed: tasya tu mānasyā doṣa śaṅkayā prāmāṇya grahaṇa śaktiḥ pratibaddhā
atas vyavasthā eva tat spṛśati
na tu avadhāraṇasya iṣye

original: parīkṣayā ca pratibandhe 'pagate nijayaiva śaktyā prāmāṇyamavadhārayati /
analyzed: parīkṣayā ca pratibandhe nijayā eva śaktyā prāmāṇyam avadhārayati

original: nacāsya vyutpādanasyāprāmāṇye 'pi samatvāttasyāpi svato grahaṇamiti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca asya vyutpādanasya aprāmāṇye sama tvāt tasya api svatas grahaṇam iti vācyam
vaiṣamyāt
prāmāṇya avadhāraṇe hi parīkṣāyāḥ pratibandhaka nivartaka tva mātram śakyate vadhārayitum
sahakāri tve hi sarvatra tad apekṣā syāt
tathā ca anavasthā iti uktam
anyathā kāraṇa tvam vyāhanyeta

original: na cāprāmāṇyaṃ kvāpi parīkṣānapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇā niścitacaram /
analyzed: na ca aprāmāṇyam kvāpi parīkṣā anapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇā niścita caram
yena pratibandhaka nivartaka tvam tasyāḥ pratīmaḥ
kintu sārvatrika tvāt kāraṇa tvam eva
pratibandhakasya sārvatrika tvāt anyathā asiddham sārvatrika tvam iti ced na
haṇe ca parīkṣāyāḥ kāraṇa tva upapatteḥ
evam sati gauravam iti ced na
viśeṣa avadhāraṇāyāḥ aśakya tvasya eva kalpaka abhāvāt
tathā api
tvasya anyathā asiddhiḥ śaṅkayataḥ iti ced na
pratibandhakasya sārvatrika tāyāḥ kvāpi adarśanena anyathāsiddhi śaṅkā nirāsāt
anyathā sarvatra sahakāriṇām tathātvam syāt

original: yadi jñānagrāhakātiriktasya yathākathamapi praveśātprāmāṇyasya paratastvamiti matam,
analyzed: yadi jñāna grāhaka atiriktasya yathā katham api praveśāt prāmāṇyasya paratas tvam iti matam

original: tadā sākṣiṇa eva svataḥprāmāṇyamanyasya parata ityaṅgīkāre 'pi na kaścidvirodha iti saṅkṣepaḥ /
analyzed: tadā sākṣiṇaḥ eva svatas prāmāṇyam anyasya paratas iti aṅgīkāre pi na kaścid virodhaḥ iti saṅkṣepaḥ
vistaraḥ tu svayam eva
ācāryeṇa vakṣyate
atha matam
sākṣī pratyakṣa ādīnām prāmāṇyam gṛhṇan api katipaya kāla katipaya puruṣa sambandhi bandhi vaidhurya rūpam eva

original: na punarasya kadācitkutrāpi kenāpi svārthavyabhicāro na bhaviṣyatītyevaṃrūpam /
analyzed: na punar asya kadācid kutra api kena api sva artha vyabhicāraḥ na bhaviṣyati iti evaṃrūpam
tat katham tena ātyantika bādhā abhāva lakṣaṇam satya tvam viśvasya
siddhayet iti atas āha anyathā iti
anyathā śruti yuktayā ādi pramāṇaiḥ ca saha eva tu

original: akasmād vinivṛttiśca kiṃ viśvasya na śaṅkayate // MAnuv_1,4.100 //
analyzed: akasmāt vinivṛttiḥ ca kim viśvasya na śaṅkayate

original: sākṣiṇaḥ sarvathā bādhavaidhurvalakṣaṇaprāmāṇyāgrāhakatve viśvasya pūrṇasya brahmaṇo 'pi prapañcavadvinivṛttiḥ kiṃ kasmānna śaṅkayate /
analyzed: sākṣiṇaḥ sarvathā bādha vaidhurva lakṣaṇa prāmāṇya a grāhaka tve viśvasya pūrṇasya brahmaṇaḥ pi prapañca vat vinivṛttiḥ kim kasmāt na śaṅkayate
nivartaka abhāvāt iti atas uktam akasmāt iti
nanu ca satyam jñānam tat satyam
ityādi śrutyā
brahma na nivṛttimat ajñāna tad kārya atirikta tvāt ityādi anumānena
niradhiṣṭhānakasya asākṣikasya bhramasya
niravadhikasya bādhasya ca adarśanāt prapañca āropa ādi anyathā anupapattyā
brahmaṇaḥ satyatā avagamāt tat na iti atas uktam śruti iti
eteṣām api pramāṇānām pratyakṣa ādīnām iva vinivṛttiḥ śaṅkayatām iti arthaḥ
etat uktam bhavati
prapañca viṣayāṇām pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇānām na ātyantikam prāmāṇyam sākṣī gṛhṇāti
kintu tātkālikam eva
iti vadan vaktavyaḥ
sākṣiṇaḥ kim ātyantika prāmāṇya grahaṇe śaktiḥ asti uta na asti

original: ādye kathaṃ prapañcaviṣayāṇāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ prāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: ādye katham prapañca viṣayāṇām pratyakṣa ādīnām prāmāṇyam ātyantikam na gṛhṇīyāt

original: dvitīye brahmaṇaḥ satyatāpratipādakānāṃ śrutyādīnāmapi nātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: dvitīye brahmaṇaḥ satya tā pratipādakānām śruti ādīnām api na ātyantikam prāmāṇyam gṛhṇīyāt
tathāca na brahmaṇaḥ bādhya tvam ātyantikam siddhayet
tatas ca sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt tasya api bādhaḥ śaṅkayeta

original: evaṃca tajjñānamapi na tattvajñānamiti na tadarthaḥ prayatnaḥ syāt /
analyzed: evaṃca tat jñānam api na tattva jñānam iti na tad arthaḥ prayatnaḥ syāt

original: atha kvacicchaktiḥ kvacinneti brūyāttadā niyāmakaṃ vācyamiti / *4,574*
analyzed: atha kvacid śaktiḥ kvacid na iti brūyāt tadā niyāmakam vācyam iti

original: nanu yadi brahma bādhārhaṃ syāttarhīyatā kālena kuto na nivṛttam /
analyzed: nanu yadi brahma bādhā arham syāt tarhi īyatā kālena kutas na nivṛttam

original: tasmāditaḥpūrvaṃ bādharahitatvānnottaratrāpi bādhaḥ śaṅkayata iti cenna /
analyzed: tasmāt itas pūrvam bādha rahita tvāt na uttaratra api bādhaḥ śaṅkayate iti ced na
ukta uttara tvāt
asyāḥ api upapatteḥ sākṣi grāhya pramāṇa bhāvāyāḥ ātyantika prāmāṇya asiddheḥ
anyathā prapañca grāhiṇām pratyakṣa ādīnām api tathātvasya anivāraṇāt
vyavasthāpaka abhāvāt
dūṣaṇa antaram āha itas pūrvam iti

original: itaḥ pūrvaṃ tathābhāvād yadi no saṃsṛtergatiḥ // MAnuv_1,4.101ab //
analyzed: itas pūrvam tathābhāvāt yadi no saṃsṛteḥ gatiḥ
tathābhāvāt nivṛtti abhāvāt

original: yadi brahmaṇo nivṛttinar śaṅkayata iti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śaṅkayate iti sambandhaḥ
tarhi iti adhyāhāraḥ
gatiḥ nivṛttiḥ syāt iti śeṣaḥ
ayam āśayaḥ
itas pūrvam anivṛtta tvāt iti kim brahmaṇaḥ nivṛtti abhāve sambhāvanā ukta tā anumānam
na ādyaḥ
sambhāvanāyāḥ api saṃśaya rūpa tvena śaṅkā nivāraṇa a sāmarthyāt
na dvitīyaḥ
tathā sati saṃsṛteḥ avidyāyāḥ nivṛtti abhāva prasaṅgāt
na hi itas prāk mūla avidyā nivṛttā
anyathā tasyām eva vyabhicāraḥ syāt iti
kiñca śukti rajata ādikam prāk anivṛttam eva nivartate
nivṛttasya nivṛtti ayogāt
atas viruddha tā ca
anyathā ityādi anyathā vyākhyāyate

original: viśvasya viyadāderuttarakṣaṇa eva nivṛttirvināśaḥ kiṃ na śaṅkayate /
analyzed: viśvasya viyat ādeḥ uttara kṣaṇe eva nivṛttiḥ vināśaḥ kim na śaṅkayate
tathā ca sarva pravṛtti vilayaḥ syāt
parameśvara sañjihīrṣā ādi abhāvāt iti atas uktam akasmāt iti
pṛṣṭhe draṣṭavyam
nanu īśvara icchayā eva śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇāni prapañca pralayam pratipādayanti
viśva vināśaḥ na nirhetukaḥ vināśa tvāt paṭa nāśa vat iti anumānam api
tat katham evam śaṅkayate iti atas uktam śruti iti
tātparyam pūvar vat
nanu prāk itas na prapañca vi
kasmāt abhūt
tat katham uttaratra api śaṅkayeta iti atas uktam
āha itas pūrvam iti

original: kimatra yatpūrvaṃ nābhūttaduttaratrāpi na bhaviṣyatīti vyāptiḥ,
analyzed: kim atra yat pūrvam na abhūt tat uttaratra api na bhaviṣyati iti vyāptiḥ

original: kiṃvā yatpūrvaṃ na nirhetukaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ na taduttaratrāpi tathā vināśavaditi,
analyzed: kiṃvā yat pūrvam na nirhetukam vinaṣṭam na tat uttaratra api tathā vināśa vat iti
yat vā yat nirhetukam na tat bhaviṣyati iti vyāptiḥ
pūrva uktiḥ tu tad upapādanāya iti
na ādyaḥ
saṃsṛteḥ avidyāyāḥ nivṛtti abhāva prasaṅgāt
na dvitīyaḥ
saṃsāra nivṛtti prasaṅgāt
tathā hi
sā api avidyā ātmaka tvāt saṃsṛtiḥ eva
na ca tasyāḥ nivartaka antaram asti

original: tathācākasmātkimapi na nivartata ityaṅgīkāre no saṃsṛtergatiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca akasmāt kim api na nivartate iti aṅgīkāre no saṃsṛteḥ gatiḥ
vidyā svayam eva sva nivṛtti hetuḥ avidyā mātra virodhi tvāt iti ced na
evam tarhi prapañcaḥ pi uttara kṣaṇe svayam eva

uktam eva artham vivṛṇoti vākya iti

original: vākyānumāditaścet syāt tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca sākṣitaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.101cd //

athavā no saṃsṛteḥ gatiḥ iti uktam
saṃsāra gateḥ śruti ādi siddha tvāt
tad asiddhayā ca hetoḥ viśeṣaṇāt iti atas āha vākya iti

original: brahmaṇo 'pi nivṛttyāśaṅkāyāmāpāditāyāṃ yadi paro vākyānumādito nivṛttyabhāvaniścayaḥ syāditi brūyāt,
analyzed: nivṛtti āśaṅkāyām āpāditāyām yadi paraḥ vākya anumāditaḥ nivṛtti abhāva niścayaḥ syāt iti brūyāt

original: yadi vā ākasmikottarakṣaṇe pralayaśaṅkāpādane vākyānumāditaḥ parameśvarecchādinaiva syāditi manyeta,
analyzed: yadi vā ākasmika uttara kṣaṇe pralaya śaṅkā āpādane vākya anumāditaḥ parameśvara icchā ādinā eva syāt iti manyeta

original: yadi ca vākyānumāditaḥ saṃsāranivṛttiḥ syāditi vadet,
analyzed: yadi ca vākya anumāditaḥ saṃsāra nivṛttiḥ syāt iti vadet

original: tadā tasya vākyādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ kena niścitamiti vaktavyam /
analyzed: tadā tasya vākya ādeḥ prāmāṇyam kena niścitam iti vaktavyam

original: sākṣītareṇetyaṅgīkāre jñānasya sākṣivedyatvena parataḥ prāmāṇyagrahāpatteḥ sākṣiṇaiveti vaktavyam / *4,583*
analyzed: sākṣī itareṇa iti aṅgīkāre jñānasya sākṣi vedya tvena paratas prāmāṇya graha āpatteḥ sākṣiṇā eva iti vaktavyam
tatas kim iti ced

original: sākṣī kiṃ brahmasatyatvādipratipādakānāṃ vākyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tātkālikameva gṛhṇāti kiṃvā'tyantikam /
analyzed: sākṣī kim brahma satya tva ādi pratipādakānām vākya ādīnām prāmāṇyam tātkālikam eva gṛhṇāti kiṃvā ātyantikam
dvitīye tu āha tat prāmāṇyam iti
tad prāmāṇyam yathā sākṣī sthāpayati evam eva hi
sarva kāleṣu api sthairyāt vyabhicāram apohya ca
evam akṣa jamāna tva siddhām viśvasya satya tām
kim iti sthāpayet na ayam
yathā śabdasya atra uttaratra ca sambandhaḥ

original: tasya brahmasatyatvādipratipādakavākyādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ yathā sākṣī vartamānakālīnaṃ sthāpayati gṛhṇāti /
analyzed: tasya brahma satya tva ādi pratipādaka vākya ādeḥ prāmāṇyam yathā sākṣī vartamāna kālīnam sthāpayati gṛhṇāti
evam eva sarva kāleṣu api sthairyeṇa gṛhṇāti
hi śabdaḥ para prasiddhi dyotakaḥ
sthairyam eva vivṛṇoti
vyabhicāram bādham apohya nirākṛtya eva iti

original: na kevalaṃ brahmasatyatvatvādivākyādiprāmāṇyaṃ sākṣī tātkālikaṃ gṛhṇāti kintvātyantikamevetyarthaḥ / *4,584*
analyzed: na kevalam brahma satya tva tva ādi vākya ādi prāmāṇyam sākṣī tātkālikam gṛhṇāti kintu ātyantikam eva iti arthaḥ
athavā yathā śabdasya uttareṇa eva sambandhaḥ
sthāpayati āntikam eva gṛhṇāti iti arthaḥ
asya eva vivaraṇam evam eva iti
iti śabdaḥ dhyāhāryaḥ

original: sarvakāleṣvapīdamevameva na kadāpi viṣayāpahāralakṣaṇaṃ bādhamāpnotīti vyabhicāramapohya tata eva sthairyeṇa gṛhṇātīti /
analyzed: sarva kāleṣu api idam evam eva na kadāpi viṣaya apahāra lakṣaṇam bādham āpnoti iti vyabhicāram apohya tatas eva sthairyeṇa gṛhṇāti iti
yat vā evam śabdaḥ samuccaye
sākṣī brahma ādi viṣaya vākya ādi prāmāṇyam sthāpayati ātyantikam gṛhṇāti

original: ata eva tadviṣayamapi brahmādikaṃ sarvakāleṣvapi sthairyādatiśayena vyabhicāramapohyaiva sthāpayatīti /
analyzed: atas eva tad viṣayam api brahma ādikam sarva kāleṣu api sthairyāt atiśayena vyabhicāram apohya eva sthāpayati iti
prāmāṇya ātyantika tvā
ntargata tvāt viṣaya abādhya tāyāḥ iti hi śabda atharḥ
evam iti dārṣyāntika uktiḥ

original: ayaṃ sākṣī yadi tatsatyamityādipramāṇaprāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ gṛhṇan tadviṣayasya brahmādestraikālikābādhyatvaṃ
analyzed: ayam sākṣī yadi tat satyam ityādi pramāṇa prāmāṇyam ātyantikam gṛhṇan tad viṣayasya brahma ādeḥ traikālika abādhya tvam
vyavasthāpayet tarhi tathā eva viśva viṣayasya akṣaja ādi jñānasya ātyantikam prāmāṇyam gṛhṇan
tad antargatām viśvasya abādhya tām api sthāpayet eva
t aviśeṣāt iti samudāya arthaḥ
nanu gṛhṇātu ātyantikam prāmāṇyam akṣaja ādīnām sākṣī
tasya tathātvam tu kutas
tatas ca na viśva satyatā siddhiḥ iti atas āha nirdoṣa iti
sākṣiṇaḥ nirdoṣa jñāna rūpa tva śaktyā tathātvam api siddhayati
anyathā brahma satya tva ādi api na
yat vā tat satyam ityādeḥ ātyantikam prāmāṇyam gṛhṇāti sākṣī

original: viśvaviṣayasyākṣajādestu tātkālikameveti kiṃ na syādityata āha- nirdoṣeti //
analyzed: viśva viṣayasya akṣaja ādeḥ tu tātkālikam eva iti kim na syāt iti atas āha nirdoṣa iti
ayam arthaḥ

original: tatsatyamityādijñānasyātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇāti sākṣītyatra kiṃ nimittam /
analyzed: tat satyam ityādi jñānasya ātyantikam prāmāṇyam gṛhṇāti sākṣī iti atra kim nimittam

original: jñānaṃ gṛhṇan tasya nirdoṣatāyāṃ prāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇātīti sākṣiṇaḥ svabhāvo 'yamiti cet /
analyzed: jñānam gṛhṇan tasya nirdoṣa tāyām prāmāṇyam api gṛhṇāti iti sākṣiṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ yam iti ced

original: kathaṃ tarhyakṣajāderapi ātyantikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: katham tarhi akṣaja ādeḥ api ātyantikam prāmāṇyam na gṛhṇīyāt
śakti sadbhāvāt iti

original: athavā kiṃ sākṣī kutrāpi prāmāṇyamātyantikaṃ grahītuṃ na śaknoti /
analyzed: athavā kim sākṣī kutra api prāmāṇyam ātyantikam grahītum na śaknoti
kiṃvā kvacid śaktaḥ kvacid aśaktaḥ
ādyasya uttaram anyathā ityādi
dvitīyasya uttaram vākya iti
syāt etat evam yadi akṣaja ādi jñānam nirdoṣam syāt
na ca evam
avidyā kṛta prapañca viṣaya tvāt śukti rajata ādi jñāna vat
nanu avidyā kim āśritā iti ced
jīva āśritā iti brūmaḥ
nanu atra api dūṣaṇam uktam svatas iti
na etat asti
tad bhedasya api āvidyaka tvāt
na ca cakraka ādi doṣaḥ
prapañca viśva
sya jīva ajñāna kṛta tvena śruti ādi siddha tvāt
pramite ca arthe tarkāṇām avakāśa abhāvāt
na ca kalpya abhāva doṣaḥ
viśvasya eka ajñāna kṛta tva aṅgīkārāt
tad atirikta jīva jaḍa prapañcasya kalpya tva upapatteḥ
eka jīva vādaḥ hi māyā vādinām param hṛdayam
bahu jīva vādaḥ tu mandānām ābhimukhyāya avatāritaḥ iti atas āha eka iti
eka jñāna kṛtam viśvam iti yat coṣyate mṛṣā
bahu jñāna kṛtam viśvam iti tasya uttaram bhavet
ucyate brahma vivarta vādibhiḥ
mṛṣā pramāṇena vinā
etat uktam bhavati
syāt api idam kathañcid
yadi viśvasya eka jīva ajñāna kalpita tvam syāt
na ca etat asti
pramāṇa abhāvāt
śruti ādeḥ anupadam eva samyak vyākhyāsyamāna tvāt

original: bahūnāmīśvarasya tatpreritānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ ca jñānecchāprayatnairnimittatve śrutyādipramāṇasadbhāvena tadviruddhatvācceti / *4,591*
analyzed: bahūnām īśvarasya tad preritānām brahma ādīnām ca jñāna icchā prayatnaiḥ nimitta tve śruti ādi pramāṇa sadbhāvena tad viruddha tvāt ca iti

original: kiñcaikajīvājñānaparikalpitaṃ jīvajaḍātmakaṃ samastamiti vadanpraṣṭavyaḥ kimasāveko jīvastvam utānya iti /
analyzed: kiñca eka jīva ajñāna parikalpitam jīva jaḍa ātmakam samastam iti vadan praṣṭavyaḥ kim asau ekaḥ jīvaḥ tvam uta anyaḥ iti
anyaḥ ced tad ajñāna kalpitasya tava bandha mokṣa abhāvāt vayartham pārivrājya ādikam ām iti āpadyeta
ādye pi prativādi pramukhān jīvān paśyasi na vā
prathame pi kim
santi iti uta na santi iti
ādyam dūṣayati parasya iti
parasya satya tām jānan api yaḥ sva ātma taskaraḥ
paraḥ na asti iti vadati

original: yaḥ parasya prativādyādeḥ satyatāṃ jānannapi paro nāstīti vadati /
analyzed: yaḥ parasya prativādi ādeḥ satya tām jānan api paraḥ na asti iti vadati
sa sva ātma taskaraḥ iti yojanā

original: svātmānamiva paramapi satyatayā paśyato 'hameka eva satyo madajñānakalpitāḥ sarve jīvā jaḍāśceti vacanaṃ svānubhavaviruddhamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sva ātmānam iva param api satya tayā paśyataḥ ham ekaḥ eva satyaḥ mad ajñāna kalpitāḥ sarve jīvāḥ jaḍāḥ ca iti vacanam sva anubhava viruddham iti arthaḥ
nahi tvad ajñāna parikalpitam samastam iti atra balavat pramāṇam asti
yena darśanam api bādhyeta
nahi sattvena pratīyamānasya api gandharvanagara ādeḥ asattvam eva aṅgīkriyate
kintu balavat pramāṇa bādhāt
anyathā prativādī ajñāna kalpitaḥ tvam iti katham na syāḥ

original: tathā cāniścayena na mokṣārthā pravṛttiḥ syāditi / *4,592*
analyzed: tathā ca aniścayena na mokṣa arthā pravṛttiḥ syāt iti
dvitīya tṛtīyau nirācaṣṭe kim iti
kim iti unmatta vat vadet
yadi paraḥ prativādi ādi jīvān na paśyati
paśyan vā na santi iti paśyati
tadā kim iti unmatta vat vavadet
na kathāyām praviśet
na śāstram viracayet vayākuryāt vā

original: anyathonmattavannāyaṃ laukiko nāpi parīkṣaka ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā unmatta vat na ayam laukikaḥ na api parīkṣakaḥ iti upekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt
kutas na vadet
yena vadan unmatta padavīm āsādayet iti atas āha parābhāve iti
parābhāve hi vāc vyarthā
vācaḥ para bodhana artha tvāt

original: parābhāve ca tadvaiyarthyādvayarthyāṃ vācaṃ na prayuñjīta /
analyzed: parābhāve ca tad vaiyarthyāt vayarthyām vācam na prayuñjīta
prayuñjānaḥ ca katham unmattaḥ na syāt iti
satyam parābhāve vacanam anarthakam

original: mayāpi kimapi nocyata ityata āha- yadīti //
analyzed: mayā api kim api na ucyate iti atas āha yadi iti
yadi na eva ucyate tadā
kaśā vetra ādikam tasya taskarasya uttaram vadet

original: mayā kimapi kadāpi naivocyata iti yadyucyate tadā svakriyāvirodhiśraḥ sakalalokāvagatārthāpalāpinastasya taskarasyaiva daṇḍa evocito na pratyuttaram
analyzed: mayā kim api kadāpi na eva ucyate iti yadi ucyate tadā sakala loka avagata artha apalāpinaḥ tasya taskarasya eva daṇḍaḥ eva ucitaḥ na pratyuttaram
paramārthataḥ na ucyate iti ucyate iti ced

original: tatkiṃ pratīyogyabhāve niścite vyavahārato 'pi vadantaḥ prekṣāvanto bhavanti,
analyzed: tat kim prati yogi abhāve niścite vyavahārataḥ pi vadantaḥ prekṣāvantaḥ bhavanti
yena idam ucyeta iti
prāk prapañca mithyātva siddhaye para udāhṛtānām śrutīnām bāhya upapatti virodhaḥ
vyutpāditaḥ
idānīm āntara anupapatti pradarśana pūrvakam tāsām aviruddha artha vyākhyāna artham uttaraḥ granthaḥ
athavā sarva śruti sādhāraṇa anupapattiḥ prāk prapañcitā
idānīm asādhāraṇa anupapattiḥ vyutpādyate

original: tatra tāvatprapañco yadi vidyetetyādivākyadvayaṃ paṭhitvā parābhimate 'rthe 'nupapattimāha- prapañca iti //
analyzed: tatra tāvat prapañcaḥ yadi vidyeta ityādi vākya dvayam paṭhitvā para abhimate rthe nupapattim āha prapañcaḥ iti

original: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: prapañcaḥ yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ
māyā mātram idam dvaitam advaitam paramārthataḥ
vikalpaḥ vinivarteta kalpitaḥ yadi kenacid

original: upadeśādayaṃ vādo 'jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MAnuv_1,4.108 //
analyzed: upadeśāt ayam vādaḥ jñāte dvaitam na vidyate

original: ityatra yadiśabdau ca nivarteteti ca dvayam /
analyzed: iti atra yadi śabdau ca nivarteta iti ca dvayam
viśvasya satya tām āhuḥ

original: nanvatra sūtragṛhītatayā pareṇopāttānāṃ śrutīnāmanupapattyādikaṃ prathamatā vaktavyam /
analyzed: nanu atra sūtra gṛhīta tayā pareṇa upāttānām śrutīnām anupapatti ādikam prathamatā vaktavyam
satyam
tathā api eka jīva ajñāna parikalpita tve samastasya
na pramāṇam asti iti anantaram eva uktam
asyām ca tat āpātataḥ pratīyate
anādi māyayā suptaḥ yadā jīvaḥ
iti ukta tvāt
atas ubhaya ānuguṇyāt asyāḥ prathama prāptiḥ

original: ityatra ślokadvaye yadiśabdadvayaṃ nivarteteti liṅprayogadvayaṃ ca /
analyzed: iti atra śloka dvaye yadi śabda dvayam nivarteta iti liṅ prayoga dvayam ca
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
vidyeta iti api grāhyam

satyatām iti upalakṣaṇam
an ādi tām ca iti grāhyam
āhuḥ iti avagamayanti iti arthaḥ
tathā ca viśva mithyātva para tayā vyākhyāne tad anupapattiḥ iti śeṣaḥ
yat yatra prapañca mithyātvam abhisaṃ

original: dhitsitaṃ syāttadā yo 'yaṃ prapañco vidyata iva dṛśyate sa nivartiṣyate /
analyzed: dhitsitam syāt tadā yaḥ yam prapañcaḥ vidyate iva dṛśyate sa nivartiṣyate

original: ajñānena kalpito vikalpo vinivartiṣyata iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: ajñānena kalpitaḥ vikalpaḥ vinivartiṣyate iti vaktavyam
yadi ādyāḥ tuśabdāḥ vigata arthāḥ viruddha arthāḥ ca
tad prayoge hi prasaṅga dvaya param etat vākya dvayam iti vijñāyate

original: yadi parvato niragniko bhavet tarhi nirdhūmo 'pi syāditi yathā / *4,597*
analyzed: yadi parvataḥ niragnikaḥ bhavet tarhi nirdhūmaḥ syāt iti yathā

original: prasaṅgasya ca viparyaye paryavasānādanivṛttyādikameva vākyasāmarthyāllabhyata iti parakīyamarthamapākurvataiva śrutitātparyaṃ sūcitam /
analyzed: prasaṅgasya ca viparyaye paryavasānāt anivṛtti ādikam eva vākya sāmarthyāt labhyate iti parakīyam artham apākurvatā eva śruti tātparyam sūcitam
tat spaṣṭīkurvan vidyeta iti asya artham tāvat āha vidyeta iti
vidyeta utpattim eva ca
iti etat śabda rūpam utpattim eva āha
na tu sattām iti prakṛti artha kathanam
caśabdena nivarteta iti vināśam āha
na tu bādham iti samuccinoti
vidyateḥ utapatti artha tvam kutas iti atas āha vidā iti
vidā utpattau iti hi asmāt dhātoḥ
vidā utpattau iti hi asmāt dhātoḥ
dhātoḥ dhātu vyākhyānāt iti arthaḥ
vidyateḥ utpatti artha tvam pratyetavyam iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ
dhātoḥ iti ṣaṣṭhayantam vā
tasya vyākhyānāt iti śeṣaḥ
mandānām aprasiddham api idam dhātu vyākhyānam bahu jñānām prasiddham eva iti hi śabda bda arthaḥ
tathā api utpaviḥ eva iti kutas
sattā atra kutas na iti atas āha utpattiḥ eva iti
utpattiḥ eva hi

original: atra hi prapañco yadi vidyeta tarhi nivarteteti yadiśabdādibalātprasaṅgo 'yamiti jñāyate /
analyzed: atra hi prapañcaḥ yadi vidyeta tarhi nivarteta iti yadiśabda ādi balāt prasaṅgaḥ yam iti jñāyate
prasaṅgaḥ ca vyāpti mūlaḥ
tathā ca vidyeta iti āpādaka tayā uktasya arthasya nivarteta iti āpādya tayā uktayā nivṛttyā vyāptiḥ avaśyambhāvinī
utpattiḥ eva nivṛtti vyāpti kktā
na sattā
asmākam vyabhicāri tvāt parasya viruddha tvāt
atas pratīyamāna anvaya yogya tā bhāvāt na sattā vidyateḥ arthaḥ
kintu utpattiḥ eva tad yogya tvāt iti
pradhvaṃsa vyudāsā atha prāyas iti aktam
utpattiḥ nivṛtti yuj iti ayam prāyas bāhulyam iti arthaḥ
tathāca bhāva tve sati iti āpādaka viśeṣaṇam vivakṣitam iti uktam bhavati
etena alpa jñānām dhātu vyākhyāne vipratipattiḥ iti nirastā veditavyā
nanu utpattiḥ nāma kāraṇa āyatta sattā lābhaḥ
na ca abhāve sattā asti iti abhāvasya prasakti abhāvāt prāyas iti vyartham
mā evam

original: keyaṃ sattā nāmānugatarūpā vā svarūpameva vā nādyaḥ /
analyzed: kā iyam sattā nāma anugata rūpā vā svarūpam eva vā na ādyaḥ
tasyāḥ ghaṭa ādau api abhāvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt
na dvitīyaḥ

original: abhāve tadbhāvasyāstyabhāvo 'sti ca dhvaṃsa ityādau vakṣyamāṇatvāditi / *4,602*
analyzed: abhāve tad bhāvasya asti abhāvaḥ sti ca dhvaṃsaḥ ityādau vakṣyamāṇa tvāt iti
nanu asmin api vyākhyāne na anvaya yogyatā asti
tarkasya vyāptiḥ iva viparyaye paryavasānam avaśyambhāvi
tathā ca prapañcaḥ yadi utpadyeta tarhi vinaśyeta
na ca vinaśyati
tasmāt na utpadyate iti vaktavyam
na ca etat yuktam
kṣiti ādeḥ prapañcasya utpatti vināśayoḥ pramāṇa dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: ata eva tarkāṅgabhūtamāpādyasyāniṣṭatvaṃ ca nopapadyata ityataḥ prapañcaśabdamanyathā vyācaṣṭe- prapañca iti //
analyzed: atas eva tarka aṅga bhūtam āpādyasya aniṣṭa tvam ca na upapadyate iti atas prapañca śabdam anyathā vyācaṣṭe prapañcaḥ iti
na ayam prapañca śabdaḥ viśva vistāra vācī
yena ukta doṣaḥ syāt
kintu pañcānām vargaḥ pañcaḥ

original: pañcaśatau varge veti vāśabdena pañcaśabdasyāpi nipātanāṅgīkārāt /
analyzed: pañcaśatau varge vā iti vā śabdena pañca śabdasya api nipātana aṅgīkārāt
prakṛṣṭaḥ pañcaḥ prapañcaḥ
prakṛṣṭa tā ca mokṣa aṅga jñāna tayā bhavati
sā ca bheda sambandhinaḥ eva pañcakasya upapannā
vailakṣaṇyam tayoḥ jñātvā mucyate baddhayate nyathā ityādeḥ
saca jīva īśvara prakṛti ādi nitya svarūpa bhūtaḥ na ādi nityaḥ eva iti na ukta doṣaḥ
ṭīkākāraḥ tu manyate
bhedaḥ nāma anyonya abhāvaḥ

tteḥ eva abhāva vipatti tvasya prāgabhāve dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: naca kadāpi padārthānāmanyonyaṃ tādātmyamastītyanityānāmapi bhedo nitya eveti /
analyzed: na ca kadāpi padārthānām anyonyam tādātmyam asti iti anityānām api bhedaḥ nityaḥ eva iti
anye pi āhuḥ
nitye ca trayāṇām siddhiḥ iti

original: mithaśca jaḍabhedo yaḥ prapañco bhedapañcakaḥ // MAnuv_1,4.111 //
analyzed: mithas ca jaḍa bhedaḥ yaḥ prapañcaḥ bheda pañcakaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ satyo hyanādiścetyanena atrāpi pratijñādvayaṃ bahireva kartavyamiti jñāyate /
analyzed: saḥ yam satyaḥ hi anādiḥ ca iti anena atra api pratijñā dvayam bahis eva kartavyam iti jñāyate

anena prathama ślokasya pūrva ardhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ bhavati
satya tva abhāve bādhakam svayam ūhanīyam iti abhipretya tat upasaṃhṛtam dvaitam iti

original: dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tasmādajñānināṃ matam // MAnuv_1,4.112cd //
analyzed: dvaitam na vidyate iti tasmāt ajñāninām matam
iti śruteḥ
tena ajñātaḥ iti ukta artham bhavati
śruti antareṇa a vyākhyāta tvāt māyā mātram iti etat vayācaṣṭe matam iti

original: māṅ māne traiṅ pālana ityābhyāṃ ghaña'rthe kavidhānamiti karmaṇi kapratyaye mātramiti bhavati /
analyzed: māṅ māne traiṅ pālane iti ābhyām ghañ arthe ka vidhānam iti karmaṇi ka pratyaye mātram iti bhavati

original: dhātudvayādapyekaḥ pratyayaḥ adibhūbhyāṃ ḍutac adbhutamityādau dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: dhātu dvayāt api ekaḥ pratyayaḥ adi bhūbhyām ḍutac adbhutam ityādau dṛṣṭaḥ
viṣṇoḥ prajñaptiḥ eva ekā śabdaiḥ eva abhidhīyate

advaitam paramārthataḥ iti etat vayākhyāti uttamaḥ rthaḥ iti
uttamaḥ rthaḥ hariḥ tu ekaḥ tad anyat madhya mādhyamam
tasya upapādanam tad anyat iti
yatas tasmāt hareḥ anyat kiñcid madhyamam kiñcid adhamam tasmāt uttamaḥ rthaḥ hariḥ eva ekaḥ iti

iti etat prapañca satya tāyām sphuṭam iti na vyākṛtam
iyam atra yojanā
anādi māyayā suptaḥ yadā jīvaḥ
ajam anidram asvapnam advaitam buddhayate tadā iti

original: pūrvaśloke 'nādimāyayā parameśvaraprajñayā tadicchayā vā jīvajātasya prakṛtyādijaḍāvṛtajñānatvalakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: pūrva śloke nādi māyayā parameśvara prajñayā tad icchayā vā jīva jātasya prakṛti ādi jaḍa āvṛta jñāna tva lakṣaṇam
supta tvam tayā eva parameśvara ādi tattva viṣaya parokṣa jñāna lakṣaṇam prabodham abhidhāya
aparokṣa jñānam api uktam
tena jīva īśvarayoḥ jaḍa īśvarayoḥ jīva jaḍayoḥ ca bhedāḥ pratipāditā

original: prabhoricchayā nigaḍādinā puruṣe baddhe mukte vā bheda(traya)darśanāt / *4,620*
analyzed: prabhoḥ icchayā nigaḍa ādinā puruṣe baddhe mukte vā bheda traya darśanāt
prāk prabhavaḥ sarva bhāvānām
iti bhāva śabda uktānām jīvānām mithas bhedaḥ pi uktaḥ
tatas eva āvaraṇānām jaḍānām api mithas bhedaḥ rthāt labhyate
teṣām ca pañcānām api bhedānām anādi māyayā ajam anidram
ityādi viśeṣaṇa sāmarthya ādinā nānā ādi tvam api labdham
tat etat pañca bhedasya satya tvam anādi tvam ca upapādayitum idam śloka dvayam

original: tatra tāvadanāditvaṃ vipakṣe bādhakapradarśanenopapādayati- prapañca iti //
analyzed: tatra tāvat anādi tvam vipakṣe bādhaka pradarśanena upapādayati prapañcaḥ iti

original: yadi ca jaḍajīvabhedo nivarteta tadā jīvānāṃ jaḍatvāpattyā mokṣaśāstravaiyarthyamityādirūpeṇa nivartetetyasyāniṣṭatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /

na saṃśayaḥ vyāpteḥ nirścāyakam āha
evam bheda pañcakasya anādi tām upapādya satya tāyām pramāṇam āha māyā mātram iti
yasmāt idam prapañca śabda uktam dvaitam ukta rītyā māyā mātram tasmāt satyam
na hi a vidyamānam īśvara prajñā viṣayaḥ bhavati
bhrānti tva prasaṅgāt
na api a vidyamānam kena api rakṣyate
atra dvayoḥ bhāvaḥ dvitā
tadīyaḥ vargaḥ dvaitam
sāmānye napuṃsakam
prapañca sambandhaḥ tu prakaraṇāt labhyate iti jñātavyam
tarhi advaitaḥ sarva bhāvānām ityādi katham uktam iti atas āha advaitam iti
yat idam parameśvarasya advaita tvam ca
viśeṣaṇam uktam na tat dvitīya vastu rāhitya abhiprāyeṇa
kintu paramārthataḥ
lyap lopa nimittā pañcamī
uktam amartham abhipretya iti
saptamī arthe vā tasiḥ
uttama artha viṣayaḥ iti
bheda satyatā anaṅgīkāre bādhakam ca āha vikalpaḥ iti

original: vikalpaḥ prakṛto bhedo yadi kenacidajñānādinā kalpitaḥ syāttarhi candrabhedavannivarteta /
analyzed: vikalpaḥ prakṛtaḥ bhedaḥ yadi kenacid ajñāna ādinā kalpitaḥ syāt tarhi candra bheda vat nivarteta
bādhyeta
na ca bādhyate
tasmāt na kalpitaḥ
kintu satyaḥ eva iti
upasaṃharati upadeśāt iti
tat evam upadeśāt śati ādi anusāri tvāt ayam eva satām vādaḥ
yaḥ bheda satya tva ādi viṣayaḥ

original: dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tu tattve 'jñāte sati bhavati /
analyzed: dvaitam na vidyate iti tu tattve jñāte sati bhavati
atas durvādaḥ iti

original: adhunā pariṇāmavādinā vivartavādinā ca pratijñādṛṣṭā tānuparodhāditi sūtrārthatayā gṛhītām“uta tamādeśamaprākṣa';

ityādikām śrutim vyākhyāti
tatra pariṇāma vādinaḥ vyākhyānam uta tam ādeśam aprākṣaḥ
yena a śrutam śrutam bhavati a matam matam a vijñātam vijñātam

original: itrata jagato brahmapariṇāmatayā tato 'nantvābhiprāyeṇa tadvijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātam /

original: tatra sarvasya brahmopādānatāmajānatā upādānopādeyayorapi bhedaṃ manyamānena śvetaketunā anyajñāne satyanyajñānasya kvāpyadarśanāt /

katham nu bhagavaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati

original: yataḥ śrutyā vācārambhaṇamityevokte kevalaśabdaprakṣepeṇa mithyeti vyākhyāne 'śrutakalpanameveti / *4,648*
analyzed: yatas śrutyā vācā ārambhaṇam iti eva ukte kevala śabda prakṣepeṇa mithyā iti vyākhyāne śruta kalpanam eva iti
dūṣaṇa antaram āha punaruktiḥ iti
punaruktiḥ nāmadheyam
iti śabdaḥ tra adhyahāryaḥ
āgāminaḥ vā kāka akṣi nyāyena ubhayatra sambandhaḥ
nāmadheyam iti etat nāmadheya mātram hi etat anṛtam iti pareṇa vyākhyātam
tasya vācā ārambhaṇam iti anena eva gata artha tvāt nāmadheyam iti punaruktiḥ syāt

original: atha vikāro nāmadheyaṃ ca dvayamapi vācārambhaṇamiti vyākhyānaṃ,
analyzed: atha vikāraḥ nāmadheyam ca dvayam api vācā ārambhaṇam iti vyākhyānam
tathā api vikāra śabdena eva abhidheya abhidhānayoḥ grahaṇa sambhavāt punaruktiḥ eva iti
tat nāma rūpābhyām vyākriyate ityādi śruteḥ
doṣa antaram āha iti iti asya iti
iti ityasya nirarthatā
mṛttikāyāḥ satya tvam hi parasya vivakṣitam
tatra mṛttikā eva satyā iti vaktavyam
vye iti śabdaḥ tu nirarthakaḥ eva
sa hi kvacid padārtha viparyāsa kṛt
kvacid hetau
kvāpi evam iti arthe
kutracid ādi śabda arthe
kvacid prakāra arthe
kvacid parisamāptau
na ca atra ete
vama ādiṣu anyatamena arthena arthavān
asmākam tuśabdāt arthe sampratyayaḥ

original: iti mṛttikārthe prāpte tatparihāreṇa śabdasvarūpagrahaṇārthaṃ tadupapattiḥ /
analyzed: iti mṛttikā arthe prāpte tad parihāreṇa śabda svarūpa grahaṇa artham tad upapattiḥ

original: pariṇāmavādino 'pi kṛdyoge tṛtīyāyā aṅgīkṛtatvāt lyuṭaḥ karmaṇi vyākhyātatvādvācārambhaṇaṃ
analyzed: pariṇāma vādinaḥ api kṛt yoge tṛtīyāyāḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt lyuṭaḥ karmaṇi vyākhyāta tvāt vācā ārambhaṇam
vikāraḥ nāmadheyam iti eteṣām padānām anvaya abhāvena pada antara adhyāhārasya iṣṭa tvāt aśruta kalpanam
nāmadheyasya api vikāra grahaṇena grahaṇa sambhavāt punaruktiḥ
iti śabdasya nirarthaka tā ca iti sphuṭa tvāt na uktam
nanu tena iti śabdaḥ prakāra vacanaḥ iti uktam
tat katham nirarthaka tā
ucyate
kārya kāraṇayoḥ bheda śaṅkā nirāsa artham hi idam ucyate

original: tatra yatsattayā mṛttikā satī tayaiva mṛṇmayaṃ satyamiti vyācakṣāṇena vaktavyam,
analyzed: tatra yad sattayā mṛttikā satī tayā eva mṛṇmayam satyam iti vyācakṣāṇena vaktavyam
kā iyam sattā vivakṣitā iti
svarūpa sattā ced sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā
yaḥ hi kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhedam manyate
sa katham kāraṇa svarūpeṇa eva kāryam sva rūpavat iti aṅgīkuryāt
atha sāmānya sattā
sā anaikāntikī
nahi mahiṣa sattayā san aśvaḥ mahiṣāt na bhidyate
atha mṛttikā sattā adhīna sattākam mṛṇmayam iti vivakṣitam iti
tathā api kulāla ādi sattā adhīna sattākam api bhavati iti anaikāntyam eva
viruddham ca ca etat
yat yad adhīnam tat eva tat iti
atas vivakṣita sādhana anupayogi tvāt iti śabdasya tad mate pi nirarthaka tā eva iti

original: idānīṃ yathā somyetyādīni dṛṣṭāntavākyāni svamatena vyākariṣyanparakīyavyākhyāyāṃ tāvaddoṣamāha- eka iti //
analyzed: idānīm yathā somya ityādīni dṛṣṭānta vākyāni sva matena vyākariṣyan parakīya vyākhyāyām tāvat doṣam āha ekaḥ iti

original: ekaḥ piṇḍo maṇiśceti padavaiyathyarmeva ca // MAnuv_1,4.119cd //
analyzed: ekaḥ piṇḍaḥ maṇiḥ ca iti pada vaiyathya ṛm eva ca
vikāra tva vivakṣāyām
pada samuccaye prathamaḥ caśabdaḥ
iti śabdasya pratyekam sambandhaḥ
vaiyarthyam vigata artha tvam viruddha artha tvam ca
evaśabdena vaiyarthyasya aparihārya tām āha
caśabdasya vivarta vivakṣāyām ca iti arthaḥ

original: jagato brahmavikāratvena tadāropitatvena caikavijñānena sarvavijñāne vivakṣite mṛdā vijñātayā mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt /
analyzed: jagataḥ brahma vikāra tvena tad āropita tvena ca eka vijñānena sarva vijñāne vivakṣite mṛdā vijñātayā mṛṇmayam vijñātam syāt
lohena vijñātena loha mayam vijñātam syāt

original: kṛṣṇāyasā vijñātena kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syādityetāvatā pūrṇatvāttrayāṇāmekaśabdānāṃ piṇḍamaṇinakhanikṛntanaśabdānāṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ ca vigatāthartvaṃ  #
analyzed: kṛṣṇāyasā vijñātena kārṣṇāyasam vijñātam syāt iti etāvatā pūrṇa tvāt trayāṇām eka śabdānām piṇḍa maṇi nakha nikṛntana śabdānām sarva śabdānām ca vigata athartvam
syāt
sarva mṛṇmaya ādīnām eka mṛd piṇḍa ādi vikāra tva abhāvāt viruddha artha tā ca syāt
āropita tvam tu ekasya api mṛṇmayasya ekasmin mṛd piṇḍe na asti
kutas sarvasya
yuktyā samathya ṛte iti ced
tarhi vivāda pada tvena dṛṣṭānta tā anupapattiḥ
laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ
iti hi nyāya vidaḥ
kintu ghaṭa ādīnām abādhita pratyakṣa ādi siddha tvena yuktiḥ eva ābhāsa bhūtā iti paramāṇu puñja vāda nirāse vakṣyate
āropita tve pi na ekasmin sarvam iti eka ādi padānām vaiyarthyam eva

original: nanvakeneti paramākāraṇasyaikatvaṃ piṇḍeneti kāryābhimukhyaṃ sarvamiti kāryanānātvaṃ vivakṣitam /
analyzed: nanu akena iti parama akāraṇasya ekatvam piṇḍena iti kārya ābhimukhyam sarvam iti kārya nānātvam vivakṣitam
atas katham vaiyarthyam iti
mā evam
dārṣyāntika vākye tad vivakṣāyām atra vaiyarthya aparihārāt
api ca ādyayoḥ dṛṣṭāntayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva mātram asti
kintu eka ādi pada vaiyarthyam eva
idam tu sarvathā na upapadyate
yathā somya ekena nakha nikṛntanena iti
nakha nikṛntanasya antyāvayavi tvena kārṣṇāyasa antaram prati kāraṇatvasya eva asambhavāt
kimu ekasya sarvam prati iti āha na ca iti
na ca eka nakha kṛntanam
sarva kārṣṇāyasam ca syāt
sarvam ca iti dvitīya caśabda sambandhaḥ

original: yadyatra dṛṣṭāntatraye na vikāravivartavivakṣā kiṃ tarhi vivakṣitamityata āha- ata iti //
analyzed: yadi atra dṛṣṭānta traye na vikāra vivarta vivakṣā kim tarhi vivakṣitam iti atas āha atas iti
atas sādṛśye eva ca

original: vivakṣātra tu nityatve prādhānye coktavartmanā // MAnuv_1,4.121ab //
analyzed: vivakṣā atra tu nitya tve prādhānye ca ukta vartmanā
artha antarasya dūṣita tvāt iti arthaḥ
caśabdau itara utara samuccaye
tuśabdena nitya tvam viśinaṣṭi

original: nityatvaṃ prādhānyopapādakameva na tu svatantramekavijñānena sarvavijñānasyeti /
analyzed: nitya tvam prādhānya upapādakam eva na tu svatantram eka vijñānena sarva vijñānasya iti
vācā ārambhaṇam ityādi tu prādhānya viṣayam iti vivektavyam
vācā ārambhaṇa dṛṣṭāntasya pūrvam eva vyākhyāta tvāt kim punarvacanena iti ced na
buddhayā āroha artham uktasya api anuktena saha ekena vākyena ukti sambhavāt iti āśayena uktam uktā iti
sādṛśyāt eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam ācāryeṇa anyatra vyutpāditam atra anusandheyam
tathā mṛd piṇḍa ādi dṛṣṭāntānām avāntarabhedaḥ u pi iti
nanu asmin api pakṣe sadā iva somya idam agre āsīt
ityādeḥ uttara granthasya saṅgati abhāvaḥ doṣaḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu kāryakāraṇabhāvādiprapañcārthatvena astyupayoga ityata āha- prādhānyeti //
analyzed: asmākam tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi prapañca artha tvena asti upayogaḥ iti atas āha prādhānya iti
prādhānya pratipatti artham sṛṣṭayā ādeḥ ca eva vistaraḥ

original: ādipadena pralaye 'vasthānaṃ trivṛtkaraṇaṃ jīvarūpeṇa praveśanamityādikaṃ gṛhyate /
analyzed: ādi padena pralaye trivṛt karaṇam jīva rūpeṇa praveśanam iti ādikam gṛhyate
prādhānyāt brahma jñānena sarva jñānasya phalam bhavati iti ukte
kutas tasya prādhānyam iti āśaṅkāyām

original: tatpratipattyarthaṃ sṛṣṭayādeḥ pratipādaka eva granthavistaraḥ pravṛtto 'taḥ kathamasaṅgatiriti /
analyzed: tad pratipatti artham sṛṣṭayā ādeḥ pratipādakaḥ eva grantha vistaraḥ katham asaṅgatiḥ iti
caśabdaḥ va dhāraṇe
na tu upādāna tva ādi pratipatti artham iti
na hi upādanām prekṣā pūrvam kāryam karoti
na api adhiṣṭhānam adhyastam
eṣa ca iti vā sambandhaḥ
tena apāgāt agneḥ agni tvam
ityādi api parasya brahmaṇaḥ prādhānya pratipatti artham eva iti uktam bhavati
tathā ca uktam bhāṣye
vivarta mata nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti

original: tasmāt kenāpi mārgeṇa na vivartamataṃ bhavet // MAnuv_1,4.122ab //
analyzed: tasmāt kena api mārgeṇa na vivarta matam bhavet
kena api mārgeṇa iti
brahma avidyā apekṣayā vā
jīva avidyā pakṣeṇa vā
eka jīva matena vā
aneka jīva matena vā
sva pakṣa sādhanena vā
parapakṣa nirāsena vā
yukti paryālocanayā vā
śruti paryālocanayā vā
vicāritam iti śeṣaḥ
na bhavet upapannam iti adhyāhāraḥ
tatas kim iti atas āha tat iti
heyam eva śubha arthibhiḥ
tat vivarta matam
tasmāt itas vā
tasya eva vivaraṇam yasmāt iti
heyam eva tat
na tu tad ukta rītyā sūtra arthaḥ grāhyaḥ
etena para mata nirākaraṇasya asaṅgatiḥ api nirastā veditavyā
yadi ukta atirikta doṣāḥ santi
tarhi dūṣaṇa abhidhānāya pravṛttaiḥ vaktavyāḥ
kim uparameṇa iti atas āha asaṅkhaya tvena iti
asaṅkhaya tvena doṣāṇām grantha ādhikya bhayāt api
uparamyate
doṣāṇām ati bahu tvena kāṃścid uktvā keṣāṃcid upalakṣaṇeṇatve
na eva uparantavyam
upalakṣaṇam ca etāvatā api bhavati iti uparamyate iti
sarve pi vaktavyāḥ
kim upalakṣaṇa tvena iti atas uktam grantha iti
grantha ādhikye hi śrotṝṇām pravṛttiḥ na syāt
tathā ca kṛtam api akṛtam syāt iti bhayāt api iti arthaḥ
yadi nā upādāna tayā vibhrama adhiṣṭhāna tayā vā

original: kīdṛśaṃ tarhi janmādisūtre 'bhitihamityata āha- tata iti //
analyzed: kīdṛśam tarhi janma ādi sūtre bhitiham iti atas āha tatas iti
tatas viṣṇuḥ icchā pūrvakam aśramaḥ
karoti pitṛ vat viśvam
pariṇāma ādi vādasya nirasta tvāt iti arthaḥ
pitṛ vat icchā pūrvakam iti katṛ tvena nimitta tvam abhipraiti

original: vicitrānekakāryakartṛtve śramādidoṣāḥ prasajyanta ityata uktam- aśrama iti //
analyzed: vicitra aneka kārya kartṛ tve śrama ādi doṣāḥ prasajyante iti atas uktam aśramaḥ iti
tat uktam antaryāmi adhikaraṇe
yat vā āśrame iti enena idam abhipraiti
adhikam tu bheda nirdeśāt
ityādinā brahmaṇaḥ śrama ādiḥ nirasiṣyate
na ca apādāna ādeḥ śrama ādi prasaktiḥ asti
atas kartṛ tvam eva abhipretam sūtrakārasya iti

original: evamasminnadhyāye parabrahmaṇi nārāyaṇe pratipāditasya sakalaśrutisamanvayasya phalaṃ janmādisūtroditalakṣaṇasiddhimupasaṃharati- pūrṇeti //
analyzed: evam asmin adhyāye para brahmaṇi nārāyaṇe pratipāditasya sakala śruti samanvayasya phalam janma ādi sūtra udita lakṣaṇa siddhim upasaṃharati pūrṇa iti
pūrṇāḥ pratyekam niravadhikāḥ
iti śrīmat ānandatīrtha bhagavat pāda ācārya viracite śrīmat brahmasūtra anuvyākhyāne prathama adhyāyasya caturtha pādaḥ
